1b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ bi ma la pra b+ha pa ri pr-its+tsha/ bod skad du/ dri ma med pa'i
1b2(rgyud 'bum): 'od kyis zhus pa/ / // bam po dang po// thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal
1b3(rgyud 'bum): lo/ / gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i mdo bshad
2a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshe/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi yul thams cad bsrung ma rnams kyi lag tu so sor
2a2(rgyud 'bum): gtad pa na/ bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bzhugs nas/ lha thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir
2a3(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer btang ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa bskyed ma thag tu lha'i rgyal po thams cad
2a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dang bcas pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sman sngar 'dus so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis//
2b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po kun tu rgyal ba la bos te bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen
2b2(rgyud 'bum): po dag nga'i bka' chos dang ldan pa bzhin gyis la rim gro byos shig/ nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya
2b3(rgyud 'bum): lon pa na/ li yul zhes bya ba zhig 'byung bar 'gyur to/ de yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir ngas khyed kyi lag tu gtad
2b4(rgyud 'bum): do/ rgyal po rnam thos bu khyod dang // rdzu 'phrul chen po kun tu rgyal// klu yi dbang po ma dros dang // blo rab
2b5(rgyud 'bum): brtan po'i lha yi bu/ / nga yi tshig ni mnyan par gyis// yul 'di rgyal ba'i dbang po yis// 'dul ba yin
3a1(rgyud 'bum): te gzhan gyis min/ / gang dag ngas ni ma btul ba'i// sems can de dag li yul 'khor// sangs rgyas
3a2(rgyud 'bum): lung bstan grong khyer du/ / so sor skye ba len par 'gyur// nga yis sangs rgyas byang chub phyir// sdug bsngal chen po myong ba dang //
3a3(rgyud 'bum): smon lam chen po rab mang ba// btab par gyur pa'ang gang yin pa'i// bsod nams kyi ni tshogs de yis// yul 'di nga yi phyag mtshan
3a4(rgyud 'bum): gyur/ / zhi bar mya ngan nga 'das na// khyed rnams la ni gtad par bya// gang tshe nga yi byams pa yis// li yul 'di ni byung ba na//
3a5(rgyud 'bum): gu ma ti ra gnas mdze der// chos kyi rgyal po'i mchod rten du// bskal pa babrang po'i sangs rgyas rnams// de tshe 'dir ni 'dul bar
3a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / yul 'di yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir// nga yis khyed la byin pa yin// de nas rgyal po rnam thos bus// bcom ldan 'das
3b1(rgyud 'bum): la gsol ba ni/ / 'dren pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka'// gcag tu rung ba ma lags te// rab mchog rgyal bas bka' stsal pa'i// las 'di shin tu dka' ba lags// ston pa bcom ldan
3b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs bzhin du/ / yul dang ljongs rnams 'khrug pa mchis// khyod kyis dam chos bshad na yang // yongs su bsrung ba dkon lags na// ston pa mya ngan 'das pa'i tshe// lha yis
3b3(rgyud 'bum): bor ba'i yul dag tu/ / lha la sogs pa srung ba rnams// bka' bzhin mi nyan ci zhig smos// bdag cag rnams la thugs rje mdzod// gang zhig thos na lha rnams kun// khyod kyi bka'
3b4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin bgyid 'gyur ba/ / de 'dra'i chos ni bshad par gsol// sangs rgyas dpa' bo rnams kyi bka'// de ni sa steng gcag tu med// skye bo gang du ma byung ba'i// la sa ni shin tu dka'
3b5(rgyud 'bum): lags na/ / bcom ldan der ni bdag cag gis// ji ltar yongs su bsrung bar bgyi// sangs rgyas rnams ni dus gsum gzigs// kun mkhyen ye shes spyan dang ldan// rgyal ba skyes
3b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog de yi phyir/ / las 'di bdag cag mchid kyis 'tshal// de phyir gtad pa mnod par bgyi// rgyal bas sngar ni bka' stsal pa'i// las ni ji ltar bgyid 'gyur ba// de ltar
3b7(rgyud 'bum): byin gyis brlab par gsol/ / rgyal bas lung bstan grong khyer du// rgyal bas sngon ni lung bstan pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni// gzugs bzang sdom pa 'dzin
4a1(rgyud 'bum): pa yi/ / dge slong brgya phrag bcu gsum dang // dge slong ma ni nyis brgya 'byung // sdig pa'i las rnams gang dag gis// sngon ni smon lam bta 'a gyur cing /
4a2(rgyud 'bum): sdig byed phyogs ni lnga brgya po// de dag rnams kyang 'byung 'gyur te// dge byed la ni 'gregs bya phyir// yul 'di dag tu skye bar 'gyur// dge byed mdza' bo de dag kyang //
4a3(rgyud 'bum): yul dag tu skye ba len// rgyal bas lung bstan yul dag tu// legs pa rnams ni byed par 'gyur// ji ltar yul 'dir bdag cag rnams// legs par 'gyur dang bdag
4a4(rgyud 'bum): cag gis/ / ci nas gzung ba'i thabs btsal bar// bcom ldan bdag cag dam pa gsol// de la bcom ldan gsungs pa ni// dam pa'i mchog ni sbyin par byas// gnod
4a5(rgyud 'bum): sbyin dbang po dus kun tu/ / yul ni yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas bzang 'di// nga yi tshig gis gzung bar bgyis// yul de 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni//
4a6(rgyud 'bum): lha yi skyed mos tshal mchog bzhin// dge 'dun kun dga' ra bas brgyan// dri gtsang khang gis mdzes par byas// der ni dgon pa'i gnas rnams kyang // bde ba can dang 'dra
4a7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / dge slong dge slong ma yis gang // de dag theg pa mchog kyang ston// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas bzang der// mi rnams skyes pa gang yin pa// dge ba yi ni las
4b1(rgyud 'bum): byed cing / / byang chub phyir ni sngo bar byed// ji srid thub pa'i dbang po yis// bstan pa yul der gnas pa dang // mchod par byed pa de srid du// yul dag kyang ni gnas par 'gyur// bstan
4b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dag la ma mchod na/ / bsrung ma rnams ni 'khrug par 'gyur// yul yang yal bar 'dor ba dang // 'khrug pa'i sems kyis 'gro bar 'gyur// bsrung ma dag ni song ba dang // yul ni lha yi sa bor ba
4b3(rgyud 'bum): der/ / nad dang mu ges nyen pa dang // rgyal po dag kyang tshe thung 'gyur// bsrung ma kun tu khros pa yis// dpung rnams kyang ni med par byed// rgyal ba dam pa mchog gis// lha rnams la de skad ces
4b4(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal nas/ / de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das dpal 'od zer lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// smin mtshams kyi gseb nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer rnam
4b5(rgyud 'bum): byabyung ngo / / 'od zer de dag las kyang 'od zer tshad med grangs med pa 'byung bar 'gyur te// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du song nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
4b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs pa der tshig tu brjod pa 'di skad ces 'byung ste/ lha'i lha sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa gnod pa nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam zhes bya ba'i bar du 'dri'o// 'di skad ces kyang
4b7(rgyud 'bum): smras te/ sangs rgyas nyid kyi phyir ngas bskal pa mang por dka' ba byas so// dam pa'i chos bsdu ba'i phyir lus grangs med pa yongs su btang ba byas te sbyin pa mang po byin no// sdug bsngal shin tu mang
5a1(rgyud 'bum): po byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis ma myong ba dag nyams su myong ste/ deng bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rjes su thob par gyur to// da ni nga yongs
5a2(rgyud 'bum): su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus dang skabs su bab nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi yul rnams yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir bsrung ma rnams kyi lag tu byin no// lha rnams mya ngan nga 'das
5a3(rgyud 'bum): nas/ lo brgya lon pa de yi tshe// ming ni li yul zhes bya ba// rab tu 'byor pa 'byung bar 'gyur// bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' skyo ba rnams kyi//
5a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dul ba'i phyir ni chang kyu ste// rtog ge ba dang bral ba yin// bskal pa bzang po'i rgyal sras rnams// li yul 'khor gyi grong khyer der// skye ba dag kyang len 'gyur zhing // mig dang 'dra bar
5a5(rgyud 'bum): snang bar 'gyur/ / sems can rnams ni smin bya dang // chos kyang mnyan par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub spyod pa bzang po dag/ de tshe de kun spyod par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag/
5a6(rgyud 'bum): la dgongs// nyi ma'i snying po mdo sde che// mdo sde mchog ni bshad pa na// snying rjes non pa'i sems kyis su// yul de bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir// gzungs sngags rnams dang 'od
5a7(rgyud 'bum): zer dag/ ji ltar sngon ni bskur ba bzhin// sangs rgyas zhing ni thams cad nas// yul 'khor 'dir ni skyes kyi rnams// rgyal mchog rnams kyis bskur bar mdzod// bstan pa bsrung
5b1(rgyud 'bum): bar bya ba'i phyir/ / bdag la dgyes pas bskur bar mdzod// skyob pa shAkya seng ge yis// 'od zer de dag btang ba na// sangs rgyas zhing rnams song nas ni// de nyid du ni slar yang 'ongs
5b2(rgyud 'bum): de nas de ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la yul yongs su bskyang bar bzhed pa'i bstan pa
5b3(rgyud 'bum): yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ skyes bu 'od zer dag kyang btang / gzungs sngags dag kyang bskur te/ 'di skad ces kyang gsungs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis
5b4(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer dag kyang btang / gzungs sngags dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lag tu bskur ba de dag gi mtshan ni 'di zhes bya/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi ming yang 'di zhes bya'o//
5b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa mu stegs thams cad 'dzud pa la dpa' ba la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' tshig gsang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/
5b6(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya thA/ ba ra ba ra/ kA sha a ra/ tsakra ko She/ gu h+ye ka ba re sA hA/ gzungs sngags 'dis li yul gyi lha dang mi rnams la lha rnams dam pa sbyin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dga'
5b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i chos la dpa' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbang phyug la 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ ba ra ti/ ki pu li/ sha si ri pa hA re bA re swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'das
6a1(rgyud 'bum): ni tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa chos la zhugs pa shin tu 'phags pa'i tog gi gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' 'jig
6a2(rgyud 'bum): rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' rang gi yid la gsal ba'i tshig la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo//
6a3(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i tshig la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ hU kya ra te/ ho ho ho ho/ pA ru ra ra a bi ba ra/ ma bi ba ra Na ru he swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di su 'dzin pa ni ngan song
6a4(rgyud 'bum): ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur la/ sems can rnams kyi 'gro ba sngon gyi tshe rabs su ji lta bur gyur pa dang / tshe rabs phyi ma la cir 'gyur ba'ang shes par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
6a5(rgyud 'bum): pa bu sdug rgyal ba'i chos la 'phel ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' lha dang mi'i chos kyi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ d+ha ra s+thi ta/ ta tha tA/ badz+ri bi sa re ta tha tA re
6a6(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'dis ni gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal
6a7(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya thA/ a ba hi/ sarba ta thA ga ta b+hU ta ko Ti/ ba ti ba ti/ ba Ti ra Ti swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi shing drung du byang chub thob par 'gyur ro//
6b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' dpal rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ tA pu Te dra ba ne/ sarba si ra Te/ gu h+ya man+ta ta tha tA d+ha na swA hA/ gzungs
6b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba chen po mdzad par 'gyur zhing / sems can rnams ca sdug bsngal dang nad rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag
6b3(rgyud 'bum): med la phyag 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' snang gsal la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ rat+na ka te ba gri pa ti ti Ta b+ha ti tsan+d+he swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa' sangs
6b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi zhing rnams yongs su sbyong bar byed de/ su 'di 'dzin pa'i lus dang sems kyi sdug bsngal rnams zad par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub
6b5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ b+hin de ri bi sa ma sa tsa ga ba/ daR+sha na ra sh+mi/ sa man+ta daR+sha
6b6(rgyud 'bum): na ra Ne swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'dis ni byang chub sems dpas bya ba thams cad shes par gyur to// 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas rgyu chen po rnams mdzad do// sangs rgyas
6b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gis gzungs sngags 'di dag yul kun tu srung ba'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la skyes su bskur ro// de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpa' bar 'gro
7a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dang po thugs bskyed pa nas/ byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug pa'i bar gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad dang / chos la gus
7a2(rgyud 'bum): par yang dag par rjes su dgongs so/ / de nas rang gi don dang lha la sogs pa'i don gyi phyir/ de dag la yul gtams shing gtad do// tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang / lha thams cad kyi
7a3(rgyud 'bum): gzungs sngags 'di'ang brjod par bya'o/ / na mo brah+ma Ne/ na maHsarba de bA nAn/ tad+ya thA/ brah+ma na in+d+ra/ de ba ta pra tiSh+Thi te/ a shwa s+thA ne/ ba ra in+ne/ sA pa ra pa raM/ ha rA k+Shim in+ne/ san ta thAsma ra pa
7a4(rgyud 'bum): ra ha re/ oM b+he ku pa kra krI grI shri/ a lad+hA ra/ sarba de ba grA ba swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'dis lha dang mi rnams rgyal ba thob par 'gyur zhing / dgras kyang de la gnod par mi byed la/ dbang phyug thams
7a5(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi bdag por 'gyur ro/ / li yul du gang la la rgyal por 'gyur ba de 'di snyam du/ li yul 'di ni skye bo drung mi mang pos gang zhing / nor dang 'bru mang pos rgyas pa yin te/ yul thams cad
7a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi mchog dam pa yin pas/ gzhan gyi dmag tshogs 'ong bar mi nus so snyam du sems par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe rgyal po des dgon pa dang / dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba dang / grong khyer dang /
7a7(rgyud 'bum): grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad du dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / yul gyi mi thams cad sngar bsha
7b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams klog tu gzhug par bya'o/ / 'dzin du gzhug par bya'o// kun chub par byed du gzhug go/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang /
7b2(rgyud 'bum): dge bsnyen ma de dag dang / yul na gnas pa'i mi de dag la'ang phye ma dang / gos dang / gdug dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba ngan rnams dang / kha zas dang / btung ba sna tshogs dang / mchod
7b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i las sna tshogs dang / yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror bya'o// btsun par bya'o// bsti stang du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// de ltar byas na li yul de gnod pa thams cad med pa dang /
7b4(rgyud 'bum): phyir rgol ba'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dpung gis rgyal po de'i yul gzhig par mi nus so// de nas yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngag nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis rang rang
7b5(rgyud 'bum): gi mtshan dang / 'od zer dang / gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams bskur ro// brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa lha'i rgyal po sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / lha'i
7b6(rgyud 'bum): bu kun tu rgyal ba la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i 'od de dang / go ma sa la gan da'i mchod rten mchod pa'i byang chub sems
7b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' nyi khri po de dag dang / klu'i rgyal po gdon la gnyems pa la sogs pa khri brgya stong po gang yin pa de dag gi lag tu/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems
8a1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' thams cad kyi gnas/ bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi phyag mtshan du gyur pa/ li yul dang thub pa drang srong chen po'i gnas su
8a2(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa/ go ma sa la gan da'i mchod rten de dang / dge slong dang dge slong ma'i dge 'dun de dag bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / 'tshe ba med par bya ba dang / 'bye bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
8a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa li yul na gnas pa de yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir gtad do// sangs rgyas kyi mtshan 'di dag dang / 'od zer 'di dag dang / gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di
8a4(rgyud 'bum): dag snying rjes non pa'i thugs dang ldan pa dang / gsol ba chen po btab pas skyes su bskur nas// de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bka' mnyan te/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa
8a5(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa lha'i rgyal po sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde'i bdag po de dag dang / klu'i rgyal po de dag dang / dri ma med pa'i 'od la sogs pa
8a6(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / 'khor de dag thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar te/ li yul de dang thub pa'i drang srong chen po'i gnas go ma sa la gan da'i mchod rten de dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan
8a7(rgyud 'bum): pa de dag srung ba'i phyir mnos so/ / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag dang / 'od zer de dag dang / gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag kyang yul srung ba'i phyir mnos so// 'od zer de dag kyang
8b1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi lus la gnas par gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims la rab tu gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gsheg pa zhi bas rol pa la phyag 'tshal
8b2(rgyud 'bum): lo/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' la rab tu gnas pa la phyag 'tshal
8b3(rgyud 'bum): lo/ de bzhin gshegs pa mtshon cha rab tu 'jil ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa spyan brgya pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer bzang po la phyag
8b4(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i rnam pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i rnams pa la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer
8b5(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi'i lo ma zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / zhi bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / lo ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / ka zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / me zhes bya ba'i
8b6(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer dang / gnas pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / thogs med sbyin zhes bya ba'i 'od zer
8b7(rgyud 'bum): yid dang 'thad pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / bar chad med pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / rims med rgyal mtshan bye ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'khrug med gnas zhes bya ba'i 'od
9a1(rgyud 'bum): zer dang / rtog gi blo gros zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / grong khyer du 'bab pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'khor lo snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / dpa' bo'i tog
9a2(rgyud 'bum): ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / rdo rje'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / bsod nams kyi tog ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / bsam gtan gyi tog ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / me lce dang ldan pa zhes
9a3(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i 'od zer dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / byang chub kyi yan lag ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / zhi gnas kyi 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i 'od
9a4(rgyud 'bum): zozer dang / nor bu snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / dpa' bo'i rin chen zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / zla ba snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / nyi ma snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / ye she
9a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / snang ba'i rin po che zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / dbang po'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'jig rten snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / snying rjes
9a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / rgyal ba dam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / shes rab kyi snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / me zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'jig rten gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i
9a7(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer dang / rab rib kyi rnam pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / rgyal ba mchog ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'jig rten gyi rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'od chen
9b1(rgyud 'bum): po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / ko ka ra zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / a'i tshul du byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / dzats+tshar+ya zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / dpa' bo byed pa'i dpa' bo rgyal
9b2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'od chen po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / mi bskyod pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / rgyal mtshan blo gros zhes
9b3(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'bad pa mtho ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / bden pa can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / mgu bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / rab sgrogs zhes bya ba'i 'od
9b4(rgyud 'bum): zer dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / rdo rje blo gros zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / stong pa'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / dpa' ba'i rgyal
9b5(rgyud 'bum): mo zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / mtho ris su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / zhi ba'i rtog ces bya ba'i 'od zer
9b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / bsam gtan gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / dga' ba'i rtog ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'dam bu lta bu'i 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / mig snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer
9b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / klu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / klung gi 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / skyes bu'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'bar ba can zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / me zhes bya ba'i
10a1(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer dang / pad+ma'i 'od ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / dbang po'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'dri ba'i tshul zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / bskyod pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer
10a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / dbang po la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'khrug pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / sa'i rgyal mtshan ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / bden pa'i tog ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang
10a3(rgyud 'bum): snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / dang ra ba'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / dbang po la brten pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / yid la 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / rab tu 'gro mdze
10a4(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / dpral ba'i rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / legs 'bar zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'dri bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / nyi ma 'khor ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang /
10a5(rgyud 'bum): nye bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / ye shes kyi chu zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / bden pa snang
10a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / sangs rgyas kyi rnam pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / gtsug tor zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / rdo rje la gnas pa zhes
10a7(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i 'od zer dang / bsod nams kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / lce'i tog ces bya ba'i 'od zer dang / yid dang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer dang / 'di dag ni
10b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer yin no/ / Shar+than+ta/ lo ka sUr/ bud+d+ha ka ru b+hI ti praN+Da li ba/ kA ru le swAt+ma/ sdig pa gcod par byed pa zhes bya'o// tad+yathA/ shud+d+hA ma ti/ ad tsa shwe pu la tsa
10b2(rgyud 'bum): a kra ma te/ tsu rA ka re pu sA hA/ dga' byed snying rje zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ in+d+ra/ in+d+ra/ b+h+r-i dre/ bA de bi pu re swA hA/ rdo rje blo gros zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ Tha ke ba ke/ dza dzam+b+ha/ b+hU ma dzA ra
10b3(rgyud 'bum): sA hA/ pad+ma'i 'dul zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ shu ra re be A lo ka/ ko sha ga re swA hA/ 'bye bar byed pa zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ tsa le bi ta thA/ a no na/ pradzA ka re swA hA/ sbyor ba med pa zhes
10b4(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / tad+ya thA/ dzi dzi re/ ha ra hA le/ le le pradz+nyA ka re sA hA/ 'gog pa med pa zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ badz+re shrI ka re/ sa ra sa ra/ a rA mAdz+nye/ ni ri re kI/ na ri saM ri dzA kA re pu swA hA/
10b5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ a pu re/ bi ba re/ sa da re/ ma kha ka r-i swA hA/ bden pa la gnas pa zhes bya'o// tad+ya thA/ dz+yo ti dz+nye ti/ badz+re a/ ak+Sha man+ta be/ bra ga a
10b6(rgyud 'bum): be badz+ri mA ba/ su ka ka re swA hA/ gzungs sngags kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal mo zhes bya ste/ gzungs sngags 'di ni pha rol gyi dmag tshogs zhi bar byed pa dang dge ba'i tshogs yongs su rdzogs
10b7(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa'o/ / tad+ya thA/ di shA kA re/ s+thA kA raM/ in+d+ra ba te/ ba prA ti sa pra ti u s+thA ti swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di ni mu ge med par byed pa dang dbul ba med par byed pa'o//
11a1(rgyud 'bum): dam pa gang 'dod pa thams cad kyang thob par 'gyur te/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du nyin lan bzhi mtshan lan bzhi ste/ dus brgyad du lan nyi shu rtsa re re bzlas brjod
11a2(rgyud 'bum): byas nas gter ram/ yang na nor gang sa'i 'og tu sbas pa gzhan thob par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ o he mo he dzam+b+ha ya/ ma sha man+ta kA/ da ma kA re la b+ha kA re bi kA re saM bi dzA kA re da ka di a d+hA ka/
11a3(rgyud 'bum): pra sha ma ne phu/ a ka na pra sha ma ne phuHswA hA/ nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa dang / bud med du skye ba las thar par byed pa dang / bud med rnams kyi bud med kyi na da rab tu zhi bar byed pa ste/
11a4(rgyud 'bum): brtul zhugs bya mi dgos par ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du dus gsum du bzlas brjod bya'o// bud med gang la la mo mtshan gyi nang yod pa de la ni nyin gcig bzhin du lan bdun bdun du bzlas
11a5(rgyud 'bum): brjod bya'o/ / tad+ya thA/ ka ka/ ko sha phu/ ma ma/ ra ra ra ra/ sta re phuHsa ka re pu swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di ni gnod pa 'byung ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad med par byed par bshad de/
11a6(rgyud 'bum): brtul zhugs bya mi dgos so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag gi mtshan sngar smos pa dang / gang dag gis gzungs sngags bshad pa de dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa byang
11a7(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na grogs su gyur pa sha stag go/ sangs rgyas de dag gis mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i phyag mtshan li yul
11b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dir skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis skye ba blangs te/ sngar smos pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dang de dag gis/ bcom ldan
11b2(rgyud 'bum): 'das shAkya thub pa'i li yul yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir gzungs sngags de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag skyes su bskur te/ sarba
11b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi sras rnams kyis zhus nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis sems can thams kyi don gyi phyir dang / li yul yongs su bskyang
11b4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la skyes de dag blangs nas 'dir khyer te 'ongs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs na gnas
11b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mang po dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyis lung bstan pa'i yul 'di ci nas 'jig par mi 'gyur ba dang / bstan pa'ang yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'dir
11b6(rgyud 'bum): lhags nas skye ba blangs so/ / gang gi tshe yul der gnod pa byung na// de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag dang / gzungs sngags de dag dang / 'od zer sngar bshad pa de dag
11b7(rgyud 'bum): bris te/ grong khyer gyi sgo rnams su gtsugs la/ dmag gi ru mtshon la'ang bris te bzhag nas/ mi rnams kyang klog tu bcug cing 'chang du bcug na/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jig
12a1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / mu ges 'jigs pa dang / las 'byung bar bya ba dang / dge ba'i phyogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyis ji lta bur bsams pa bzhin
12a2(rgyud 'bum): du phan 'dogs par 'gyur ro/ / sems can nad pa rnams la'ang skyabs byed par 'gyur ro// gang la sdig pa'i las shin tu lci ba dag yod na'ang / des zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du sangs rgyas
12a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi mtshan dang / gzungs sngags dang / 'od zer rnams bzlas brjod bya zhing / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dran par bya'o// gang na sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten
12a4(rgyud 'bum): nam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bzhugs pa de'i spyan sngar dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na/ dge ba'i phyogs las gang 'dod pa de myur du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ 'od zer de dag
12a5(rgyud 'bum): kyang de'i steng du gnas par 'gyur ro/ / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ongs na'ang bzlas brjod bya'o// yang na zhag bdun gyi bar du bklag par bya'o// su'ang rung ste gnod pa byung ba 'am/ nad pa
12a6(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ ji lta bur 'dod pa las bzlas brjod bya ba 'am/ yang na bklag par bya'o// ci ste klog mi nus na de'i tshe skud pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te mdud pa byas nas btags na/ gnod
12a7(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ / grong khyer gang gi sgo dag tu sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang / gzungs sngags dang / 'od zer rnams bris te gzhag na/ grong khyer de gzhan gyi dmag
12b1(rgyud 'bum): tshogs kyis gzhom par mi nus so/ / rtag tu bzlas brjod byed pa la ni sha spang mi dgos so// dngos po gzhan yang spang mi dgos so// de nas rigs kyi bu gang dag sangs rgyas
12b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi rjes su rab tu byung ba de dag shin tu dgongs shing bag tsha bar gyur pa de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so//
12b3(rgyud 'bum): dag bag tsha ba ma byed cig/ khyed kyi don gyi phyir dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba mang po dang / chos kyi rgyal pos byas pa'i dri gtsang khang la sogs pa/ sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten yul
12b4(rgyud 'bum): der 'byung bar 'gyur te/ ji srid du yul de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa gnas kyi bar du yul de ma lus par gzhig nus pa'i rgyal po 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/
12b5(rgyud 'bum): dang ra ldan zhes bya ba yid du 'ong ba dang / phag gis mtshon pa'i grong khyer dang / grong khyer rnying pa de dag gsum yang / ji srid du sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa gnas shing / dge 'dun thams cad la
12b6(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten ka pi lan yod kyi bar du de dag 'jig par mi 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ rgyal
12b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sras thams cad la bos te bsgo ba/ kye grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha la sogs pa yul yongs su skyong ba gang yin pa dag gis chos dang mi ldan pa'i rgyal
13a1(rgyud 'bum): pos yul de gzhig pa na yal bar ma dor cig/ la la zhig gis sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma mnyan te 'jig pa'i tshe yul gtang bar gyur na/ bla na med pa yang dag
13a2(rgyud 'bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las bskal pa mang por bar chad du 'gyur ro/ / de nas gzungs sngags bshad do// tad+ya thA/ kA le/ a kA le/ nish+na me pra be sha/ a kA le kA le/
13a3(rgyud 'bum): a ni shrA me/ a pra be sha/ pa ri sa me pa ri sa me ti/ sa sa se/ a sa sa se/ sa ku te/ pa ru re/ pa ru re/ A ga me/ a sa ma mo hai/ sid+d+he sid+d+ha ya/ na mo bai ro tsa nA ya swA hA/
13a4(rgyud 'bum): phaT Te Ne sA te A sa te su san ne/ sA ru ste/ sid+d+he sid+d+ha ya swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa s+phun ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ li yul gyi rgyal por gyur pa la dris
13a5(rgyud 'bum): nas/ 'di ni khyod kyi skyes yin no// ji ltar khyod kyis byas pa dang / khyod kyis dkon mchog gsum gyi phyir lus dang srog btang bar byas pa gang yin pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sras rnams
13a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi las de lta bu yin te/ khyod kyis legs par byas pa yin no// gang gi tshe yul du dgra chen po'i 'jigs pa byung bar gyur pa na/ de'i tshe mdo sde 'di bklag par bya'o// bcang bar bya'o//
13a7(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bya'o// 'on tang 'jigs pa thams cad zhi bar gyur te/ sa ha ba ti'ang grogs byed par 'gyur ro// yul srung ba'i phyir mdo 'di cho ga bzhin du bris te/ rgyal po'i pho
13b1(rgyud 'bum): zang du bcang bar bya'o/ / rgyal po'i pho brang gi phyi rol dang grong khyer gyi sgo rnams su'ang de bzhin du bris te gzhag par bya'o// lam po che dang / srung dang / bzhi mdo dang / sum
13b2(rgyud 'bum): mdo rnams dang / khyim bdag rnams kyi khyim du'ang gzhag par bya'o// gang gi tshe mang du bklags sam/ bslabs sam/ bcangs na de'i tshe yul der yams kyi nad dang /
13b3(rgyud 'bum): gnod pa rnams las thar par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis de skad ces smras pa na/ bar snang la gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis lha'i ni//
13b4(rgyud 'bum): tog gi char ni phab/ lha'i sil snyan rnams ni dkrol/ lha'i rnga bo che rnams ni brdungs te/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha dang / klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyis tshig 'di skad
13b5(rgyud 'bum): ces brjod do/ / gang gi tshe yul der gzungs sngags de dag dang / 'od zer de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag 'ong bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang ji ltar sngon bcom
13b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i thad du 'ongs pa bzhin du phyi bzhin 'ong bar bya'o/ / rgyal po de la'ang yul srung ba'i phyir bdag cag gis gzungs sngags sbyin par byas te/ dam pa ci slong
13b7(rgyud 'bum): bapa de bzhin du sbyin par bya'o/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhig bud med kyi gzugs kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od zer gyis so sor brgyan pa zhes bya ba na
14a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dug pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa'i rgyu skar gyi rgyal po mngon par shes pa'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i mngon sum du smon lam btab
14a2(rgyud 'bum): ste/ ci nas bdag mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mchis la/ der bcom ldan 'das de las dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar
14a3(rgyud 'bum): po zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs thos par gyur cig/ der bdag gis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / na las thar par bgyid par gyur cig ces de skad du smon
14a4(rgyud 'bum): lam btab nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas shi 'phos nas/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i pho brang du btsun mo dam pa'i bu mor skyes
14a5(rgyud 'bum): ste/ dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bar gyur to// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i bu mor gyur pa dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba de nyid 'khor de'i nang du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan
14a6(rgyud 'bum): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya lags pa na/ li yul yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du bdag gis kyang bkas gtad
14a7(rgyud 'bum): pa mnos par 'tshal lo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar gsungs pa'i 'od zer btang ba rnams gang gi tshe bdag gi steng du gnas par 'gyur ba na/ gzungs gang gis
14b1(rgyud 'bum): gzungs thams cad rtogs par 'gyur ba'i gzungs de'ang bdag gis bud med kyi gzugs kyis thob par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe li yul du 'jigs pa chen po byung bar gyur pa na/
14b2(rgyud 'bum): de'i tshe yul yongs su bsrung ba dang / bstan pa'ang yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bdag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs par gyur cig/ thags
14b3(rgyud 'bum): kyang ston par gyur cig/ lha rnams kyang dam pa stsol bar gyur cig/ de bzhin du bdag der mi'i bud med gzhan 'dra bar bud med tha mal pa'i gzugs su snang bar gyur cig/ sangs
14b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi 'od zer de dag bdag gi steng du gnas pa'ang thob par gyur cig/ sems can gnod pas nyen pa rnams dang / nad kyis thebs pa rnams dang / sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de dag
14b5(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par bgyi ba'i slad du/ gzungs sngags de dag kyang bdag gis thob par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe rgyal po chen po de dag phan tshun 'thab pa dang / gang gi tshe
14b6(rgyud 'bum): gdong dmar gyis li yul gyi yul 'khor khyer ba na'ang der bdag bud med kyi skye ba len par gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dam pa'i chos
14b7(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma dkar po gsungs pa gang lags pa de'ang ba dag 'dzin par gyur cig/ mdo sde 'di las gzungs sngags 'byung ba rnams kyang rtogs par gyur cig/ sems can 'dul ba'i slad
15a1(rgyud 'bum): du sgra thams cad la rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang rtogs par gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyis sems can thams cad la
15a2(rgyud 'bum): phan 'dogs par gyur cig/ li yul gyi bsrung ma gang lags pa'i lha rnams la'ang chos kyi sbyin pa dang mchod pa'i las bgyid par gyur cig/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dam
15a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po 'di dang / lha gang dag gis mdo sde 'di sten cing mnos pa de dag kyang bdag gi dbang du gyur cig/ de nas bsrung ma rnam thos kyi bu dang / srin mi lam
15a4(rgyud 'bum): bkon ti dang / srin mo thams cad dang / grogs mo dang bcas pa dang / 'phrog ma bu dang 'khor du bcas pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das dang lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi tshig
15a5(rgyud 'bum): thos nas/ stan las langs te thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to// gang gi tshe lha mo 'di li yul du skye ba len par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ bdag cag kyang grogs bgyid pa'i slad du
15a6(rgyud 'bum): bzung ma bgyid cing / theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po dang / li yul gyi yul 'khor sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis btad pa khyod kyis mnos so zhes
15a7(rgyud 'bum): dran par bgyi'o/ / de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis/ lha mo de'i dam bcas pa 'di thos nas 'di skad ces gsol to// gang gi tshe lha mo 'di li yul srung ba'i slad
15b1(rgyud 'bum): du skye ba len par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pas kyang yul srung ba dang bsams pa bzhin du 'byor par bgyi ba'i slad du grogs bgyi'o// de'i tshe lha mo dri ma
15b2(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i 'od stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la dam pa gsol zhing
15b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan skur smon lam btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin du sems par gyur cig/ brtson 'grus gang ci rtsom pa de
15b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad grub par gyur cig/ lus brtan pa dang / sems brtan pa dang / sems can gyi don bgyid pa dang / bsams pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa dang / yul gyi slad du sems
15b5(rgyud 'bum): mngon par brtson par gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos pud+ma dkar po'i mdo sdes sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa dang ting nge 'dzin yang thob par gyur cig ces smras so// lha mos
15b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar de skad ces smras pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das dang lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi steng du lha'i me tog gi char bab bo// de'i tshe lha mo dri med 'od// byang chub sems
15b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa'i gnas mdzes pa/ / li yul du ni skyes shig ces// rgyal ba'i spyan sngar smon lam btab// skyob pa shAkya seng ge yi// bstan pa ji srid gnas pa'i bar// de srid bar du bdag kyang
16a1(rgyud 'bum): der/ rtag tu skye ba 'dzin gyur cig/ rgyal ba'i spyan sngar gang gi tshe// lha mos smon lam btab pa na// sangs rgyas zhing bzhugs rgyal rnams kyis// de tshe legs
16a2(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba byin/ / lha mo yul gyi bsrung ma la// rgyal ba rnams kyis legs byin pa// rnam thos bu dang gnod sbyin dbang // kun tu rgyal gyis de bzhin thos// de tshe rnam thos bu la sogs// lha
16a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams gang dag der 'dus pas/ / bcom ldan 'das la tshig gis gsol// li yul yongs su srung ba'i phyi // lha rab dam pa mthun gyur pa// bdag cag gis ni yul yang bzung //
16a4(rgyud 'bum): gang tshe gser gyi rigs drag dang // skar rdo'i yul ni mdzes gyur pa// li ni dpung bar gyur pa na// gser gyi dpya ni 'jal bar 'gyur// de tshe lha mos gsol pa ni// skar rdo dang ni gse
16a5(rgyud 'bum): gyi rigs/ / lha rnams kyis ni srung ba'i phyir// rgyal ba skyes mchog stsol bar mdzod// sa 'dir sngon gyi tshe rabs su// gang tshe bdag ni dge bsnyen ma// ming ni hu shar gyur pa na// yul
16a6(rgyud 'bum): 'di gnyis ni bdag gi lags/ / de yi 'khor du rgyal byung ba// oMr+yan bdag po dbang phyug po// rgyal po stan las langs nas kyang // pus mo gnyis ni sa la btsugs// bcom ldan
16a7(rgyud 'bum): 'das la gsol pa ni/ / gang gi tshe na li yul zhes// bya ba de ni 'byung 'gyur zhes// yongs su rgyas shing skye bos gang // de tshe skar rdo'i yul dag tu// stobs chen rgyal por bdag gyur
16b1(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / der ni li yul bdag po dang // rtag tu gnyen ni bgyid pa dang // bdag gis yul de srung ba'i phyir// bdag nyid kyang ni dbul bar bgyi// de yi tshe ni dri med 'od// lha mos smon lam 'di
16b2(rgyud 'bum): skad btab/ / gang tshe yul gyi dbang po 'dir// sum pa mang po 'ong ba dang // gang tshe yul 'dir rgya dang ni// 'azha dang ni sum pa rnams// 'phags skyes po yi dmag bzhin du// yul der
16b3(rgyud 'bum): 'ong bar gyur pa na/ / de tshe yul 'dir skye bo'i phyir// bdag gis skye ba blang bar bgyi// bdag gis skye ba der blangs pas// sum pa la sogs ldog gyur cig/ li yul na ni gnas rnams
16b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ / sngon ni gang du las bgyis pa// der ni bdag kyang dga' bzhin du// bdag gis su ni las rnams bgyis// der ni sngon gyi rgyal po gang // blon po khyim bdag yul mi dang //
16b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag la sdug par gyur pa dang // de dag dang ni bral bar 'gyur// de tshe bdag ni gcig pu sdug/ mi gtsang ting 'dzin thob gyur nas// der ni skyo bar gyur pa na// sngon gyi smon lam
16b6(rgyud 'bum): dran gyur cig/ de tshe de yi 'khor du ni// ka s+pha ra yi bdag po rgyal// des ni lha mo dri med 'od// smras pa thos par gyur nas kyang // rgyal po stan las langs nas ni// 'di skad kyi ni
16b7(rgyud 'bum): tshig kyang smras/ / bdag gis tshe rabs snga mar ni// mi bzad las byas gang yin pas// shAkya rnams ni brlag pa'i phyir// bdag ni rgyal po 'phags skyes dang // mdzes pa'i yul
17a1(rgyud 'bum): du lhan cig dong / / las de'i rnam smin mi bzad pa// tshe 'di la ni mi myong bar// bdag ni 'di skad smon lam 'debs// gang gi tshe na sum pa dang // 'azha dag
17a2(rgyud 'bum): der dong ba dang / / bdag gis sngon shAkya'i yul du 'phags skyes po'i g.yul ngor las byas pa gang yin pa de gang gi tshe lha mo 'di skyo ba chen por gyur pa na// de'i tshe bdag 'di'i phar gyur
17a3(rgyud 'bum): la/ bdag gi phyir 'di skyo bar gyur cing // dang por gzungs thob par gyur pa bzhin du des bdag kyang sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar gyur cig ces byas so// rgyal po de'i
17a4(rgyud 'bum): btsun mo dam pa 'khor de nyid kyi nang du 'dug pa des smon lam btab pa/ de'i tshe bdag kyang lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi mar gyur la/ bdag gis 'phags skyes po'i dmag slar log
17a5(rgyud 'bum): la/ sdig pa'i las chen po 'di lta bu byas te/ ci bya zhes 'gyod btab pa'i dge ba'i sems bskyed pa gang yin pa des na/ li yul der bdag 'chi ba'i dus lo ma bab kyi bar du bdag
17a6(rgyud 'bum): gis li yul de nyid du mi rtag pa nyid mthong nas/ gang gi tshe der 'a zha dang sum pa 'ong ba de'i tshe bdag 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du bdag skye bar gyur
17a7(rgyud 'bum): cig ces byas so/ / lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od de'i ming po rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i bu gang yin pa de'ang shin tu nga rgyal che zhing rgyags pas g.yul 'gyed pa blta ba'i phyir/ shAkya'i
17b1(rgyud 'bum): yul der rgyal po 'phags skyes po'i dmag gi zla la 'ongs nas/ des kyang g.yul der mi bsad pa la sogs pa'i sdig byas te/ gang gi tshe der sems can mang po shi ba mthong ba de'i tshe/ des
17b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas mthong nas 'gyod pa chen po dang skyo bar gyur te/ de'i tshe des lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od la smras pa/ nga ni khyod kyi ming po shin tu sdug pa yin pas/ ngas dmag de'i nang du sdig pa'i
17b3(rgyud 'bum): las byas pa khyod kyis thos nas rjes su yi rang bar gyur te/ khyod kyi yid kyis mi dge ba thob par gyur pa gang yin pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des na/ khyod kyi yul du sum pa'i dmag
17b4(rgyud 'bum): 'ong bar gyur te/ de'i tshe'ang da ltar ji lta ba bzhin du de rang khyod kyi sdug pa'i ming por gyur la/ khyod kyis gcig pu lung med pa mi gtsang ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba dang / khyod
17b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis thog ma kho nar gzungs thob par 'gyur ba bzhin du de'i tshe nga'ang khyod kyi mthus/ sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i sdug bsngal rnams las thar par gyur nas/ gnod sbyin
17b6(rgyud 'bum): gyi dbang po rnam thos kyi bu'i g.yog byed pa'i gnod sbyin A dzu la zhes bya bar gyur la/ ngas rtag tu khyod srung zhing / ngas rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa de dag dang / gnod sbyin gzhan
17b7(rgyud 'bum): de dag dang / lha'i pho brang sum cu rtsa gnyis dag tu lha'i rgyal po de dag la dran par bskul te/ gang gi tshe khyod la dgos pa de'i tshe 'ongs nas ci 'dod pa sgrub par gyur cig ces
18a1(rgyud 'bum): smras so/ / der lha mo de nyid kyi nu mo tha chung rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i bu mor gyur pa des smon lam btub pa/ bdag gi ming po 'phags skyes po'i dmag gi zla la sdig
18a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i las byas pa bdag gis thos nas dga' bar gyur pa'i las des na/ der yang khyod kyi nu mor gyur la/ gang gi tshe las de'i rnam par smin pas bdag mya ngan gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed
18a3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ khyod de lta bur skyo bar gyur pa na/ bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed nas// chos gang gis 'bras bu dang po thob ste/ sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
18a4(rgyud 'bum): chos thos nas/ de'i tshe sngon dang phyi ma'i las rnams dran par gyur cig ces byas so// der lha mo de'i ming po tha chung du gyur cing / dge bsnyen ma hu sha zhes bya bar gyur pa/ phyin chad de'i ming
18a5(rgyud 'bum): por gyur pa de'i sngon gyi las kyis sems can rnams skrag par byas pa des/ sring mo bcom ldan 'das kyi sman sngar sngon smon lam 'debs pa'ang mthong la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
18a6(rgyud 'bum): smon lam btab nas/ li yul gyi yul 'khor yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir mnos pa'ang mthong ngo // de nas lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi ming po tha chung rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i bus/ bcom
18a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / sngon bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mang po la bsnyen bkur byas te/ dus thams
18b1(rgyud 'bum): cad du skyes par gyur nas rgyal srid kyi bgyi ba mang po'ang bgyis so/ / bdag gi sring mo 'di'ang bud med kyi gzugs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa lags te/ 'dis li
18b2(rgyud 'bum): yul yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du sdug par blangs pa de ni las chen po mchid kyis 'tshal ba lags te/ bud med kyi bsam pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mkhyen par byas so//
18b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das ci nas kyang bdag gi steng du 'od zer rnams btang ba de lta bur bdag la byin gyis brlab par gsol/ ci nas kyang yul srung ba'i slad du grogs bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / bdag gi rigs
18b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis yun ring por li yul du yul 'dzin par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gzungs kyang stsal bar gsol/ skye ba blangs te 'bras bu thob nas gum pa'i 'og tu'ang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar gyur cig/ gang
18b5(rgyud 'bum): gi tshe li yul du sum pa 'am/ gdong dmar rnams 'ong bar 'gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag skar rdo'i yul gyi rgyal por gyur te/ lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od 'di'i ming por gyur la/ li yul dar bar bgyi
18b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i slad du bdag de'i grogs bgyid par gyur cig ces byas so/ / gang gi tshe gzhon nu des de skad ces gsol nas/ smon lam yang btab pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das bdud las rnam par
18b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / lha rnams kyis kyang lha'i me tog gi char pha ba ste/ lha'i sil snyan rnams dkrol lo// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las
19a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhengs nas bka' stsal pa/ ngas thog ma sems bskyed pa nas/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du bsod nam+ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa de dag dang //
19a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa mang po gzhan dag ji lta ba bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi 'ophrin las mang po mdzad pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po chen po de dag dang / cho 'phrul de dag ngas gcig tu bsdus
19a3(rgyud 'bum): tertagacig tu brtul bas/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus su lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od 'dis yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir/ lag tu blangs pa'i lali yul gyi yul 'khor rab tu gnas par bya'o//
19a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las mi snang bar gyur te/ phyogs gang du li yul dang thub pa'i drang srong chen po'i gnas go ma sa la gan d+ha'i mchod rten 'byung bar 'gyur
19a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyogs der bzhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das de na bzhugs bzhin du dpal thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ye shes sgron ma zhes
19a6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i 'od zer btang ngo / / bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la gnas pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyis kyang gnas gcig na 'khod bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das gang du li yul 'byung bar
19a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba'i phyogs de ni skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs par mthong ngo / / thub pa'i drang srong chen po'i gnas ri glang ru zhes bya ba'i ri de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sngon
19b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na grogs su gyur pa gang yin pa de dag gis kyang 'od zer de dag btang te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid ni gang du goms
19b2(rgyud 'bum): la gan d+hA'i mchod rten gyi chos kyi 'khor lo 'byung bar 'gyur ba de'i bar snang la bzhugs so/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gang dang gang dag tu dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba dang /
19b3(rgyud 'bum): dgon pa'i gnas dang / dri gtsang khang dang / mchod rten chen po rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i chu'i nang gi pad+ma'i steng de dang de dag la 'khod do// de nas der sangs rgyas bcom ldan
19b4(rgyud 'bum): ' das kyis gzungs sngags gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos thams cad thugs su chud par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi chos kyi spyi bo zhes bya ba 'di
19b5(rgyud 'bum): bshad do/ / tad+ya thA/ a ba ba ra/ pra t+ya ba ba ra/ pra dz+nyA ba bA ra/ bud+d+ha ba bA ra/ sad+d+harmA ba ba ra/ shu rA ba ba ra/ sarba d+harma skan+na ba ba ra/ pra badz+ra pA Ni ba ba ra/ tiSh+Thi te ba ba ra sA hA/ gang
19b6(rgyud 'bum): gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags 'di bshad pa de'i tshe/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ro la gnas pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis thos so// ri blang ru'i zom na bcom ldan
19b7(rgyud 'bum): 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi tshogs dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa'ang mthong ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / gzhon nu rdo rje
20a1(rgyud 'bum): sde la bka' stsal pa/ khyed kyis gzungs sngags 'dis nga'i las gyis la/ li yul gyi yul 'khor khyed la gtad pa yongs su srung bar gyis shig/ de'i
20a2(rgyud 'bum): tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sdes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das l-i yul gtad pa 'di bdag cag gis mnod par 'tshal lo//
20a3(rgyud 'bum): / dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa bam po gnyis pa// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / gzhon nu rdo rje sde'i don
20a4(rgyud 'bum): gyi phyir gzungs sngags gzhan bshad pa/ tad+ya thA/ nirdzi te/ brdzi te/ b+ha Shi te/ d+harma skan+d+ha/ a pa rA dzi te/ in+d+ra brdzi te puHswA hA/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin
20a5(rgyud 'bum): chen snying po la sogs pa gang dag la/ lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis sngon sangs rgyas nyid du thog ma sems bskyed pa de dag kyang der gshegs so// gzhon nu rdo rje sdes kyang
20a6(rgyud 'bum): yon phul lo/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de las sngon sangs rgyas nyid du lung bstan pa thob bo// dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis sangs
20a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi zhing 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba der byang chub sems thob par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i rgyal mtshan shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od zer gyi 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//
20b1(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la 'jig rten gyi khams bud med du grags pa zhes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgra sgrog phyan rin chen mdzod bsnams zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// klung gi tshes
20b2(rgyud 'bum): mo de la de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan pa de'i tshe/ de lung bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer btang ste/ gang gi tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis
20b3(rgyud 'bum): lung bstan pa de thob pa de'i tshe/ der byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi tshig ces bya bar gyur te/ de phyin chad sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na gnas pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
20b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis kyang lung bstan to/ / bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang / byang chub gang la khyod gnas pa de ni shin tu dkon pa yin no zhes smras so// sangs
20b5(rgyud 'bum): r gyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i thad du 'od zer gtong ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang gsung gcig tu mthun par
20b6(rgyud 'bum): gzungs sngags bshad pa/ tad+ya dz+nyA/ ta thA tA/ lo kA kra/ ta thA ga tA/ ka ba ba'i/ kar dzi/ b+hU ta ko Ti/ bi'i dra mral shararA/ sa sa sa sa sa sas sa/ rbadra pra d+ha/ ba ba dka raNas/
20b7(rgyud 'bum): ba ra Na ba ba pa pa/ a sa tsa ru Nan/ tsa ba ba ra Nan/ ka ka ko Ti rA dza na/ b+hu ka ra Na sud+hadra/ ka ra Na sI hA/ gzungs sngags 'di ni lung ston pa zhes bya ste/ gzungs sngags 'dis sangs
21a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par mdzad de/ mtshan lan gsum
21a2(rgyud 'bum): nyin lan gsum du bzlas brjod byas na phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung bstan pa'ang thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis sangs
21a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas nyid du lung bstan pa thob pa de'i tshe des bzod pa chen po thob par gyur te/ de'i tshe des smon lam btab pa/ ji srid du li yul du 'jigs pa chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ba de srid du
21a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag bud med kyi gzugs su snang bar gyur te smon lam btab pa des na/ de'i tshe bdag skar rdo'i rgyal po'i bu mor skye ba len par gyur cig ces byas so// de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i rgyas
21a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan shin tu 'phags pa'i 'od zer gyi 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sgra sgrog phyag nu rin chen mdzod bsnams la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes sangs
21a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi mtshan 'di gnyis su brjod pa ni bud med du skye ba las thar par 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skye bar 'gyur ro// chos dang ldan pa'i dam pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de bzhin du 'grub
21a7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / sems can dmyal bar skye ba'i las rnams kyang bshags par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// s+ya the dan//
21b1(rgyud 'bum): da da du/ pradz+nye ke sa/ pradz+nyA ka re/ ba ra pradz+nye/ pra ti ha te swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di ni byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog ces bya ste/ chos ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu 'thob par 'gyur ro//
21b2(rgyud 'bum): bdud ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas su sgrub pa la bar chad byed mi nus shing glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// dran pa dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro// sems kyang phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur
21b3(rgyud 'bum): klung gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags 'di shad pa de'i tshe/ lha mo drim med pa'i 'od kyis sngon la ma btab pa/ bdag gis der sde bzungs te skar rngo
21b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i bu mor gyur nas/ gser gyi yul gang du bdag gi pha ma gum pa'i sdug bsngal gyis bdag skyo bar 'gyur ba der bdag 'gro bar gyur cig ces byas so// de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang
21b5(rgyud 'bum): na rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i grong khyer skyong ba'i rigs kyi bu gzhan zhig 'dug pa des 'di skad ces smras so/ / bdag khyod kyi khyim thab tu gyur la/ bdag gi khyim na khyod bud med kyi lus kyis
21b6(rgyud 'bum): las de dag byed cing / bdag gis kyang de la bar chad byed par mi 'gyur ba dang / khyod kyi yul gyi phyir dang / sangs rgyas nyid sgrub pa'i bar gyi las ci byed pa de dag tham cad bdag gi
21b7(rgyud 'bum): khyim du byed cing / dka' ba'i las de dag tham cad kyang dran par gyur cig ces byas so// de na grong khyer skyong ba de'i bur gyur pa zhig yod pa des smras pa/ gang gi tshe sngon khyod dge bsnyen ma
22a1(rgyud 'bum): hu sha zhes bya bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag khyod kyi bur gyur cig ces bdag gis smon lam bta nas/ de phyin chad tshe rabs thams cad du khyod ni bdag gi mar
22a2(rgyud 'bum): gyur la/ bdag ni khyod kyi bur gyur to// gang gi tshe khyod gser gyi yul du smon lam chen po'i dbang gis las byed par 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe yul der gnod pa chen po 'byung ba
22a3(rgyud 'bum): de'i tshe/ yang ci nas kyang bdag der sems can thams cad gnod pa las thar par bya ba'i phyir grogs su 'gyur ba dang // yul de na rgyal po med par yang bdag gis chos bzhin
22a4(rgyud 'bum): du skyong ba dang / bdag gzhan gyis bkol bar mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas nyid du gyur kyi bar du bdag khyod kyi bur 'gyur zhing / khyod kyang bdag gi mar gyur cig ces byas so//
22a5(rgyud 'bum): de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang ba'i rigs dang ldan pa'i bud med gcig 'dug pa nga rgyal gyis shin tu khengs shing rgyags la/ 'dod chags
22a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi sems dang shin tu ldan pa des smon lam ba tab pa/ bdag kyang khyod kyi bu mor gyur te/ gzhon nu'i tshe bdag gis skyes bu mang po dag dang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi phyir bkang
22a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang rtses pa gang yin pa'i bdag gi las de dag thams cad byang bar gyur cig ces byas so/ / 'khor de'i nang na skyes pa gzhan zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi
22b1(rgyud 'bum): spyan snga na 'dug pa des/ rigs dang ldan pa'i bud med de la smras pa/ gang khyod kyis nga'i phyir gsung ba'i don gyi dam bcus pa de ni ngas mi gtang zhes byas nas/ de'i tshe mi des
22b2(rgyud 'bum): smon lam btab pa/ gang gi tshe ma 'ongs pan rigs dang ldan pa'i bud med 'di lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang lhan cig tu li yul na gnas shing las chen po byed par 'gyur ba de
22b3(rgyud 'bum): tshebadag gis las 'di bshags te 'khor ba nas 'byung ba 'thob par gyur cig ces byas so/ / de'i tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i ming po byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sde/ bcom
22b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gser gyi rigs su chos dang ldan
22b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyal por gyur te/ yul brtas par bgyi ba'i slad du lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi grogs su gyur la/ li yul gyi yul 'khor brtas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ gser gyi yul ka
22b6(rgyud 'bum): du dge bsnyen mthu sha zhes bya ba gnas par gyur pa der nor sa'i 'og tu bzhag pa dang / mi shrI ba rnams kyi dur khrod na yod pa'i gang yin pa dang / dge bsnyen ma phu sha'i nor du gyur pa gang yin
22b7(rgyud 'bum): pa de dag thams cad bdag gis btsal te/ gser la sogs pa nor mang po rnams stsal bar bgyi'o// lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od 'di'ang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar li yul gyi
23a1(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / slad du nor rnams 'bul bar bgyid do// gang gi tshe yul der gnod pa 'byung ba de'i tshe'ang lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ 'byung po gang su'ang nor de la bgegs
23a2(rgyud 'bum): byed par mi 'gyur ro/ / yul de'i bsrung mar gyur pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang ci nas nor de snyed par 'gyur bar rang nyid grogs byed par 'gyur ro// sngon gser gyi ri gang du dge
23a3(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen ma hu sha byung bar gyur pa der bud med gzhan zhig byung ste/ des sbyin pa mang po byin la/ tshul khrims ni des ma bsrungs te/ des 'di skad du bdag gis sbyin pa dag byin pa'i bsod nams
23a4(rgyud 'bum): bsags pa gang yin pa des/ bdag gser gyi rigs kyi rgyal po'i btsun mo dam par gyur la/ ci nas kyang li yul de brtas par bya ba'i phyir nor sbyin par byed pa de lta bur bdag grogs su gyur cig
23a5(rgyud 'bum): ces byas so/ / de'i tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi snying po dang / gzhon nu rdo rje skyes 'di skad ces gsol to// gang gi tshe dmag gi dpung chen po de dag phan tshun 'gyed par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ bdag
23a6(rgyud 'bum): skar rdo'i rgyal por gyur nas gang gi tshe gdong dmar dag dmag 'dren pa de'i tshe/ bdag gis gser gyi rigs kyi rgyal po las nor blangs te/ li yul brtas par bgyi ba'i slad du chos bzhin du
23a7(rgyud 'bum): stsol bar gyur cig ces byas so/ / de'i tshe na rigs dang ldan pa'i bud med gzhan zhig lha mo de'i grogs mor gyur pa sa dang po thob pa gang yin pa de 'khor der 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug
23b1(rgyud 'bum): pab des smon lam btab pa/ bdag li yul du tshe rabs bdun gyi bar du rgyal po'i btsun mo dam par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe dmag gi dpung chen po gang yin pa de dag li yul du g.yul
23b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyed pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe ni/ bdag rgyal yul du skye ba len par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe gzhon nu rdo rje sde 'di li'i rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe ni/ bdag de'i btsun mo dam par gyur
23b3(rgyud 'bum): nas/ bdag cag gnyis kas li yul slar brtas par bgyi ba dang / dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba rnams dang / dgon pa'i gnas rnams dang / mchod rten chen po dang / dri gtsang
23b4(rgyud 'bum): khang dang / gdong dmar rnams kyis bsregs pa gang yin pa de dag kyang / bdag cag gnyis kyis slar gsar du bgyid par gyur cig ces byas so// gang gi tshe de dag gis 'khor gyi
23b5(rgyud 'bum): nang du smon lam btab pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / gnod sbyin kun tu rgyal
23b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / lha'i bu blo gros rab tu brtan pa dang / lha mo 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang / lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od rnams kyang / de'i tshe sangs rgyas yid la byed pa
23b7(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / de nas ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas 'di skad ces
24a1(rgyud 'bum): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ma 'ongs pa'i dus su li yul de srung ba'i slad du mnos par 'tshal te/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
24a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du sug las thams cad 'tshal lo/ / de nas 'khor der 'dus pa gang yin pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am cingadang
24a3(rgyud 'bum): lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi nam mkha' la me tog gi char phab nas/ rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs ji lta bus sangs rgyas
24a4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la mchod par 'os pa rnams kyang bsgrags so/ / de'i tshe 'khor de'i nang na rnam thos kyi bu dang / kun tu rgyal la sogs pa gang dag gi lag tu yul de srung ba'i phyir gtang pa
24a5(rgyud 'bum): de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / yul srung ba'i phyir khyed kyi lag tu yang dang yang du gtad do// gang gi tshe gdong dmar dag gis yul bzung ste/ dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba
24a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / dri gtsang khang dang / mchod rten chen po rnams 'jig par byed cing sreg par byed de/ de dag gis ci nas kyang nga'i bstan pa gzhig par bya ba'i smon lam log par btab pas ring por mi
24a7(rgyud 'bum): thogs par der dmag sde gnyis po de dag phan tshun 'gyed par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi ming po gzhon nu rdo rje sde nyid gser gyi rigs kyi yul der song nas/ gser gyi rigs
24b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras te/ dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa'i mdo bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bka' stsal pa yod de/ li yul nas 'ongs pa 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom
24b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das dang lha rnams kyis gsung+ga pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lha rnams kyi bka' ni gcag tu rung ba ma yin no// gdong dmar gyis li yul gyi yul 'khor/
24b3(rgyud 'bum): khyer ba'i dus ni da bab ste/ rgyu ni gser gyi rigs kyi yul du 'ong bar 'dod do// gang gi tshe phan tshun g.yul 'gyed par byed pa de ni 'jigs pa chen po yin te/ gang gi tshe gdong dmar rnams skrag par
24b4(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa de'i tshe/ gser gyi rigs kyi yul du 'gro bar chas so// de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa ni 'di yin te/ gang gi tshe gser gyi rigs kyi yul gdong dmar mi gtong la/ rgya nga la gnod
24b5(rgyud 'bum): pa byed du mi 'ong ba de'i tshe gser gyi rigs kyi yul du mdo 'di 'phrin yig tu khyer la gser gyi rigs kyi rgyal po la 'di skad du/ 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang lha rnams kyis bka'
24b6(rgyud 'bum): stsal pa yin te/ lha dang mi rnams kyis 'gal bar byar mi rung ba yin gyis// bdag gis li yul gyi glung sbyin pa dang / skar rdo'i don gyi phyir ngal nor mang po byin cig ces smos la/ gang gi tshe
24b7(rgyud 'bum): nor thob par gyur pa de'i tshe thog mar li yul du nor rdzongs la gdong dam ral skur cig/ li yul ba rnams la'ang der sbyin par bya ste/ gang gi tshe li yul du skyes bskur ba na/ der
25a1(rgyud 'bum): thog mar skar rdo'ang bskur bar bya ste/ mi'i yul chos bzhin du bya'o// de'i tshe 'di skad du nga ni gdong dmar rnams kyi bran mi byed de/ ngas li yul gzung gis/ nga
25a2(rgyud 'bum): la nor byin cig dang / de dag gi dmag gi dpung chen po'ang der 'ong bar mi nus so zhes smros shig/ gang gi tshe de'i dmag li yul du 'ong ba na der ma 'ongs shig dang / yul de ci ri ba'i
25a3(rgyud 'bum): rin ngas sbyin no/ / ci ste yul bru ba'i phyir 'phrin yig 'di bzhin du byed par gyur na/ bdag cag gis li yul thams cad bsdus te 'dun par bya'o zhes byas na brdzi bar mi nus te 'di la the tsom
25a4(rgyud 'bum): mi bya'o/ / gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i sde la 'di skad ces bstan nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
25a5(rgyud 'bum): 'od rnams gtong zhing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams gtong ba gang yin pa de dag dang / lha la sogs pa 'khor der 'dus pa gang yin pa de dag gis 'di skad ces gsungs so// bdag
25a6(rgyud 'bum): cag gis kyang lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od de la gang gi tshe yul der gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe dran par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags dang / gzungs sngags gang yid la byas na/ gzungs
25a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags chen mo gzhan rnams rtogs par 'gyur ba de sbyin par bya'o/ / 'on teng sangs rgyas yid la byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur te/ de la gnas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
25b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa rnams mthong zhing / de dag gis chos bshad pa'ang thos par 'gyur la/ lha rnams kyang dam pa sbyin par 'gyur ro// de nas
25b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon 'od zer gtong ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyis/ / lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// khyod kyis
25b3(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir/ li yul gnon pa gang yin pa// rgyal mchog gis ni bka' stsal bzhin// shes rab chen pos de bzhin byos// sa stengs gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa'i// gsang sngags
25b4(rgyud 'bum): kyang ni sbyin par bya/ / gang gi tshe na li yul der// gnod 'byung dus la bab pa na// de tshe nged kyis dgongs par bya// de 'dra'i shes rab dag kyang sbyin// de tshe tshangs pa la sogs lha// sa
25b5(rgyud 'bum): steng dbang phyug sum cu gnyis/ / mgrin gcig mthun par smras pa ni// klu rnams dang ni gnod sbyin dang // de bzhin 'byung po lha ma yin// mi ma yin dang mi rnams kyis// 'tshe bar mi 'gyur
25b6(rgyud 'bum): gang yin pa'i/ / gzungs sngags nged kyis sbyin par bya// tad+ya thA/ in+d+ra dad+ha tI shU la ha se sarba pA sha ban d+ha ne/ ni tsin+da ne/ dra dradra dra/ dza dza dza dza/ bud+d+ha d+hi re/ ni tsin te/ sAl he li/ a
25b7(rgyud 'bum): s+tha ne/ ni ni ni ni/ pu pu pu pu/ in+d+ra yo gi na/ bi sha bi sha bi sha bi sha swA hA/ 'di ni rta gnas zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags yin te/ gzungs sngags 'dis ni rangs byed kyi srin po rnams
26a1(rgyud 'bum): thub la/ srid sgrub kyis kyang sgra mi snyan pa rnams thub par gyur to// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams dang / 'khor de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces
26a2(rgyud 'bum): smras so/ / rig sngags 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags sam/ rta'i mgo la btags sam/ rang gi mgul du btags kyang rung ste/ gang dang gang du g.yul 'gyed du 'gro ba de gzhan gyi
26a3(rgyud 'bum): mo thub par 'gyur zhing thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur te/ lha la bya ba bzhin du gtsang mas bcang bar bya'o// li yul gyi bdag po rgyal po des kyang ras la 'dus pa chen po'i ri mo bris te
26a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i pho brang gtsang mar byas te/ thams cad du gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis brgyan nas bdug pa sna tshogs kyi snod kyis bdugs te/ me tog sna tshogs bkram
26a5(rgyud 'bum): zhing / me tog gi 'phreng ba sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas la/ der g.yog gi bya ba byed pa gang yin pa de dag gis kyang ji ltar rgyal po btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa rnams spangs pa
26a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du spang bar bya zhing / gtsang mas gos dang / zas dang / skom gtsang mar byas te/ 'dus pa chen po'i ri mo'i gzugs rgyal po'i gdan la bzhugs nas/ de'i mdun du sa gzhi
26a7(rgyud 'bum): skyang nul gyis legs par byugs pa la dkyil 'khor bya'o/ / bdag nyid kyang khrus legs par byas shing / gos gtsang ma bgos la/ g.yog de rnams kyang de bzhin du byed du gzhug
26b1(rgyud 'bum): go/ gang gi tshe sa gzhi dag par byed pa de'i tshe/ thog mar ba'i rnam lngas rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad chag chag gdab bo// yang na spos thams cad kyi chus gdub bo// de nas
26b2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor khru bcu drug pa gru bzhi lham par byas la/ der kha zas ro sum brgya pa dang / 'bru mar dri zhim pos bsgos pa'i mar me sum brgya drug cu dang / gdugs stong nyis brgya sum cu
26b3(rgyud 'bum): dang rta ba dan stong nyis brgya sum cu dang / bum pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / bum pa chen po bzhi dang / rnga bo che bzhi gzhag par bya'o// gzungs sngags 'di'ang dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su
26b4(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bya'o/ / sil snyan mang po dkrol zhing rol mo'i sgra mang po'ang bsgrag par bya'o// de nas sgrub pa pos tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams la bstod pa gdon cing / gzungs sngags
26b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di'ang bzlas brjod byas te/ sgrub pa po des sgrub pa'i zla gang lha thams cad kyi bstod pa sna tshogs shes pa gzhag par bya'o// las 'di zhag bdun gyi bar du byas nas mjug brtul te zhag
26b6(rgyud 'bum): bdun pa'i nyin par khrus bya'o/ / las 'di ni ji ltar sngar smos pa de bzhin du tshes lnga la bya'o// sgrub pa po nyid kyang dkyil 'khor gyi drung du 'dug par bya'o// me'i thab khung ni gnyis te/
26b7(rgyud 'bum): gcig ni sgrub pa po'i phyir bya'o// gcig ni sgrub pa'i zla'i phyir byas la/ der las kyi sbyin sreg lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// rta gnas kyi gzungs sngags kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
27a1(rgyud 'bum): bya/ brjod bya'o// rtswa dur ba'i sbyin sreg kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// gur kum gyi chus dkyil 'khor gser gyi kha dog bzhin du gyur kyis du chag chag mang du gdab par
27a2(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / sbyin sreg gi mar ni dri zhim pos bsgos pas sbyin sreg bya'o// dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis mdzes par byugs la/ gang gi tshe bzlas brjod rtsom pa na rnga bo che rdung zhing rol mo'i sgra rnams
27a3(rgyud 'bum): bsgrags te/ dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas la/ thog ma tshes lnga'i nyi ma nub ka'i dus skabs su las 'di brtsam zhing gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya'o// yang na tshes drug gam bdun
27a4(rgyud 'bum): la brtsam par bya'o/ / nang par gyi dus skabs su thog ma me lha spyan drangs la/ ji ltar sngar bstan pa bzhin du rtswa dur ba'i sbyin sreg bya'o// ro'i kha zas de dag kyang phyis phyung la gsar pa
27a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gzhag par bya ste/ zhag gsum mam zhag bdun gyi bar du sbyin sreg zin pa'i rjes la/ ro'i kha zas gsar pa rnams gzhog par bya'o// dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su sangs rgyas kyi sku
27a6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs dang / dam pa'i chos dang / sku gdung yang gzhag par bya'o// dkyil 'khor der gdugs bcu dang / rgyal mtshan bcu dang / ba da na bcu dang / rnga bo che bcu dang / dril bu bcu
27a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba sum brgya drug cu dang / mar me sum brgya drug cu rnams gzhag par bya'o// las de ltar byas pa'i rjes la dkyil 'khor de nyid du tshes brgyad la brtsams te/
27b1(rgyud 'bum): chos bco lnga'i bar du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi cho ga rgyas par brtsam zhing bzlas brjod bya'o// gang gi tshe na gnas kyi gzungs sngags kyi las de dag gis las chen po
27b2(rgyud 'bum): rtsom pa 'am/ yang na g.yul chen po'i nang du 'gro bar 'dod dam/ yang na rgyal po chen po'i dbang phyug gi bdag po thob par 'dod na/ rta gnas kyi gzungs sngags 'di ji lhur 'di las cho ga
27b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa sngar smos pa de bzhin du bzlas brjod byas na/ de'i tshe lha rnams dam pa dang dbang bskur ba sbyin par byed do// gang gi tshe 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi cho ga rgyas pa
27b4(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod bya bar rtsom na/ dkyil 'khor de nyid du snga ma'i lugs bzhin du byas na/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sngon 'od zer gtong zhing gzungs sngags bskur ba gang yin pa de
27b5(rgyud 'bum): dag gi thugs las skyes pa'i sku/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / lha mang po dag dang thabs cig tu der gshegs nas dam pa'ang stsol bar mdzad
27b6(rgyud 'bum): delas 'di ni ji ltar 'dod pa de bzhin du 'grub pa yin no/ / gzungs sngags 'di'i las 'di dag cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i las rnams ni gang gi tshe las chen po rtsom pa 'am/ yang na dgra
27b7(rgyud 'bum): mthong nas g.yul du 'gro ba de'i tshe bzlas brjod byas te/ ya lad la bzlas brjod byas na bdag nyid srung bar 'gyur ro// dgra sta la bzlas brjod byas sam/ gzhu la bzlas brjod byas
28a1(rgyud 'bum): sam/ mda' la bzlas brjod bya ste/ dkyil 'khor der gur kum la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nas/ dmag mi thams cad dang rta thams cad kyi dpral bar
28a2(rgyud 'bum): thig le byas la/ grong khyer gyi sgo rnams sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ rgyal po'i khab kyi sgo rnams su gur kum des bskus na thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur te/ 'jigs pa thams cad
28a3(rgyud 'bum): las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ / de nas lha rnams kyis gzungs sngags gzhan byin te/ na mo brah+ma Ne/ na maHsarba de bA nAn/ tad+ya thA/ brah+ma na in+d+ri de bA nAn/ pra tiSh+Thi ti a shA s+thA na/ ba ra
28a4(rgyud 'bum): in+d+ri sA ba ra ba ri ha rAk+Shi in+d+ra/ saM ta thA sma ra pa ra ha re/ a ma b+ha ku b+ha ka gri kri shri a laM kA ra/ sarba de ba grA ma swA hA/ 'di ni tshol pa'i gzungs sngags yin te/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du dkyil
28a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor der bzlas brjod bya'o/ / gur kum la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ rta gnas kyi gzungs sngags kyi skabs su sngar bshad pa'i las de dag thams cad kyang byed par 'gyur/
28a6(rgyud 'bum): te rtalan bdun bzlas brjod byed pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga ni sngar bshad pa yin no// gang gi tshe dmag gi nang du 'gro ba na/ de'i tshe gsang sngags 'di dang rtag nas kyi gsang sngags lan
28a7(rgyud 'bum): bdun bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ sngar bshad pa'i 'od zer dang gzungs sngags rnams dang bcas par dmag dpon gyi rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la gdags shing lus la'ang bcang bar
28b1(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / gang gi tshe rta gnas kyi rig sngags kyi bzlas brjod rtsom pa de'i tshe/ zhag bdun gyi bar du lha'i gnas su 'gro ba bzhin du gtsang sbra byas te spang ba rnams 'di ltar bya'o// tshes bcu gsum
28b2(rgyud 'bum): la rtsom na ni kun spang bar bya'o/ / tshes bcu bzhi la rtsom na ni sha bza' bar mi bya'o// tshes bco lnga la rtsom na ni 'bras chan 'o ma dang sbyar ba 'am/ 'bras kyi 'o thug gam/ 'bras chan dang
28b3(rgyud 'bum): mar bza' bar byas te/ chu btung bar mi bya'o// de nas yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags 'di byin no// na maHshrI su baN+Do ta ta ma pra b+hA sa s+ya ta thA ga ta s+ya/ tad+yaH
28b4(rgyud 'bum): bud+d+ha d+harme/ a saM g+ha pra ti b+hA se/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ dra be shrI sa re sa re/ bi sarbe duHkha shri a laM kA ra sarba du ra pra b+ha se ba ra pra tiSh+Thi te swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di gang du rta gnas kyi rig sngags bzlas
28b5(rgyud 'bum): brjod byed pa der brjod par bya ste/ dngos grub gang 'dod pa dang las gzhan gang byed kyang rung / yang na gter 'dod na'ang gzungs sngags 'di lan sum cu rtsa gsum bzlas brjod bya'o// de
28b6(rgyud 'bum): nas 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to/ / gnod sbyin nam 'byung po ji snyed mchis pa de dag bzlog pa'i
28b7(rgyud 'bum): slad du/ bdag cag gis gzungs sngags 'di bshad par 'tshal te/ 'byung po dang / rims dang / nad thams cad zhi bar bgyi ba dang / gzhan yang skyes pa'am/ byis pa rnams kyi
29a1(rgyud 'bum): nad gang ci'ang rung ba dag la lan gsum bsrung bar bgyi'o/ / yang na mdud pa gsum bgyis te btags na 'byung pos btang ba'i nad rnams zhi bar 'gyur
29a2(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / gang gi bu btsas nas mi 'tsho ba des ni bdag nyid kyis bsgrub par bya ste/ bu rnams kyang bsrung bar bya'o// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
29a3(rgyud 'bum): to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang grub pa stsol bar gsol/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis gzungs sngags 'di gsungs so// tad+ya thA/ baM ku dre/ bi dza la phuH
29a4(rgyud 'bum): swAhA/ gzungs sngags 'di bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'grub par
29a5(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i phyir gsungs te/ gang gi sna nas khrag 'byung ba dang / gang gi lus las rma 'byung ba dang / yang na gzhi gzhan las gyur te/ bud med rnams kyi lus las khrag 'dzag cing 'byung ba la/
29a6(rgyud 'bum): / skud pa dmar po la sngags la spyi bor btags par byas te/ rma la ni byug par yang bya'o// ci ste rims sam/ 'byung pos btang ba'i nad dam/ bskangs par gyur na/ de la skud pa
29a7(rgyud 'bum): la bsngags nas mdud pa bcu byas te mgul du btags so/ / gang la 'khru ba 'am/ mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'khru ba yod pa de la ni skud pa ser po la mdud pa bcu byas te rked par gdagra
29b1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gzungs sngags 'di bshad do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi sa twa ya/ ma hA satwA ya/
29b2(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya thA/ sa re sa re/ bi sa re sarba bi sha na sha ni ye swA hA/ 'byung pos btang ba'i nad thams cad dang / rims nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa ste/ gang gi tshe nad pa shi la thug par gyur te/
29b3(rgyud 'bum): mdangs 'phrog pas srog gi phyed 'phrogs pa de la/ gzungs sngags 'di brjod par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa ra rash+mi pra b+hA se b+hU ta dze b+he/ phu phu phu phu/ ku ru le pu
29b4(rgyud 'bum): swAswA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di rims nad thams cad dang / 'byung po'i gdon thams cad zhi bar bya ba la/ lan gsum brjod la skud pa la mdud pa gsum bor te gdags so// bzlas brjod
29b5(rgyud 'bum): ni zan zos pa'i 'og tu bya'o/ / gzungs 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gsungs so// na mo asti ka ra dza ra ka ri bud+d+ha s+ya ta thA ga ta s+ya/ tad+ya thA/
29b6(rgyud 'bum): ang+ga re/ mang+ga re/ phu pa tsag re phu phaT dz+ra/ phu bud+d+ha ra dze pu h+ya re te pu tri ba re puHswA hA/ dug gis gsang sngapra yin te/ gang gis dug 'thungs sam/ pol mig byung ngam/ rma red pa la kha
29b7(rgyud 'bum): zas sam/ yang na chu'am/ sman nam/ sa la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// de'i tshe rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis gzungs sngags bshad de/ sngar
30a1(rgyud 'bum): gang gi yon tan gsungs pa de dag gi mtshan mas bcad pa'i gzungs sngags bdag cag gis sprul par bgyi'o/ / tad+ya thA/ shAn+ta mu khe bi mu khe bi ma le/ bi ma?
30a2(rgyud 'bum): kheHdr-i D+ha mu khe swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di ni 'byung po'i rims thams cad dang / nad gzhi'i rims rnams dang / nad 'gro ba zhi bar bgyid pa ste/ gzungs sngags 'di ni 'byung po rnams kyis
30a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gal bar bgyir mi rung ba lags so/ / gang gi tshe rta gnas kyi rig sngags bzlas brjod bgyid pa na/ thog mar gsang sngags 'di dag gis skud pa gdags par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor
30a4(rgyud 'bum): gyi nang du mchi ba'i tshe'ang der mtshams 'dzin pa 'di dag gzhag par bgyi ste/ gzungs sngags re re'ang lan gsum gsum brjod la mdud pa gsum bor te/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bdug pa
30a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis bdug par bya'o/ / dkyil 'khor gyi mdun der byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ri mo'i gzugs bris pa bzhag la/ du ru ka 'am/ oM ka ru nag po
30a6(rgyud 'bum): bdug pa bsreg par bgyi'o/ / lha rnams la ni sra rtsi pog dang gu gul gyi bdug pa bsreg par bya ste/ de'i tshe 'di skad smon lam gdab par bgyi'o// ji ltar bdag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
30a7(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ li yul gyi yul 'khor kun tu srung ba'i phyir las su bka' stsal pa dang / ji ltar lha rnams kyis bdag gi grogs bgyi'o zhes dam bcas pa dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyis bka'
30b1(rgyud 'bum): stsal pa dang / lha rnams kyis dam bcas pa bzhin du/ bdag gi las 'di de bzhin du nges par 'grub cing mthar phyin par gyur cig ces bgyi'o// de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams
30b2(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan 'di dag bshad do// de bzhin gshegs pa gser mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
30b3(rgyud 'bum): pa kun tu gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgongs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa la phyag
30b4(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'jigs shing bag tsha ba dang bral ba drang srong chen por grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ ka ra ba ra/ i ri bA ra/ sa su ra ma ma ra
30b5(rgyud 'bum): ba ba ra/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ d+harma a d+hiSh+Thi te/ saM g+hA a d+hiSh+Thi te/ brah+ma a d+hiSh+Thi te/ sha kra a d+hiSh+Thi te/ badz+ra pA Ni gu h+ya ka a d+hiSh+Ti te bid+yA d+hiSh+Ti te/ sarba de ba a d+hiSh+Thi te sA hA/ gzungs
30b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di ni lag na rdo rje'i gsang ba'i ye shes chen po'i mdo las gsungs te/ nad thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa gnod
