57b5(rgyud 'bum): rjod par mdzad do/ / tad+yA thA/ su ru su ru su ru/ tu ru tu ru/ hi li mi li/ si li si l-i/ di saM li/ dz+wa le dz+wa li ne/ u khe mu khe/ pug si gau ri gan d+hu ri/ drA bi Di mA ta gi pra kis
57b6(rgyud 'bum): d+hu re d+ha re d+hA d+hA re/ d+harme d+hame/ d+ha ma~M nr-i/ shAn+te/ shanA na ma sa muk+te/ bi muk+te/ dza ye bi dza ye/ hi li mi ha li/ ma hA la mi/ hi li mi le/ su ba ne su ma nai/ su ri se/ a rba ta sA rbA ni/ naH
57b7(rgyud 'bum): na d+hi/ mu kha~M/ tsan+de tsan+de/ mu khe/ pad+me pad+ma mu le/ shud+d+ha kan the/ sUr+ya pra b+he sUr+ya rash+mi sa tri/ she prah+ma ma h+me sA re in+d+ra/ in+di kra me/ b+ha ye a ra dze/ a mr-i te ma hA pra b+he dun d+hu b+hi sA re ma d+h+ya
58a1(rgyud 'bum): ra sA re/ sarba satwa/ a nu kam+ba ya/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bud+d+ha ma nusma rA hI/ d+harma ma nusma ra h+ni/ saM g+ha ma nusma ra hI/ bu d+h+ya bu d+h+ya/ hr-i da ya ma nusmA ra hI/ bo d+ha ya
58a2(rgyud 'bum): / bo d+ha ya/ bo d+hi satwa me karma sA d+ha ya/ ba ra dA ya swA hA/ kA ru Ni kA ya swA hA/ karma me sa d+ha ya swA hA/ na ma Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ sid d+h+yan tu man+t+ra pa dA swA hA/ gang gi tshe 'di dag lan brgya
58a3(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/ pad+ma'i sbyin sreg byas par 'gyur te/ de'i tshe gsang sngags 'di dag bzlas brjod bya'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma Ar+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwa
58a4(rgyud 'bum): yaHma hA satwA ya/ tad+ya thA/ khi ri khi ri/ tsi ri tsi ri/ su ru su ru/ gats+tsha ya gats+tsha ya/ thA su khaM/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA swA hA/ lan gsum brjod par bya'o// me tog dang bdug pa la'ang
58a5(rgyud 'bum): lan gsum bzlas brjod bya ste/ a ka ru'i bdug pa bsregs la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la slar gtang bar bya'o// 'di'i cho gar bya ba thams cad ni sngar bshad pa'i tshe
58a6(rgyud 'bum): ga rgyas pa'i nang du 'dus so/ / rtswa gnas kyi rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor las bzlas brjod ji ltar bya ba bzhin du/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi cho ga 'di'ang de bzhin du bzlas
58a7(rgyud 'bum): brjod bya ste/ cho ga de nyid dang 'dra'o// de'i tshe gzungs sngags 'di'ang gser gyi pad+ma'i cho ga mchod pa'i skabs su bshad pa bzhin du brjod par bya'o// de'i tshe mdo 'di'ang gser gyi rigs
58b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi yul du bkur bar bya'o/ / de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i phyag mtshan li'i yul 'khor der mi ji snyed skye bar
58b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur pa de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur pa dang phyir mi ldog pa sha stag ste/ der rgan po dang byis pa rnams kyis bsod nams ji snyed byed
58b3(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasasu bsngo bar byed do/ / de la li'i yul 'khor de ci'i phyir yang dang yang du gzhig par 'dod la/ gzhig nus par yang
58b4(rgyud 'bum): mi 'gyur zhes the tshom 'byung ste/ de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya sangs rgyas kyi bstan
58b5(rgyud 'bum): pa ji srid gnas kyi bar du rtag tu yul der skye ba len par 'gyur te/ sum brgya ni dge slong dang dge slong ma'i tshul du gnas so// nyis brgya ni dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / rgyal po'i
58b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / rgan po dang / byis pa'i tshul du gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag li yul 'khor der sems can la phan pa dang / bstan pa yongs su srung
58b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyir li yul du gnas so/ / gang gis bcom ldan 'das la theg pa chen po mdo sde shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo zhu bar byed pa'i gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di ni/ dge slong brtson 'grus
59a1(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba de yin par rig par bya'o/ / de'i tshe ci'i phyir yul de 'jig par mi 'gyur zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi
59a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung gnas de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis ci nas der bdag cag sum pa rnams kyis mchod rten dang / dri gtsang khang dang / dge 'dun gyi kun
59a3(rgyud 'bum): dga' ra ba rnams 'jig par mi 'gyur bar yul de byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas ka pi la na'i mchod rten la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma
59a4(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i dpal tsan dan gyi snying po dang thabs cig tu sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las mdzad do zhes de ltar mkhyen to/ / de'i tshe grong khyer der mir gyur pa dge slong dang / rgyal po'i 'khor dang /
59a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang skye bo mang po 'byung ba de dag sum pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten dang / dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba rnams bshig tu 'ong ngo snyam ste shin tu yid mi bde bar 'gyur ro//
59a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ ka pi la na'i mchod rten de'i bsrung ma'i mir gyur pa gang yin pa de dag 'di snyam du/ bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
59a7(rgyud 'bum): grong khyer du gshegs par bya'o snyam du sems kyi rtog pa skyed par mdzad do/ / gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer gyi nang du gshegs pa de'i tshe/ ka bi la na'i mchod rten du
59b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'byung gnas rnams gshegs par 'gyur te/ lha rnams kyi mya ngan bsal ba'i phyir 'du bar mdzad do// de'i tshe de'i nub mo dri ma med pa'i 'od las
59b2(rgyud 'bum): rab nges zhes bya bar gyur pa des lha rnams dru ba'i sgra thos so/ / ngu ba'i sgra thos nas grong khyer 'dir sdig can dag mi 'ong grang snyam nas 'jigs shing skrag par gyur te gzungs sngags brjod do//
59b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsungs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos bzhin du grong khyer du gshegs su gsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
59b4(rgyud 'bum): mngon sum du bzhugs pa ji lta ba bzhin du grong khyer gyi sgo nas gshegs su gsol bar byed do/ / gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs par gyur pa de na/
59b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis 'od zer btang ba dang / de dag las tshig de dag byung ba de dag gis rab nges de la khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams bud med du
59b6(rgyud 'bum): grags pa zhes bya bar/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos rnam par sgrog pa phyag na rin chen mdzod bsnams zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe rab nges
59b7(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya bar gyur pa dang / ka pi la na'i mchod rten gyi drung du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer gtong ba de dag gser gyi yul gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams dang thabs cig tu 'ong bar 'gyur
60a1(rgyud 'bum): te/ ci nas sum pa rnams kyi bran byed pa de las thar par bya ba'i phyir/ de sngon gyi ma byin par len pa las grol bar mdzad do// de nas gtam de grags par gyur nas
60a2(rgyud 'bum): sum pa rnams phyir ldog par 'gyur ro/ / de nas de'i tshe der rab des des phyis 'khor du 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i sems can phal po che rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan
60a3(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / khyed rnams ma 'ongs pa na/ ci'i phyir na ba bdag sum pas nga'i yul du dri gtsang khang dang / dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba rnams bshig par 'gyur
60a4(rgyud 'bum): snyam du the tsom za bar gyur tam/ yang na sum pa 'di dag la ci'i phyir na ba bdag ces bya zhe na/ 'das pa'i dus na rgyal po tshangs pas sbyin zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ de'i yul du kun tu rgyu byang chub
60a5(rgyud 'bum): ces bya ba zhig byung ste/ rgyal po tshangs sbyin des yul nas bskrad nas rgyal po gzhan zhig gi yul du phyin te/ bdag 'dir phan tshun du rtsa ba dang 'bras bu bza' 'o snyam ste/ der lo ma'i spyil po zhig byas
60a6(rgyud 'bum): nas 'dug go/ de nas bud med gzhan zhig jo bo'i ba 'tsho zhing 'dug pa des kun tu rgyu de mthong nas sems dad pa thob ste/ nyin gcig bzhin du bdag gi kha zas la longs spyod cig ces kha zas la
60a7(rgyud 'bum): mgron du gnyer to/ / ba de dag ni bud med de nyid dbang ba ma yin te/ jo bo'i yin pas na/ kun tu rgyu la kha zas byin pa gang yin pa de ni des sbyar bar gyur to// bdag mi dbang ba'i 'o ma kun tu
60b1(rgyud 'bum): labyin pa gang yin pa de ni ma byin par blangs par gyur to/ / de nas ba lang de dag gi bdag por gyur pa'i mi gang yin pa des ni shAkya'i yul du skye ba blangs te/ des 'di skad du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bcom
60b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das khyod kyi bstan pa bdag gis bshig par gyur cig ces smon lam btab ste/ de'ang gzhan yin par mi blta'i/ sum pa'i rgyal po gang li yul 'jig par byed pa de yin no// kun tu rgyur
60b3(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa nga yin no/ / bud med gang gis kun tu rgyu la 'o ma byin pa de ni rigs dang ldan pa'i bud med gang gis sangs rgyas dka' ba spyod pa spyad nas bzhen
60b4(rgyud 'bum): pa la thog mar zhal zas 'bul ba 'di yin no/ / de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nga'i yul der sum pa dang gdong dmar dka 'ong ba de'i rgyu ni 'di
60b5(rgyud 'bum): yin te/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ de'i tshe rgyal po de'i yul na bud med gzhan zhig la bu zhig yod pa de zhing rmo ba'i phyir phyi rol tu byung ngo // der mi gzhan zhig gis kyang
60b6(rgyud 'bum): de'i 'dab tu zhing rmos so/ / de nas bud med de'i bu des mi de'i rkyal pa dang / shing gzhong dang / phye dang / zong dag cig brkus te/ phye dang zong la sogs pa brkus/ phyir ba bdag sum pa dang
60b7(rgyud 'bum): gdong dmar rnams li yul du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / bud med de'i bu gang gis phye dang / rkyal ba dang / shing gzhong dang / zong khyer ba de ni li'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// mi gang gi rgyal ba la sogs
61a1(rgyud 'bum): pa rdzas phrogs pa ni de'i tshe gdong dmar gyi rgyal por 'gyur ro/ / ba de dag ni de'i tshe dmag mir 'gyur ro// mi de'i mar gyur pa'i bud med de ni de'i tshe li yul gyi rgyal po'i mar 'gyur
61a2(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / ma byin par len pa byed byed pa'i mi de'i mas ni phyed de blangs te/ sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos kyi dge slong grong khyer mdzes zhes bya ba la bsod snyoms su phul te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba des na yang mir
61a3(rgyud 'bum): skye ba thob par 'gyur ro/ / mau de ni ma la phye byin pa dang / mas kyang dge slong grong khyer mdzes la phul ba de'i bsod nams bsags pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na li yul du dpa' sbed ces bya bar
61a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ rgyu des na rnam par rgyal ba'i go cha zhes bya bar yang gyur nas/ rgyal srid thob par gyur te skar rdor g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur ro// phye sbyin par byed pa de ni rgyu des na mir skye ba thob par 'gyur
61a5(rgyud 'bum): te/ mi des lam gyi 'gram na 'bras rmos so// der mi gang dag gis 'bras chan chud gzan par byas pa de na de'i tshe dge slong du gyur te/ des na de dag gis dge 'dun gyi nor yul gyi glud du 'jal bar 'gyur
61a6(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / der bya sna tshogs kyis 'bras zos pa gang yin pa de dag ni de'i tshe li'i rgyal po'i bran du 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'di ltar li yul du mi rgod mang
61a7(rgyud 'bum): por 'gyur te/ de dag gis ni gang gi tshe gzhon nu dge byed skyes pa de la phan 'dogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe sdig byed skyes pa na de la gnod pa byed par 'gyur te/ de'i tshe mi rgod lnga brgya po de
61b1(rgyud 'bum): dag rgyal po yab kyi thad du gtong bar 'gyur ro/ / mi rgod de dag kyang li yul der skye ba len par 'gyur te/ dge 'dun gyi nor dang mchod rten gyi nor chud gzon par byed do// mi rgod de dag kyang sngon ma
61b2(rgyud 'bum): byin par len pa byed pa'i phyir/ yan lag bcad nas bsad pa des na de dag gis kyang li'i rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba'i grags pa gsod par 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i dus su mi rgod de dag 'khor
61b3(rgyud 'bum): ba las grol bar byed pa'i dge slong zla ba dag pa zhes bya ba zhig kyang 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de'ang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi yab kyi bya ba byed byed pa 'di
61b4(rgyud 'bum): yin te/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal 'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas de dag gi
61b5(rgyud 'bum): sku gdung yang 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe'ang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal bram ze dro nas go tra zhes bya ba chos
61b6(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa zhig tu 'gyur te/ gang gi tshe rgyal po rnams phan tshun du g.yul 'gyed par chas pa de'i tshe bram ze dro nas ko tras/ bum pa bzang po blangs nas sku gdung 'gyed par byed do// klung gi tshe
61b7(rgyud 'bum): li yul du byang chub sems dpa' phal po che ma byung ba dang / mchod rten phal po che dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dang / dge 'dun gi kun dga' ra ba mdzes pa dag ma byung ba de'i tshe/ byang
62a1(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal grong khyer du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rigs dang ldan pa'i bud med du 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi spyod pa ji lta bu zhe na/
62a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad du 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin du'ang snang / rgyal po ji lta ba bzhin du'ang rtswa ba rgyal mo ji lta ba dang / dge sbyong dang bram
62a3(rgyud 'bum): ze'i gzugs ji lta bu dang / 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bar du thams cad du 'jug par 'gyur te/ rol mo mkhan rol mo'i gnas la mkhas pa gzugs rnam pa sna
62a4(rgyud 'bum): tshogs thams cad ston pa bzhin no/ / chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i sems can gyi thad du'ang shin tu lhag par ston to// ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal bud med kyi gzugs su
62a5(rgyud 'bum): ston ce na/ gang gi phyir bud med lhag par 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la chags pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni shin tu glen zhing shin tu ser sna che bas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal lhag
62a6(rgyud 'bum): bar bud med du ston to/ / bud med byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa dag kyang yod pas na/ de'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal de lta bur byed do// bud med du skyes nas snying rje chen por thob
62a7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ba'i dus kyang yod do/ / bud med rnams 'dzem par 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i skyon rtogs par 'gyur ba dang // skyes pa gzhan spong bar 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do// gang gi tshe ba bdag
62b1(rgyud 'bum): sum pa der 'ongs te/ mchod rten chen po rnams dang / dri gtsang khang mang po dang / dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba bzang po rnams sreg par 'gyur ba lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis rtogs pa de'i tshe
62b2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ lha mo de la 'di skad ces smras te/ sring mo sdug pa gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das rin chen snying po grong khyer du gshegs pa de na/ nga khyod kyi
62b3(rgyud 'bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur te/ der 'o bu cag gnyis kyis byang chub kyi phyir dang / sems can 'jigs shing skrag pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gis yongs su bskyang bar bya'o zhes
62b4(rgyud 'bum): smon lam btab pa'i dus de dran par gyis shig/ sring mo sdug pa ji ltar dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ rdo rje sde dang gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' mnos pa dran par gyis shig
62b5(rgyud 'bum): gzungs sngags de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de dag dang / 'od zer gang dag khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe 'dir mthong ba de dag ngas rgyas par bshad kyis/ khyod kyis
62b6(rgyud 'bum): zung la dris te de'i ming po'i thad du khyer cig/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas de dag gis 'od zer btang ba'ang / li yul 'di bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i phyag mtshan yin la/
62b7(rgyud 'bum): bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ der skye ba len par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// chos kyi rgyal po'i mchod rten de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
63a1(rgyud 'bum): phal po che de dag gi sku gdung mang po gnas pa de dag lha mo de'i lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur te/ mchod pa'i phyir sems can de dag la 'gyed par byed do// yul der lha mo de snying rje
63a2(rgyud 'bum): skye bar 'gyur te/ ci nas mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur bar byed do// de nas grong khyer gyi nang du khang pa shin tu mdzes par bya ste/ grong khyer de na mi ji snyed gnas pa de dag der ci nas bsod nams byed
63a3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur zhing 'dzin pa dang / mchod pa dang / brtse bar byed par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas spyod pa de la 'jug par 'gyur bar bya'o// ci'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis li yul
63a4(rgyud 'bum): gyi phyir chos yang dag par 'gro ba mdzad ce na/ li yul bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i phyag mtshan yin pa dang / bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed pa de dag thams
63a5(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi phyag mtshan yin pa dang / ri glang mgo dang / go ma sa la gan d+ha'i mchod rten du bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas thams cad 'du bar 'gyur ba dang / li yul byang chub sems dpa'i gnas
63a6(rgyud 'bum): su 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/ / de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ gang gi tshe gdong dmar dang rgya 'thab
63a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe nu bo khyod kyis bya ba'i dus la bab bo/ / rab nges kyang sems can la phan pa'i phyir shes bzhin du'ang skye ba len par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis
63b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dir 'od zer btang nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la skyes bskur te/ skyes de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'dir khyer te 'ongs nas/ sems can 'jis
63b2(rgyud 'bum): shing skrag pa rnams kyi don gyi phyir snying rjes sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang byul to/ / gzungs sngags de dag dang 'od zer de dag kyang li yul gyi don du sangs rgyas kyis bzhes nas de dag gi grogs su
63b3(rgyud 'bum): gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' dag kyang ci nas li yul de 'jig par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas shi 'phos nas der skye ba len par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe li yul
63b4(rgyud 'bum): du gnod pa byung na de'i tshe sangs rgyas de dag gi mtshan dang / gzungs sngags de dag dang / 'od zer gyi ming de dag bris te grong khyer gyi sgo rnams su gzhag la/ dmag gi nang du'ang bris te rgyal
63b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan la gdags so/ / yang na ming de dag 'dzin du gzhug cing bklag pa dang bcang bar bya'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / mu ge rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / dge ba'i phyogs 'phel bar bya ba
63b6(rgyud 'bum): dang sdig pa 'byang bar bya ba dang / nad las thar par bya ba rnams la'ang phan par byed pa yin no// gang la sdig pa lci ba yod na/ des zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du phyogs bcu'i sangs
63b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas rnams la rim gro byas te/ sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten nam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na/ dge ba'i phyogs las gang 'dod pa
64a1(rgyud 'bum): myur du thob par 'gyur te/ 'od zer de dag kyang de'i steng du gnas par 'gyur ro// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong ba la'ang bzlas brjod bya'o// yang na nyin gcig bzhin du
64a2(rgyud 'bum): lan bdun bdun bklag par bya'o/ / gang sdug bsngal bar gyur pa'am/ nad pa'am/ yang na ji lta bur 'dod kyang rung ste bzlas brjod bya'o// yang na bklag par bya'o// ci ste mi klog
64a3(rgyud 'bum): na'ang skud pa la mdud pa bdun bor te/ lan bdun bdun bzlas brjod byas nas btags na sdug bsngal las thar par 'gyur ro// grong khyer gang gi sgo la btags na grong khyer der dgra 'ong
64a4(rgyud 'bum): mi nus par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gang gi tshe gdong dmar dang rgya 'thab pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe/ gzhon nu rdo rje sde bcom ldan 'das
64a5(rgyud 'bum): kyis las su bskos pa de rnam par rgyal ba'i ko cha zhes bya bar gyur pa na/ 'phrin yig 'di gser gyi rigs kyi yul du khyer la/ 'phrin yig 'di gser gyi rigs kyi rgyal po la bstan par bya ste/
64a6(rgyud 'bum): mi mang po'i mig sngar ni bstan par mi bya'o// yul de'i glud kyang khyer la kha cig ni der bskur bar bya'o// kha cig ni skar rdor gzhag par bya'o// gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis
64a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad du sngon byung ba ni 'di lta bu'o/ / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
64b1(rgyud 'bum): zhugs so/ / zla ba'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
64b2(rgyud 'bum): nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba'i dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / thams cad kyi rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpa' bzhi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od chen po zhes bya ba'i
64b3(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin bcu po 'di dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs nas/ smin mtshams kyi gseb nas snang ba
64b4(rgyud 'bum): chen po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ngo / / 'od zer de las kyang 'od zer bcu byung nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du song ngo // song nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med par 'phros so// sangs rgyas
64b5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed yod pa'i zhing de dag thams cad du ji ltar li yul du gzhon nu rdo rje'i sde dang / lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi phyir sngar bshad pa bzhin du tshig tu brjod
64b6(rgyud 'bum): pa de dag byung ngo / / de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas dgongs pa mthun par rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags 'di gsungs
64b7(rgyud 'bum): so/ / tad+ya thA/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ sarba a laM kA ra/ ba ra ga ta/ d+harma tsakra/ ba rag te/ ma ra se n+ya ba ra ga ta/ a bi sha ya ba ra ga ta/ a bi d+yA pra tA ya saM stA ra pra t+ya ya/ na ma rU pa pra tA ya/ b+ha ba pra
65a1(rgyud 'bum): d+ha ya ni ru da d+ha pra t+yA ya/ ta thA ga ta/ ma ra Na ha ra/ bud+d+ha sa t+ye na/ de ba sa t+ye na/ nA ga sa t+yen/ rak+Sha sa t+ye na/ a su ra sa t+ye na/ sarba pa rA ta sa t+ye na/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes
65a2(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i gzungs sngags 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs te/ gang gi tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis thos pa de'i mod la/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs sngags rtogs par 'gyur ro//
65a3(rgyud 'bum): gang gi tshe li yul gyi don gyi phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos 'di gsungs pa de'i tshe/ lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
65a4(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyis mkhyen pa lags te/ bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'od zer gyis so sor brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i
65a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dab ma dri ma med pa'i rgyu skar gyi rgyal po mngon par shes pa'i me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ma'i don bgyi ba dang / dam pa'i chos
65a6(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma dkar po don du gnyer ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i drung du smon lam gdab pa'i slad du mchis te/ dge bsnyen ma hu sha zhes bya bar gyur nas/ bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul dang
65a7(rgyud 'bum): mjal ba slan chad lung bstan pa thob ste/ de'i tshe der smon lam btab pas gang du khyod sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der bdag byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par gyur cig ces
65b1(rgyud 'bum): bgyis nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad kyis so sor brgyan pa zhes bgyi ba de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa'i rgyu skar gyi rgyal po mngon par shes pa'i me tog kun tu
65b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i drung du mchis nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi mjed kyi 'jim
65b3(rgyud 'bum): rten gyi khams kyi mi rnams ni chags shing zhen la/ zhe sdang nga rgyal gyis khengs pa dang 'gying ba ste/ de dag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' rnams phan tshun las chen po nyams su len par byed
65b4(rgyud 'bum): de/ de dag gi sdig pa rnams tshe rabs kun tu sel bar byed do zhes gsungs so// de'i tshe bdag gis smon lam btab pa/ ji lta bu'i tshul dang thabs kyis der gzhan dag mchi ba de bzhin du
65b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag kyang mchi bar gyur cig ces bgyis nas/ de'i tshe tshe rabs snga ma la bdag gi mar gyur pa de'i don bgyi ba dang / ci nas ngan song gsum du mi mchi bar bgyi ba'i slad du skye ba blangs so// /
65b6(rgyud 'bum): sngon gyi mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su dge bsnyen ma hu sha zhes bgyi bar gyur pa dang / gzhon nu nor bzang gis rnam par thar pa bdag la dris pa/ slan chad bdag gis mi'i nang du mi'i skye
65b7(rgyud 'bum): ba blangs te/ bdag gis sems can dag dang 'dod chags spyad nas mi gzhan gyis bdag la khro mo dang glen mar mthong ngo // sems can rnams yongs su grol ba'i slad du bud med
66a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi nang du mi bzad pa'i skye ba mang po dag blangs te/ rgyal mo dang / rgyal po'i bu mo dang / bud med phal dang / smad 'tshong ma dang / sdug 'phongs pa dang / bud med
66a2(rgyud 'bum): dbul mo dag tu gyur te/ bud med du skyes pa rnams kyi don bgyid pa dang / bud med rnams yongs su grol bar bgyid do// rang gi las kyi dbang gis ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'dod chags spyad kyang
66a3(rgyud 'bum): sems can de dag mgu bar ma nus te/ tshe rabs du mar mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can gyi don gyi slad du sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong ste/ bud med du skye bas shin tu
66a4(rgyud 'bum): skyo bar gyur na/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis su ga las chen por bka' stsal te/ tshe rabs grangs ma mchis par bdag gis sdug bsngal bzod par bgyi 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
66a5(rgyud 'bum): shAkya thub pa mnyes par bgyi ba dang / sangs rgyas nyid sgrub pa'i srad du bdag gis smon lam chen po btab pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i slad du tshe rabs gzhan dag tu bdag
66a6(rgyud 'bum): la sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ba thams cad bdag gis bzod par bgyi'o/ / yul de srungs shig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal pa gang lags pa de nad dung
66a7(rgyud 'bum): ming yang ma mchis/ yul yang ma byung mod kyi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dang / 'khor der 'dus pa lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang /
66b1(rgyud 'bum): dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad las dam pa blang bar bgyi'o// ji srid du bdag tshe rabs de dag tu skye ba na/ bdag la 'dod chags dang zhe
66b2(rgyud 'bum): sdang gi gzhir mthong na'ang bdag la sdig par ma gyur cig/ ci rigs par skye ba'i dus 'tshal bar gyur la/ 'di lta bu yongs su 'dzin par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe li yul thog mar byung ba'i dus la bab
66b3(rgyud 'bum): ba na/ de'i tshe yul bgyid pa'i slad du der bdag thog mar rgyal por gyur cig/ li yul du nam rgyal po de dag gi ming chags shing rgyal rabs thog mar byung ba na/ tshe rabs bdun du rgyal po byed par gyur
66b4(rgyud 'bum): cig/ grong khyer dang ldan zhes bgyi ba'ang bgyi'o// bal po se'u tshal du ni sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten chen po bgyi'o// yul rta mjug tu ni chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po'i mchod rten bgyi'o// 'gum ti
66b5(rgyud 'bum): ra ni dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba chen po bgyi'o/ / rtsa rma ba nar yang dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba chen po bgyi'o// pa ya di kar ni dri gtsang khang chen po dang mchod rten chen po bgyi ste/ ji srid du bdag rgyal
66b6(rgyud 'bum): srid la gnas pa de srid du las chen po dag bgyi'o/ / gang gi tshe rgyal po las shi 'phos par gyur pa na'ang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa gang na bzhugs pa'i lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur te/ bdag de nas
66b7(rgyud 'bum): mchis pa'i tshe ting nge 'dzin rnams dran par gyur cig/ de nas slar yang li yul 'dir skye ba len cing / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du bud med kyi gzugs su gyur te/ skar
67a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo'i rgyal po'i bu mo rab nges zhes bya bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gzungs sngags ji snyed gsungs pa dang / bdag gis rtogs pa gang lags
67a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gzungs sngags de dag thams cad de'i tshe bdag gis dran par gyur cig/ mdo sde 'di'ang shin tu dran par gyur te/ ci nas thams cad rgyas par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe dmag sde gnyis 'thab
67a3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ba dang / li yul gyi don gyi phyir las su bya ba yod par gyur pa dang / gang gi tshe gzhon nu rdo rje sde skar rdo'i rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba'i go cha zhes bya bar gyur nas/ li yul gyi phyir glud 'jal
67a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe/ bdag rab nges zhes bya bar gyur pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad dang / 'khor de'i nang du ji snyed 'dus par gyur pa'i lha de dag thams cad grogs su
67a5(rgyud 'bum): gyur te/ mdo 'di dang gzungs sngags rnams bshad pa'i gzungs sngags de dag thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad bdag gis tshe rabs thams cad du dran par gyur cig ces byas so// gang
67a6(rgyud 'bum): gi tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis tshig de skad ces smras pa de'i tshe des ting nge 'dzin rnams thob ste/ ci nas mdo 'di la sus kyang gnod pa byed mi nus par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin theg pa chen po'i
67a7(rgyud 'bum): mdo dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i grong 'khyil ba zhes bya ba thob ste/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gang gi tshe khyod las
67b1(rgyud 'bum): rtsom pa de'i tshe 'od zer de dag steng du gnas par gyur te/ de'i tshe gang gis mdo 'di dran par 'gyur zhing / shin tu nyams su len par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas yid la byed pa zhes bya ba
67b2(rgyud 'bum): rtogs par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags gsungs pa de'i rang bzhin gang gis gzungs sngags rtogs par 'gyur
67b3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / ting nge 'dzin sbyong ba dang / sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la chos thos pa de dag thams cad kyang dran par byed do// lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od des kyang byang chub sems
67b4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' dag gis ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs sngags ji ltar rtogs pa de de bzhin du rtogs par byed do/ / rnam par rgyal ba'i go chas kyang rgyal srid thob par 'gyur te/ gzhan gyis bar chad byed
67b5(rgyud 'bum): mi nus so/ / de dag gi las ni lan bdun bzlas brjod byas la/ rta gnas kyi rig sngags gang gis sdig pa rnams 'byang bar 'gyur bar yang brjod par bya ste/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan
67b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum brjod na/ lo bdun gyis rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs sngags rtogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzungs sngags 'di bshad pa de'i
67b7(rgyud 'bum): tshebacom ldan 'das kyi steng du lha rnams kyis lha'i me tog gi char phab ste/ lha'i rol mo'i sgra bsgrags nas 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis kyang sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
68a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams las thos pa'i gzungs sngags rnams stsal bar bgyi'o/ / na ma sarba a t+yud ga ta/ badz+ra maN+Da lo ta ma s+ya/ ta thA ga ta s+ya/ kang+ka d+hi/ sa t+ya s+ya/ bo d+hi sa twa s+ya/
68a2(rgyud 'bum): tad+ya thA/ bud+d+ha sa t+ye na/ das pi ri/ de na ha ya ri/ ku tsi ru pra ti/ pa da ri pa b+hi ba tu/ tsi tu/ ma tu ga la ra ya ka da ma pa tu/ sa pa dza ma sa ra ta swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di ni lha rnams chad pas
68a3(rgyud 'bum): gcod pa'i gzungs sngags zhes bya ste/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ rtswa dUr ba brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na gang ci byed kyang rung ste/ lha rnams kyis gzhig par mi nus so//
68a4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor zlum por byas te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad bor nas/ gang du brjod pa der 'byung pos gnod par byed mi nus so// byad snyems byed
68a5(rgyud 'bum): par yang mi nus so/ / de nas de'i tshe 'khor de dag thams cad kyis gzungs sngags 'di bshad do// tad+ya thA/ sarba de bA nAn/ sarba brla na ni rdzi ta brdzi te/ skan dan tsa pa na/ na ta ma na pa nA gas
68a6(rgyud 'bum): ra/ da da tsa tsa pa pa/ tsad mi ma/ b+has+thi mi/ daN+Da ka ra Na ha ra/ su ba ra/ de ba ma ra swA hA/ sa ba pa/ pAR+Sha kA ra Na swA hA/ 'khor thams cad kyis bshad pa'i gzungs sngags 'di lan brgyaH
68a7(rgyud 'bum): brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas nas skud pa de bsregs na khyim der byad sems kyis mi tshugs la/ 'byung ba'i nad rnams kyang med par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ ra ti thA
68b1(rgyud 'bum): ka ra/ de ba bar bu dza dza ri phu ku dza ti pu swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di lkog man ba la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas/ g.yag rdal ma dud pa bdun bor te gdags par bya'o// tad+ya thA/ sarba bud+d+ha
68b2(rgyud 'bum): dam bi Sha ka ra ba ba ra tsa tsa ra sa sa ra swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di lus la nad byung ba thams cad la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas/ skud pa la mdud pa bdun bdun bor te btags so// de nas
68b3(rgyud 'bum): de'i tshe 'khor de dag thams cad kyis pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs te 'di skad ces gsol to/ / gang gi tshe gzhon nu rdo rje sde yul skar rdo nas li yul du mchi pa de'i tshe/ gzungs sngags gang gis
68b4(rgyud 'bum): shul du dpa' bo'i las bgyid par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags bdag cag gis stsal bar 'tshal lo/ / tad+ya thA/ bu bu de de bi bi sa sa/ ban+d+ha pa ba ti/ pa pa ra ti ka ra swA hA/ tad+ya thA/ sha ra ka
68b5(rgyud 'bum): rabA/ dzad tsha ba ra/ shad tra tra/ na dza~M swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di 'gron du 'gro ba rnams kyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ khrus byas la lag par blugs nas lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/
68b6(rgyud 'bum): phyogs bzhir 'thor ram/ bdag nyid kyis 'thungs na/ de la dgras gnod pa byed par mi nus te/ dpa' bo'i las kyang byed par 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis
68b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ de bzhin du rnam thos kyi bu dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / kun tu rgyal dang / 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag gis
69a1(rgyud 'bum): kyang gzhon nu rdo rje sde de la ci nas dgra rnams gnod pa byed mi nus par gzungs sngags 'di dag sbyin no/ / na mo badz+ra d+h+wa dza s+ya/ ta thA ga ta s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ badz+ra bi bi bi bi ma ma sa
69a2(rgyud 'bum): kasu ma te/ ad d+ha re/ ad d+ha re/ ad dz+wa le/ pA dA ni swA hA/ na mo ma he shwa ra s+ya/ na mo baM shra ma Na s+ya/ na ma sany+tsa ya s+ya/ na mo ha ri ti ye ba sa pu tra/ ba ri ba ra ya/ tad+ya thA/ sa sa sa sa/ hA hA
69a3(rgyud 'bum): hA hA/ pri ya pri ya pri ya pri ya/ pu tra pu tra pu tra/ pa ra da d+ha ka ra/ ts+tshin+da mA le bid twe sha na ka ra swA hA/ dbang phyug chen po dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang / kun tu rgyal ba dang / 'phrog ma bu dang bcas
69a4(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams kyis gzungs sngags 'di bshad nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag sug las chen por bskos pa'i gzungs sngags gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa de dag kyang bdag
69a5(rgyud 'bum): cag gis bshad par 'tshal lo/ / lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od de dang / gzhon nu rdo rje sde skar rdo'i rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba'i go char 'gyur ba gang lags pa des chad pas gcad par bgyi ba de'ang bdag cag gis
69a6(rgyud 'bum): bshad par bgyi'o/ / gang gi tshe dgra'am/ su'ang rung ba dag sdig pa'i las rtsom pa na/ gzungs sngags bshad pa 'di gnyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ skud pa sngon po la mdud pa bdun bor nas
69a7(rgyud 'bum): bsregs te/ sra rtsi pog gi bdug pas bsregs la/ mi de'i ming nas brjod na gnod pa byed mi nus so// bdag cag gis yid dam dang por bcas pa bzhin du ste/ gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang / lha mo
69b1(rgyud 'bum): dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis na/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sku bslus par gyur cig ces byas so// de nas 'khor der
69b2(rgyud 'bum): snyed 'dus pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'di skad
69b3(rgyud 'bum): ces gsol to/ / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du/ bdag cag thams cad kyis kyang dam bcas te de ltar ma bgyis na/ bdag cag gis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas
69b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sku bslus par gyur cig/ bdag cag thams cad kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i go cha ci nas kyang / li yul gyi rgyal por 'gyur ba thams cad sems mthun pas lhan cig/
69b5(rgyud 'bum): tu dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// gang gi tshe gdong dmar dang rgya 'thab par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ ci nas li yul 'jig par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang gi tshe yul gzhan nas li yul du rab tu byung ba rnams 'ongs pa
69b6(rgyud 'bum): na/ der ci nas rim gro byed par mi 'gyur ba dang / yul gzhan nas der sems can bros pa de dag der gnas 'thob par 'gyur zhing / gdong dmar gyis bsregs pa gang yin pa'i mchod rten chen po de dag
69b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba de dag 'chos pa'i grogs byed par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir li yul gyi glung 'jal ba dang / rgya dang phan tshun du bag ma gtong ba dang len par byed do// de nas sangs rgyas
70a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / gzhon nu rdo rje sde gnyis la li yul gtad nas/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gzhon nu rdo rje sde
70a2(rgyud 'bum): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / khyod li yul gyi rgyal po byed pa dang / lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis grogs byed par 'gyur gyis// mdo 'di las ji skad bshad pa bzhin du khyod kyis thams
70a3(rgyud 'bum): cad gyis shig/ gang gi tshe khyod gser gyi rigs kyi yul du phyir log pa de'i tshe/ rgya'i dmag li yul du 'ongs so zhes de skad du thos pa dang the tshom ma byed par li yul du song la der pho nya ba btang na/ der
70a4(rgyud 'bum): 'ong bar mi 'gyur te/ li yul dang gu zan gyi yul du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de la spring yig ni nga dang gnyen du byos la/ yul ngal byin cig ces springs shig/ de nas de'i tshe khyod ni li yul gyi rgyal
70a5(rgyud 'bum): por 'gyur ro/ / dbang po'i go cha ni skar rdo'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur te/ de'ang khyod ci nas li yul gyi rgyal por 'gyur ba'i grogs byed par 'gyur ro// skar rdo'i yul du gnod pa 'byung ba de'i tshe/ khyod
70a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis ci nas kyang gnod pa byed du ma gzhug cig/ dbang po'i go cha dang yang thog mar 'dum par gyis shig/ las 'di dag byed pa'i grogs su 'gyur ro// skar rdo ba ji snyed yod pa thams cad kyang
70a7(rgyud 'bum): grogs byed par 'gyur ro/ / a kun zhes bya ba dpa' bo zhig yod de// de sngon ye shes grags pa zhes bya bar gyur pa na/ des dar ma hing zhes bya ba'i gtsug lag khang byas so// de nas khyod kyis a kra/
70b1(rgyud 'bum): na tshol cig dang / yul gzung ba'i phyir grogs byed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dang khyod sngon smon lam lhan cig tu btab pa'i phyir te/ a kun zhes bya ba'i mi de ni sngon rgyal por gyur te/
70b2(rgyud 'bum): mi rgod rnams kyis chung ma brkus te phyir ma rnyed pa yin no// khyod ni rgyal po de'i blon po chen po yin te/ dge byed kyi phar gyur pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gzhon
70b3(rgyud 'bum): nu rdo rje sdel 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / gzhon nu rdo rje sde khyod ni li yul 'khor du rnam par rgyal ba'i go cha zhes bya ba'i rgyal por gyur te/ lo sum cu'i bar du rgyal srid 'dzin par 'gyur la/ dge
70b4(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen du gyur nas li yul gyi phyir lus yongs su gtong zhing 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod la
70b5(rgyud 'bum): yul du rab nges zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe mdo 'di zung zhig/ 'di la 'jug par gyis shig/ rgyas par gyis shig/ skar rdo'i yul du'ang ming po la skul cig dang / khyod kyi steng du 'od zer rnams
70b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe khyod kyis gzungs sngags rnams rtogs par gyur pa de'i tshe khyod la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid gsung bar 'gyur zhing / lha rnams kyang ci nas khyod kyi
70b7(rgyud 'bum): las byed nus par 'gyur ba de lta bu rgyas par smra bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis// byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsa
71a1(rgyud 'bum): to/ / nu sdug ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rin chen snying po grong khyer du gshegs pa'i tshe'o bu cag gnyis sangs rgyas nyid du lung bstan pa thob nas/ der de skad du phyogs bcun sems
71a2(rgyud 'bum): can 'jigs shing skrag pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gis skyabs byed par gyur cig/ de skad ces smon lam btab pa'i dus de dran par gyis la/ da nga'i li yul 'di dang / lha mo dri ma med
71a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'od dang / gzhon nu rdo rje sde gtad pa 'di khyod kyis long zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / 'jam dpal dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / mthu
71a4(rgyud 'bum): chen thob dang / sman gyi rgyal po dang / rab sbyin dbang po dang / sa'i snying po dang / byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sngon 'di'i phu nu
71a5(rgyud 'bum): po dang / grogs su gyur pa dang / rtag tu 'grogs 'grogs pa ni 'di dag yin te/ sna tshogs kyi lha dang / dbang phyug gi lha dang / ljon shing gi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / snying rje'i dbang phyug dang / gzugs kyi
71a6(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug dang / spong ba'i dbang phyug dang / 'od kyi dbang phyug dang / dri'i dbang phyug dang / tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug dang / 'od gsal dang / rigs kyi dbang phyug rnams so// de
71a7(rgyud 'bum): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis nga'i theg pa
71b1(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i mdo 'di dang / gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang / lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od yongs su zung zhig/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod rtag tu nga'i phyi bzhin du 'brang
71b2(rgyud 'bum): bapa yin gyis/ mdo 'di dang / gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang / lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od khyod la gtad do// gnod sbyin dbang po rnam thos kyi bu dang / gnod sbyin kun tu rgyal dang / lha'i bu blo gros brtan pa dang / klu'i
71b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po ma dros pa dang / 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang / lha'i pho brang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi lha'i rgyal po rnams dang / 'khor der 'dus pa thams cad dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer gtong ba de
71b4(rgyud 'bum): dag dang / phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la mdo 'di dang / li yul dang / gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang / lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od gtad de/ yongs su gtad pa'i dam pas
71b5(rgyud 'bum): yongs su gtad do/ / de nas yang de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ngas ji skad bshad pa dang / khyed kyis ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du grogs kyis la/ ngas dgongs pa kun thams
71b6(rgyud 'bum): cad nas thams cad du mthar phyin par gyis la/ ci nas log par mi 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig/ ngas bskal pa mang por 'khor ba na dka' ba'i las shin tu mang po don dang ldan pa dag byas pa lta bu ni/
71b7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis kyang ma byas so// nga'i li yul 'khor der sems can ngas yongs su smin par ma byas pa de gang yin pa dag phyis li yul 'khor du gnas par gyur te/ nga'i chos
72a1(rgyud 'bum): kyis yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyed thams
72a2(rgyud 'bum): cad la mdo 'di dang / li yul dang / gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang / lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od gtad do// gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
72a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / lha thams cad dang / 'khor thams cad la mdo 'di dang / li yul dang / gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang / lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od gtad pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng du lha'i me
72a4(rgyud 'bum): tog gi char bab bo/ / lha rnams kyis lha'i rol mo'i sgra bsgrags so// lha'i rgyan gyi char yang bab bo// de bzhin du 'khor de dag thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la ji ltar 'os pa'i mchod pas bcom
72a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das la mchod par byas so/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'od zer shin tu mang po btang ngo // mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pa'i
72a6(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngo / / de na gnas pa rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa
72a7(rgyud 'bum): dang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ste/ 'khor thams cad dang / lha dang / mi rnams gcig gis gcig mthong bar gyur to// de nas de'i tshe dge slong kun dga' bo stan las langs te thal
72b1(rgyud 'bum): mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na su la la mdo 'di klog pa dang / sems pa dang / nyan pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir
72b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam du 'phel bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad khri bzhi stong gi nang na skye bo ji snyed gnas pa rnams la sbyin pa byin
72b3(rgyud 'bum): pa bas ni/ su mdo 'di 'chang ba 'am/ kha ton du byed pa 'am/ klog pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang bar 'gyur ro// mdor na ji ltar 'bras bu gsum pa rtogs pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung
72b4(rgyud 'bum): po ji snyed 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes nga smra'o/ / de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / 'khor
72b5(rgyud 'bum): de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bdag cag 'khor 'dir 'dus pa ji snyed mchis pa rnams gang du mdo 'di brjod pa der ma mchis sam/ gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang / lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od
72b6(rgyud 'bum): la gzungs sngags ma sprul tam/ dam bcas pa 'di bskyud par gyur na/ bdag cag gis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku bslus par gyur cig/ mtshams
72b7(rgyud 'bum): ma mchis pa'i las bgyis pa'i sdig pa ji tsam mchis pa bdag cag gis bgyis par gyur cig/ de nas 'od zer de dag las tshigs su brjod pa 'di skad ces 'byung ste/ gang na mdo 'di brjod pa der
73a1(rgyud 'bum): bdag cag 'ong ngo zhes sgra grags par gyur to/ / de nas kun dga' bo dang 'khor de dag thams cad kyis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/

77a6(rgyud 'bum): na phyugs nad med par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du zhag bdun du byas na nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// mi nad dang phyugs nad la gro ga la bris te mchod pa byas nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la gdags so//

78a4(rgyud 'bum): bar mdzod cig/ yongs su bskyang bar mdzod cig/ zhi ba dang bde legs su mdzod cig/ chad pa spang bar mdzod cig/ mtshon cha spang bar mdzod cig/ ji srid dug gzhom pa'i bar du mdzod cig/

78a6(rgyud 'bum): a mr-i te/ oM mr-i ta ud b+ha be/ a mr-i ta saM b+ha be/ A shA ste/ A shwa staM ge/ mA ma ra mA ma ra/ mA sa ra mA sa ra/ zhi bar mdzod/ nad thams cad nye bar zhi bar mdzod/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams
78a7(rgyud 'bum): cad nye bar zhi bar mdzod/ gza' dang rgyu skar gyi nyes pa thams cad nye bar zhi bar mdzod/ mche ba'i dug thams cad nye bar zhi bar mdzod/ bcom ldan 'das ma ri khrod lo ma can/ tun+na tun+na/ bi tur+tha
78b1(rgyud 'bum): n+da/ tuN taN/ tu mu le swA hA/ oM ko ri/ krAn+d+ha ri/ tsan+d+ra li/ mA ha~M ki/ prak+ka si swA hA/ oM a ku re/ ma~M ku re/ ku re re/ par+N+Na sha ba ri swA hA/ na maHsarba sha ba rIH/ ma hA sha ba riH/ b+ha ga ba ti/
78b2(rgyud 'bum): pi shA tsa/ par+N+Na sha ba ri pi shA tsi swA hA/ oM pi shA tsi par+N+Na sha ba ri hriHdzaHhUM phaT pi shA tsi swA hA/ 'phags ma ri khrod ma lo ma gyon ma'i gzungs rdzogs so// //

78b5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bzlog pa/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad 'gog pa/ gza' dang / rgyu skar gyi gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ bdud kyi gnas thams

78b7(rgyud 'bum): d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra ba ra/ kA le kA le kA le/ ma hA kA la a ba lo ki te/ pra sa d+ha ne/ d+ha me d+ha me/ d+ha me/ d+ha ma ne/ sa mA he te/ bdag la srung du gsol srung du gsol/ 'jigs shi
79a1(rgyud 'bum): skrag pa thams cad las bsrung bar mdzad du gsol/ yongs su bskyab tu gsol// yongs su gzung du gsol/ yongs su bskyang du gsol/ zhi ba dang bde legs

79a4(rgyud 'bum): r-ib le ba le/ ta ra ta ra/ mu ya mu ya/ muny+tsa ni/ kha kha re/ d+hu d+hu d+hu ni/ bdag 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad las srung du gsol srung du gsol/
79a5(rgyud 'bum): dza yaM ku ru ku ru/ phu ru phu ru swA hA/ a ma le swA hU~M/ oM m+bu te swA hA/ 'phags pa phyir bzlog pa spobs can zhes bya ba rdzogs so// rgya gar
79a6(rgyud 'bum): skad du/ a gra bid+hi man+t+ra/ bod skad du/ mchog thob pa'i rig sngags/ bcom ldan 'das ma dung can ma la phyag 'tshal lo// bsnyen pa rdzogs par byed pa/ gzi brjid rgyas par byed pa/
79a7(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod 'phel bar byed pa/ dbang phyug 'phel bar byed pa/ 'khor 'phel bar byed pa/ tshe 'phel bar byed pa/ dgra zhi bar byed pa/ bgegs zhi bar byed pa'o// dkon mchog gsum la
79b1(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa phul la/ sems byams pa la gnas pas dus gcig la lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ na maHsarba ta thA ga tA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ oM shaM khi ni de bi/ A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ tiSh+Tha d+ha ni//
79b2(rgyud 'bum): d+ha nA dza ye/ prI brI/ bi ti ka ri/ d+hI d+h+ri d+hI ti ka ri nan/ bi bi d+ha/ be sha ba sta/ A yu d+hA ri na yu yu/ a yu pal+la la nI/ ta thA ga tA/ sma ra bo d+hi tsit+ti/ ma ti la ma bo da ra/ de hi me ba ra na shA khi naM sA hA/ bdag gis
79b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di nyid kyi sprul pa'i sku 'di nyid du mthong bar gyur cig/ stong pa nyid la bzod pa thob par gyur cig/ stong pa nyid kyi don mthong bar gyur cig/ stong pa nyid kyi don byed par gyur cig/ 'di brjod pas
79b4(rgyud 'bum): bar du gcod pa thams cad kyang rnam par sel bar 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa mchog thob pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs la
79b5(rgyud 'bum): bstod pa/ lam gang gis na sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang // rgyal ba sras bcas chos kyi bla mar gyur// mkhyen pa'i rim par sa rnams bkod pa yi// shes rab dkyil 'khor mang la skyabs su mchi//
79b6(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal dpal ldan lha mo dbyangs can ma// 'jig rten khams 'dir spru la dbang brnyes shes// drang srong rig gsum rig pa'i pha rol gshegs// de ni spyod pa rgya chen rnams las byung // sem
79b7(rgyud 'bum): can don phyir 'phrin las chen po'i khur/ / spro bar dka' ba kun kyang khyod kyis mdzad// sa dang pha rol phyin pa bcu spyad pas// dge ba'i tshogs brtan yid bzhin lus su bsgyur// zhal gyi dkyil
80a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor zla ba dri med rgyas/ / thugs rje'i spyan gyis 'gro ba'i mig 'byed pa// dus ring 'jig rten kun la bde bar gzigs// de la dbang po tshangs sogs shin tu bdud//
80a2(rgyud 'bum): byams shing bzod ldan snying rje bskyed pa'i ma// lha mo mchog de 'gro kun skyong bar dgyes// thor tsugs ri bo rtse 'dra spobs pa 'phags// shes rab zab cing shes pa'i rten byed kyang // rig pa'i
80a3(rgyud 'bum): gnas la mnga' brnyes tshig gi bdag/ 'jig rten na yang lha yi lhar gyur la// sdug bsngal ba sal bar rab brtson gnyen mchog pas// mu su rtog ge pa rnams kun kyang 'dud// yan lag rnam
80a4(rgyud 'bum): par 'byes shing gsung snyan pa/ / yon tan dri med bsod nams 'bar bar bsgyings// rig pa mchog gi dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa// blo myur chog 'chang spobs pa'i mchog stsol cig/ sems
80a5(rgyud 'bum): can kun la rtag tu phan sems pa/ / mi smra mchog khyod rnam grol sa la bzhugs// thugs dam brtan bcas bskul ba rnams la yang // dpal gyis dgongs shig don kun nye bar skongs// 'di ltar
80a6(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten dag na snang ba kun/ / sgra 'joms khyad par tshig gis don mtshon te// phan tshun shes shing yang dag brda sprod pa'ang // dbyangs can khyod kyi mthu ste bsam mi khyab// gzungs dang chos
80a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi stobs la dbang brnyes pa/ / dam tshig bden grub drang srong shes nyen can// lus sems ngag rnams byin gyis rlob pa dang // yid 'ong sgras kyang 'jig rten tshim par byed// byang chub mchog
80b1(rgyud 'bum): gi spyod phyir su dag mos/ / bdag dang gzhan don phun sum tshogs gyur pa'i// lus dang ngag yid rnam dag mchog 'dod la// bcom ldan 'das mas rtag tu don mchog stsol// bdag ni dpa'
80b2(rgyud 'bum): zhing byang chub lam brtson dang / / lce yi dbang po dag cing tshig btsun la// rig pa'i gter ldan smra la thogs med dang // bde gshegs spobs pa nye bar bsgrub tu gsol// rig pa'i yum gyi rang
80b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin rtog las dben/ / snyan pa'i rgyal mtshan dga' ba'i shugs kyis bskyod// mkha' la sna tshogs rnam par dri 'dod ltar// mtshan nyid rtogs dka' yon tan gting mtha' med// na mo b+ha ga ba
80b4(rgyud 'bum): te/ brah+ma Ne/ na maHs+phA ra swa t+yai de bi sid d+h+ya nu man+t+ra pA da taM brah+ma nu man+tha swA hA/ dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs la bstod pa rdzogs so// / ts+ya/ rgya gar skad
80b5(rgyud 'bum): / duHAr+ya shrI ma hA de ba~M byA ka ra Na/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
80b6(rgyud 'bum): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
80b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen po thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
81a1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i

81a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po nyi zla dang / 'jig rten 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mu stegs kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam

81a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// lha mo chen mo dpal
81a7(rgyud 'bum): yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
81b1(rgyud 'bum): chen po de dag la'ang mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams brgya stong du mas brgyan cing / de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba dag gis yongs su bskor te/
81b2(rgyud 'bum): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags so// lha mo chen mo dpal la gzigs nas tshangs pa chen po'i gsung gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
81b3(rgyud 'bum): chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyal po 'am/ blon po'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen

81b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyal po de'i yul dang / sems can de dag gi 'jigs pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing / chom rkun dang / g.yo can dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa
81b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i khyim du'ang dpal nges par gnas par 'gyur ro//
81b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsung 'di legs par bka' stsal pa legs so legs so// legs te/ gang dag
82a1(rgyud 'bum): mo chen mo dpal gyi ming rnams 'dzin pa dang / thos nas kyang sgrub par bgyid pa de dag gi yon tan dang phan yon ni de dag lags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
82a2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang du bskyed pa lags/
82a3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo chen mo dpal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sngon byung ba 'das

82a5(rgyud 'bum): bab 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa mang po gzhan dag la'ang lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag kyang lha mo chen mo dpal de'i dge ba
82a6(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba dang / 'grub par byed pa dang / rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba yin te/ de dag ni 'dir lha mo chen mo dpal gyis yang dag par brjod pa dang / sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang / nyes
82a7(rgyud 'bum): sdig thams cad med par byed pa dang / lus thams cad dri ma med par byed pa dang / nor dang 'bru rnams 'du zhing 'phel bar byed pa dang / dbul ba gcod par byed pa dang / lha dang / klu dang /
82b1(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad 'dun par byed cing 'gugs par byed pa dang / yams kyi nad dang / gnod

82b4(rgyud 'bum): stegs kyi sgo thams cad bkra shis kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi me tog gzi brjid skar ma'i 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa

83a1(rgyud 'bum): su brjod pa mtshan gsol dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo rin po che'i gnas kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshes
83a2(rgyud 'bum): ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'phags dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus grangs med pa la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs

83a4(rgyud 'bum): ba shes rab sgrol ma grangs med pa'i 'od kyi tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa sred med kyi bu'i brtul zhugs kyi cho ga lhun po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs
