83a6(rgyud 'bum): pa zab mo'i chos kyi 'od kyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i sgron ma 'od bzang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 'od tog gi dpal la phyag
83a7(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi sgron ma'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i snying po las byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i
83b1(rgyud 'bum): 'brug sgra snyan pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sdang ba thams cad bkod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shing gi rgyal po ltar skyes pa'i dpal
83b2(rgyud 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro ri bo'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od 'phro rgya mtsho'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
83b3(rgyud 'bum): smon lam chen po'i shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhi/
83b4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa dbang po tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nor dang 'bru thams cad sdud pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhing
83b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dren pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'gugs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag rim gror byas te bcang bar
83b6(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / bklag par bya'o// de ltar byas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams shin tu mang du bskyed par 'gyur ro// lha mo chen mo dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung
83b7(rgyud 'bum): bstan te/ lha mo chen mo dpal khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal chen po rin po ches brgyan pa zhes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
84a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas dpal nor bu rin po che las byung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de'ang lha'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi khams der de
84a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa de nyid snang bar mdzad par 'gyur la/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang rang las 'od 'byung zhing tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// nam mkha'
84a3(rgyud 'bum): las kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang pad+ma'i snying po dag
84a4(rgyud 'bum): las skye bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/ / de la ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med pa lta bu zhes bya ba'i bstod pa rgyun chags bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha
84a5(rgyud 'bum): mo chen mo dpal gyi ming rnam par nyon cig/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/ lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/
84a6(rgyud 'bum): lha thams cad kyi ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dpal/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal/ tshangs pa dang /
84a7(rgyud 'bum): / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi dpal/ lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi dpal/ gnas thams cad yod pa'i dpal/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin
84b1(rgyud 'bum): dang rtanam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/ rig sngags 'chang dang / lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyi dpal/ 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang lnga'i
84b2(rgyud 'bum): dpal/ gza' brgya chu skar nya shu rtsa brgyad kyi dpal lo// oM nyi ma'i bu mo 'am/ yum rig byed bzhi'i dpal/ bkra shis ma/ sems can gyi ma/ rnam par rgyal ma/ gad+hA ma/ mu stegs tham
84b3(rgyud 'bum): cad ma/ bkra shis thams cad ma/ dri ma med par byed pa'i dpal/ sdig pa thams cad 'phrog ma/ rgyags byed ma/ zla ba'i dpal/ nyi ma'i dpal/ gza' thams cad kyi dpal/ seng ge la zhon
84b4(rgyud 'bum): maHpad+ma'i mchog 'bum gyis bkab ma/ pad+ma/ pad+ma las byung ma/ pad+ma la gnas ma/ pad+ma 'dzin ma/ pad+ma dang ldan ma/ rin po che 'od 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba dum dang ldan ma/ nor sbyin ma/ dkar
84b5(rgyud 'bum): mo/ dkar mo chen mo// lag dkar ma/ bkra shis thams cad 'dzin ma/ bsod nams thams cad bsags pa'i lus can ma/ shes nyen gyi bu mo/ lag pa 'bum ldan ma/ mig 'bum
84b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan ma/ mgo 'bum ldan ma/ nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi cod pan dang ldan ma/ gzugs bzang ma/ kun gyi gzugs can ma/ grags ma/ shin tu grags ma/ zhi ma/ sprin 'dra ba'i sgra
84b7(rgyud 'bum): gtsang ma/ zla bsar mdzes ma/ dkam/ dge byed ma/ sems can thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal/ 'phags ma/ me tog gi dpal/ me tog gi dbang phyugs/ ri'i rgyal
85a1(rgyud 'bum): ra rab thams cad kyi dpal/ chu klung dang mtsho thams cad kyi dpal/ chu dang rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dpal/ mu stegs thams cad mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal/ sman dang
85a2(rgyud 'bum): rtsa dang / nags tshal dang / nor dang / 'bru thams cad kyi dpal/ gser sbyin ma/ zas dang skom sbyin ma/ 'od gsal ma/ snang ma/ lus gtsang ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang
85a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ma/ lha'i tshogs thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal/ gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i dpal/ sbyin byed ma/ longs spyod ma/ gzi brjid
85a4(rgyud 'bum): mgazi brjid ldan ma/ phun sum tshogs ma/ 'byor pa ma/ rnam par 'phel ma/ mthong ma/ chos kyi dpal ma/ khyab 'jug la brten ma/ ku mu da la gnas ma/ gnod sbyin ma/ bzod
85a5(rgyud 'bum): sbyin ma/ mthu rtsal gyi gnas ma/ dag byed dang bkra shis thams cad kyi lag ldan ma/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad 'jig byed ma/ bsod nams thams cad sdud pa'i dpal/ sa thams
85a6(rgyud 'bum): cad dang rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal/ rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal/ 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / sto
85a7(rgyud 'bum): 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/ lha'i gnas dang / lha thams cad kyi dpal/ bzlas brjod dang / bzlas brjod du bya ba dang / sbyin sreg dang / sbyin sreg tu bya ba dang / bkra shis thams
85b1(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi dpal/ 'od ldan ma/ mchog dga' ma/ skal bas 'gyur ma/ drang srong thams cad dga' bar brjod pa'i dpal/ bud med thams cad kyi gnas/ kun gyi gtso mo/ dpal gyi mchog/
85b2(rgyud 'bum): mi'am ci mo thams cad dang / lha ma yin mo thams cad kyi dpal gyi mchog/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i gnas na 'dug ma/ yid 'ong ma/ sim byed ma/ lus ngan la sdug ma/ chos kyi rgyal po'i dpal
85b3(rgyud 'bum): oM sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par gzigs shing sgrol cig/ thar par mdzod cig/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bdag la mngon du gyur par mdzod cig swA hA/ oM gang+ga sarba tir+tha
85b4(rgyud 'bum): mU khai swA hA/ oM sarba bid+d+he swA hA/ sarba maM ga la d+hA ra Ni swA hA/ tsa tu ra be da sarba nak+Sha tra/ grA hA ga/ nA hA ga/ nA d+ha mUrba ye swA hA/ prap+tA ya swA hA/ biSh+Ta ye swAhA/ ru drA ya swA hA/ bi shwa mu khA ya swA hA/
85b5(rgyud 'bum): oM gr-i ni gla na sarba kAr+ya sA d+ha ni/ si ni si ni/ A bA hA/ de ba hA/ bai shra maN+Da ya swA hA/ su bar+Na/ d+ha na d+ha n+ya/ A kaR+Sha N+yaM swA hA/ sarba puN+ye A kaR+Sha N+yai swA hA/ shrI he ba te A kaR+Sha NAM swA hA/ sarba pA pa~M na
85b6(rgyud 'bum): sha myaM swA hA/ sarba A lak+Sh+mI pra sha ma N+ye swA hA/ sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ye swA hA/ sarba de ba ta a b+hi mu kha shrI ye a yur ba la par+Na ke ra ya swA hA/ sarba bi ta tA maM ga la ha s+thA ye swA hA/ saM gi ba
85b7(rgyud 'bum): nane swA hA/ pad+ma saM b+hU ta yo swA hA/ sarba kri ti ka kho rda bi nA sha ne swA hA/ 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming // nyes sdig thams cad med par
86a1(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ bsod nams thams cad sdud par byed pa/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad med par byed pa/ dpal dang / bde ba dang /
86a2(rgyud 'bum): skal ba bzang po thams cad sdud par byed pa 'di dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag 'chang ba dang klog par byed pa des nang par langs te gtsang bar byas la/ sangs rgyas thams cad
86a3(rgyud 'bum): la me tog dang bdug pa gsol nas/ lha mo chen mo dpal la'ang tsan dan gyi bdug pa phul te bklags na/ des dpal thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad thob par
86a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ lha thams cad kyang srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur/ de'i dgos pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/
86a5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / lha mo chen mo dpal de dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bca
86a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa lha mo chen ma dpal lung bstan pa rdzogs so// /
86a7(rgyud 'bum): gar skad du/ Ar+ya ma hA shri yaHsUtra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
86b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan
86b2(rgyud 'bum): 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas
86b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo la gzigs nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis po 'di dge slong
86b4(rgyud 'bum): ngamadage slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ de ma yin pa gzhan yang rung ste/ gang gis shes pa dang / gang la la 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug
86b5(rgyud 'bum): pa de ni dbul bor te phyug por 'gyur ro/ / de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis de ltar gyur cig ces kun nas gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis
86b6(rgyud 'bum): po bka' stsal pa/ 'di lta ste/ dpal ldan ma/ bkra shis ma/ pad+ma'i 'phreng ba can/ nor gyi bdag mo/ dkar mo/ grags pa chen mo/ pad+ma'i spyan/ 'od chen ma/ byed pa mo// zas sbyin ma/
86b7(rgyud 'bum): rin po che rab tu sbyin ma/ dpal chen mo// s+yAd ya the dan/ dzi ni/ g+hi Ni/ sarba ar+tha sA d+ha na~M/ sha shi ni/ a lak+ShAM Ni/ me nA sha ya/ sid d+ha nu me man+t+ra pa dAHswA hA/ oM thA ku Ti pa ra ma su b+ha ge swA hA/
87a1(rgyud 'bum): lan gsum du brjod par bya ste/ gang la la dus gsum du 'don pa de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// skal ba bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
87a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa zad mi shes par 'gyur ro// mi dang phrad du 'gro ba'i tshe bklags nas phrad pa byas na mi des de la bu'i 'du shes skyed par 'gyur te dga' bar 'gyur la/ ji skad bsgo ba bzhin byed do// rtag tu/
87a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyun mi 'chad par bklags na tshangs pa dang bram zes drag shul gyi las byas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par yang 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
87a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags
87a5(rgyud 'bum): ba dpal chen mo'i mdo rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
87a6(rgyud 'bum): / dpal gyi lha mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo//
87a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal lha mo chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can gyi 'jig rten na bzhugs te/ de nas
87b1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
87b2(rgyud 'bum): te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpal lha mo chen mo'ang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste drung du phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
87b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo la gzigs nas/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di
87b4(rgyud 'bum): skad ces bka' stsal to/ / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ sems can gang su'ang rung bas dpal
87b5(rgyud 'bum): chen mo 'di'i ming bcu gnyis shes te 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / sgrub par byed pa dang / rjod par byed na de dbul po spangs nas phyug po chen por 'gyur ro// de nas 'byung po'i tshogs
87b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras so/ / dpal lha mo chen mo'i ming bcu gnyis ni/ 'di lta ste/ bkra shis ma/ dpal ldan ma/ pad+ma'i 'phreng thogs ma/ nor
87b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag ma/ dkar sha ma ma/ grags chen ma/ pad+ma'i spyan mnga' ma/ 'od chen ma/ byed pa mo// zas sbyin ma/ rin chen 'od ldan ma/ dpal chen mo ma/ sangs rgyas thams cad la
88a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag 'tshal lo/ / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di lta ste/ dzi na/ g+h+r-i Ni/ dgos pa thams cad sgrub
88a2(rgyud 'bum): par mdzad ma/ si mi so mi/ ni mi ni mi/ bdag gis mi shes pa thams cad bsal bar mdzod cig swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
88a3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' 'o/ / dpal gyi lha mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis pa rdzogs so// /
88a4(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// // rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya
88a5(rgyud 'bum): sarba kar+m+ma A ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ni nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par skyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
88a6(rgyud 'bum): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM kaM ka na~M kaM ka ni/ ro tsa ni ro tsa na~M/ tro Ta ni tro Ta ni/ trA sa ni trA sa ni/ pra ti ha na pra ti ha na/ sarba karma pa ra pa rA Ni me swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di'i cho ga 'di yin te/ rtag
88a7(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod byas na las gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ / dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na mtshams med pa lnga'ang 'byang bar 'gyur ro// lan cig
88b1(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod byas na lhas ngan pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa rnams med par 'gyur ro// lus la 'chang ngam/ glegs bam la bris nas mgul du thogs te 'chang na de la dus ma
88b2(rgyud 'bum): yin par 'chi ba rnams gtan du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / gang zhig snying rjes non te ri dgas dang / bya dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyang rung ste/ 'chi ba'i rna khung du brjod na de ngan song du 'gro
88b3(rgyud 'bum): bar mi 'gyur ro/ / yang na shi ste dus las 'das na shi 'phos pa'i ming nas smos te/ de'i phyir byams pa dang snying rjes lan brgya'am/ stong ngam/ 'bum brjod na de sems can dmyal bar
88b4(rgyud 'bum): skyes su zin kyang de'i mod la thar par 'gyur ro/ / sa 'am/ til lam/ yungs kar ram/ chu gang yang rung ba la bzlas brjod byas te/ shi ba'i lus la gtor ram khrus byas nas de'i 'og
88b5(rgyud 'bum): tu mchod pa 'am/ yang na mchod rten gyi nang du bcug ste bzhag la/ rig sngags kyang bris nas mgo la btags na/ de ngan song du skyes pa'ang zhag bdun gyis gdon mi za bar thar te/
88b6(rgyud 'bum): bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba 'am/ yang na rang gi smon lam gyi dbang gis skye bar 'gyur ro// gang zhig zla ba nye ba'i tshe khrus byas la gtsang mar byas te/ dus gsum
88b7(rgyud 'bum): du gos brje zhing kha zas mi za ba 'am/ yang na kha zas dkar bag bza' zhing / sku gdung dang mchod rten skor bzhin du gang gi ming dang ldan pas lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ de ngan song
89a1(rgyud 'bum): nas thar te gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i ris su skyes nas sgrub pa po'i thad du 'ongs te mchod par byed cing lus kyang ston la/ legs so zhes byas pa'ang byin nas lan gsu
89a2(rgyud 'bum): bskor ba byas te mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / de'i ming bris la gzungs sngags bzlas brjod byed cing // mchod rten 'bum byas la/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs
89a3(rgyud 'bum): pas legs par mchod nas rgya mtsho chen po dang / yang na chu klung du btang na des sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa nas thar par 'gyur ro// yang na de ltar mchod pa byas nas mjug tu lam
89a4(rgyud 'bum): gyi bzhi mdor mchod rten chen po byas te/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas legs par mchod la/ 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la'ang mchod ston gsol nas yon yang
89a5(rgyud 'bum): phul te legs par mchod nas che ge mo zhig gi dge ba'i rtsa bar gyur cig/ 'di kho nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar gyur cig ces kyang shes par byas na/ de kho na bzhin du skyes
89a6(rgyud 'bum): nas lus kyang ston cing legs so zhes bya ba'ang byin nas mi snang bar gyur to/ / mtshams med pa lnga byed pa 'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba'am/ 'phags pa la skur pa btab pa'ang
89a7(rgyud 'bum): rung ste 'chi khar rtsig pa la gzungs sngags 'di bris pa mthong na de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur na/ 'don pa dang bzlas brjod byas pa lta ci smos te/ de bzhin gshegs
89b1(rgyud 'bum): pa de nyid byon nas 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu tshur nga'i gan du shog ces kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
89b2(rgyud 'bum): / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya bid+yA ud+d+ha ma ma hA tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig pa mchog gi rgyud chen po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
89b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gnyen yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs
89b4(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje rig pa bye ba phrag du mas bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas par snang las babs te/
89b5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
89b6(rgyud 'bum): gzigs dbang phyug kyang rig pa bye ba du mas yongs su bskor nas 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la/
89b7(rgyud 'bum): lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan 'byung po bye ba phrag du mas bskor nas 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ bcom ldan
90a1(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyi zhabs dang phyag na rdo rje la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas gdol pa'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pa'ang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par
90a2(rgyud 'bum): gyur to/ / rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang g.yog 'khor bye ba phrag du mas kun nas bskor te 'khor de nyid du 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs
90a3(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de log
90a4(rgyud 'bum): su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du bdag gsang sngags kyi tshig 'chad par gnang ba
90a5(rgyud 'bum): mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje khyod ni shin tu ma rungs pa/ lag na rdo rje khyod ni shin tu brtsam
90a6(rgyud 'bum): pa med pa/ shin tu gtum pa yin na/ ji ltar sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gsang sngags 'chad/ lag na rdo rje khyod ni dam tshig shes pa yin la/ sems can gang dag dam tshig mi shes
90a7(rgyud 'bum): par brjod pa rnams ni rdo rjes mthar byed pa yin na/ / khyod ji ltar gsang sngags 'chad/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de ltar lags mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag rig pa mchog 'di'i
90b1(rgyud 'bum): don 'don pa dang / 'chang ba dang // mchod pa bgyid pa de dag ni bdag gi dam tshig 'tshal ba lags/ bdag gi dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar
90b2(rgyud 'bum): mdzad du gsol/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnod sbyin gyi bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi yi ge bzhi pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni rig pa'i tshogs
90b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa/ las mang po rab tu sgrub pa/ stobs dang pha rol gnon pa dpag tu ma mchis pa/ bstan pa thogs pa ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po
90b4(rgyud 'bum): bshad par bgyi'o/ / kye kye lha yul dang / sa dang tshul gnas pa'i 'byung po'i tshogs rnams khyed yid rtse gcig tu gyis la nyon cig/ rdo rjes mgo bkas par gyur tar/ de nas lag na rdo rjes rang
90b5(rgyud 'bum): gi rig pa'i tshogs la bltas nas gsang sngags smras pa/ na mo rat+na tra yA s+ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha sa nA pa ti s+ya/ ma hA shAkya saM bud d+hA ya/ birli/ kiR+Ye/ miR+Ye/ hiR+Shi/ bai d+yu ta ma
90b6(rgyud 'bum): ya rtsi ni mi li swA hA/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de 'dar yang yod nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la bskyab tu
90b7(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag la bskyab tu gsol/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi dbang po lag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs
91a1(rgyud 'bum): shig/ rig pa'i rgyal po dran par gyis shig ces dbugs phyung ngo // de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
91a2(rgyud 'bum): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje 'di lta bu'i gsang sngags kyi tshig dag 'chad pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni reg pa'i rgyal po gang na gnas
91a3(rgyud 'bum): pa der mchod par 'tshal lo/ / su klog pa dang / mchod par bgyid pa dang / sgrub pa'i rig sngags 'chang de'i brtson pa bskyed par bgyi'o// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin te/ de
91a4(rgyud 'bum): debazhin no/ / de nas rig pa'i rgyal po'i las ni 'di lags te/ srad bu 'am/ thal ba'am/ chu la lan cig brjod pas srung bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags gcad na mtshon rnon po la lan gnyis
91a5(rgyud 'bum): brjod de rtswa ku sha ga cad do/ / yang na sa dra'o// de ltar na rig sngags thams cad bcad par 'gyur ro// lan gsum brjod na rig sngags tshang bar 'gyur te/ mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la 'phags pa lag
91a6(rgyud 'bum): nardo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis la rig sngags gang yi ge ma tshang ba 'am/ dran pa nyams pa de lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod de rig pa'i mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig tu lan gsum brjod na rmi lam
91a7(rgyud 'bum): du ston to/ / ci ste las bcad par gyur na rtsa ku shas bya ba par bya ste rdzogs par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan bzhi brjod na dge ba dang mi dge ba ston par 'gyur ro// ci 'dod pa yid bzhin
91b1(rgyud 'bum): du sbyor ba bgyis na las rnams su 'gyur ro/ / gdon tshar gcad na thal ba'am/ chu 'am/ dur khrod kyi sol bas bsnun no// yang na gzugs bgyis te lcug mas gzhus na gtong bar 'gyur
91b2(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / yang na sa la gzugs bgyis te dur khrod kyi sol bas lag mthil la rdo rje bris te lag pas bkab na gtong bar 'gyur ro// skud pa la mdud pa bor ba rnams kyis rig sngags bcing ngo //
91b3(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma rnams gcad par bgyi na yungs kar dag la lan bdun bdun bsngags te/ bsnun na mkha' 'gro ma thams cad ma rungs par 'gyur ro// dbab par bgyi na rna bar bzlas brjod
91b4(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / yang na tsan dan dmar pos dkyil 'khor byugs la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bris te gu gul gyi bdug pa dang me tog rnams kyis dbab bo// phyag rgya gzhig na chu 'am/ thal lcag gam/ saM
91b5(rgyud 'bum): phag gi dum bu rnams kyis so/ / dug las gson chu 'am/ rma bya'i mdongs sam/ chu dri'am/ me long gis so// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun du zhag gsum sbyang bar byas
91b6(rgyud 'bum): la lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes dam pa stsol bar 'gyur te/ de'i 'og tu dug gso ba la sogs pa dang las gzhan rnams kyang bgyi'o//
91b7(rgyud 'bum): gal te mkha' 'gro ma rnams shin tu gcad par 'tshal na/ de nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun du 'bras kyi gzegs mas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na lag na rdo rjes ji skad bshad pa bzhin du
92a1(rgyud 'bum): tshe ji tsam thub par rig sngags thams cad ma rungs par 'gyur ro/ / seng ldeng gis rdo rje bgyis te rig sngags 'chang gi ming nas brjod las la lan cig btsugs na bshig/
92a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur te/ de phyin chad rig sngags 'chang de'i gsang sngags rnams mi 'jug go// rig sngags gcad par bgyi 'tshal na/ rig sngags 'chang gi gzugs bgyis pa bcad na bcad pa bgyis
92a3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags bshig par bgyid 'tshal bas rig sngags de rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig brjod na rig sngags thams cad bshig par 'gyur te las mi bgyid do// rig pa
92a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gugs par 'tshal bas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung bar bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis te/ rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig lan brgya stong bzlas brjod
92a5(rgyud 'bum): bgyis na rig pa 'gugs te phyis rig pa sgrub bo/ / rig pa nyams par bgyis na bzlas brjod byas pas chog ste/ che ge mo'i rig pa la gnod pa mdzod cig ces bgyis na rig pa de las mi bgyid do//
92a6(rgyud 'bum): rig pa tshar gcad par bgyi na thal ba la gzugs bgyis te/ rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig brjod la rkang pa g.yon pas kyang phyis na rig pa smad pa dang nyams par 'gyur te las mi bgyid do//
92a7(rgyud 'bum): gal te rig sngags 'chang gzhig par 'tshal na/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rig sngags 'chang gi ming nas brjod da mar me'i snying po me lce dang bcas pa bdun sbyin sreg bgyis na rig sngags 'chang ba
92b1(rgyud 'bum): bshig par 'gyur te bsod nams kyang 'jig go/ / srog kyang 'jig go/ rig sngags 'chang de'i tshe ji tsam par gsang sngags rnams mi 'grub bo// slar gso ba rab gyi na ma la ta'i me tog mar la
92b2(rgyud 'bum): bstsags pa'i sbyi ni sreg bgyi ba lan nyi shu rtsa gcig lag na rdo rje'i mdun du sbyin sreg bgyis na rig pa 'grub bo/ / las 'di dag ni ma bsgrubs kyang bgyid do// ci ste bgyid 'tshal na ril 'dzegs
92b3(rgyud 'bum): tekha zas 'o skyo 'thung zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na rig pa'i rgyal po'i mchog rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur te/ de la bu ci bya zhes gsung bar 'gyur ro// de des bcom ldan 'das
92b4(rgyud 'bum): las thams cad mdzad du gsol zhes brjod par bgyi'o/ / de bzhin du gyur cig ces brjod nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas yid kyis bzlas brjod bgyis na rig sngags 'chang yang 'gug go//
92b5(rgyud 'bum): grog mkhar gyi sa la sbrul bgyis te sngags kyis btab na klu thams cad mchi'o// dbang du'ang 'gyur ro// gseg ma la lan bdun bsngags te mtshor bor na mtsho skam par 'gyur ro// 'bab
92b6(rgyud 'bum): chuchen por bor na 'bab chu chen po skam par 'gyur ro/ / gang du bor ba de skam par 'gyur ro// bdag gi rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad dang rig pa thams cad kyi mchog
92b7(rgyud 'bum): tu brjod pa'o/ / gal te rig pa gzhan dag gi las mi 'tshal na'ang sbyor ba 'dis rig pa thams cad sbyor bar bgyi'o// las thams cad bgyid do// las bgyid na rig pa'i rgyal po dang lhan
93a1(rgyud 'bum): cig lan gsum brjod la 'ga' zhig ma mchis na/ de'i mgo dum bu zim thig le'i snyi ma bzhin du 'gas par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe gsang ba pa rnams kyis gsang sngags
93a2(rgyud 'bum): grub pa de'i tshe/ las thams cad du rig pa'i mchog bzlas brjod bgyi'o// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis la ba smad spu mthun gyi
93a3(rgyud 'bum): mar gsar blangs te/ mar gsar des seng ldeng gi mer lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na/ rig pa'i mchog reg pa sgrub pa rnams la dam pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe pha rol 'bros
93a4(rgyud 'bum): par bgyid 'tshal na/ phub ma las lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bya'o// so phag gis kyang 'phangs na 'bros par 'gyur ro// mar gyi nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du arka'i
93a5(rgyud 'bum): zhugs bus la/ rtswa dur ba'i lo ma lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na di na ra gcig rnyed par 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas zhag gsum sbyang ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du me tog
93a6(rgyud 'bum): ku mu da dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la bstsags pa khri me'i nang du sbyin sreg bgyis na dpal che bar 'gyur ro// rgya mtsho'i lbub dang / rgya spos dang / ldong ros rnams cha bsnams te rma b+h+ya
93a7(rgyud 'bum): mkhris pa dang ril bu sran ma tsam du bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rig pa'i mchog lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis la sbrul gyis zin pa la chus btang na 'jog pos zin pa'ang 'tshon
93b1(rgyud 'bum): srin bus zin pa dang / bas ba ljags dang / 'bras 'phreng bar gyur pa la chab bskol ba las gtang ngo // sbrum ma bum phyin pa la ni mar las btang na bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro// byi
93b2(rgyud 'bum): pa gdon gyis zin na bdug pas bdug pas gtong bar 'gyur ro/ / bud med kyi nad la ni dar ba las gtang ngo // phug tu 'jug na lus la bsku'o// sgrub pa na bdag la bdugs na log 'dren thams
93b3(rgyud 'bum): cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ / lag na rdo rje'i mdun du srad bu la rig pa'i mchog brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis te/ lag pa la btags nas g.yul ngor zhugs na pha rol gyis mi tshugs par
93b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / sbyin sreg bgyis pa'i thal ba 'am/ thal ba gtsang mas kham phor bkang la rig pa mchog bzlas brjod bgyis na rkun po gang na 'dug pa der mchi'o// gang gis rig pa'i rgyal
93b5(rgyud 'bum): po 'di yid kyis bzlas brjod bgyis pa de la dbang phyug chen po dang / dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / srin po dang / sha za dang /
93b6(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / grul bum dang / srul po dang / ma dngas 'phrog pa dang / gdon rgyan ma dang / ma mo dang / lag na rdo rje'i phyag brnyan dang / gang gis kyang grags mi rnyed kyi
93b7(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rjes de'i mgo 'gems so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga'am phyogs gtsang mar mchod pa bgyis te/ rtswa ku sha'i mdung rtse gsum pa thogs la yungs kar zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar bsregs
94a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sbyin blugs lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyi zhing nyin bdun dus gsum du gcer bus skra bshig la bgyis na nor stsol bar bgyid do/ / mar gyi ngo zhag drug nas brtsams te/
94a2(rgyud 'bum): mtsho 'gram du mchis la mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad pa'i bar du yungs kar dag las sbyin sreg lan brgya stong bgyis na nor dang gos rnams stsol bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa rig pa'i rgyal po'i mchog sgrub pa ni
94a3(rgyud 'bum): ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas ma god pa'i ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon rtsi rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bri bar bgyi'o/ / g.yas phyogs su lag na rdo rje spyan nang tshangs can gyi steng na
94a4(rgyud 'bum): mchis par bri'o/ / lag na rdo rje'i 'og tu rig pa'i mchog bri'o// bcom ldan 'das ni gser gyi kha dog lta bu'o// lag na rdo rje ni sngo bsangs te rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// rig pa'i rgyal
94a5(rgyud 'bum): po'ang sngo bsangs te rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan la stan gor bu'i steng na mchis par bri'o/ / mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ ci nus su mchod par bgyis la rgyal po'i
94a6(rgyud 'bum): blo gros kyis rig pa'i rgyal po dgug par bgyi'o/ / rdo rje'i khas nye reg bgyi'o// rdo rje'i lte bas spos dbul bar bgyi'o// me kha las me tog dbul bar bgyi'o// dad+mo dkar gyis bsrung bar
94a7(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / rdo rje ser mos khrus bgyi'o// nag mos khu ba bcing bar bgyi'o// gyen du lta ba'i gdong gis phyogs bcing bar bgyi'o// rdo rje'i seng ge'i khris 'dug par bgyi'o// rdo rje ldan mas
94b1(rgyud 'bum): bgegs gnom par bgyi'o/ / shugs ldan mas slar gshegs su gsol lo// phyis rig pa mchog gi ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du gu gul gyi ril bu brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na/ dngos grub/
94b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi mtshan mar bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs 'gul bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun na di na ra brgya rnyed par 'gyur ro// yang na longs spyod stsol bar 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad na lag na rdo rje'i mdun
94b3(rgyud 'bum): du du ru ka'i 'bras bu las lan brgyad brgya sbyin sreg bgyis na gang 'dod pa de spro bar 'gyur ro/ / lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mar dang gu gul gyi ril bu brgyad brgya'i sbyin sreg bgyis na sos par 'gyur ro//
94b4(rgyud 'bum): mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te shing a shwat+tha'i lo 'dab kyi steng du ldong ros bzhag la/ ji srid kyis rnam gsum grub pa de srid du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// dro bar gyur na
94b5(rgyud 'bum): rkang pas mchi'o/ / dub 'thul na mi snang ba dang lo bdun stong du 'tsho'o// 'bar na bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro// rlung bzhin du lag na rdo rje'i gnas su mchi zhing kha zas ci 'dod pa za'o// a tha
94b6(rgyud 'bum): rA dzA nA ma shi ka d+hu kA ma kr-i ta aSh+Ta mya a ho rA tri shi te na badz+ra pA Ni s+ya a gra ta arka kaSh+Te ag+ni pra dzA le/ ru d+hi ra a ga taN ti lA nA aSh+Ta sa hA sraM hu dzu ya da rA dza ba sho ba ti badz+ra kA mo pa saM ha ti/ tsi ste
94b7(rgyud 'bum): dgra gsod par 'dod na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du seng ldeng gi zhugs bus la/ yungs kar dang ske tshe'i 'bru las lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dgra 'chi'o// gnod par sems par
95a1(rgyud 'bum): bgyis na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du yi dgas kyi shing gi zhugs su bus la/ til nag pos lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na gnod par sems par bgyis par 'gyur ro// mar
95a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong las bzung la de'i ming nas phyung ste bzlas brjod bgyis na 'phral du dgrar mi 'gyur ro/ / mar
95a3(rgyud 'bum): gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te rig pa mchog gi sngags kyis btab pa'i chang gis rdo rje bkrus la/ rig sngags kyang lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bgyis na gang gis ming
95a4(rgyud 'bum): nas phyung ste bzlas brjod bgyis pa de gdon gyis zin par 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje 'o mas bkrus la rig sngags lan brgyad stong bzlas pa bgyis na sos par 'gyur ro// yul 'khor gzhig par
95a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pas seng ldeng gi rdo rje bgyis la yar gyi ngo tshes bcu gnyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis te/ shul gyi bzhi mdor btsugs na yul 'khor 'jig par
95a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / phyung nas bsngags na snga mkho zhing rtas par 'gyur ro// mar ngo'i zhag dgu la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rig pa mchog gis ske tshe'i 'bru la lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na
95a7(rgyud 'bum): khyim phung bar 'gyur ro/ / lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mar dang bsres pa'i ske tshe'i 'bru las lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na brtas par 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la ba smad spu
95b1(rgyud 'bum): mthun gyi 'o ma blangs te rig pa mchog gi bzlas brjod byas shing bsrungs la/ de las mar gsar blangs te thod pa'i nang du bzhag la/ thod pa de blangs te mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag
95b2(rgyud 'bum): gcig smyung ba bgyis la mngon mtshan gcig yod par song ste/ 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma bgyis la/ thod pa de thogs te lus kyi lho phyogs su 'dug la ji tsam na 'bar ba de srid du
95b3(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / de nas de 'thungs na ci 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ro// nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro// mi snang bar 'gyur ro// gzugs sna tshogs ston par 'gyur ro// lo lnga
95b4(rgyud 'bum): brgya 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / bdag gi rig pa'i rgyal po'i mchog 'di ni rig pa thams cad kyi gtso bo'o// bdag srung na gos kyi mtha' mar mdud pa dor ro// gzhan srung na spyi gtsug tu sgra mdud
95b5(rgyud 'bum): dor ro/ / chu srin khu phi ra'i khabacings na phyogs bzhir chu gtor ro// stag la ni yid kyis dkyil 'khor bgyis na bcings par 'gyur ro// mtshams gcad na yungs kar gyis so// zhing
95b6(rgyud 'bum): srung na phur bu dag gis so/ / sman srung na yid kyis rig pa'i mchog sbyar bar bgyi'o// gzhan yang sgrub na ma god pa'i ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshen rtsi rnams kyis rig pa'i rgyal po'i
95b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog bri bar bgyi ste/ mdog sngo bsangs sham thabs ser po/ lag pa g.yon na zhags pa/ g.yas pas dam pa sbyin pa bri bar bya'o// 'og tu sgrub pa po lag na pog por thogs pa dril
96a1(rgyud 'bum): zhag bdun zas su'o skyo btung ngo / / tha mar zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la ci nas kyis mchod pa bgyis la sna tshogs las zhags pa bgyis te/
96a2(rgyud 'bum): lag pa g.yas par thogs te ji srid du rang gi gzugs kyis mchi ba de srid du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// rdo rje bzhad mas smrar gzhug ste/ des bu ci bya zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// des tshangs pa'am/ khyab
96a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jug gam/ dbang phyug chen po'am/ che ge mo zhes bya ba zhags pas bzung la khrid de spyon cig ces brjod do// yang na rgyal po 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'am/ sha za 'am/ gang dgug
96a4(rgyud 'bum): par 'dod na de dgug pa ste/ de dag thams cad phyag brnyan du 'gyur ro// gang bsams pa de 'tshal te mchi'o// yang na ma god pa'i ras la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshen
96a5(rgyud 'bum): rtsi rnams kyis rig pa'i rgyal po'i mchog bri bar bya ste/ mdog sngo ba sangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ stod g.yogs dar dkar/ smad g.yogs ras/ lag pa bzhi pa/ lag pa g.yon
96a6(rgyud 'bum): pa gcig na rdo rje/ gcig na lcags kyu/ g.yas pa gcig dam pa sbyin pa/ gcig be con thogs par bri bar bgyi'o// 'og tu sgrub pa po lag na pog por thogs par bgyi'o// g.yas phyogs
96a7(rgyud 'bum): su rdo rje khu tshur mdog gser sa bu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lag pa gnyis kan rdo rje thogs pa bri'o// g.yon logs su rdo rje blo gros bri bar bgyi ste/ de'ang mdog gser sa tra
96b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bcu'o/ / de nas rdo rje sgrub pa ni zlab gcig slong mo'i bas zos la tha mar lus sbyang bar bgyi ste/ cho 'phrul gyi zla ba nyal zhag gsum sbyang ba bgyis la lus
96b2(rgyud 'bum): sna gsum la bgyis pa'i rdo rje ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du shing a shwat+tha'i lo ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag la bsgrub ste/ ji srid kyis 'bar ba de srid du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar nas blang
96b3(rgyud 'bum): pabapar bgyi ste/ blangs ma thag tu lag na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur ro// nyi ma sha ra ba'i kha dog 'dra bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// de nas lcags kyu bsgrub
96b4(rgyud 'bum): na sngar spyad pa sngar bgyis te/ rtswa ku sha rtsa ba med pa las lcags kyu bgyis la mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gsum sbyang ba bgyis te ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la mi
96b5(rgyud 'bum): tog gi steng du bzhag ste/ de'i steng du lag pa bzhag la ji srid kyis 'bar ba de srid du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar nas blang bar bgyi ste/ blangs ma thag tu sa ser ga mthong zhing tshangs pa'i
96b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas su mchi bar 'gyur ro/ / lag na lcags kyu thogs na sum cu rtsa gsum pas kyang zil gyis mnan par mi nus so// be con sgrub pa bshad par bgyi ste/ lcags sna gsum las rtse
96b7(rgyud 'bum): con sor bcu drug pa/ dbyibs tho ba 'dra bzur drug par bgyi'o// sngar spyad pa bgyis la mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gsum spang ba bgyis te ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du mchod
97a1(rgyud 'bum): pa rgya cher bgyis la/ ras dkar po'i steng du bzhag ste ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas blangs ma thag tu lag na rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur te// lag na rdo rje
97a2(rgyud 'bum): dang stobs mnyam ste/ lag na rdo rje'i gnas su mchi bar 'gyur ro// dngos grub rnam pa gsum la bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa thams cad du pho nya mo rnams kyis las thams
97a3(rgyud 'bum): cad bgyis te rig pa sna tshogs sbyar bar bgyi'o/ / de ltar gang rig pa'i rgyal po 'don pa dang mchod pa de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa lags so// mnyes par bgyis pa lags so// /
97a4(rgyud 'bum): thod pa blangs te khrag gis bkang ste mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung bar bgyis te khang stong ngam/ kun dga' ra bar ji srid kyis bud med 'byung ba de srid du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
97a5(rgyud 'bum): de la che ge mo zhes bya ba la gnod pa bgyis shig par brjod na gnod par bgyid do// gnod pa bgyid du 'jug go// rengs par bgyid do// rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dgug pa 'dis bkug
97a6(rgyud 'bum): nas phyis rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis dkrug par bgyi'o/ / na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na maHtsaN+Da badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha sa nA pa ti s+ya/ tu ru tu ru/ tsu ru tsu ru/ ki ri kI ri/ re thapra tsaN+DA yaT ya/
97a7(rgyud 'bum): A gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ ma ma a d+ha ma/ pa ri pU ra ya/ am+ba ta bid+yA d+ha rod ta ma a haM/ s+thA A kaR+Sha yA mi/ ma ma sarba ir+tha ma nor tha pa ri pU ra ko b+ha ba ma ma ar+tha sid d+hi rkyed dam tsi raM ku ru swA hA/
97b1(rgyud 'bum): tsikyi tshes brgyad la sgrub par 'tshal na chos bdun gyi phye ma re dkru gul gyis bdugs la gsang sngags lanA brgya rtsa brgyad brjod do// sgrub pa ni rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis dgug go// sgrub pa
97b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang las thams cad du'ang dgug pa 'dis dgug go/ na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na ma sh+tsar+N+Na badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha sa nA pa ti s+ya/ dza ya ma hi/ dzi na ti dzin d+ha ri Ni/ a bi sha ya/ da sha
97b3(rgyud 'bum): ma ta shAM pa/ de ba nA ga yak+Sha gaM d+hArbe kA nu tsarma/ ru shi la hul hu/ gr-ih+Na b+hu ma~M pa ta ye/ shI g+h+ra~M badz+ra pA Ni s+t+wa~M/ A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ rgyal ba'i blo gros 'dis dgug par bgyi'o// de nas rdo rje
97b4(rgyud 'bum): / lcags sgrog gis bcing bar bgyi'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsar+N+Na badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ ku ru ku ru/ tsa ta tsata/ ma la ma la/ sa ra sa ra/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ma hA ba la/
97b5(rgyud 'bum): sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sid+d+ha/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Ni/ Adz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dis gu gul gyi ril bu gsum yungs kar gyi 'bru mar du baspugs la sbyin sreg bgyis na bcings
97b6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / rig pa gang sgrub pa dang pho nya mo'ang rung ste/ de 'di nyid kyis bcing bar bgyi'o// rdo rje sen mos ni bcing ba las dgrol bar bgyi'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaH
97b7(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ hu lu hu lu/ gats+tsha gats+tsha/ ma hA ba la/ swa b+ha ba na ma pu na na ma ga na ma ya ku ru ku ru/ gats+tsha gats+tsha swA hA/ chab khyor ba gsum gtor/ me tog
98a1(rgyud 'bum): klung dal lo/ / de nas thugs ldan gyisas gshegs su gsolalo// na rdzob kye/ barbahwArA/ kan+d+hakan+tu/ rdzag+sa pa ti/ s+'ud+hU k+Sha
98a2(rgyud 'bum): nili/ hi ri li tsi ni ma/ ho raM le a bi ga nA~M ku r+yA swA hA/ shugs ldan gyis sbyar ka shegs su gsol ba'i sngags te/ a ka ru'i bdug pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pas so// na mo
98a3(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ na ma staM b+ha ga ba ti/ badz+ra mu khi gau ri bik+She/ ga ra te ga ra te/ ki ni ti ki ni ti swA hA/ nye reg bya ba'i gsang sngags so// na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ dz+wa la badz+ra Ni bi hu ru hu ru/ la hu la
98a4(rgyud 'bum): huHpra ti gr-ih+Na s+thA/ oM mAM ge d+hA/ kI li kI la ya swA hA/ spos kyi gsang sngags so// na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ baM d+ha baM d+hA/ shi khi swA hA/ me tog gi gsang sngags so// na mo
98a5(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra pA NI s+yA/ a ti ni/ tsa li ni/ kha la karma Ni/ dair tsa la ni/ tsi li nr-i swA hA/ bdug pa'i gsang sngags so// na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ na ma ste/ b+ha ga pa ti sha ta mu khi/ ma hA gau ro tsa tshu le/ tsu
98a6(rgyud 'bum): tsu la/ tsi tsau rak+Sha rak+Sha sA hA/ srad bus bsrung bar bgyi'o// na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ ka ta ka ta/ ma ta ma ta/ ra ra ra ra/ badz+ra bi ga la/ ma ta dA ra da ra ni/ ki ri Ni kai ri Ni/ ki ri Ni ki ri swA hA/ khrus
98a7(rgyud 'bum): bgyi ba'i gsang sngags so/ / na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ nam ste/ b+ha ga ba ti/ da sha ba tid sha ba ti/ sa ha pra pa ti A gats+tsha/ shA g+h+ra~M ki ri ki ri/ shu kra bi d+ha baM d+ha swA hA/ srad bul lan bdun bzlas
98b1(rgyud 'bum): brjod bgyis te khub bcing ngo / / na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ ut+ta ma rak+Sha/ a d+ho rak+Sha/ tsa tu ra di shaM rak+Sha/ ma tha ma tha/ trA sa ya trA sa ya/ stam b+ha ya stam b+ha ya/ ud d+hA ta badz+ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti
98b2(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ yungs kar la lan nyi shurtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te phyogs bcing ngo // na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ badz+re bidz+re Ni/ badz+ra si ha ni/ badz+ra pA Ni/ pri ye badz+ra ba ra debi ki ta/ da~MSh+Ta ka ra
98b3(rgyud 'bum): la ba ne/ laM bo da ra bi ki ta/ gau ra rU pa dar sha na mardza ra bak+She madz+dza/ mAM sa pri ye/ e hi e hi b+ha ba ti byo gu ru pri dz+wa li ta ta ke shi i daM ma nu sha sha rI ra/ ma nu pra bi she/ ka ta ka ta/ pu ra pu ra/
98b4(rgyud 'bum): d+hu na d+hu na/ pa ta pa ta/ balgu balgu/ ha sa ha sa/ A bi she A bi she/ spa ta spa ta/ ki tsi ra ya si/ b+ha ga ba ti/ ba hu rU be/ ad b+hi ka sr-i ga la he ru ka ra bid tre/ aT Ta Ta Ta ha se/ i ma
98b5(rgyud 'bum): se husta/ gra ha s+ya hr-i da yaM/ b+hi da b+hi da/ tsa la tsa la/ gu mu gu mu/ ku ru ku ru/ A bi sha A bi sha/ badz+ra pA Ni/ A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ las thams cad du rtswa ku sha sbams pa la sngags
98b6(rgyud 'bum): kyis btab ste bdug par bgyi'o/ / na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ la la ha sa ha saM/ badz+re Na ku ru ku ru/ kam+pa kam+ba/ tsa la tsa la/ dza lA dzal+la swA hA/ gshegs nas gsung du gzhug go/ na ma
98b7(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ d+hu d+hu ma sa la ma sa la/ d+hu ru me a ma le/ badz+ra pA Ni yak+Sha d+hi pa ti ma tsa me kash+tsA da big+h+nAM ku ru sA hA/ yungs kar ram thal bas bgegs rab tu zhi bar bya'o// tsi ste rig
99a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang grub pa rnams kyi rig pa gcad par 'tshal na/ mar gyi ngo tshos bco lnga la lag/ rdo rje'i mdun du bku la'i me tog dag las lan brgyad skyong sbyin sreg bgyis na
99a2(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi rig sngags bcad par 'gyur ro/ / mgod pa'i ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon rtsi rnams kyis rig pa'i mchog bri bar bgyi ste/ mdog stob sangs rgyan thams
99a3(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ / sbyin sreg bgyi ba bzang zhing bri bar bgyi'o// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du ci nus su mchod pa bgyis la
99a4(rgyud 'bum): byang chub kyi shing gi zhugs bus te ta ma la'i me tog mar la basprugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na ri mo'i sku gzugs 'gul lo/ / me tog gi 'phreng ba'ang 'gul lo// de nas mtshan
99a5(rgyud 'bum): mo'i lha mo me tog ces bgyi ba grub par 'gyur te/ lha mo me tog gi las rnams su 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi rig pa'i sgrub pa la bgegs su mi 'gyur ro// log 'dren gyis mi
99a6(rgyud 'bum): tshugs so/ / dngos grub 'dis mtshan mo'i lha mo bzhi dngos grub tu 'gyur te/ srod ni lha mo me tog gi'o// 'jing ni lha mo 'phreng ba'i 'o// nam gung ni lha mo ku mu da'i 'o// tho rangs ni lha mo
99a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzes ma'i'o/ / rig sngags 'chang ni rig pa sgrub na srod la log 'dren gnas su 'ong ste/ de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo me tog gis log 'dren mthong nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje yid
99b1(rgyud 'bum): la bgyid do/ / lag na rdo rje yid la bgyis pas log 'dren rnams skrag cing nyams te nyam thag nas 'bros par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje rig sngags 'chang de'i mdun du 'dug cing dngos
99b2(rgyud 'bum): thub kyang myur du rgyal bar babyed do/ / 'dzing la gas te gragags srung namatshan mo'i na mo phreng ba dres/ rten po la bcom ldan 'das la kun sa gro di nas zlog go/
99b3(rgyud 'bum): de thos nas snying 'dar zhing myur ba myur bar mdun du 'dug ste/ des na rig sngags 'chang de mtshan la bgegs su mi 'gyur ro// dngos grub kyang myur du 'grub bo// nam gung la gal
99b4(rgyud 'bum): bgegs byung na mtshan mo'i lha mo ku mu da de'ang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la kye kye btsun dkon dag lag na rdo rje khyed la 'bod do zhes sgrog go/ de dag gis tshag de thos nas snying 'dar zhing myur
99b5(rgyud 'bum): ba myur bar mdun du 'dug ste/ des na de la bgegs su mi 'gyur ro// tho rangs la gal te bgegs byung na mtshan mo'i lha mo mdzes ma'ang / log 'dren rnams la kye kye log 'dren
99b6(rgyud 'bum): sdang ba rnams drag po lag na rdo rjes bka' stsal to zhes bsgo bar bgyid do/ / de dag gis de'i tshig thos nas phyogs bcur 'bros so// des na de la bgegs su mi 'gyur te bde bar
99b7(rgyud 'bum): las rnams 'grub par byed do/ / mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad dam bcu bzhi la bud med bu byung ba'i khye'u'i lte ba sor gnyis tsam bcad la gser gyi gyim bag gis dkris te mar gyi ngo zhag
100a1(rgyud 'bum): brgyad la nyi ma nag gcig sbyang bar bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// tshe'ang nyis 'gyur du 'gyur ro//
100a2(rgyud 'bum): zhag bdun du phye thug btung ngo // phyis mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te/ zhi ba'i mtshan yod par song la mtshan gyi steng gi lho phyogs logs su lag pa g.yas
100a3(rgyud 'bum): pa bzhag ste skra las bgyis pa'i skud pas bcing ngo / / bcings nas ji srid kyis bcad do zhes sgra 'byung ba de srid du bzlas brjod bgyi/ sgra lan gsum du byung na dngos grub tu 'gyur ro//
100a4(rgyud 'bum): khu tshur bcangs te bsgrub par bgyi'o// khu tshur bcangs na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// skra lcang lo 'khyil bar 'gyur ro// lo bcu drug lon pa tsam du 'gyur ro// lo bdun brgya 'tsho bar
100a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs rnams kyang phyag brnyan du 'gyur ro// ci ste dgra gsad par 'tshal na mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ spra tshal las
100a6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs bgyis la seng ldeng gi phur bu lngas gnad du btsugs te/ dur khrod du mchis la dong brkos te dong der bcug la steng du zhugs bus la dug dang / khrag dang / yungs kar bsres la
100a7(rgyud 'bum): lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na ngu zhing tshig ste 'phral du 'gum mo/ / mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la ba ser mo'i lci bas la ma lhung ba blangs te/ sa phyogs gtsang mar gzugs bgyis la ci
100b1(rgyud 'bum): nus kyis mchod de/ zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis la shing bil ba'i yam sreg shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / ma ral bsnyugs te brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dpral ba las 'od zer 'byung ngo // de
100b2(rgyud 'bum): nas dngos grub tu 'gyur te gser dpag tu med pa stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / yang na nyin gcig bzhin du di na ra stsol bar 'gyur ro// gseg ma la lan brgya stong bzlas te dur khrod du bor na yi dgas
100b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad glu len cing gar byed par 'gyur ro/ / mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa'i drung du zhag gsum sbyang ba bgyis la/ shing ka ra wI ra'i me tog las lan brgya stong sbyin sreg
100b4(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / de nas ka ra wI ra'i me tog dag las me tog gcig blangs te klu'i gnas su song la bzlas brjod bgyis na/ klu dang klu mo rnams dbang du 'gyur te ci 'tshal ba rnams rnyed do// lag pu
100b5(rgyud 'bum): mig dang / gser dang / mchod phyir thogs kyang ka ra wI ra'i me tog dang 'dra'o// gang na gnod sbyin mo 'dug pa der bzlas brjod bgyis na gnod sbyin mo mchi ste chung mar 'gyur ro// yang
100b6(rgyud 'bum): nanor stsol bar 'gyur ro/ / gal te mi mchin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te shing ma da nA'i tsher ma dang / dug dang / khrag bsres pa lan brgya stong seng ldeng gi zhugs la sbyin sreg bgyis
100b7(rgyud 'bum): na de 'tshig cing mi sdug par 'gyur la mchi'o/ / gal te klu mo mi mchin de la'ang de nyid kyis sbyin sreg bgyi'o// yar gyi ngo tshas bco lnga la zhag gsum sbyang ba bgyis te rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i
101a1(rgyud 'bum): chu bor zhugs la/ klu shing gi me tog brgyad stong byi dor bgyis na dus ma yin par char 'bab bo// zhag bdun 'o skyo 'thungs la mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung
101a2(rgyud 'bum): pa bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis la sa las bgyis pa'i rdo rje bzhag ste/ de'i rked par shing a shwat+tha'i lo ma bdun bzhag la/ de'i steng du ldong ros bzhag ste ji srid kyis dngos
101a3(rgyud 'bum): grub gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / 'bar bar gyur na lo bdun stong du 'tsho'o// lus mdzes par bgyis la mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te
101a4(rgyud 'bum): lam gyi sum mdor mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la/ der 'dug ste ldong ros sran ma tsam zhig khar bcug la ji srid du kha'i nang du gas par gyur pa de srid du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas dngos
101a5(rgyud 'bum): grub tu 'gyur te thig le bgyis na mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / le lnga brgya thub par 'gyur ro// ci 'dod pa'i gzugs can du 'gyur ro// nyi ma'i gung tshogs la bgyi'o// tshes grangs dang
101a6(rgyud 'bum): skar ma 'dam mi 'tshal/ smyung ba bgyi mi 'tshal bar skyes pa'i ro ma smras ma nyams pa blangs te/ rdo rje sen mo'i sngags bzlas brjod bgyis la bkru'o// rdo rje lte bas spos stsol bar
101a7(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / rdo rje me kha las me tog stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas de'i snying khar 'dug ste mi do tsam gyen du ma 'phags kyi bar du rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig bzlas brjod
101b1(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / gyen du 'phags ma thag tu slar 'og tu lhung ngo // lhung nas bud med bcu nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ de dag g.yog 'khor rnams la stsal par bgyi'o// de dag kyang
101b2(rgyud 'bum): stobs mnyam par 'gyur ro/ / ci ste ma stsal na bdag bud med bcus bskor te mi la zhon te gar dga' ba der mchi'o// yang yid kyis bsams pa de bzhon pa las 'byung ngo // lo
101b3(rgyud 'bum): brgyud khrir 'tshe bar 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang du'ang 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad dam bcu bzhi la skyes pa shi ba'i ro bzhag pa'i khyogs kyi g.yas rol gyi zur shing khyer
101b4(rgyud 'bum): te song la/ phyi ma mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la de mdung rtse gsum par bgyis la slong mo pa'i zas bza' zhing rig sngags 'chang bzlas brjod bgyi'o// phyi ma mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas zhag
101b5(rgyud 'bum): gsum smyung ba bgyis te dur khrod du song la mdung rtse gsum pa la mchod pa rgya cher bgyis te/ mdung rtse gsum pa lag pa g.yas par thogs la/ rig pa'i mchog lan brgyad stong
101b6(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod bgyis na mdung rtse gsum pa las 'od zer 'byung ste/ de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// mtshan mo btsugs na rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i bud med dag 'byung ngo // skyes
101b7(rgyud 'bum): pa ci la ma rag par chas pa dag kyang nye bar gnas so/ / gang bsams pa thams cad rnyed do// phyung na thams cad med par 'gyur ro// 'byung po rnams kyang phyag brnyan du 'gyur
102a1(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / cho ga gang la blangs pa'i cho ga de nyid la bsgrub par bgyi'o// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ci nus kyis mchod
102a2(rgyud 'bum): pa bgyis la/ de'i mdun du 'bras chan gyis lo ma bkang ste bzhag la 'bras chan mi snang bar ma gyur kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur te/ phyis 'bras chan la 'pho bar
102a3(rgyud 'bum): bgyid do/ / rdzas kyang 'pho bar 'gyur ro// 'bru'i rnam pa gzhan dag kyang 'pho bar 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te sang ldeng la bgyis pa'i rdo rje la shing kun
102a4(rgyud 'bum): gyis bdugs la/ rig pa'i mchog go snying po dang lhan cig bzlas brjod bgyis na/ gang gi ming nas phyung ste bzlas brjod bgyis pa de la brjed byed kyis zin par 'gyur ro// lce pog gis bdugs la
102a5(rgyud 'bum): lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na gtong bar 'gyur ro/ / mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis la/ e ran da'i shing gi zhugs busal ba glang gi pags pa las sreg blugs
102a6(rgyud 'bum): lan brgyad spong ming nas brjod de sbyin sreg bgyis na bgrang rnams mchi'o/ / skyes pa'i ro ma smras ma nyams pa blangs te chu 'gram gyi phyogs gcig gam/ skams gtsang mar po nya mo rnams kyis
102a7(rgyud 'bum): las thams cad bgyi'o/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang nyi ma'i gung tshogs la mi ro'i mgo shar phyogs su bstan te phyogs bzhir bsnyen bkur bgyis pa bzhi gzhag par bgyi'o// de nas rig
102b1(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang de'i snying khar 'dug la ldong ros khar bcug ste dngos grub rnam gsum ma thob kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/ / 'bar bar gyur na lo stong thub bo// rkang pa la bslus na lo lnga brgya
102b2(rgyud 'bum): thub ste 'di ni dngos grub bo/ / mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du pa la sha'i shing gi zhugs bus la shing ril ba'i yam sreg shing zho dang / sbrang
102b3(rgyud 'bum): dang mar la bsnyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi zhing ming nas brjod na phrugs chung rnyed do/ / gal te ma rnyed na phyugs chung de mchi'o// dgra gang la nad kyis btab par bgyid 'tshal na
102b4(rgyud 'bum): ru rta btags la bdag gi lus la dril ba'i dri ma bsags te/ mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du du ru ka'i shing gi zhugs bus la/ dri ma des lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi zhing
102b5(rgyud 'bum): ming nas brjod na de mdzend kyis 'debs so/ / lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lce pog gi bdug pas bdugs la/ rig sngags kyang lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na gso ba bgyis par 'gyur
102b6(rgyud 'bum): ro/ yar gyi ngo zhag gcig la rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs la zas su chu skyo 'thung zhing zla ba nya'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na yul gru 'thob bo// bram ze dbang du bgyi na yar gyi
102b7(rgyud 'bum): ngo tshes drug nas/ brgyad kyi bar du dus gsum du lag na rdo rje'i mdun du snga ma'i me tog las lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis la tha mar zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis na/ skyes pa'am bud
103a1(rgyud 'bum): med kyang rung ste dbang du 'gyur ro/ / mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig spyang ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bil ba'i shing gi zhugs bus la/ yungs
103a2(rgyud 'bum): kar gyi 'bru mar dang bsres pa'i til las lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi zhing ming nas brjod na dbang du 'gyur ro/ / bud med yug sa mo dbang du bgyi na nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis la
103a3(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje'i mdun du arka'i shing gi zhugs bus te/ arka'i me tog mar la bsgrags pa lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi zhing ming nas brjod na dbang du 'gyur ro// dus gsum
103a4(rgyud 'bum): du khrus bgyi zhing lag na rdo rje'i mdun du shing ma dana'i tsher ma las lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na zhag gsum gyis dbang du 'gyur ro/ / mi ngas 'byung bar 'tshal na mar gyi ngo zhag
103a5(rgyud 'bum): brgyad la dur khrod du song la dur khrod kyi shing gi zhugs bus la/ dug rlon pas lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na mi ngas 'byung ngo // zhi bar bgyi na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag
103a6(rgyud 'bum): gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du shing tha mal pa'i zhugs bus la ut+pal dang / zhe dang / sbrang rtsi dang / maral ba spyugs pa brgyud stong sbyin sreg bgyis na zhi bar 'gyur
103a7(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / gzhan bskrad par 'tshal na bya khA'i gshog pa yungs kar gyi 'bru mar la bsgugs pa brgyad stong zhag bdun dus gsum du sbyin sreg bgyi'o// 'di ni bskrad pa'i mchog go/
103b1(rgyud 'bum): dbye bar bgyi na zhag bdun dus gsum du ba lang gi lci ba las brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dbye ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// las gcig gis cho ga rgyas par sgrub par 'tshal bas
103b2(rgyud 'bum): mA ma kI thogs la/ pad+ma'i rdzing du song ste mA ma kI la reg par pad+ma 'bum phul na rig pa'i rgyal po mchog rang gi gzugs ston te de la bu ci bya zhes smra'o// des bcom ldan 'das
103b3(rgyud 'bum): cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol zhes brjod pa dang / de bzhin bya'o zhes brjod nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de cho ga rgyas pa las 'byung ba'i las thams cad dngos grub
103b4(rgyud 'bum): tu 'gyur ro/ / gal te des las grub par ma gyur na de'i 'og tu las 'di bsgrubs na dngos grub kyi mchog tu 'gyur ro// yar gyi ngo nyanas bzung ste phyi ma'i nya'i bar du mi sA
103b5(rgyud 'bum): ga rgyas pa dang dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ / ras sngon po la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ 'og sgor bcings la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis pa'i thal bas mgo bor
103b6(rgyud 'bum): bsrung bar bgyis na gyad par non cing gyad kyis tshur phyir mi non no/ / yid gzhungs par bgyi na bra ma'i khu ba mar dang cha bsnyams la mar gyi ngo zhog bcu bzhi la nyi zhag gcig smyung ba
104a1(rgyud 'bum): bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis pa 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// yar gyi ngo tshos zhag gcig nas brtsams
104a2(rgyud 'bum): telag na rdo rje'i mdun du mar dang 'o ma bsres pa las lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pa 'thung zhing zhag bdun bgyis na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / yar gyi ngo nya la nyin nag
104a3(rgyud 'bum): gcig smyung ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ang gro ta'i me tog brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na nyi ma gsum pa la thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ / zhag bdun lag na rdo rje'i kha nas 'od
104a4(rgyud 'bum): zer 'byung ste rig sngags 'chang la bskor ba byas nas gyen du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs can du 'gyur ro// lo sum stong thub par 'gyur ro// mar
104a5(rgyud 'bum): gyi ngo zhag bcu la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du sgyu ma'i me tog brgyad stong phul na gnas ston par 'gyur ro/ / cho ga rgyas pa sgrub pa pos nya dang / sha dang / til dang / sran chan gyi bag dang / lha bshos
104a6(rgyud 'bum): dang kha 'dra dang / la phug dang / shing thog rnams bza' bar mi bgyi'o// gal te 'di dag kyang zos lnga las kyang bsgrubs na lag na rdo rjes de nyid mthar byed cing las kyang dngos grub tu

104b1(rgyud 'bum): zas su 'o skyo 'thung zhing tha mar zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te mar gyi ngo nagra brgyad la sgrub bo/ / sngar pho nya mo rnams kyis las rnams bgyi'o// bsnyen bkur bgyis pa rnams kyang
104b2(rgyud 'bum): bsrung bar bgyi'o/ / de nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bzlas brjod bgyis te/ seng gi'i sgra 'byin gyi bar du bgyi'o// seng ge'i sgra thos nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams 'byung ngo // de
104b3(rgyud 'bum): dag la 'dod pa bskyed par mi bgyi'o/ / gal te 'dod pa bskyed na seng ge'i ni ma mchis so// lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams ni mchis te/ lha ma yin rnams kyang yongs su spyad par 'gyur

104b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gang du 'dod pa dar mchi'o// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// 'khor lo la sogs pa'i spyod yul du mi 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe rdo rje dang / 'khor

105a1(rgyud 'bum): par gnas pa'i rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal por 'gyur ro/ / mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te ba'i lcib sa la ma lhung ba blangs te skams
105a2(rgyud 'bum): gtsang ma'i phyogs su gnod sbyin gyi gzugs bgyis te/ de la me tog dmar po dang gtor ma dmar po sbyin no// pho nya mo rnams kyis las thams cad bgyi'o// phyogs gcig tu gnon
105a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyin thams cad la me kha las me tog dkar po rnams stsol to/ / gzugs de'i mdun du arka'i shing gi zhugs bus la shing bil ba'i yam shing sreg cing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la

105a5(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi ste gtsang mar bgyis la lan cig bzlas brjod bgyis te ba nag mo ma smad spu mthun gyi 'o ma blangs la/ bram ze'i bu mos bsrubs pa'i mar blangs te mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la

105b5(rgyud 'bum): po'i bdag po de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de de bzhin no// 'byung po'i bdag po rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rig pa mchog 'di ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o// 'byung po'i bdag po rig pa'i rgyal po chen

106a1(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po'i bdag po 'di thos na sems can gang dag mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dag kyang sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skye ba de ni gnas ma yin zhing go
106a2(rgyud 'bum): skabs med de/ rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rig pa mchog gi mthu ni 'di yin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che chen po'i rgyal po gtsug tor ldan zhes bya ba mthong ba tsam gyis nad

106b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad ces smras so/ / shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ ci de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo yin nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gtso bo yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
107a1(rgyud 'bum): gtso bo yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo yin zhe na/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad ni shes

109a5(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer de la sogs pa sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i gam du bdud pham par mdzad nas bstan pa kun tu bzung bar gyur to/ / rtogs pa dri ma med pa de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
109a6(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa ye shes sgron ma chen mo 'od zer de'i 'og tu bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa drug pa la 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
109a7(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas don gzigs pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i gsung rab la bdud cang mi smra ba zhes bya ba de byung ngo // rtogs pa dri ma med pa lag na rdo rje des yang bdud pam
109b1(rgyud 'bum): par byas nas/ don gzigs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad bcu dang / sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig las bdud pham par byas te bstan pa bsrung bar byas so// de tshun
109b2(rgyud 'bum): c had bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa drug lhag pa zhig 'das nas sangs rgyas gser du snang bas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba bskal pa bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad las bdud pham par byas te bstan pa kun
109b3(rgyud 'bum): tu bsrungs par gyur to/ / de'i 'og tu der stong snyed 'das nas lag na rdo rje 'di de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis gsang ba 'dzin pa dang bstan pa bsrungs par gyur to// de bzhin du
109b4(rgyud 'bum): sbyar te tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can dang / rnam par gzigs dang / thams cad skyo ba dang / gser grub dang / de bzhin du log par dang sel dang / mi 'khrugs pa dang /
