109b6(rgyud 'bum): bskal pa bzang po'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed pa thams cad la de bzhin du mthar gyis thabs 'dis bstan pa la bya ba byas nas mngon par rdzogs
109b7(rgyud 'bum): par sangs rgyas te/ rdo rje'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
110a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas bka' stsal to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan gyis 'di skad ces
110a2(rgyud 'bum): gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang rig pa mchog gi las skul bar bgyi'o// ma god pa'i ras la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs gser gyi kha
110a3(rgyud 'bum): dog ltar 'drir sprul to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yas rol du lag na rdo rje mdog sngo ba sangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// lag na rdo rje'i g.yas rol du ni pho nya mo bcu gnyis
110a4(rgyud 'bum): te/ rgyal ba'i blo gros ma dang / me khal ni sngo bsangs so// rdo rje'i gdong dang / rdo rje lte ba dang / gdong dkar mo dang / rdo rje ser mo dang / nag mo dang / gyen du lta ba'i gdong ni gsar
110a5(rgyud 'bum): mdog go/ rdo rje seng ge'i khri dang / rdo rje ldan ma dang / shugs ldan ma dang / rdo rje bzhad ma ni dmar mor bri bar bgyi ste/ pho nya mo thams cad kyang rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan par
110a6(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon rol du dbang phyug chen po mdog dkar po ral pa can mtshan ma bsgreng ba/ dka' thub bzlog pa dang lhan cig bri bar bya'o// 'byung po mdog dmar
110a7(rgyud 'bum): po mi sdug pa bzhi'ang bri bar bya'o/ / phyis rig sngags 'chang gis dus gsum du khrus bgyi zhing zla ba gcig gi bar du brgyad brgya brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bgyi zhing zas su chu skyo
110b1(rgyud 'bum): btung bar bgyi'o/ / tha mar lus sbyang bar bgyi ste/ de'i 'og tu zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis la/ gnas bzhir bsnyen bkur bgyid pa bzhi gzhag go// pho nya mo rnams kyis las thams cad
110b2(rgyud 'bum): bgyi'o/ / ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar rtswa ku sha sbams pa'i steng du 'dug ste/ mchod pa rgya cher ba gyis la gtor ma'ang shin tu rgya cher bgyi'o// lce pog gi bdug pas bdug go/
110b3(rgyud 'bum): ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar arka'i shing gis zhugs bus la/ me tog dkar po zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la bstsags pas me stag dag byung gi bar du sprin sreg bgyi'o// de'i
110b4(rgyud 'bum): 'og tu ut+pal sngon po lta bu'i ral gri byung gi bar du lcags phyes sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ / de blang ma thag tu sgra lcang lor 'khyil bar 'gyur// lo bcu drug pa lta bur 'gyur/ nyi ma 'char ba'i 'od
110b5(rgyud 'bum): lhur 'gyur/ dpon g.yog drug num mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur ro// lo khri nyis stong thub par 'gyur/ de bzhin du grogs rnams kyang dpag tshad stong du gyen du 'phags par 'gyur ro//
110b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du 'og ma dbang phyug chen po'i ral gri bsgrub par bgyi'o// gzhan yang ral gri bsgrub pa ni zla ba gcig slong mo'i zas za zhing / phyis mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la ri mo'i gzugs
110b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi mdun du pho nya mo rnams kyis las thams cad bgyi'o/ / zhag gsum sbyang ba bgyis te ral gri ma chag cing 'phan med pa blangs la/ ral gri lag pa g.yas na thogs te 'bar gyi
111a1(rgyud 'bum): / bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de blangs pa tsam gyis nam mkha' la 'phag go/ lo bcu drug lon pa lta bur 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang stong gi bdag por 'gyur ro//
111a2(rgyud 'bum): lo khri nyis stong thub par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang 'khor lo bsgrub pa bshad par bgyi'o// slong mo'i zas bza' zhing phyis mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te/ lag
111a3(rgyud 'bum): nardo rje'i mdun du mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la/ gtor ma dang lha bshos kyang shin tu rgya cher sbyar zhing pho nya mo rnams kyis las thams cad bgyi'o// lcags sna gsum la 'khor lo rtsibs bcu
111a4(rgyud 'bum): drug pa bgyis la/ shing a shwat+tha'i lo ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag la 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar nas sa g.yo bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang thams cad skrag par 'gyur
111a5(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / des blangs pa tsam gyis skra lcang lor 'khyil bar 'gyur ro// lo bcu drug lon pa lta bur 'gyur ro// mdog nyi ma shar ba bzhin du 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur
111a6(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / bud med brgyad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dpon g.yog bcu drug 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gzhan brgyu'ang 'byung ste bsnyen bkur bgyid par 'gyur ro// gang gi/
111a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas che ge mo zhes bgyi bar mchi bar bsam par de'i tshe 'khor lo dpag tshad tsam du me lce 'bar ba stong 'byin cing 'gro ste/ sngo ba ci yod pa phung bar 'gyur ro// lo brgyad khri thub par 'gyur
111b1(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / gang gi tshe 'chi ba de'i tshe lha'i nang du skye'o// de nas rig pa'i rgyal po las kyi dkyil 'khor bshad par bgyi ste/ brtag pa bgyis la gnas ma nyams par/ shes rab can gyis dkyil
111b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bri/ / khru ni bcu gnyis sgo bzhi pa// de bzhin du ni khru brgyad la// de la thog mar bri ba ni// rim pa gnyis pa dmar po ste// rim pa gsum pa nag po'o// dkyil 'khor de yi byang phyogs
111b3(rgyud 'bum): su/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan bri bar bgyi// de bzhin gshegs dang nye bar ni// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ste// rdo rje thogs shing rig pas bskor// sgo rnams kun tu bsrung bar bgyi/
111b4(rgyud 'bum): sgo bzhir sgo ba rnams bri'o// shar phyogs su ni drag po dang // gzhon nu dang ni ma mo bri// lho phyogs su ni khyab 'jug dang // nyi zla dang ni tshangs pa bri// nub phyogs su ni gshin rje dang //
111b5(rgyud 'bum): ka t+ya'i bu mo gtum mo bro// byang phyogs su ni lha mo dpal// de bzhin lha mo dbyangs can bri// lha rnams 'di dag thams cad ni// ji skad bshad pa bzhin du bri// bya ma bum mgul chings
111b6(rgyud 'bum): can gyis bskor zhing sgo sgor yang gzhag go/ dbus su gtung shing skra'i srad bu dang bcas pa gcig gzhag go/ bya ma bum gyi lho phyogs su rdo rje bri'o// lha rnams kyang mtshon cha dang bcas
111b7(rgyud 'bum): par bgyis te/ drag po'i ni mdung gsum pazi'o// gzhon nu'i ni mdung thung ngo // ma mo rnams kyi ni mche ba'o// khyab 'jug gi ni 'khor lo'o// zla ba dang nyi ma'i ni gzhu'o// tshangs
112a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ni ril ba spyi blugs so/ / gshin rje'i ni be con no// gzhan dag mtshon cha tha mal pa'o// zhugs ni rab hu bus nas su// brgyad brgya tshang ba'i yam sreg shing // lha
112a2(rgyud 'bum): bshos dri dang bdug pa dang / / gtor ma btsal nas lha spyan dang // sbyin sreg 'di ni sbrang rtsi dang // mar dang 'bras yos lan tshwa dang // de bzhin yungs kar rnams kyis bgyi// yungs
112a3(rgyud 'bum): kar gyis ni bsrung ba bgyi/ / gtsang ma'i gos ni bgo bar bgyi// mchod pa dag ni sngar bgyis te// de yi 'og tu las brtsam mo// 'jig rten na ni ci yod pa'i// mna' tshig rnams kyis mna'
112a4(rgyud 'bum): bsgag go/ / dam tshig 'di ltar su srung ba de la log 'dren thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed cing las kyang dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsum la dad pas dkyil 'khor sngar mthong nas
112a5(rgyud 'bum): de'i 'og tu rig pa mchog bsgrub par bgyi'o/ / su zhig gzhan du bgyid na de'i rdo rje nyid kyis mthar bgyid par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so// // rig pa
112a6(rgyud 'bum): mchog sgrub pa 'di ni 'di lags te/ zla ba gcig zas su 'o skyo 'thungs la phyis mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te gos gtsang ma bgos la/ ring bsrel dang bcas
112a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mchod rten nam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs sam/ byang chub kyi shing ngam/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje'ang ci nus su mchod do// pho nya rnams kyis dri dang / me tog dang /
112b1(rgyud 'bum): bdug pa dang / gtor ma sbyin no// de nas lcags kyi ral gri bgyis te/ bud med rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bud med bcus bskor ba nam 'ongs kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'ongs
112b2(rgyud 'bum): nas g.yog 'khor 'bul lo/ / ral gri de g.yog 'khor la bzhag na bud med de chung mar 'gyur ro// gal te 'tshal na bud med de dag kyang chung mar 'gyur ro// gal te mi 'tshal na g.yog
112b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor rnams la stsal to/ / g.yog 'khor rnams dang lhan cig nam mkha' la mchi'o// 'og tu'ang dpag tshad stong du'ang mchi'o// steng du'ang de bzhin no// ral gri de thogs na 'khor
112b4(rgyud 'bum): los sgyur ba ma gtogs par rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi sod do/ / lo khri thub bo// sgrub pa gzhan yang yod do// tshes grangs dang skar ma gdam mi dgos/ smyung ba bya mi dgro
112b5(rgyud 'bum): so/ rtabud med de legs par bsku zhing me tog gis kyang mchod la pho nya mo rnams kyis kyang las bya'o// de'i 'og tu bud med de kha bub tu bzhag la/ bud med de'i rgyab tu zhon te/ phud
112b6(rgyud 'bum): med de 'gul zhing sgra 'byin yang 'jigs pa mi bya zhing / gyen du 'phags kyi bar du rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bya'o// yang sa la lhung ngo // lhung nas de las 'bab par bya'o// de nas
112b7(rgyud 'bum): bud med rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rnams mthong ngo / / de'i nang nas bud med cig kha bub tu 'dug cing dbugs 'byin pa de'i rgyab tu zhon nas nam mkha' la 'phag cing mdog nyi ma shar
113a1(rgyud 'bum): blta bur 'gyur ro/ / bud med kyi glol ral gri 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyis brgyan cing mu tig dang rin po ches spras pa'i phyang ngo // las 'di ni rgyal mtshan dang
113a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dra'o zhes smras nas bya'o/ / le lo can dang byas pa mi gzo ba rnams kyis las 'di mi bya'o// gang nus pa brtan zhing mthu stobs dang ldan pa rtsol bar nges par byas pas las 'di brtsam
113a3(rgyud 'bum): par bya ste/ las 'di sgrub pa pos rtag tu go cha sra ba dang tshangs par spyod par bya zhing nya dang sha yongs su spang bar bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gis ldong ros sgrub pa'i tshe gal te sbyor na de
113a4(rgyud 'bum): dgug pa'i phyir 'di brtsam par bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang grub pa'am/ klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ sha za'am/ grul bum yang rung ste/ dbab pa byas pa de la gang gis rdzas khyer ba des
113a5(rgyud 'bum): nga la slar byin cig dang 'phung bar mi bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o/ / mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ zangs po che btsugs la 'bru mar blugs te bskol la rig
113a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod byas na rig sngags 'chang grub pa'ang rung / gang yin pa de der 'ong zhing 'ongs nas kyang slar 'bul la de la ci'ang mi bya'o// gal te mi 'ong na phyis snying pos
113a7(rgyud 'bum): yan lag dang nying lag rnams gtubs te gzhag go/ bsrung ba byas pa'i cho gas bya'o// gzhan du na ma rungs par 'gyur ro// gal te bsrung ba ma byas na grub pa rnams kyis ma
113b1(rgyud 'bum): rungs par byed do/ / yan lag dang nying lag gtubs pas 'ong zhing rdzas kyang sbyin par byed do// 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das yongs su bskyab tu gsol zhes smra'o// de slar gso ba'i
113b2(rgyud 'bum): phyir 'bru mar gyi zangs po che las 'bru mar blangs te/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du snying pos sreg blugs la na stong sbyin sreg byas na sos shing dbang du'ang 'gyur ro// dbyig dug
113b3(rgyud 'bum): bsal bar 'dod na lag pa dang rkang pa snod du bcug la rlung g.yab kyis g.yabs te/ gang du 'dod pa der rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod bya na/ dbyig dug byung ste nad med par 'gyur ro// mig
113b4(rgyud 'bum): ser gyi nad bsal bar 'dod na tshul lan bdun bsngags la skom du blud na 'tshe'o/ / mig nad bsal bar 'dod na me tog rtsa ba ring po dag la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te sngags kyis
113b5(rgyud 'bum): btab la snom du bcug na 'tshe'o/ / de nas rig pa'i rgyal po'i mchog lag na rdo rje la/ log 'dren gyis 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad
113b6(rgyud 'bum): du rig pa mchog 'di 'chad dam/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis bdag sa la 'khyam zhing sems can rnams la'ang glags rnyed par 'gyur bar bdag la mi gzigs sam/ de nas gnod sbyin
113b7(rgyud 'bum): gyi dbang po lag na rdo rjes/ / log 'dren la 'di skad ces smras so// khyod nyon cig/ gang dag dam tshig mi shes par nga'i rig pa'i cho ga rgyas par klog pa de dag khyer cig/ gang dag
114a1(rgyud 'bum): gcig gi lhag ma gcig za ba dang / lha la phul ba'i dri dang / bdug pa dang / me tog la spyod pa de dag khyer cig/ gang dag nga'i dam tshig shes pa dang / cho ga rgyas pa las
114a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba bzhin du spong bar byed pa dang / gang dag rig pa mchog rdo rje'i rig sngags dang bcas/ gsang chen dang bcas par 'dzin pa de dag la glags ma tshol cig/ chung ma gson cig/ de/
114a3(rgyud 'bum): thos pa dang / log 'dzin de dag ca conas dga' zhing mgul yi rangs te/ lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa la phyag bya ba'i gsang sngags smras pa/ na mo rat+na trA m+b+ha yA/ nam braH badz+nyA pA N+Ta ye/ ma
114a4(rgyud 'bum): yak+Sha sa nA pa ta ya/ tad+ya thA/ hu ru badz+ra pA Ni hu ru badz+ra pA Ni/ tro tA tha ya badz+ra pA Ni/ s+pho Ta ya badz+ra pA Ni/ da ha pa tsa ma tha badz+ra pA Ni swA hA/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas ma god pa'i ras la
114a5(rgyud 'bum): sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'phags pa lag na rdo rje bri bar bya ste/ pri yang ku ltar sngo ba sangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// de'i g.yog 'khor log 'dren bzhi bcu bri bar bya ste/ kha dor
114a6(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs pa lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal ba bri bar bya'o/ / sna dkar la gcu bar bya'o// de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas brtsams te/
114a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rnam lngas lus sbyang ba byas la/ dus gsum du khrus bya zhing ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du dus gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// zla ba phyi ma mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la
114b1(rgyud 'bum): nyin zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ lag na rdo rje la mchod pa byas nas dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa phul te log 'dren rnams la'ang bag bcos par pa ta ka dang / mo ta ka da dang / pu ba li ka rab
114b2(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba dang / shing thog gzhan dag kyang phul la/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du snga ma'i me tog zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la bsnyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bya'o// 'og dang ri mo'i sku gzugs
114b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gul zhing ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra bslag ste/ de la'ang 'jigs par mi bya'i// yang lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na de nas mi mi sdug pa zhig 'ongs te/ de la'ang 'jigs par mi bya'o// rdo
114b4(rgyud 'bum): rje bzhad mas smra ra bcug na de ci zhes smra'o/ / des lag na rdo rje'i mdun du gang smras pa de dran par bgyis la de bzhin gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o// de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas mi snang
114b5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / de'i 'og tu rig sngags sgrub pa la log 'dren de dag dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur/ nyin gcig bzhin kar sha pa Na nyi shu sbyin par 'gyur/ dbang du'ang 'gyur/ yid
114b6(rgyud 'bum): la gang ci bsams pa de thams cad byed par yang 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang brjod par bgyi'o// gang dag rig pa mchog gis tshig rgyas par bsgrub par bgyi ba dang /
114b7(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bgyi ba de dag la ci'ang mi bgyi'o// 'dod pa thams cad za zhing sgrub pa de la dngos grub stsal to// gang dag bdag cag gis gsang sngags 'chang ba de dag la log 'dren
115a1(rgyud 'bum): nam/ log 'dren gyi bu'am/ log 'dren gyi 'khor gang la la zhig glags lta ba 'am/ gang glags rnam par tshol ba de'i mgo tshal pa brgyur 'grus so// bcom
115a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das bdag cag gis mi snyan pa brjod par bgyi'o/ / sgrub pa'i dus na gsang sngags 'di nyid kyis me tog la lan bdun sngags kyis btab la stsal bar bgyis na log 'dren thams
115a3(rgyud 'bum): cad dngos grub stsol to/ / sngags 'di nyid kyis gzhan la bgegs bgyid do// skar ma bdam mi 'tshal/ smyung ba bgyi mi 'tshal lo// lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mon sran gre'u las
115a4(rgyud 'bum): bgyis pa'i snum 'khur phul ba la ka brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis la/ 'di skad du che ge mo zhes bya ba'i bgegs gyis shig ces brjod na/ de'i tshe log 'dren de dag dga' zhing mgu bar gyur
115a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i yid kyis bgegs bgyid do/ / bsams na zhi bar 'gyur ro// ci ste log 'dren rnams mthong bar 'tshal na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ dur khrod du
115a6(rgyud 'bum): mchis la mgul ba blangs te/ dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pas brgyan pa bgyis la/ rig pa dpag tu ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyis na dgung phyed kyi dus na log 'dren rnams mchi d
115a7(rgyud 'bum): e dag la rdo rje lte bas dri stsal bar bgyi'o/ / me kha las me tog stsal bar bgyi'o// rdo rje bzhad mas sgrar stsal te/ 'di skad du sems dang bar gyis shig ces brjod na log 'dren de dag
115b1(rgyud 'bum): rtse zhing dgod do/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rig pa mchog dran par bgyis na de dag mi 'gul te/ 'di skad du khyed sems dang bar gyis shig ces brjod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du bya'o
115b2(rgyud 'bum): zhes smras nas mi sdang bar gyur to/ / de'i 'og tu rig pa la bgegs mi bgyid do// sngags 'di nyid kyis skyes pa dang bud med dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la grog mkhar
115b3(rgyud 'bum): rtse'i mdun gyi dogs blangs la gzugs bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du thab khung bgyis la thab khung gi nang du dkon pa'i ba lang gi lbu bas zhugs bus te/ zhugs kyi nang du gzugs stsal
115b4(rgyud 'bum): la/ de'i steng du lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te dgung bdun du dus gsum na dbang du 'gyur ro// bgegs brgyad khri gtsug pud 'phyang ba zhes bgyi ba'i
115b5(rgyud 'bum): bgegs de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bgegs bgyid pa lags te/ de'i bar du bsgrub par bgyi'o// sgrub pa'i dus na rig sngags 'chang gis grog mkhar gyi dog
115b6(rgyud 'bum): sa las gtsug pu da' phyang gi sku gzugs bgyis la mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad dam bzhi la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bzhag ste/ zho dang 'o mas bkrus la me tog dang bdug pas mchod de/ rig pa
115b7(rgyud 'bum): brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de nas yid dga' nas 'jig rten gyi 'phrul po chos dngos grub stsol to// dgos pa zhig grub na'ang de la dngos grub stsol to// log 'dren gyi sgrub
116a1(rgyud 'bum): pa rdzogs so/ / / rig sngags 'chang gis nor bsgrub pa dang las byang bar bgyi bar 'tshal na ba lang gi lhas su mchis la mar gyi ngo nag brgyad nas/
116a2(rgyud 'bum): brtsams te zas su'o skyo 'tshal zhing / 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na rig pa'i rgyal po tshangs pa'i gdugs kyi gung la lce spyang mo sla 'byin te/ sba lan lnga brgya 'byin to// de nas
116a3(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub tu 'gyur to ha na ra stong rnyed cing las kyang byang bar 'gyur ro/ / ci ste lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje mthong bar 'tshal na pad+ma'i rdzing du mchis la yar gyi ngo zhag
116a4(rgyud 'bum): bdun nas brtsams te zas su'o sgyu 'thung zhing / lan sum stong bzlas brjod bgyis na nyid kyis lag na rdo rje mthong ngo // me khal bzlas brjod bgyis pas me tog dbul lo//
116a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bzhad mas spur stsal te/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das pa dgu yongs su bskyab tu gsol zhes brjod do// des 'di skad du bu ci bya zhes brjod pa
116a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das yid kyis gang byasam pa de theb par mdzad drugs pa zhes brjod do// de bzhin du gyur cig ces brjod nas mi snang bar sbyor ro// de'i 'og
116a7(rgyud 'bum): yid la gang bsams pa de thams cad 'grub bo/ / byis pa log 'dren gyis zin na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i spos chus bkrus na

116b3(rgyud 'bum): tede nas log 'dren gyi las dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ / log 'dren rnams ngagu nyan par yang 'gyur ro// log 'dren rnams gsad do snyam du khros pa'i yid kyis bzlas brjod

116b5(rgyud 'bum): lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / gdugs kyi gung la'ang de bzhin du bgyi'o// phye ma red lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ de ltar dgung bdun du bgyis na bdun pa'i

117a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bgyis te/ lam phor du stsal la lo mas kha bcad de/ rig pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// ras zung gcig stsol gyi bar du gzhag go/ de nas mtsho
117a2(rgyud 'bum): 'ur dor ro/ / tshes grangs dang skar ma bdam mi 'tshal/ smyung ba bgyi mi 'tshal bar rked pa nub tsam gyi chab tu zhugs la lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na ras zung gcig stsol bar bgyid

117b1(rgyud 'bum): steng du mchis shing / rig pa'i rgyal po brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de nas shing n+ya gro d+ha las 'od zer gcig byung ste/ des rig sngags 'chang la bskor ba bgyis nas spyi bor nub

118b1(rgyud 'bum): skyong bzung bas ma god pa'i ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bri bar bgyi'o/ / de'i g.yon rol tu kun dga' bo dang / g.yas rol du lag na rdo rje
118b2(rgyud 'bum): yab thogs pa bri bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das ni gser gyi mdog can no// kun dga' bo ni sngo bsangs so// lag na rdo rje'ang sngo bsangs te/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o//

122a6(rgyud 'bum): bapar mi 'gyur bar bdag cag la yongs su bskyab tu gsol zhes lag na rdo rje la skyabs su dong ngo / / log 'dren rnams kyang 'gul ma nus nas yid kyis lug na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo//

122b1(rgyud 'bum): shig/ de thos nas lha rnams rab tu dga' ba'i bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//

122b7(rgyud 'bum): zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te/ ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung ba las brgya byin gyi gzugs bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bzhag ste/ de'i steng du shing kun gyi shing gis zhugs bus la
123a1(rgyud 'bum): bri yang ku'i yam sreg shing yungs kar gyi 'brum ral ba sgugs la brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ / de nas lha rnams so so nas tshig cing brgya byin gyi gan du mchi'o// brgya
123a2(rgyud 'bum): byin yang lha rnams dbugs 'byin te/ grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig ces lha rnams dbugs phyung nas rig sngags 'chang gi gan du mchi ste phyin pa dang / tshig 'di skad du kye ma'o rig sngags
123a3(rgyud 'bum): 'chang la dge sbyong gi tshul med do zhes smras pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gis 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes gang bshad pa de dran par gyis shig ces brjod par bgyi'o// de thos
123a4(rgyud 'bum): nas shin tu dga' ba'i bzhin gyis rig sngags 'chang la rig pa stsol lo/ / de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gi rig pa mchog gis slar gtang bar bgyi'o// rig pa des rig sngags 'chang
123a5(rgyud 'bum): gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang bdun stong gi bdag por bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyang g.yos par bgyid par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin rnams
123a6(rgyud 'bum): kyang phung bar bgyid par 'tshal bas/ gang na gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo gnas pa der mar gyi ngo nag brgyad la mchis la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ byang chub kyi shing gis
123a7(rgyud 'bum): zhugs bus la a pa marga'i yam sreg shing las lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ / de nas gnod sbyin de dga'abros pa dang tshur shog ces brjod na slar mchi'o// mchis nas kyang
123b1(rgyud 'bum): nga'i bsnyen bkur gyis shig ces brjod do/ / gdugs gcig bzhin du tin ra bdun bdun stsol lo// gang du bskos pa de thams cad bgyid do// dri za rnams lhung bar bgyid par
123b2(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal bas rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi ngos su yar gyi ngo tshos brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ kham po dza'i shing gis zhugs bul yungs kar mar dang bsres pas lan khrir
123b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ / de nas yi dgas kyi gzugs can gyi mi zhig mchi'o// mchis nas kyang rkang pa gnyis la phyag bgyid pa dang / bde bar gyur cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// de nas
123b4(rgyud 'bum): mi des rkang pa gnyis la lig bu mig bzhag nas slar mchi'o/ / lig bu mig de mig bskus na dri za'i gzugs su 'gyur ro// rkang gis 'gro bar 'gyur ro// lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur
123b5(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / dri za rnams kyang srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par bgyid do// log 'dren rnams kyang rlag par bgyid na sman a sa de ba dang / shing ba la ka ra ba sa'i tshig gu dang / ne'u
123b6(rgyud 'bum): le'i spu dang / sbrul kogs parjes pa dang / rdzas de dag gis gnod sbyin gyi gzugs la bdug par bgyi'o// rig pa'ang lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas rmi lam
123b7(rgyud 'bum): du log 'dren rnams bred cing ci bye gtol med par mthong ngo / / de'i nang nas mi zhig 'di skad ces kyi rig sngags 'chang bdag cag la gnod pa ma mdzad par 'di snoms shig ces
124a1(rgyud 'bum): smra'o/ / de nas nang par ti na ra gcig stsol lo// sgrub pa'i dus na'ang bdug pa 'di nyid kyis bdag la bdugs na log 'dren thams cad nyams par 'gyur ro//
124a2(rgyud 'bum): log 'dren gyi las bgyi na'ang mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis la bgyi'o// rdo rje'i rigs skrag par bgyi na lce 'bab pas bcag pa'i shing blangs la mar gyi ngo nag

124b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg bgyis na sreg blugs gsum pa'i tshe 'drar ro/ / brgyas tshar gcod par 'gyur ro// sum brgyas bskam par 'gyur ro// bzhi brgya pa'i tshe lag na rdo rje la phur bus btab par 'gyur ro//
124b2(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje bur bus btab bas lag na rdo rje'i rigs thams cad dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha thams cad kyang phur bus btab par 'gyur ro//

125a1(rgyud 'bum): ma 'gums pa dang / tshangs pa la gnod pa bgyid pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis/ mtshams ma mchis pa lnga dang ldan pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te/ bcom ldan

129a2(rgyud 'bum): sreg bgyis na dbye ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ / chos grangs dang skar ma padam mi 'tshal/ sbyang ba bsngo ma 'tshal te/ lagan rdo rje'i mdun du gdugs bdun dus gsum du ba ru ra brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin
129a3(rgyud 'bum): sreg bgyis na phyugs chung rnyed do/ / bud med dbang du bgyis na gdugs bdun dus gsum du mon sran gre'u las sbyin sreg bgyi'o// skyes pa dbang du bgyi na mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la lag na rdo rje'i

129a5(rgyud 'bum): sa ra sha pa naM aSh+Ta sa ha sr-i dzu hwa yang ya bad a sta mi ti ba sha/ rgyal ba ldan ma'i cho ga rdzogs so// / rdo rje lcags sgrog gi las rnams lags te/ rig sngags bcing na sra
129a6(rgyud 'bum): bul lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te mdud pa dor ro/ / yungs kar gyis ni zhugs kyi ra bar 'gyur ro// chab kyis ni yul gru chen por 'gyur ro// thal bas ni rdo rje ra bar 'gyur
129a7(rgyud 'bum): ro/ bcing ba thams cad rdo rdza lcags sgrog 'di cid gyur bar mgyi'o// gang dag padag so rig pa mchog gi chog rgyas pa ladam tshig mthong nas 'jig rten padang ji na las rba
129b1(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa de dag la/ gang dag bgegs bgyid dam rdzas 'phrog pa de dag ni dam tshig ma 'tshal cing rigs la 'khu ba lags te/ de dag ma rung bar bgyi ba'i slad du las 'di brtsams par bgyi'o//
129b2(rgyud 'bum): tsan dan dmar po las lag na rdo rje'i gzugs bgyis te mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du seng ldeng gi shing gis zhugs bu sa la/ sha chen po sreg
129b3(rgyud 'bum): blugs lan bdun sbyin sreg bgyis te/ de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces lha 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ grub pa'am/ rig sngags 'chang ngam/ log 'dren nam/ log 'dren gyi g.yog 'khor ram/
129b4(rgyud 'bum): grul bum mam/ 'byung po'am/ sha za'am/ gang gis bdag gi rdzus ji ltar khyer ba des slar byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// de skad thos nas gal te des srul na ni cang mi bgyi'o//
129b5(rgyud 'bum): gal te ma stsa la na yang 'di skad bsgrag par bgyi ste/ gang gis bdag gi rdzas khyer ba des slar byin cig ces bgyi'o// ci stem sna lan lag na rdo rje'i rigs las phyi rol pa lag na rdo rje'i rigs
129b6(rgyud 'bum): la 'khu ba lags pas/ bya gag gi rtug pa blangs la yang lan gsum brjod par bgyi'o// de ltar bgyis kyang ma stsal na byag ga gi rtug pa lag na rdo rje la bdug cing rig sngags kyang lan brgyad
129b7(rgyud 'bum): brgya bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / de nas lag na rdo rje'i rigs la 'khu ba des kyi hud kyi hud ces mchil tshig cings phyogs der lhung ngo // mig kyang 'jar ro// 'gum par yang 'gyur ro//
130a1(rgyud 'bum): rigs rabs chad par 'gyur ro// nor ni slar khugs par 'gyur ro// gsad par ni mi bgyi'o// gdon gyi las rnams kyang bgyi ste/ sa zin pa'am ma zin pa'ang
130a2(rgyud 'bum): rung ste yid kyis dbab par bgyi'o/ / bye'u drug pa'i lo ma'am/ sra rtsi pog gam/ chab kyis dug las gso bar bgyi'o// bdag gso zhing mdze nad ma mchis par bgyi na dog sa la lam
130a3(rgyud 'bum): brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la bsku bar bgyi'o/ / nang kri ta si ma ma mchis par bgyi na srad bul lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la/ gang na nad kri ta si mchis pa der bcing
130a4(rgyud 'bum): bar bgyi'o/ / mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bil ba'i shing gis zhugs bus la bil ba'i yam sreg shing khri sbyin sreg bgyis na longs
130a5(rgyud 'bum): spyod dag stsol lo/ / yar gyi do nya la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du a pa marga'i yam sreg shing khri rig pa mchog dang lhan cig pas sbyin sreg bgyis na/ rdo rje lcag
130a6(rgyud 'bum): sgrog mthong zhing gang bslangs pa de stsol lo/ / rdo rje lcags sgrog gi cho ga rdzogs so// / rdo rje ser mo'i las rnams lags te/ gdon babs pa gtong bar bgyi na chab
130a7(rgyud 'bum): kyis bgyi'o/ / 'dar bar bgyi na mdzub mo la lan bdud bzlas brjod bgyis te bstan na 'dar ro// gdon rnam par gzhom na yid kyis lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyi'o// chab kyis
130b1(rgyud 'bum): ni rengs par bgyid do/ / rig pas bcings pa las dgrol na rdo rje ser mo'i sngags lan bdun brjod de/ song zhig song zhig ces brjod na grol bar 'gyur ro// bcings pa grol na lan 'bum
130b2(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod pagyis pas 'grol lo/ / rkang rdul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pas thig le bgyis na gang bsams pa de rnyed do// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas zhag gcig smyung ba
130b3(rgyud 'bum): bgyis te/ n+ya gro d+ha gcig pu mchis par mchis la mchod pa rgya cher bgyis te/ n+ya gro d+ha'i drung du mchis la shre sh+le ta ka'i lo ma dag gi steng cu dur ba'i lo ma bzhag ste/ 'bar gyi bar du bzlas
130b4(rgyud 'bum): brjod bgyi'o/ / 'bar nas mgo bor bzhag na de me tog gi 'phreng bar 'gyur ro// des mgo la bcings na dpag tshad stong du gyen du 'phag go/ lo khri nyis stong thub bo// zla ba sprang kis zin
130b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshe zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis la/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ras dkar po bzhag la 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na/ blangs pa tsam gyis gdugs shar ba lta bu'i mdog can du 'gyur
130b6(rgyud 'bum): zhing le nyes stong thub par 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje ser mo'i cho ga rdzogs so// / shugs ldan ma'i las rnams lags te/ gdon tshar gcad na dur khrod kyi sol bas gzug
130b7(rgyud 'bum): bris la/ lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i lcug mas gzhus na gdon gyis gtong ngo // skra las bgyis pa'i srad bu gtun shing gis brdungs na gdon dra zhing gtong ngo // gzegs ma
131a1(rgyud 'bum): las sbyin sreg bgyis na gdon gyi yan lag 'tshog par 'gyur ro/ / ba lang gi lci ba las gzugs bgyis la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i thur mas mig phyung na
131a2(rgyud 'bum): nar bar 'gyur ro/ / lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i gseg mas shing ljon pa la bsnun na 'pho bar 'gyur ro// dbab na me tog gis bgyi'o// dgrol na yid kyis so// 'di dag la som
131a3(rgyud 'bum): pa ni gdon gyi las rnams lags so/ / bsrung ba ni lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i thal bas bgyi'o// yul gru bsrung ba ni lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i chab kyis bgyi'o//
131a4(rgyud 'bum): bskrad pa ni yungs kar gyis bgyi'o// nang par langs te shugs ldan ma'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na/ nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// bud med dbang du bgyi na mar gyi ngo
131a5(rgyud 'bum): zhag brgyad nas brtsams te/ dgung bdun dus gsum du lung thang gi shing gis zhugs bus la/ til gyi sreg blugs la na nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bgyis na dbang du 'gyur ro// rA dz+nyA na
131a6(rgyud 'bum): bam shi ka ma kreSh+Ta sra a b+ha mi ma a ho ra tro shr-i te na badz+ra pA Ni ra g+hA ta ti la ka sh+le ra ka ni pra dzA l+ya ru d+hi ra ak+ta nair dza~M ka na aSh+Ta sa ha sraM dzu hU yaM ba sha~M b+ha bi ta/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu ngogs gachis
131a7(rgyud 'bum): ka'i sa blangs la za ma tog bgyis te/ za ma tog der lig bu maug stsal la/ za ma tog kyang mthong kha sbyar gyi nang du stsal te/ mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas dgung gsum sbyang ba bgyis te/
131b1(rgyud 'bum): mtshan gcig mchis par mchis la lho phyogs su mchis te mi thod thogs la 'bar gyi bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar nas blangs te rig pa mchog gis bsrung ba bgyis te lig bu mig gcig la
131b2(rgyud 'bum): btags te/ lig bu mig de 'o ma dang lhan cig 'tshal na 'tshal ba tsam gyis skra lhung lo 'khyil bar 'gyur/ mdog ut+pa la'i kha dog lta bur 'gyur/ mtshon gang dga' phangs pa de dag phye mar
131b3(rgyud 'bum): lpags par 'gyur/ / lo drug khri thub par 'gyur/ dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs rnams grogs su 'gyur ro// mar gyi po nag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje
131b4(rgyud 'bum): mdun du byang chub kyi shing gis zhugs bus la me tog ut+pal zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la bsnyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na yul rnyed do// 'byung po thams cad dbang du bgyi bar
131b5(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal bas mar gyi ngo nag gsum du smyung ba bgyis te/ dur khrod du mchis la pri yang ku'i shing gos zhugs bus te ma ral lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bgyis na 'byung po thams cad mchi bar
131b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ de dag la phyag brnyan gyis shig ces brjod na gang dang gang du bskos pa de dag thams cad bgyid do// yar gyi ngo tshos lnga la nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun
131b7(rgyud 'bum): du sa ti muk+ta ka'i me tog stong rtsa brgyad phul na longs spyod rnams stsol te/ shugs ldan ma'i cho ga rdzogs so// / rdo rje gdong gi las rnams lags te/ lan baH
132a1(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i bum pas gdugs bdun khrus bgyis na sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ / byis pa gang dag gdon gyis zin te khrus
132a2(rgyud 'bum): bgyis na gtong bar 'gyur ro/ / gdon gyis zin pa rnams la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i bdug pas bdugs na gtong bar 'gyur ro// gang dag nam gru dang / srul po dang
132a3(rgyud 'bum): gdon brlan nas zin pa de dag tshen sna lnga'i skud pa la mdud pa bdun bor te lag pa la bcings na gtong ngo / / dug las gson yal gas bgyi'o// srin pu ti kas zin pa dang / nad tsi lu ta
132a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / rkang shu byung ba las la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te bskus na lan gsum gyi tha ma la sos par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya gzhi ga na chab kyis bgyi'o// dbyig dug bsal bar
132a5(rgyud 'bum): bgyi na rkang lag bkrus la snod du stsal te/ de nas rtswa ku shas bya bas na 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gdon spron lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i thal bas bgyi'o// nad tsau lu ma mchis
132a6(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi na mtshon rnon pos sa shur gyis dra sa la yang rked du bcad na tsau lu ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ / nad br-i hA ma mchis par bgyi ba'ang de bzhin no// 'dzer pa ma mchis par bgyi nas la
132a7(rgyud 'bum): lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pas bgyi'o/ / mar gyi po nag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa ci nus su bgyis la giru wang ras
132b1(rgyud 'bum): dkar po'i steng du bzhag ste 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / 'bar nas blang bar bgyis te/ blangs nas thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur// 'byung po thams cad kyis mi tshug
132b2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / zla ba gcig slong mo pa'i zas 'tshal zhing tha mar zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis la/ mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa rgya cher bgyis te/ shu dag
132b3(rgyud 'bum): chad par bcangs la sbrul du gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi zhing / des mi 'jigs par bgyi'o// slar yang shu dag tu gyur kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas bza' bar bgyi ste// 'tshal
132b4(rgyud 'bum): pab tsam gyis gdugs sha ra ba lta bu'i mdog can du 'gyur zhing lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur ro/ / mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la lha chen po'i gnas su mchis la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis la/ lha chen
132b5(rgyud 'bum): po'i gzhogs g.yas par lig bu mig a shwat+tha'i lo ma'i steng du bzhag ste/ du ba 'thul gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas lig bu mig blangs te lha'i skal ba bzhag la mig la bskus na mi
132b6(rgyud 'bum): gda' bar 'gyur ro/ / lo bdun stong thub par 'gyur ro// arka'i me tog dur khrod kyi mes bsregs nas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis nas lha chen po'i gnas su mchis
132b7(rgyud 'bum): lashing a shwat+tha'i lo ma'i steng du bzhag stelan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis la thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur ro/ / lo lnga sdong thub par 'gyur ro// zla ba gciga'o skyo 'tshal
133a1(rgyud 'bum): zhing mar gyi ngo nag bcu bzhi la mi'i rus pa zla ga ma lta bur bgyis la/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du lag na rdo rje'i gzugs dang /
133a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs bzhag la/ rig sngags 'chang gis bcom ldan 'das dang / lag na rdo rje dang / dbang phyug chen po la rgya cher mchod de/ rig sngags 'chang gis yar gyi de'i tshes
133a3(rgyud 'bum): brgyad nas nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis la/ zla gam blangs te ras dkar po'o steng du bzhag la 'a bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar nas blangs te mgo bor bzhag na ci 'dod pa'i gzugs
133a4(rgyud 'bum): can du 'gyur ro/ / lag na rdo rje dang / dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su'ang bsgyur/ yid kyis gang bsams pa de thams cad kyang 'grub bo// le stong thub par 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus kyang
133a5(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / zas su 'o skyo 'tshal zhing lag na rdo rje'i mdun du sh+le sh+le ta ka'i shing gis zhugs pus la// a ba marga'i yam sreg shing 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na rgyal po nyid thob bo// rdo rje gdong gi cho ga
133a6(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs so/ / rdo rje lte ba'i las rnams lags te/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas mgod pa'i ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshan gyis 'phags pa lag na rdo rje mdog sngo
133a7(rgyud 'bum): bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dar ram ras kyi sham thabs can bri bar bya'o// de'i g.yas rol du rdo rje'i lte ba gser gyi mdog lta bu bri bar bgyis te/ de'ang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
133b1(rgyud 'bum): par bgyi'o/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang zas su'i skyo 'tshal bar bgyi'o// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nas zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te/ ci nus kyi mchod pa bgyis la tsan dan dmar po mtho gang la
133b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje ba gyis te/ rdo rje'i rked par ldong ros bzhag la/ byang chub kyi shing gi lo mas g.yogs te/ dngos grub rnam gsum byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar bar gyur na bskal par gnas
133b3(rgyud 'bum): shing rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ / dpag tshad stong gyen du 'phag cing de'i mod la slar mchi'o// gang gi tshe 'gum pa de'i tshe lag na rdo rje'i rigs su skye'o// ci ste du ba
133b4(rgyud 'bum): 'thul nas blangs te thig le bgyis na mi gda' bar 'gyur/ / lo bcu drug lon pa lta bu'i lus su 'gyur/ lo bdun stong thub par 'gyur ro// dro bar gyur nas blangs la thig ler bgyis na gang
133b5(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur te/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'ang dbang du 'gyur ro// zla ba gcig zas su chu grog 'tshal zhing mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas zhag gsum spang ba bgyis te/ b.lang
133b6(rgyud 'bum): gilhas sam/ kun dga' ra ba 'am/ yang na gnas gtsang mar mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la/ ldong ros til gyi lo ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag ste/ gdol pa'i bu mo'i mo mtshan nam/ 'jib la
133b7(rgyud 'bum): bgyis pa'i mo mtshan gyi steng du gzhag par bgyi zhing / gdol pa'i bu mo ral gri thogs pa bzhi phyogs bzhir bzhag par bgyis la/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gos dngos grub rnam pa gsum
134a1(rgyud 'bum): byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / 'bar bar gyur na gdugs shar ba 'dra ba'i mdog tu 'gyur/ sga lcang lo 'khyil bar 'gyur/ lo bcu drug lon pa lta bur 'gyur/ 'og
134a2(rgyud 'bum): tu dpag tshad stong du mchi bar 'gyur/ steng du'ang de bzhin mchi bar 'gyur/ dpag tshad stong tshun chad kyis thos shing mthong bar 'gyur/ lo khri nyis stong 'tshe bar 'gyur/ nam mkha' la rlung gi
134a3(rgyud 'bum): shugs dang mtshungs par 'gyur/ grub pa thams cad kyang 'dis dbang du 'gyur/ tshes grangs dang skar ma bdam mi 'tshal/ smyung ba bgyi mi 'tshal/ bud med kyi ro blangs la lig bu mig de'i
134a4(rgyud 'bum): mo mtshan gyi steng du bzhag ste/ mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis la/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis te/ lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis la/ lig bu mig de
134a5(rgyud 'bum): blangs te mi gal ba skus na mi gda' bar 'gyur/ lo bdun stong thub par 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/ gdol pa'i khyim nas zhugs blangs la seng ldeng gi
134a6(rgyud 'bum): shing gis zhugs bus te dug dang khrag dang bsres pa'i yungs kar gyis lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na/ gang gi ming nas smos te sbyin sreg bgyis pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo
134a7(rgyud 'bum): zhag bcu gnyis la mi rus kyi thur mas blangs te lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis la dgra'i khyim sgor btsugs na dgung gsum gyis 'bros par 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje lte ba'i cho ga rdzogs so//
134b1(rgyud 'bum): / me kha la'i las rnams lags te/ srung ba bgyid na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i srad bus lag pa la bcing bar bgyi'o// yul gru srung na lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
134b2(rgyud 'bum): brjod bgyis pa'i chab kyis bgyi'o/ / dbab na bye'u rug pa'i lo ma'am rma bya'i mdongs kyis bgyi'o// gdon la gnod pa bgyid na chab kyis bgyi'o// khyim mam/ lnga khang ngam/ kun dga'i ra bar
134b3(rgyud 'bum): mchis la gang du bzlas brjod bgyis pa de nas 'byung po dang gdon thams cad 'bros par 'gyur ro/ / gdon tshar gcad na khrag gis gzugs bris la rkang pas mnan te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
134b4(rgyud 'bum): bgyis na gdon gyi rigs phung bar 'gyur ro/ / rig pa sgrub na thog ma nyid las 'di bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du sh+le sh+le ta ka'i shing gis zhugs bu sa la kur ba'i me tog brgyad stong sbyin sreg
134b5(rgyud 'bum): bgyis na lha des rig pa'i lha bzung nas khrid de mchi'o/ / khrid de mchis nas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// ci ste log 'dren rnams kyi rigs sgrub par 'tshal na loga'i dran rnams kyi log 'dran gyi rigs
134b6(rgyud 'bum): ni bzhi mchis te/ so gcig pa'i rigs dang / kam po dza'i rigs dang / rnam par 'joms pa'i rigs dang / phung byed kyi rigs so// so gcig pa'i rigs la gtsug pud 'phyang la sogs pa log
134b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dren brgyad khri mchis te/ de dag ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bgegs bgyid do// kam po dza'i rigs la ni dbang phyug chen po'i g.yog 'khor ba lang rna ba la sogs pa
135a1(rgyud 'bum): la bgegs drug khri mchis te/ dbang phyug chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa la bgegs bgyid cing rig pa'ang 'joms par bgyid do// rnam par 'joms pa'i rigs la ni 'jig rten skyong
135a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i g.yog 'khor mya ngan med la sogs pa log 'dren drug khri mchis te/ de dag kyang dbang phyug chen po dang phur bu gsum pa'i cho ga rgyas pa la bgegs bgyid do// phung byed kyi rigs la ni lag na rdo rje
135a3(rgyud 'bum): g.yog 'khor mu rda ta ka la sogs pa'i log 'dren bye ba phrag 'bum mchis te/ de dag ni rig pa'i cho ga rgyas pa thams cad la bgegs bgyid cing rig pa'ang 'joms par bgyid do// 'di ni log 'dren/
135a4(rgyud 'bum): dedag gi sgrub pa lag te/ so gcig pa'i rigs kyi sgrub pa ni mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dur khrod kyi shing gis zhugs bus la ba lang gi mkhris
135a5(rgyud 'bum): pas sbags pa'i yungs kar la lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na/ kyi hud kyi hud ces 'chi ba'i sgra grag cing grub par 'gyur te/ grub nas kyang sgrub pa la bgegs mi bgyid de/ bde bar sgrub tu
135a6(rgyud 'bum): mchis so/ / kam po dza'i rigs kyi sgrub pa ni mar gyi ngo zhag lnga la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje dang / dbang phyug chen po la mchod pa bgyis nas/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du arka'i
135a7(rgyud 'bum): shing gis zhugs bus la mon sran gre'u dang mar bsres pa la lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na/ lag na rdo rje'i gzugs 'gul te/ de nas grub par 'gyur ro// grub nas kyang dbang phyug chen po'i
135b1(rgyud 'bum): cho ga rgyas pa bklags pa tsam gyis rig pa thams cad 'grub bo/ / rnam par 'joms pa'i rigs kyi sgrub pa ni mar gyi ngo nag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ mtshan gcig mchis par
135b2(rgyud 'bum): mchis la/ mtshan gcig pa la mchod pa chen po bgyis la/ log 'dren rnams la'ang gtor ma bgyi'o// de'i mdun du be kang ta'i zhugs bus la khrag dang bsres pa'i yungs kar gyis lan
135b3(rgyud 'bum): brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na de'i 'og tu grib ma gda' zhing grub par 'gyur ro/ / rnam par 'joms pa'i rigs grub na log 'dren rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// gang dang gang du dgos pa de thams
135b4(rgyud 'bum): cad bgyid do/ / phung byed kyi rigs kyi sgrub pa ni zla ba phyed zas su'o skyo 'tshal zhing mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la

142a3(rgyud 'bum): bgyis te/ gnas dben par mchis la dur khrod kyi shing gis zhugs bus la seng ldeng gi yam sreg shing khrag dang dug la bsrugs pa lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na gnod sbyin mo de mchis
142a4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur te/ mchis nas 'di skad du ci bya zhes mchi ba dang / des 'di skad du gang bsams pa de gyis shig ces brjod par bgyi'o// gal te btub na 'di skad du dpag tshad brgya nas bud
142a5(rgyud 'bum): med nga'i gan du khrid de shog/ grogs po brgyad cu la zan byin cig/ nyin gcig bzhin ras zung brgyad dang / kar sha pa Na brgyad brgyad phul cig ces brjod dang / de ltar bgyi'o zhes mchi bar
142a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ de'i 'og tu bud med khrid de mchi'o// yid kyis bzlas brjod bgyi'o// yid kyis slar gtang bar bgyi'o// rdo rje bzhad ma'i cho ga rdzogs so// / pho
142a7(rgyud 'bum): nya mo thams cad kyi las ni 'di lags te/ rig pa mchog gi pho nya mo ni las thams cad du'ang sbyar bar bgyi'o// las thams cad du'ang rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig sbyang bar
142b1(rgyud 'bum): bgyi ste/ sgrub pa ma lags pa'i rig pa'ang sgrub par bgyid do// srin bu ka ta'i dug gis gnod par gyur pa rnams la ni yi ge bri ba'i gzhi dang sdug tsha dang / spyi gu'ang sngags lan bdun
142b2(rgyud 'bum): bdun gyis bsngags la gang 'dod pa bris te bskur na sos par 'gyur ro/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la/ lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang
142b3(rgyud 'bum): gis rig pa thams cad dngos grub tu 'gyur ba stsol ba'i rig pa'i lha thams cad kyi gsang ba brjod par bgyi'o/ / gal te rig sngags 'chang rig pa grub par 'tshal na rig pa'i lha de la 'dis
142b4(rgyud 'bum): mgu bar bgyi'o/ / mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi ngogs gnyis ka'i sa blangs la lha'i gzugs bgyis te/ sprin dang ma
142b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dres pa'i tshon gyis lha'i kha dog ci'i dra ba de 'dra bar bri bar bgyi'o/ / mar dang sbrang rtsis lto dgang bar bgyi'o// me tog pad+ma'i dbus su lba de gzhag par bgyi'o// pad+ma'i ze ba ni a
142b6(rgyud 'bum): ka ru dang tsan dan gyis bsku bar bgyi'o/ / dus gsum du bdug pas kyang bdug par bgyi ste/ gu gul dang / du ru ka dang / ga pur dang / shing sha mi'i me tog dang / de rnams bsres
142b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bdug pas bdug par bgyi'o/ / gdugs gsum gyi bar du bgyi'o// de nas gzugs de 'o ma'i nang du stsal de zhig par ma gyur gyi bar du bzhag la/ zhig nas 'o ma rgya mtshor
143a1(rgyud 'bum): 'bab pa'i chab kyi nang du stsal to/ / de nas sbyor ba 'dis lha de mgu bar 'gyur zhing dga' ba mthong ste myur du dngos grub kyang stsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rig pa'i rig
143a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi gsang ba lags te/ 'dis lha thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba 'di ni bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du brjod do// bcom ldan 'das
143a3(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i rgyal po bdag gis bshad pa 'di ni rig sngags thams cad kyi rgyal po/ / rig pa thams cad sgrub tu stsal ba/ tshungs pa ma mchis pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ bla ma mchis pa lags
143a4(rgyud 'bum): so/ / 'di ni bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa la bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag
143a5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs chen po lag na rdo rje mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lag so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan
143a6(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la gang gis 'di ltar yid kyis phyag 'tshal na'ang des de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag dgu la phyag byas
143a7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de sa lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po khyod de bzhin gshegs pas
143b1(rgyud 'bum): bstod cing bkur te bsngags pa legs so legs so/ / brtson 'grus dang brtul ba chen po dang ldan pa legs so zhes bya ba smras so// de nas gzhon nu rdo rje sdes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs dang lag
143b2(rgyud 'bum): na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// yab bdag kyang rig pa mchog la dga' bas gang gis rig pa mchog sgrub pa'i rig sngags 'chang de la gnod sbyin
143b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / log 'dren thams cad dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad dang / grub pa thams cad dang / klu thams cad dang / yi dgas thams cad dang / grul bum thams cad bgegs bgyid
143b4(rgyud 'bum): par mi 'gyur bar sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du gsang sngags stsal bar bgyi'o/ / de nas gnod sbyin gyi dbang po lag na rdo rjes/ gzhon nu rdo rje sdel 'di skad ces smras so// bzhin bzang
143b5(rgyud 'bum): khyod sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa legs so/ / bzhin bzang khyod rig pa mchog gi don gyi phyir gsang sngags smros shig/ de nas phas gnang bas gzhon nu rdo rje sde dga' mgu yi rangs
143b6(rgyud 'bum): tebacom ldan 'das kyi nabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas log 'dren nges par gcig pa'i gsang sngags spras pa/ na mo p+'ud+hA ya/ na moH mAl/ namaHsaM dz+wal/ nas sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra d+hA sa
143b7(rgyud 'bum): ma hA yak+Sha sa nA pa ta ye/ na mo badz+ra se nA ya/ ku mA ra rA pa d+ha ra Ni/ a pra ti ha tA ya/ ma hA ba la pa rA kra mA ya/ tsal tsa la/ ku la ku la/ mtha ma tha/ nA sha ya sarba big+h+nAn/ bi nA ma
144a1(rgyud 'bum): kanaHban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ ma ra ma ra/ bin+da bin+da/ ye ma ma duSh+Ta/ ts+tshin+da staM mya krin+ta dzam+b+ha mo hA ya ni/ sum+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya swA hA/ sgrub pa'i dus na grog mkhar
144a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi sa las rdo rje bgyis te bsrung ba bgyi'o/ / srung ba'i dus na til nag pos sbyin sreg brgyad stong bgyis na bgegs thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa'i dus na lan bdun bzlas brjod
144a3(rgyud 'bum): bgyis pa'i yungs kar gyis mtshams gcad do/ / rkang rjes kyi sa'am thal ba la lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis te bsrung ba bgyis la/ sgrub pa'i dus 'jim pa las rdo rje sde'i gzugs bgyis

144a5(rgyud 'bum): gul gyi bdug pus bgyi'o/ / klu dkrug par bgyi na rdo rje'i phyag rgya bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du brgyud brgya bgyis te/ gang na klu gnas pa'i mtsho dar bor na klu thams cad skrag par 'gyur ro//
144a6(rgyud 'bum): dri za rnams g.yos par bgyi na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dur khrod kyi sol bas dri za'i gzugs bris la/ de'i lto bar srin lag bzhag
144a7(rgyud 'bum): rig pa lan brgyad stong brjod na snying po brjod pas mchis par 'gyur te/ mchis nas par snang las sman 'dor te/ de 'tshal na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ dri za thams cad kyang

144b2(rgyud 'bum): rtsa brgyud bzlas brjod bgyis te btsugs na gnod sbyin 'bros par 'gyur ro/ / tso ste bsgrub par 'tshal na ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas ma god pa'i ras la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs gse
144b3(rgyud 'bum): gyi mdog can bri bar bgyi'o/ / de'i g.yon rol du lag na rdo rje mdog sngo ba sangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yas rol du rdo rje gzhon nu'i gzugs
144b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa gser gyi mdog can lag pa g.yon pa na pad+ma g.yas pas dam pa sbyin par bri'o/ / de'i 'og rol du sgrub pa po lag na pog por thogs pa bri'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis
144b5(rgyud 'bum): zla ba phyed zas su'o skyo 'thung zhing rig pa bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ / de nas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcog smyung ba bgyis te rgya cher mchod la/ gtor ma'ang rgya cher bgyi'o// de nas

145a1(rgyud 'bum): sde'i cho ga rdzogs so/ / // de nas mu d+ha da kas/ lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// yab bdag ni khyod kyi rig sngags kyi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad
145a2(rgyud 'bum): la bgegs bgyid pa lags mod kyis/ gang dag rig pa mchog sgrub pa de dag la bdag slar bcing bstsal bar bgyi'o// bdag bcings na rig sngags 'chang de la su'ang bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur
145a3(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / bzhin bzang de de bzhin te/ bdag cag bcing ba spros shig spros shig/ de nas murta Ta ka sa lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te bdag bcing ba'i gsang sngags smras pa/ na mo rat+na tra

145a5(rgyud 'bum): mdun du me tog dmar po dang bdug pas mchod la/ de nas sgrub pa'i dus na srad bu dkar po la mdud pa gsum dor ro// su zhig rtag tu 'chang ba de la thams cad dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// sgrub pa thams
145a6(rgyud 'bum): cad dang las thams cad du'ang spra tshil las murta Da ka'i gzugs bgyis te/ lag pa g.yon na mdung rtse gsum pa thogs par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tsan dan dmar po'i mdung rtse
145a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum pas snying khar btsugs pa de'i 'og tu rde'u nag pos bkang ste/ dngos grub stsal gyi bar du gzhag par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mdung rtse gsum pa phyung la 'o mas bkrus te/
145b1(rgyud 'bum): rig pa lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la thams cad bgyi'o// gal te las de ltar ma bgyis na dngos grub tu mi 'gyur ro// mur+ha Ta ka'i sgrub pa lags te/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong

145b6(rgyud 'bum): mo'i gzugs kyi me tog gi 'phreng ba 'gul bar 'gyur te dngos grub tu 'gyur ro/ / dngos grub tu gyur na rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// las gzhan dag kyang bgyis te sprul
145b7(rgyud 'bum): gyis zin pa dbab na sra rtsi pog gi bdug pas bgyi'o/ / gdon bskrad na rkang rjes kyi sa sa lag mthil du mdung rtse gsum pa bris la bstan na gdon du zhing 'bros so// skyes pa dang bud med dbang
146a1(rgyud 'bum): dubagyi na mur+d+ha Ta ka la phyag bgyis la gdugs gang yang rung ste shre smai ta ka'i shing gis zhugs bus la/ ba ru ra'i me tog brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dbang du 'gyur ro//
146a2(rgyud 'bum): mo mtshan bcing bar 'tshal na dur khrod kyi thal ba dur khrod kyi ras kyis bcings la/ rig pa'ang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis na mo mtshan bcings par 'gyur ro// dgrol na dbye'o//
146a3(rgyud 'bum): byis pa gdon skem byed kyis zin pa rnams ni tsha ba la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te bkrus na sos par 'gyur ro// 'byung po dang / 'dre dang / klu rnams bskrad na thal mo brdabs

146a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang lag na rdo rje la gsang sngags stsal bar bgyi'o// lag na rdo rje 'di ni le ma
146a6(rgyud 'bum): gos dkar mo'i snying po bton pa tsam gyis 'grub pa ste/ 'di kho bos brjod par bgyi'o// 'di bton pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo
146a7(rgyud 'bum): b+ha ga ba te/ oM b+ha ya nA sha ni trA sa ni/ trA sa ya/ b+h+r-i ku Ti ta ti be ta ti swA hA/ rig pa 'di bton pa tsam gyis bgegs thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro// bdag bsrung na thal ba la lan bdun
146b1(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod bgyis pas bgyi'o/ / gzhan bsrung na spyi bor lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis te sku mdud par bgyi'o// sems can thams cad rengs par bgyi na yid kyis bgyi'o// dbang du
146b2(rgyud 'bum): bgyi na yar gyi ngo zla ba nya la zhag gcig bsrung ba bgyis la/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du byang chub kyi shing gis zhugs bus la til gyis lan brgyad srong sbyin sreg bgyis

146b6(rgyud 'bum): btsugs na mtshams bcad par 'gyur ro/ / yul 'khor ba cing na lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i chab kyis bgyi'o// sems can rnams bskrad na lan bdun bzlas brjod pa gyis
146b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i yungs kar gyis bgyi'o/ / lag bu mig dang ldong ros bsgrub na zla ba gcig zas su'o skyo 'tshal zhing / yar gyi ngo tshas brgyad nas zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i
147a1(rgyud 'bum): @mchod rten nam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar shing a shwat+tha'i lo ma bdun gyi steng du lig bu mig dang ldong ros bzhag pa dngos grub gsum byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis
147a2(rgyud 'bum): 'bar na ni lo stong thub par 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang skra lcang lo 'khyil pa can du 'gyur ro// du ba 'thul na ni mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// lo dgu stong thub par 'gyur ro// yul 'khor ma rung

147a6(rgyud 'bum): bgyis na dga' bar 'gyur ro/ / yugs sa mo dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal bas yar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi mdun du me tog dkar po brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyid

147b1(rgyud 'bum): brjod bgyis na gang 'dod pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro/ / mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bcing ba yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pas bgyi'o// chu srin kum bi ra'i kha bcing
147b2(rgyud 'bum): na gseg ma la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis te chab tu bor na kha bcing bar 'gyur ro/ / seng ge dang / stag dang / ma he dang / glang po che dang / rgyal po dang / chom rkun gyi nang du chud na bsam
147b3(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas ma god pa'i ras la sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bri bar bya ste/ g.yon rol du ni lag na rdo rje/ g.yas rol du ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
147b4(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug go/ / de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsar gyi mdog can du bri'o// lag na rdo rje ni lo bcu drug tsam lon pa'i gzugs 'dral kha dog sngo ba sangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bri'o// 'phadra/
147b5(rgyud 'bum): pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi g.yas rol du ni lha mo br-i/ de'ang 'dam bu mda' rgyu ltar dkar ba'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyang de dang 'dra'o// lha mo ni pad+mo'i 'phreng
147b6(rgyud 'bum): bas brgyan par bri'o/ / de'i 'og rol du sgrub pa pog por thogs par bri'o// sgrub pa po zla ba gcig gi bar du zas su'o skyo 'tshal zhing yar gyi ngo tshas brgyad la mchod pa rgya chen po bgyis te/
147b7(rgyud 'bum): mo la 'od zer byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'od zer de de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur ro// de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur te rgyal po nyid stsol to// yid
148a1(rgyud 'bum): kyis gang bsams pa de dag thams cad 'byor to/ / yar gyi ngo zla ba nya nas zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs la pad+ma 'bum bor na lha mo nyid mthong
148a2(rgyud 'bum): ngo/ / dam pa gang blangs pa de rnye de rgyal po nyid dam rig sngags 'chang nyid du 'gyur ro// tha mar zhag gsum smyung ba bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi cho ga rdzogs
148a3(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje ngas kyang gang gis rdo rje'i rigs dang / cho ga rgyas pa chen po
148a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur ba'i gsang sngags cho ga rgyas pa 'dir sbyin par bgyi'o/ / da lta bas na cho ga rgyas pa thams cad du 'di gcig pu sbyar bar bgyi'o// lag na rdo rje 'di dran pa tsam gyis
148a5(rgyud 'bum): / rig pa'i lha thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo/ b+ha ga bad+d+haH/ oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ lag na rdo rje spyan 'di ni sems can thams cad
148a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi don gyi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag bcus dgongs te/ ngas kyang da ltar sems can rnams kyi don dang / khro bo rnams dga' bar bya ba dang / gdul dka' ba rnams gdul ba'i phyir
148a7(rgyud 'bum): bshad do/ / ri mo mkhan gso sbyong dang ldan pas ma god pa'i ras la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshen gyis sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs gser gyi mdog can chos ston pa bri bar bya'o// de'i g.yas
148b1(rgyud 'bum): rol du 'phags pa lag na rdo rje mdog sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa chos nyan par bri'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yon rol du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
148b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dam bu mda' rgyu ltar dka' ba/ skra'i thor tsugs dang cod pan can/ stag lpags kyi sham thabs gyon pa/ lag na rnga yab thogs pa bri bar bya'o// de nas zla ba phyed zas su'o sgro 'thung /

150a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu ma dbang du bya na a rang ga ni me tog brgyad stong gis lag na rdo rje la phog par byas na gzhon nu ma dbang du 'gyur ro// yugs sa mo dbang du byan lag na rdo rje'i mdun du

154b4(rgyud 'bum): lha rnams la mchod pa byas la/ btsugs nas byung na'ong rtag tu bcing bar bya'o// de bcings na cho ga rgyas par 'grub par 'gyur te/ rig sngags kyi dngos grub las su'ang glags tshol
154b5(rgyud 'bum): par mi 'gyur ro/ / gang la rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad rdzogs pa yod pa de thams cad la ni lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur te rig sngags kyang sbyin par byed do// de ma yin na
154b6(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje'i bya ba sgrub pa rnams grags tshol ba'i phyir 'khrod do/ / cho ga rgyu bsgrub pas cho ga rgyas pa las bshad pa bzhin du 'gal ba rnams bsrung bar byaste/ nya dang sha spang bar bya'o//
154b7(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dga' bar bya'o// gang dag nga'i rdo rje'i rigs la mchod pa byed cing dang bar byed pa dang / rig pa'i mchog 'don cing mchod
155a1(rgyud 'bum): pa de dag ni nga'i dam tshig shes pa yin no/ / de dag ni ngal shas cher dang ste de dag la nga zhi bar sems so// lha thams cad kyang zhi bar sems par 'gyur ro// gang
155a2(rgyud 'bum): dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul las phyi rol du gyur cing 'dod do cog za ba dang / dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / bram zer mi 'dzin par cho ga rgyas pa 'di sgrub pa de dag ni lag na rdo rje 'dzin gyi rdo
155a3(rgyud 'bum): rjes bshig par 'gyur ro/ / lha thams cad kyang ma dad pa'i sems su 'gyur ro// log 'dren rnams kyang glags lta zhing klan ka tshol ba'i phyir 'khod do// de ma thag tu nad kyis 'debs shing
155a4(rgyud 'bum): log 'dren rnams kyis non par 'gyur ro/ / ma mo rnams kyi cho ga rdzogs so// // de nas rdo rje khro bo bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyis 'khor 'dus pa thams cad la glang po che'i lha stangs
155a5(rgyud 'bum): kyis bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di'i sems can rnams ni bsod nams dman pa dang / tshul la mi gnas pa dang / phal ma gus pa
155a6(rgyud 'bum): dang mal ma gus pa dang / bsod nams chung ba dang / dad pa med pa dang / grags tshol ba dang / 'chal pa dang / rtag tu zang zing la brkam pa dang / rtag tu log 'dren dang / mche ba
155a7(rgyud 'bum): can dang / sha za rnams kyis zin pa lags te/ bgegs dang log 'dren de dag gzhig pa dang mthar gtugs pa'i slad du gsang sngags bshad par 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
155b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje khro bo la bka' stsal to// bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gang khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa legs so legs so// khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gis/ sems can
155b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi phyir gsang sngags shod cig/ de nas rdo rje khro bo bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyis bcom ldan 'das dang lag na rdo rje'i zhabs la gtugs nas gsang sngags bshad pa/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/
155b3(rgyud 'bum): nam sh+tsaN+Ta badz+ra pA Na ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ta ye/ na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ pra dz+wa li ta dIp+ta daMSh+To ka Ta b+ha ya b+hai ra brA ya/ a si mu sa la/ badz+ra pa ra shupA sha ha stA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM hu lu hu lu/ ar+tha
155b4(rgyud 'bum): takuN+Da li/ kha la kha kha khA rA khA nA khA nA khA nA/ khA da khA da khA da khA da/ khA hi khA hi khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ gardza gardza/
155b5(rgyud 'bum): tardza tardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ b+ha ga bAM/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ mUr+han tA Da ya badz+re Na sarba big+h+na ba nA ya kaM ni bA ra ya ma hA ga Na pa tI/ dzI bi tAM ta ka rA ya/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM kro d+ha ga Na ya
155b6(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi gsang sngags dang po'o// na mo rat+na traM yA ya/ nA ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ mA hA yak+Sha senA pa ta ye/ na mo ma hA badz+ra krod+ha ya/ daM Sh+ToH kaT b+hai ra ba ya/ a
155b7(rgyud 'bum): mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha na has+thA ya/ he he/ pa ta pa ta/ d+ha pa d+ha pa/ kha ba/ khA hi khA hi/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+ta/ ha na ha ni/ gardza gerdza/ gaN pa ti/ dzI baM
156a1(rgyud 'bum): ta Ar+tha ka rA ya swA hA/ gsang sngags gnyis pa'o// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha sa nA pa ta ye/ na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya/ bi ma la ku na ka
156a2(rgyud 'bum): dzA pu sha na ya ga ka na/ a mr-i ta saM b+ha bA ya/ garta ma l+ya a nu le/ pa na pri yA ya/ badz+ra pA NI pr-i yA ya/ badz+ra pA Ni tA l+ya/ b+ha ga ya ba nA ga yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa pra marda nA ya/ trai lo kya/ go tsar
156a3(rgyud 'bum): yasha ta s+ya n+ya bi tra ka ra ya tri dan na/ gar+b+ho d+ha mA ya a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ e h+ye hi daMSh+To ta ka Ta b+he ra ba g+hi bi tud dz+wa la sU l-i ka sha ni du le ru po tI ti saM bud+d+ha/ oM kha kha ba kha/ grih+Na grih+Na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/
156a4(rgyud 'bum): ha na ha na/ gardza gardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ pra dzA la pra dzA la/ gra sa gra sa/ sarba big+h+nAM bi nA ya kA nAn hr-i da yaM smA taM gan d+harba hr-i da yaM pa ta/ rAk+Sha so hr-i da yaM
156a5(rgyud 'bum): s+phata sarba dzA ra hr-i da ya s+pha ta/ sarba tsa tur+tha ku hr-i da ya sU tA/ sarba nI gA nAM hr-i da yaM sa pA ta/ huM hu swa ta/ da ha da ha/ pa tse pa tsi/ A bi sha a br-i sha/ a da~M tsa me kAr+yaM ku ru badz+ra d+ha ra ar+d+ha
156a6(rgyud 'bum): pa ya ti swA hA/ gsang sngags gsum pa'o// na mo badz+ra kro d+hA a/ da~MSh+To hA ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ tad+ya thA/ hu lu hu lu/ khA ba ga kha/ khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tISh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha swA hA/ khro za
156a7(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi gsang sngags bzhi pa'o/ / de nas 'di dag gi snying po don yod pa gang 'dod pa dang / bzlas brjod byas shing bsgrubs na bdag gi gsang sngags thams cad ba ton cing bzlas
156b1(rgyud 'bum): brjod pagyis pa dang / bsgrubs par gyur pa de bshad par 'tshal lo// de la 'di ni bdag gi snying po lags so// oM a mr-i te hUM phaT/ bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi snying po rdo rje khro bo bdud rtsi zab
156b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyor gyis gsang sngags rnams bshad ma thag tu sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ / log 'dren rnams kyang skrag ste skabs med cing rten med par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du
156b3(rgyud 'bum): song ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag cag gi skyabs mdzad du gsol zhes de skad smra zhing mgo bo thur du gtugs so// kye kye log
156b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dren ma rungs pa rnams longs la nga'i ngag nyon cig/ rdo rje kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la/ kun tu rab tu 'ab rabs khyed kyi spyi bo gshegs sa re/ ngas ral pa ser po can rnams kyi
156b5(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags kyis lha'i le stong gi bar du log 'dren rnams bcom pa dang / gtubs pa dang / brdungs pa dang / gzir ba dang / bskums pa gang yin pa de dran par gyis shig/ nga'i mthu
156b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / brtson 'grus dang / pha rol gnon pa chen po dran par gyis shig/ gang nga'i gsang sngags 'dzin cing 'don pa dang / sgrub pa dang / nges par byed pa de la glags ma tshol cig/ til spras
156b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'am zas ngan pa za'ang rung / sha za'ang rung / grong gi chom rkun spyod kyang rung ste/ rig pa'i mchog la sogs pa rig pa thams cad sgrub pa la glags ma tshol cig/ zan za ba'i tshe'ang kham
157a1(rgyud 'bum): dang po la sngags kyis btab ste dbul bar bya'o/ / nyi ma shar ba'i tshe lan bdun brjod nang de'i phyi bzhin du rtag tu 'brang ngo // log 'dren rnams kyang grags mi tshol lo//
157a2(rgyud 'bum): nya dang / sha dang / til dang / sran chan dang / pan tshe yang rung / snum skur barba ta dang / la phug kyang rung ste/ thams cad zar zin kyang ngade'i rig sngags 'dzin nang la thams cad 'grub
157a3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / gang nga'i gsang sngags 'dzin pa ni bza' ba ma yin pa za zhing bya ba ma yin pa byed du zin kyang / de la gang gis log 'dren rnams grags tshol ba la brtun te 'khod par mi 'gyur
157a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gsang sngags bde ba bstan par bya'o/ / rig sngags 'chang sgrub pa na gang du log 'dren rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba'i gnas kyang bstan par bya ste/ nges par byas pa la ni glags
157a5(rgyud 'bum): tshol ba la brtun par mi 'gyur ro/ / nges par gnas pa la'ang gnas nas gnas su 'gro ba na gom pa re re la log 'dren rnams glags tshol ba'i phyir 'khod pa yod do// log 'dren sa'i spyi phud ces
157a6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba gang dag sa brtol nas 'byung ba'ang yod do/ / de la bgegs kyi mtshan ma'ang bshad par bya ste/ de dag ni gom pa re re 'dzin par byed do// de dag gis zin na bgegs su 'gyur te la lo skye bar
157a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing brgyal ba dang / skyug pa dang / mgo 'khor bar 'gyur ro// log 'dren de dag ni bsod nams kyang zad par byed de/ log 'dren rnams kyis reg pa tsam gyis lha'i longs spyod stong gi
157b1(rgyud 'bum): bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'ang thal bar rlog par byed cing / rig sngags 'chang rig sngags sgrub pa'i bsod nams zad par byed de/ de nas rig sngags rnams
157b2(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ / de bas na rig sngags 'chang gis lus kyi lce yang las shes par bya ste/ mar dang sra rtsi pog gis bdag nyid bdug par bya'o// de nas log 'dren de dag gis gtong bar
157b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gang nga'i gsang sngags 'dzin pa de la ni glags tshol bar brtun par mi 'gyur ro// de bas na rig sngags 'chang gis rig pa'i mchog dran par byas na/ de mnyes par gyur pas 'dzum
157b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bzhin gyis dngos grub myur du 'byin par byed de/ log 'dren rnams kyis ma mthong bar grub par 'gyur ro// log 'dren sa'i spyi phud ces bya ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid rdzogs so// /
157b5(rgyud 'bum): / log 'dren chu ltar g.yo ba zhes bya ba de dag ni chun gnas te/ rig sngags 'chang khrus byed pa na 'dzin par byed do// de dag gi mtshan ma 'byung ste sems 'khrug par byed de/ 'dod
157b6(rgyud 'bum): pa la lhur sems pa dang / bru bas gzir cing kha zas la mngon par chags pa dang / 'jigs pa'i sems skye bar 'gyur ro// de bas na rig sngags 'chang gis bdud rtsi thabs sbyor dran par
157b7(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ dran pa tsam gyis log 'dren rnams 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis snying rje'i sems bskyed par bya ste/ rig pa mchog dran par bya'o// de dran pa tsam gyis
158a1(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu che bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags kyi lha de dag gis log 'dren rnams myos par mthong nas dga' ba'i sems kyis dngos grub myur du sbyin par byed do// log 'dren chu ltar
158a2(rgyud 'bum): g.yo ba zhes bya ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid rdzogs so/ / / log 'dren rig sngags kyi lha'i mngag gzhug pa zhes bya ba rnams ni mthu che ba ste/ de dag ni rig sngags 'chang rig sngags
158a3(rgyud 'bum): las ldang ba na 'dzin par byed do/ / zin par gyur na lus kyi tshul las rtogs par bya ste/ lus tsha bar 'gyur/ dngang bar 'gyur/ sdig pa'i sems 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig
158a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang gis de dge byir gzhil bar bya'o/ gtsug phung 'phyang la bdug pa thams cad sbyin zhing / rig sngags lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas na/ byin chang log 'dren dag pas
158a5(rgyud 'bum): tshetshol ba la brtun par mi 'gyur te/ dga' bar gyur nas dngos grub kyang sbyin par byed do// log 'dren 'di dag kyang rig sngags kyi lha thams cad kyi phyi bzhin 'brang zhing gnas pa yin no//
158a6(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu glags tshol ba'ang yin te/ su zhig sngags grub pa/ su zhig sngags 'don pa/ su mchod pa byed pas de la bgegs kyang byed cing 'dun pa zlog par byed de/ le lo'ang 'jug par byed do//
158a7(rgyud 'bum): de bas na rig sngags 'chang gis nyi ma logs su kha bltas la rtag tu chu khyor gang gtor nas khro bo'i rig sngags kyang lan bdun brjod par bya ste/ 'di skad du bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba rig sngag
158b1(rgyud 'bum): chege mo zhes bya ba sgrub kyis/ khyed yid dga' bar gyis shig ces kyang smros shig/ dus thams cad dud skad smras nas des log 'dren rnams dga' zhing mgul yid dga' bar gyur te/
158b2(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub sbyin par byed cing sems kyang dang bar 'gyur ro// grub pa'i tshe'ang nang par nyi ma logs su kha bltas la thal mo sbyar nas rig sngags brjod de/ 'di skad du bdag ming 'dri zhes
158b3(rgyud 'bum): bgyi ba rig sngags che ge mo zhig sgrub kyis/ khyed yid dga' bar gyis shig ces kyang spros shig/ de nas gtsug pud 'phyang la sogs pa log 'dren de dag de nyid du 'du bar 'gyur te/

158b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams dgrol ba ni yid kyis bya'o/ / log 'dren lha'i mngag gzhug ces bya ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid rdzogs so// // log 'dren 'jig rten me tog ces bya ba rnams
158b6(rgyud 'bum): ni gang gi tshe rig sngags 'chang rig sngags sgrub cing lha la me tog 'bul ba na de'i tshe log 'dren de dag gis 'dzin par byed de/ log 'dren de dag nyid kyang me tog gi khongs su 'jug cing gnas

159a4(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang la 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ / de bas na rig sngags 'chang gis thog ma nyid du khro bo'i bzlas brjod byed bzhin du dri blang bar bya'o// des na log 'dren de dga' byer te rmas par yang

159a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dren nag po zhes bya ba rnams ni bdug pa nyid las 'byung ste/ gang gi tshe rig sngags 'chang lnga la bdug pa 'bul ba na de'i tshe 'dzin par byed do// log 'dren gyis zin pa'i mtshan nyid ni dran pa'am
159a7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / rig sngags gtong bar 'gyur te/ bdug pa mthong bas lha 'phang bar 'gyur zhing dngos grub 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// de bas na rig sngags 'chang gis thog ma nyid du lag pa g.yon pas
159b1(rgyud 'bum): mar blangs la kham por gyi nang nas bdug pa phul na de phyin chad log 'dren rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / bdug pa des kyang ma thams cad tshim par bya'o// lha des kyang dngos grub myur du sbyin par
159b2(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / nag po dang zas su dri za ba ni mtshan nyid gcig go// nag po zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid rdzogs so// // log 'dren gtsug pud gcig pa zhes bya ba rnams ni mthu che zhing
159b3(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grus che ba ste/ log 'dren de dag kyang mar me'i me lce nyid las 'byung ste/ de bas na rig sngags 'chang gis thog ma nyid du 'di ltar bya ste/ ras dkar po las snying po byas te mar me gnyis
159b4(rgyud 'bum): sngar nas rig sngags bzlas brjod byed bzhin du kha thur du bstan te bzhag la/ rig sngags kyang lan brgyad brgya brjod na log 'dren thams cad kha thur du bltas te 'khod par 'gyur ro// rig snga ma
159b5(rgyud 'bum): kyang bde blag tu grub par 'gyur ro/ / sgrub pa thams cad la'ang thog ma nyid du las de dag bya'o// log 'dren gtsug bud gcig pa zhes bya ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid rdzogs so//
159b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das gang su log 'dren rnams 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / gang du rig sngags 'chang rnams kyis dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba'i log 'dren rnams kyi gnas bdag gis bshad
