160a1(rgyud 'bum): snang nul gyis byugs la/ ka ra wI ra'i shing gis me sbar la/ ka ra wI ra'i me tog bdag gi khrag gi nang du bskyugs pa'i sreg blug nyi shu rtsa gcig gis sbyin sreg bya ste/
160a2(rgyud 'bum): las de byas nas log 'dren thams cad bcing ngo zhes brjod na bcings par 'gyur ro// log 'dren thams cad kyi mthar thug par gyis shig ces brjod na log 'dren thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur ro//
160a3(rgyud 'bum): bcings pa las bkrol na rang yid kyis bya'o// las gzhan dag kyang 'byung ste/ bsrung bar bya na lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i chus mgo bor blugs so// mtshams gcad na lan nyi shu rtsa
160a4(rgyud 'bum): gcig bzlas brjod byas pa'i seng ldeng gi phur bus bya'o/ / gdon dbab na ha ha zhes bya ba dang gu gul gyi bdug pas bya'o// dug las gso bar bya na se gol lam yal gas bya'o// gdon 'bros
160a5(rgyud 'bum): pabapar bya na me tog dkar po la lan bdun bzlas brjod bya ba'am gu gul gyis bdug par bya'o/ / dgra bskrad par 'dod pas ni mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ rdo rje khro bo'i
160a6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs nas pri yang ku'i shing gis me sbar te phub ma'i sbyin sreg lan brgyad stong byas na zhag bdun gyis 'bros par 'gyur ro/ / dgra gsad par 'dod na dur khrod du
160a7(rgyud 'bum): song la rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor skyal nul gyis byugs pa'i dbus su sa las gzugs byas pa de'i khar dur khrod kyi shing gis me sbar te/ yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg lan brgyad stong byas na dam
160b1(rgyud 'bum): thag tu dgra'achi bar 'gyur ro/ / mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ka ra wI ra ka'i mitog dus gsum du brgya rtsa brgyad zhag bdun gyi bar du sbyin sreg byas na khrag 'dzag par 'gyur ro// 'phag
160b2(rgyud 'bum): ba lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa byas te ka ra wI ra'i me tog dkar po stong rtsa brgyad phul na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas skyes pa dang bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod na ma ngan las gzugs byas te/ ma da
160b3(rgyud 'bum): na'i tshe ram bdun gyis gnad rnams su btab la tsha ba gsum gyis snying khar bkang nas zangs kyi thur mas kyang rkang par btsugs la spyi bor phyung ste/ zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du bzlas brjod
160b4(rgyud 'bum): byed bzhin du seng ldeng gi me la sreg cing dus gcig kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa'i mjug tu zhag gcig smyung ba byas la mchod pa rgya cher byas te/ lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas na
160b5(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa dang bud med dbang du 'gyur ro/ / mar gyi ngo zhag bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bol ba'i shing gis me sba ra la/ be kang ka ta'i yam sreg shing yungs mar gyi
160b6(rgyud 'bum): nang du bskyugs pa brgyad stong gis sbyin sreg byas na tin ra re re thob par 'gyur ro/ / yugs sa mo dbang du bya bar 'dod na yar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas brtsams te zhag gsum gyi bar du dus gsum du
160b7(rgyud 'bum): zar ma'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad kyis lag na rdo rje la bsnun na dbang du 'gyur ro/ / bu mo dbang du bya bar 'dod na zhag gsum sbyang ba byas te yar gyi ngo tshes bcu gsum la sa las 'dod pa'i lha
161a1(rgyud 'bum): gzugs byas te/ 'di'i khar 'bras kyi sbyin sreg lan brgyad stong byas na bu mo dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas mdzub mo bsgrub par 'dod na zhag gsum sbyang ba byas te/ mar gyi
161a2(rgyud 'bum): zhag bcu bzhil dur khrod du song nas ba lang gi lci bas la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mi'i thod pa ma chag ma nyams pa bzhag la tsan dan dmar po'i dri
161a3(rgyud 'bum): chus gtor nas me tog dmar pos mchod la/ de nas sgrub pa pos mdzub mos g.yabs nas gang gi tshe thod pa 'gul na de'i tshe 'grub par 'gyur te/ gang la mdzub mos bsdigs pa de dbar du
161a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de nas gter dbyung bar 'dod na me'i sbyin sreg gi thab tu lcags bzhag pa blangs pa las rdo rje byas la/ rdo rje de bal nag gi skud pas dkris te mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag
161a5(rgyud 'bum): gcig smyung ba byas nas/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rdo rje de lan brgya bzlas brjod byas na de'i tshe 'grub par 'gyur ro// bsgrubs nas kyang gter gang na yod pa der bzhag pas rdo rjes gter de
161a6(rgyud 'bum): blangs te 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas khro bo bzlas brjod byed bzhin du blang bar bya'o// de ste med na rdo rje nyid 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas gshed byed bsrang 'dod na mar gyi ngo zhag brtsa
161a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dur khrod kyi shing gis mo sbar la/ ba lang gi shas sbyin sreg byas pa dang / ji tsam na me'i thab nas gshed byed 'byung bar 'gyur
161b1(rgyud 'bum): tegang la yid kyis bsams pa de bskyabs par 'gyur ro/ / mi nad 'byung bar 'dod na mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la dur khrod du song ste dur khrod kyi shing gis me sbyar la/ sgren mor byung zhing sma
161b2(rgyud 'bum): bshig ste til dang bsres pa'i yungs kar gyis brgyad brgya sbyin sreg byas na mi nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du pad+ma'i sbyin sreg lan stong rtsa brgyad byas na zhi bar 'gyur
161b3(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / mi mang po gzhig par 'dod na tshes grangs dang rgyu skar yang bdam mi 'tshal/ smyung ba'ang bya mi dgos par khro bo nyid mchog tu brtsam par bya ste/ dur khrod du song la dur khrod kyi shing gis
161b4(rgyud 'bum): me sbar la sgren mor byung zhing skra bshig ste/ nim pa'i lo mas bsregs pa'i dur khrod kyi thal ba'i sbyin sreg lan brgyad stong byas na mi mang po 'jig par 'gyur ro// zhi bar 'dod na sna ma'i me
161b5(rgyud 'bum): tog zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyi nang du bsnyugs pas lan brgyad brgya sbyin sreg byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje khro ba bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi cho ga rdzogs so// /
161b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gang gis log 'dren rnams kyi gsang ba'i gnas 'di dag bshad pa
161b7(rgyud 'bum): ni brtson 'grus dang / mthu dang / pha rol gnon pa che ba lags so// bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la rig sngags rnams kyi dngos grub rnams kyi slad du/ gang gis rig sngags rnams
162a1(rgyud 'bum): grub pa dang / gang gis ming 'grub pa yongs su zhu bar 'tshal lo// de nas com ldan 'das kyis/ tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa chen po gang
162a2(rgyud 'bum): khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs te/ dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / 'grub par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu bar byed pa legs so legs so// tshangs
162a3(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po khyod la rig sngags rnams kyi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / 'grub par mi 'gyur ba'i rgyu bshad par bya ste/ 'jug par bya ba ma yin pa la 'jug pa gang yin pa dang / tshangs pa chen po 'jom
162a4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / rig sngags la smod pa gang yin pa de la ni rig sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// mi bzad pa'i las byed pa 'am/ sdig pa'i ngang tshul can nam/ brdzun zer ba'am/ rig sngags gcod
162a5(rgyud 'bum): dang/ phur bus 'debs pa gang yin pa de la'ang rig sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// tshangs pa byang chub kyi sems yongs su 'dzin pas ni yid kyis kyang lha gzhan la phyag mi bya'o// gsol pa
162a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni de lags so/ / bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang byang chub kyi sem yongs su 'dzin pas lha gzhan la phyag byas na byang chub kyi sems yongs su 'dzin pa
162a7(rgyud 'bum): yin pa'i phyir de la lha de ma dad pa'i phyir te/ de'i phyir des kyang rig sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skyes pa rnams la 'jug par byed pa gang yin pa dang / sbrul 'dzin pa dang / khas
162b1(rgyud 'bum): rtswa gcod par byed pa gang yin pa de la'ang rig sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/ / pad+ma dang khyu mchog la rkang pas reg par byed pa de la'ang rig sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// tshangs pa gang gis rig
162b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ba ngas mdor bstan pa yin no/ / de nas mi mjed kyi bdag pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
162b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams de ltar sems can dag bde blag tu 'grub par bgyi ba'i gnas rnams ston pa thugs rje che ba lags so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa
162b4(rgyud 'bum): gang dag la rig sngags kyi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba'i phyogs 'ga' tsam zhig khyod la bstan par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la dga' ba gang yin pa dag dang / dge ba bcu'i
162b5(rgyud 'bum): las kyi lam dang ldan pa gang yin pa dag dang / pha la gus pa dang / ma la gus pa gang yin pa dang / rig sngags la mchod pa byed cing rig sngags la bkur sti byed pa gang yin pa dang / gsang sngags 'dzin
162b6(rgyud 'bum): par byed pa gang yin pa dang / 'byung po'i zas ngan pa dang / til sbrus pa mi za ba dang / sems can thams cad la legs par lta ba gang yin pa de la ni rig sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas mi mjed
162b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi bdag po tshangs pa dga' zhing mgul yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
163a1(rgyud 'bum): gis kyang lag na rdo rje'i cho ga rgyas pa la gang gis rig sngags 'chang rnams bsrung ba'i gsang sngags dbul bar 'tshal lo/ / bka' stsal pa/ tshangs pa chen po gang khyod kyis sem
163a2(rgyud 'bum): can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir bsams pa shod cig shod cig/ khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ngo // de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa sa lag na rdo rje la gsang sngags phul ba/ na mo rat+na tra
163a3(rgyud 'bum): ya s+ya na mash+tsar+Na badz+ra pA ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha sa nA pa ti s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da bak+Shi Ni/ a ti ni tsa a se b+hi sha ya/ mi mad tsa mye dan tsa/ A ha ra swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di dran pa tsam
163a4(rgyud 'bum): gyis log 'dren rnams las thar par 'gyur ro/ / 'di dag gi las rnams 'byung sa/ bsrung ba ni lan bdun bzlas brjod byed pa'i skud pas bya'o// mtshams gcad pa dang dug bcing bani lar brgya rtsa brgyad
163a5(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod byas pa'i chus bya'o/ / drug las gso ba ni yal gas bya'o// rgya gzhom pa ni chus bya'o// dbab pa ni gu gul gyis bdugs pa'am chus bya'o// gdon bcing ba dang / gdon spyod pa ni mthe
163a6(rgyud 'bum): bos bya'o/ / gdon 'khor du gzhug pa ni mdzub mo la bzlas brjod byas te bsdigs par bya'o// skyes pa dang bud med dbang du byan yar gyi ngo tshes gcig nas brtsams te/ zhag bdun gyi bar du dus
163a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum du snga ma'i me tog stong rtsa brgyad kyis lag na rdo rje la bsnun na dbang du 'gyur ro/ / bum pa la lan brgyad brgyar bsngags te bdag nyid khrus byas na log 'dren thams cad kyis gtong bar 'gyur ro//
163b1(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags sgrub pa'i tshe bgegs zhi bar byan lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i thal ba gtsang mas bya'o// gzhan la bgegs 'byung bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang gang gis nub mo'i rig sngags sgrub pa de nyid
163b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis nub mo lag na rdo rje'i mdun du be kang ka ta'i ya ma sreg shing brgyad brgyas sbyin sreg byas na/ pha rol la bgegs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rig sngags lan brgya dbargya
163b3(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod byas na rmi lam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston par 'gyur ro/ / gzhig par 'dod na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du lha la phul ba'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sra bya'o//
163b4(rgyud 'bum): rims kyis 'debs par bya na mar gyi ngo nag brgyad na zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du a shwat+tha'i shing gis me sbar nas yungs kar khrag gis bsgos pas lan stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg
163b5(rgyud 'bum): byas na de ma thag tu rims kyis 'debs par 'gyur ro/ / dbye bar bya ma zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du phub ma'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o// gdon gzhig par 'dod na gdon gyi mdun du til
163b6(rgyud 'bum): dang thal ba'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na gdon gyi rigs 'jigs par 'gyur ro/ / gdon mdongs par bya na zhi ma thig le'i lo ma sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na mdongs par 'gyur ro// yungs
163b7(rgyud 'bum): kar khyor gang btags te 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na slar gshags 'gyed pa la lan thebs par 'gyur ro/ / nor 'dod pa na yar gyi ngo zla ba nyal zhag
164a1(rgyud 'bum): gcig smyung ba byas te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du nim pa'i shing gis me sbar nas til gyi sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na ti na ra re re thob par 'gyur ro// de nas mdzub mo bsgrub
164a2(rgyud 'bum): pabapar 'dod na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ khang stong ngam dben pa'i phyogs su bud med kyi mo mtshan du mdzub mo btsugs te rig sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na 'grub
164a3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur te/ de nas gang la mdzub mos bsdigs pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// gos 'dod na yang yar gyi ngo chos brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ lte ba nub tsam du chu'i nang du zhugs la ka ra wI ra
164a4(rgyud 'bum): ka'i me tog brgyad brgya phul na gos phrugs re re thob par 'gyur ro/ / klu mchod pa tshes lnga la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ grog mkhar gyi steng du song la der 'dug nas rig sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas
164a5(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas te/ de nas sbrul mthong ba de la che ge mo zhig gi thang du song la zo zhig ces smros shig/ phyir gson yid kyis bya ste/ gcig pus gso nus kyi/ gzhan sus kyang gso mi nus so//
164a6(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa'i cho ga rdzogs so// // de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
164a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rig pa'i mchog sgrub pa la dngos grub stsal bar 'tshal te/ bgegs gzhil ba'i gsang sngags kyang bshad par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
164b1(rgyud 'bum): parigs kyi bu dag sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir khyed kyis shod cig/ de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das dang / lag na rdo rje'i zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas tshig mthun par gsang
164b2(rgyud 'bum): sngags bshad pa/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha sa nA pa ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ u grA ya swA hA/ a ti u grA ya swA hA/ u gra bi yA ya swA hA/ a ti u gra bi yA ya swA hA/
164b3(rgyud 'bum): u gra kro d+ha nA ya swA hA/ a ti u gra kro d+ha nA ya sA hA/ tsaN+Da ro Sha N+Da ya swA hA/ ro Sha pra ma nA ya swA hA/ pra ha ra Na badz+ra pra ha ra Ni swA hA/ aT Te maT Te ma ti ni ha se swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dran pa
164b4(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyis gdon thams cad 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ / yi dgas thams cad dang / sha za thams cad dang / grul bum thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad dang / gnod sbyin thams cad 'byer bar
164b5(rgyud 'bum): byed de 'gum par yang 'gyur ro/ / de nas rig sngags 'di'i las rnams 'byung ste/ dpa' bar bya na ni zhim thig le'i lo mas bya'o// gdon thams cad mnye bar bya na gos bsreg par bya'o// gdon
164b6(rgyud 'bum): gyis zin pa la ni lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i gtun shing gis ba sdigs par bya'o/ / gdon 'bros par bya na dur khrod kyi sol ba la gzugs byas te/ mtshon rnon pos bcad na gdon tshangs
164b7(rgyud 'bum): 'debs shing 'bros par 'gyur ro/ / gdon gyi mdun du lan tshwa dang ske tshe'i sbyin sreg lan brgyad brgya byas na gdon gyi lus tshabs 'debs par 'gyur ro// ba lang gi lci ba las gdon gyi gzugs byas
165a1(rgyud 'bum): te/ lcags kyi thur mas mig tu btsugs na long bar 'gyur ro// gdon gyi mdun du phub ma'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na/ gdon gyi rigs brlag par 'gyur ro// gdon
165a2(rgyud 'bum): kyigyi mdun du na le sham gyi sreg blugs nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na gdon khrag tu skyug par 'gyur ro/ / byis pa gdon gyis zin pa la ni bdugs pas gtong bar 'gyur ro// ci ste mi gtong na sra
165a3(rgyud 'bum): gtubs pa dang / lug ru dang / sgog skya dang / sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa rnams kyis bdugs na de ma thag tu gtong bar 'gyur ro// byis pa gdon gyis zin pa rnams la bzlas brjod byas pa'i
