165a5(rgyud 'bum): gcad na lan gsum bzlas brjod byas pa'i gseg mas bya'o/ / sbrul bslad na lan gsum bzlas brjod byas pa'i chu dang thal bas brdabs par bya'o// mche ba can thams cad kha bcing bar bya ba
165a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / smad bcing bar bya ba ni yid kyis bya'o// gter bcing na lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pa'i seng ldeng gi phur bus la btab na gter bcings par 'gyur ro// chang ma rung bar
165a7(rgyud 'bum): byabu na til gyi sreg blugs lan bdun sbyin sreg bya'o/ / nya ba skrad na nib pa'i lo ma la lan bdun bsngags te mtsho'i nang du bor na nya 'bros par 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skyes pa rnams la nang dag zhi
165b1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'dod par bya na/ lag na rdo rje'i gzugs 'o mas bkrus la bzlas brjod kyang stong rtsa brgyad byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro// dus ma yin par char dbab par 'dod na yang yar gyi ngo tshas lnga la zhag
165b2(rgyud 'bum): gcig smyung ba byas te/ lte ba nub pa tsam du chu'i nang du zhugs nas pad+ma'i sbyin sreg khri phul na dus ma yin par char pa 'bab par 'gyur ro// zhi bar 'dod na yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la zhag gcig
165b3(rgyud 'bum): smyung ba byas la/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du byang chub kyi shing gi bud shing gis me sbar nas ut+pa la'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro// dug gzhom par 'dod na rtswa ku shas bya'o//
165b4(rgyud 'bum): dug bsal na khu tshur gyis bya'o// gdon zar gzhug na lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i a ba ra tsai ta'i me tog gis bya'o// g.yul 'gyed na a pa ra tsi ta'i me tog la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
165b5(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas te ma go la btags na gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe rig sngags 'chang rig sngags 'grub par 'dod na zhag gsum smyung ba byas la nang par bum pa gsar pa bzhi blangs
165b6(rgyud 'bum): techus bkang nas rig sngags 'chang gis phye ma red na le sham dkar po la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te/ bum pa de dag gi nang du blugs ni bum pa de dga' phag cing ldud par 'gyur na rig sngag
165b7(rgyud 'bum): 'chang gis rig sngags 'grub par shes par bya'o/ / de ste mi 'grub na ni 'phag par mi bya'o// rig sngags 'chang rig sngags sgrub pa na zhag gcig smyung bar byas la sa las gzugs byas pa
166a1(rgyud 'bum): bkod de me'i phyogs su kha dog dmar po gzhag par bya'o/ / gshin rje'i phyogs su ni kha dog ser po// chu lha'i phyogs su ni sngo bsangs so// rlung gi phyogs su ni nag po ste/
166a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag so so'i gnas ji lta ba bzhin du dgod par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang rig sngags sgrub pa na ci ste bgegs kyi gzugs dga' byung bar 'gyur te/ dngos grub pa la sgrub na gshin rje'i phyogs
166a3(rgyud 'bum): nas yi dgas mo nag mo zhes bya ba de bgegs byed de/ stag gi gzugs su ston pa dang / wa'i gzugs su 'tshe bar byed do// de lta bu la sogs pa bgegs byed pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gis
166a4(rgyud 'bum): gshin rje'i phyogs su lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnun na bgegs rnams med par 'gyur ro/ / gshin rje'i rgyal po'i g.yog yi dgas ku mu da zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul che ba yi
166a5(rgyud 'bum): dgas sum khri'i bdag po zhig yod de/ ku mu da de'ang rig sngags 'chang de dngos grub chen po sgrub pa na bgegs byed de/ ku mu da'i bgegs 'byung ba'angal la ni yi dgas kyi tshul/ la la ni srin po'i
166a6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs/ la la ni khyi'i mgo can/ la la ni rnga mo'i mgo can/ la la ni bong bu'i mgo can gyi yi dgas te/ de dag 'ong ba'i tshe'ang ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin cing skar mda' brgya dag kha nas 'byin
166a7(rgyud 'bum): par byed do/ / de la rig sngags 'chang gis gshin rje'i phyogs kyi gzugs la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i thal bas pasdun na de ma thag tu bgegs thams cad med par 'gyur ro// rgyal po de'i
166b1(rgyud 'bum): phyi bzhin 'brang ba sgo dpon ma sna chang ma zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba zhig yod de/ sna chang ma de ni bgegs chen po byed pa yin no// de'ang des gsang sngags kyis bzlog par mi nus te/ de 'ong
166b2(rgyud 'bum): ba dang skar mda' lhung bar ston cing spyugs pa'ang len te/ sna tshad ma des dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams seng ldeng gi phur bus btab pa ni mo mtshan gyis 'byin par byed do// dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams thal
166b3(rgyud 'bum): bas bcad pa ni bus pas med par byed do/ / dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams chus bcad pa ni mchil mas med par byed do// yid kyis dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams bcad pa ni bcin gyis 'bral bar byed do//
166b4(rgyud 'bum): de lta bu'i tshul dag gis dkyil 'khor 'jig par byed pa dang / de la rig sngags 'chang gis myur du sna tshad ma'i ming nas smos te/ sring mo sna chad ma khyod 'ongs pa legs so legs so zhes byas nas/
166b5(rgyud 'bum): lan bdun bsngags pa'i seng ldeng gi phur bu sor bzhi pa gshin rje'i phyogs kyi snying khar gdab bo// de nas sna tshad ma des ngu 'bod kyi sgra phyung nas med par 'gyur te/ rig sngags kyang 'grub par
166b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gshin rje'i phyogs kyi cho ga rdzogs so// rig sngags 'chang rig sngags sgrub pa na ci ste me'i phyogs nas bgegs kyi gzugs dag 'byung ste/ dngos grub
166b7(rgyud 'bum): phal sgrub pa na me'i phyogs kyi rgyal po'i g.yog mo srin mo rtsed mo can zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni bgegs byed pa yin no// srin mo rtsed mo can de'ang bya'i gzugs su ston par byed cing nga rom snyan pa la
167a1(rgyud 'bum): 'byin par byed do/ / de la rig sngags 'chang gis me'i phyogs kyi gzugs la lan bdun sngags kyis bsngags pa'i yungs kar gyis bsdun na med par 'gyur ro// dngos grub
167a2(rgyud 'bum): chen po sgrub pa na rgyal po de'i g.yog srin mo mi sdug pa zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul che ba srin po sum khri'i bdag po zhig yod de/ mi sdug pa de'ang rig sngags 'chang la bgegs byed pa yin te/ mi sdug pa de 'ong ba
167a3(rgyud 'bum): dang mi sdug pa de'i rnam pa'i srin po dag dang / la la khyimago can dag dang / la la glang po che'i mgo can dag dang / la la seng ge'i mgo can lha bu'i bgegs kyi rnam pa dag tu snang ste/ la la
167a4(rgyud 'bum): ni brag 'phen par byed/ la la ni 'byung po'i 'khrul 'khor ston cing 'jigs pa'i sgra dag kyang 'byin te/ skar mda' brgya dag kyang kha nas 'byin par byed do// de la rig sngags 'chang gis me'i
167a5(rgyud 'bum): phyogs kyi gzugs la lan bdun bsngags pa'i thal bas bskrun na bgegs rnams med par 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po de'i g.yog srin po so dkar zhes bya ba mthu che zhing brtson 'grus che ba zhig yod de/
167a6(rgyud 'bum): so dkar de'ang rig sngags 'chang de la nam gung gi thun la bgegs byed do// de'ang gsang sngags kyis bzlog par mi nus te/ de 'od dang ngu'abod kyi sgra chen po ni 'byin/ ri rnams ni g.yo/ ri
167a7(rgyud 'bum): dgas rnams ni gar byed/ wa rnams ni rtse/ glang po che rnams ni skad 'byin te/ de'i rig sngags 'chang gis me'i phyogs kyi bgegs yin par shes par bya'o// so dkar de'ang bus pa'i
167b1(rgyud 'bum): gzugs kyis sgra 'byin cing 'ong ngo / / yang na lha'i gzugs kyis 'ongs te/ des kyang bltas pa tsam gyis dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jig par byed do// de la rig sngags 'chang gis myur du
167b2(rgyud 'bum): lan bdun bsngags pa'i seng ldeng gi phur bu sor bzhi pas me'i phyogs kyi gzugs la btab ste/ 'di skad du so dkar bcom mo zhes kyang spras na/ ngu 'bod kyi sgra chen po phyung nas med par 'gyur
167b3(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / me'i phyogs kyi cho ga rdzogs so// / rig sngags 'chang rig sngags sgrub pa na ci ste rlung gi phyogs nas srod la bgegs
167b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi gzugs dga' byung ste/ dngos grub pa la sgrub pa na rlung gi phyogs kyi rgyal po'i g.yog mo so rgom zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de'ang bgegs byed de/ mar me gsod cing lha bshos smre bas 'bags
167b5(rgyud 'bum): par byed do/ / de'i phyir gzhil bar bya ba ni rlung gi phyogs kyi gzugs la lan bdun bsngags pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnun na bgegs rnams med par 'gyur ro// dngos grub chen po sgrub pa na rlung
167b6(rgyud 'bum): gi phyogs kyi rgyal po'i g.yog gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po drug khri'i bdag po zhig yod de/ tshub ma gcig pa zhes bya ba de'ang rig sngags 'chang de la 'jing gi thun la bgegs byed do// tshub ma gcig
167b7(rgyud 'bum): pade'ang 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can yin te/ ched 'ga' ni wa'i gzugs/ ched 'ga' ni stag gi gzugs/ ched 'ga' ni khyu mchog gi gzugs dang / gzugs sna tshogs su bdag
168a1(rgyud 'bum): nyid ston par byed cing / ched 'ga' ni ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin cing skar mda' brgyad gasrung bar byed/ gnam yang grub par byed do// de la rig sngags 'chang gis rlung gi phyogs kyi
168a2(rgyud 'bum): gzugs la lan bdun bsngags pa'i thal bas bsnun na bgegs rnams med par 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po'i sgo dpon ma lcags kyu dkar mo can zhes bya ba mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che la bgegs byed pa chen mo zhig
168a3(rgyud 'bum): yod de/ de'angag sang sngags kyis bzlog par mi nu ya te/ de'i nam gung gi thun la 'ong ngo // de 'ong ba dang dus ma yin pa'i char 'bab cing 'brug kyang di ri ri sgrog/ gnam yang grub par byed de/
168a4(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyu dkar mo can de'ang mdog dkar zhing gzugs kyi lus bstan pas kyang dkyil 'khor 'jig par byed do// de la rig sngags 'chang gis myur du lan bdun bsngags te seng ldeng gi phur bu sor bzhi
168a5(rgyud 'bum): bas rlung gi phyogs kyi gzugs la btab ste/ lcags kyu dkar mo can bcom mo zhes kyang smras na ngu 'bod kyi sgra chen po phyung nas med par 'gyur te/ gsang sngags kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// rlung
168a6(rgyud 'bum): gi phyogs kyi cho ga rdzogs so/ / / rig sngags 'chang rig sngags sgrub pa na chu lha'i phyogs nas bgegs rnams 'byung ste/ dngos grub phal bsgrub na chu lha'i rgyal po'i g.yog
168a7(rgyud 'bum): mo klu mo rgyal ba mo zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ rgyal ba mo de'ang srod la bgegs byed do// thog tu 'ong la khog skam 'dor bar byed cing pha gu 'phen par byed do// de la rig sngags 'chang gis chu'i phyogs
168b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi gzugs la lan bdun bsngags pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnun na med par 'gyur ro/ / rgyal po de'i g.yog klu mo so brtsegs zhes bya ba mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba klu sum khri'i bdag po zhig yod de/ so brtse
168b2(rgyud 'bum): de'ang rig sngags 'chang de la 'jing gi thun la bgegs byed sna tshogs rnam pa mang po byed do/ / so brtsegs de dur khrod du skyes pa thams cad kyi cha lugs dag tu snang zhing / kun tu rgyu dang gcer bu pa lta bu'i
168b3(rgyud 'bum): bgegs kyi cha lugs dag tu snang ste/ de'ang ngu 'bod kyi sgra chen po 'byin cing skar mda' dag kyang 'byin par byed do// de la rig sngags 'chang gis chu lha'i phyogs kyi gzugs la lan bdun bsngags
168b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnun na med par 'gyur ro/ / chu lha'i phyogs kyi rgyal po'i sgo dpon ma mig ser ma zhes bya ba mthu che zhing rdzu 'phrul che ba bgegs chen po byed pa zhig yod de/ de'ang gsang sngags
168b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis bzlog par mi nus te/ rig sngags 'chang de rig sngags sgrub pa na nam gung gi thun la bgegs byed de/ des kyang sgra phyung bas dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jig par byed cing / me'i gzug
168b6(rgyud 'bum): kyis bgegs byed la/ skar mda' stong dag snang bar byed do// de la rig sngags 'chang gis myur du lan bdun bsngags pa'i seng ldeng gi phur bu sor bzhi pas chu lha'i phyogs kyi gzugs la btab
168b7(rgyud 'bum): cing 'di skad du/ mig ser ma 'dug cig ma n+de smras na 'dug cig 'dug cig ces bya ba thos nas bdag ni spa bab bo snyam ste/ ngu 'bod kyi sgra chen po phyung nas med par 'gyur te/ rig sngags kyi
169a1(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub kyang grub par 'gyur ro/ / chu lha'i phyogs kyi cho ga rdzogs so// // de bas 'jam pa'i las 'di bshad de/ rig sngags 'chang rig sngags
169a2(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa na lan bdun bsngags pa'i seng ldeng gi phur bu sor bzhi pa tshon sna lnga'i skud pas dkris pa/ bgegs thams cad kyi gnas su rkang pa g.yon pas mnan na bgegs thams cad bcom pa dang
169a3(rgyud 'bum): rengs par byas par 'gyur ro/ / zhag gsum smyung ba byas te mar gyi nga zhag brgyad dam zhag bcu bzhi la dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su song ste 'byung po'i gtor ma'ang byin la/ rig sngags lan brgyad brgya
169a4(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod byas na bgegs kyi las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ bsams pas bgegs thams cad med par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi cho ga rdzogs so// /
169a5(rgyud 'bum): / de nas 'jig rten phan 'dod pa// thub pa kun dang lnga chen gyis// lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bdar// lhan cig tu ni 'dus par 'gyur// nyi ma bzhin du gzi 'bar zhing // dka' thub rnal 'byor
169a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa yi/ / thub pa rab mchog ldan pa kun// nyin mo bya ba byas nas 'khod// thub pa dag ni thams cad dang // bde byed lha tshogs lha rnams kyis// lag na rdo rje sems dpa' che// 'byung
169a7(rgyud 'bum): po kun dbang rje la zhus/ / 'jig rten dngos grub byed pa yin// bgegs rnams dag ni ga la 'byung // de dag gi ni tshig thos nas// lag na rdo rje grags pa che// dga' bar gyur nas dris pa
169b1(rgyud 'bum): de/ rgyas par yang ni rab bshad de// bgegs rnams ji ltar 'byung 'gyur ba// thub pa dag ni kun gyis nyon// lha rnams la yang lha min rnams// 'thab pa'i phyir ni ldang balhur// sems
169b2(rgyud 'bum): can rnams la bgegs bya'i phyir/ / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung 'gyur// ji ltar lha yis lha min rnams// g.yul du lan brgyar bcom pa dang // brgya byin gyis ni g.yul bcom ltar
169b3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin bgegs rnams bcom par gyur/ / de tshe lha kun dgar gyur nas// 'jig rten grags pa de dag ni// thams cad stobs dang ldan 'gyur zhing // de dag nga rgyal dregs pas rgyas//
169b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten don dang lha rnams kyis// brtson 'grus dang ni mthu bskyed phyir// bde zhing rgya mtsho chen po ni// gshed byed dang ni dbyung ba brtsams// thub pa de dag rmongs pa ste// phan pa
169b5(rgyud 'bum): byas na stobs kyis rgyags/ / nga rgyal 'dis ni 'jig rten nas// ring por mi thogs the tshom med// de nas drang srong lhar bcas rnams// ca co'i sgra ni dbyung bar brtsams// rtsom pa chen po
169b6(rgyud 'bum): skad cig tu/ / 'jig rten du ni grags par 'gyur// de nas lha rnams thub par bcas// khro ba ru ni gyur pa na// lhar bcas drang srong de dag la// lha chen gyis ni tshig smras pa// tshangs
169b7(rgyud 'bum): bcas lha rnams khyed kyi mthus/ / brtsams pa dag ni ma byed cig/ rdo rje 'chang ba dpal ldan 'di// gnod sbyin tshegs kun bdag po ste// gnod sbyin bde bdag zhib po// sems can kun
170a1(rgyud 'bum): la phan par dga'/ / ma rungs 'di dag rlag byed pa// brtsam zhing tshar gcod nus pa yod// de nas lha yi mchog rnams kyis// lag na rdo rje dpal ldan mchog/ sbyor ba
170a2(rgyud 'bum): shes shing sbyor gnas nas/ / dpung chen dag ni rab sprul pa// rgyal po'i blo gros rdo rje'i gdong // rdo rje'i lte ba gdong dkar ma// rdo rje mig ser 'og pag can// rdo rje nag mo pho nya che// dbang
170a3(rgyud 'bum): phyug chen mo gnam ngom/ / drag mo rdo rje seng ge'i khri// shugs ldan ma dang rdo rje can// de bzhin bzhad ma rdo rje can// gtum mo rang gi thugs dang ni// nye ba'i snying po las kun byed// 'byung
170a4(rgyud 'bum): po srin po pho nya mo/ / rnam pa sna tshogs ming grags pa// ma rungs gdon rnams bzlog pa dang // bgegs rnams brlag phyir sprul par gyur// de nas dpung de dgar gyur nas// dpal gyis
170a5(rgyud 'bum): su ni 'khyud pa bzhin/ / lag na rdo rje'i pho nyad// kun nas bskor cing 'khod par gyur// de nas rab 'bar mi bzad cing // 'byung po thams cad rlag byed cing // lag na rdo rje'i rdo rje de//
170a6(rgyud 'bum): phyogs brgyad dag tu 'phros par gyur// de nas stobs chen brtson chen mo// pho nya mo dag song bar gyur// de nas skra ga nas gdon de dag/ thams cad brdungs te sems sbyor cing // rdo rje nag
170a7(rgyud 'bum): mos 'jig gzi rabs/ / bskyabs kyang rnyed par mgyur te// rdo rje sgrogs kyis 'pham byas shong // rdo rje can gyi yul du bcom// de nas de dag yid kyis su// de bzhin gshegs la rgyas
170b1(rgyud 'bum): su song / / dkon mchog gsum gyis mdzes byas shing // thams cad dge la nges par gyur// de nas me ni 'dra ba de// rdo rje lta bu'i mtshon thogs pa// zhi nas rdo rje la sogs tshogs// yid mazhi la
170b2(rgyud 'bum): yang smras pa/ / kye kye tshogs rnams zhi bar gyis// skal ba che rnams ldog par gyis// gdon kun dge la nges byas shing // zhi bar gyur gyis ma gzhom zhig/ lag na rdo rje lhas bsten pa'i//
170b3(rgyud 'bum): thazad du yang na khrid par gyis// mi bzad tshegs kyis de mnyan nas// gdon rnams de dag thams cad ni// rnal 'byor bstan bcos mthus btul nas// lag na rdo rje'i thang du khrid// bcom
170b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan rdo rje ldan pa des/ / mthong nas ci ste gson 'dod na// rig pa'i mchog la phyag byos la// phyag rgya mthong nas bstan la gnos// gnas nas mi rnams thong zhig ces// gdon rnams la ni
170b5(rgyud 'bum): pagad de smras/ / de skad smras nas gdon de dag/ kun gyis de tshe bstan smras pa// khyod kyi las 'di mchog yin te// gzhan gyis mi thub drag cing dge/ mnga' bdag khyod kyis bka' stsal pa//
170b6(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du ni bgyi bar 'tshal// sangs rgyas la ni skyabs su mchi// chos dang dge 'dun de bzhin te// zhi la ma rungs 'dul ba po// khyod la rtag tu skyabs su mchi// sems can kun la phan
170b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir/ / stobs chen gyis ni skyes pa legs// bdag cag gi ni 'tshe ba yi// thabs kyi phyir yang bka' stsol cig/ de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // ba gang nas tshogs la spras pa ni/
171a1(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyis blang bar bya ba dang // mi blang ba yang bstan par bya// gang dag rtag tu brdzun smras dang // drin du mi gzo gtsang sbrar med// byang chub sems ni rab nyams pa/
171a2(rgyud 'bum): bo de dag rtag tu long // nya dang sha sogs za ba dang // mi bya ba dag byed pa gang // rkang pas phyag rgya rdzi byed pa// skye bo de dag blang bar bgyi// ci ste gson par 'dod na ni// gang dag bden pa'i
171a3(rgyud 'bum): tshig smra dang / / drin du gzo zhing nges par gnas// srog gi phyir yang byang chub sems// gtong bar mi byed rab bsdams dang // rtag tung la dad pa dang // de bzhin rigs mchog rigs la
171a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / gang rnams kyi ni khyim dag tu// rigs rgyal dam pa rtag mchod dang // nga rig pa yi rgyal po mchog/ sgrub pa dang ni bzlas brjod byed// de dag la ni zhi bar gyis// yi ge bzhi pa
171a5(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya yi/ / rdo rje don yod chen po des// gdon gang ngal dang mi 'dzin// de yi spyi bo 'gems par byed// rtag tu dang rigs mchog la// de bzhin dad pa lhur byed dang // dam tshig shes pa
171a6(rgyud 'bum): gang yin de/ / khyed kyis rtag tu mchod pa gyis// lag na rdo rje'i tshig 'di dag/ thos nas kyang ni log 'dren rnams// dga' zhing ca tse'i sgra byin nas// skad cig gis ni mi snang 'gyur// rig
171a7(rgyud 'bum): pa mchog gi rgyud phyi ma las log 'dren 'byung po rdzogs so/ / // las 'di ni dam par 'gyur ba dang / drag cing don yod la gzhan gyis mi thub cing dge ba yin te/ dngos
171b1(rgyud 'bum): grub sgrub pa'i tshe dud pa med pa'i mdab ma la rig sngags kyi rgyal pos til nag po'i sbyin sreg lan brgyad brgya byas na bgegs thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / las 'di dag ni mchog yin te/
171b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten rnams kyi dngos grub phyir// reg mchog mgo bor bzhag na ni// spyan rnams dngos grub ston par 'gyur// sangs rgyas yul dang chos spyan la// gang zhig phyag 'tshal de la
171b3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ bcom ldan gsungs pa'i las la sogs// lag na rdo rjes bshad pa yi// cho ga 'di dang rdo rje'i rigs// de dag thams cad 'grub 'gyur te// yul yang yid la bzhag nas ni//
171b4(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya// las 'di dag kyang byas nas ni// dngos grub mchog 'gyur shes par bya// gang gis nyin mo yang rung ste// zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ lag na rdo rje'i
171b5(rgyud 'bum): mdun du dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa phul nas pa ser mo'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas lha mo'i gzugs byas te/ lag pa g.yas par rdo rje thogs par bya// de'i 'og logs su sgrub pa
171b6(rgyud 'bum): po snyim pa bzed cing 'dug par bya'o/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yid la bsams te/ rig sngags brjod nas ci ste gzugs 'gul bar 'gyur na de ma thag tu las 'grub cing /
171b7(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags kyang bde brag tu 'grub ste/ bgegs thams cad kyang bsams pa tsam gyis 'jigs par 'gyur ro// yang na sgrub pa po'i lag tu rdo rje byin na sa'i bdag por 'gyur ro// yang
172a1(rgyud 'bum): na bcom ldan 'das ma las 'od zer 'byung ste/ 'od zer des phog par gyur na ni rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur zhing / glang po che'i stobs dang ldan la skra ldang lo 'khyil ba dang /
172a2(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma shar ba'i kha dog can du 'gyur zhing lag tu ral gri 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de thogs na rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi sod la sgyu 'phrul dag kyang byed par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe gnyid kyis
172a3(rgyud 'bum): log pa de na ral gri de dpag tshad gcig tsam nas mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du kun nas 'khor bar byed cing sad pa na shugs su 'gro ste/ tshe lo khri bzhi stong thub cing nam 'chi ba de'i tshe bde ba can du skye
172a4(rgyud 'bum): pabapar 'gyur ro/ / las de byas te dngos grub kyi mchog bsgrubs na cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub sbyin par byed de mas bul bya ba bzhin no// dngos grub sgrub pa'i phyir dbang phyug chen po mdor bstan te/
172a5(rgyud 'bum): del 'do ni cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub mchog sgrub pa bstan pa ste/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du byang chub kyi shing gis me sbar la yungs mar dang sbyar bas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na khru do'am khru gsum
172a6(rgyud 'bum): tsam du dud pa'i 'khri shing 'byung ste/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rig sngags kyi rigs 'grub pa dang / cho ga rgyas par 'grub par shes par bya ste/ de nas las brtsam par bya'o// yid la
172a7(rgyud 'bum): bsams te phur bu gsum pas bshad pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bsgrub par bya'o// rna bar gshibs te bzlas brjod byas na dngos grub kyi mchog ston par 'gyur te/
172b1(rgyud 'bum): nub kar lag na rdo rje la mchod pa byas la/ lag na rdo rje'i rna ba g.yas par rig sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/ ci ste rmi lam du bram ze mthong na las 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'dreg
172b2(rgyud 'bum): mkhan mthong na ni 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ de la lta zhing las bsgrub par bya'o// ri mo'i gzugs gang gis mthong ba des ni rdo rje'i rigs mthong ba yin no// rdo rje'i rigs mthong na las 'byung
172b3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / las byung na dngos grub kyi mchog thob par 'gyur te/ ras ma nyams pa la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong dang ldan pas tshon rtsi sprin med pas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs gser gyi kha dog
172b4(rgyud 'bum): can chos ston pa'i tshul du 'drir gzhug go/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yas logs su lha mo gser gyi kha dog can chos nyan pa bri'o// de'i 'og logs su lag na rdo rje'i mdog sngo bsangs la rgyan tham
172b5(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis brgyan pa chos nyan par bri'o/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yon logs su dbang phyug chen po mda' chu'i mdog can thor tsugs dang con phan thogs par bri'o// de'i g.yon logs su
172b6(rgyud 'bum): phur bu gsum pa ma tang gi cha lugs can chos can pa'i tshul du bri/ de'i 'og logs su dbang phyug chen po'angam bu mda' chu'i kha dog can thor tsugs 'chang ba'i mgo la zla ba'i mtshan ma yod la mig
172b7(rgyud 'bum): gsum dang ldan par bri'o/ / de'i drung du ma tang gi rgyal po phur ba gsum pa mdog sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ma tang gi cha lugs su bri'o// de'i 'og legs su 'jig rten sbeng
173a1(rgyud 'bum): ba bzhi kha dog tha dad pa dang / rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa chos nyan pa'i tshul du bri'o// lag na rdo rje'i logs su rdo rje sde dang gtsug nas byung rtse zhing 'dug par bri ste/ rdo rje sden
173a2(rgyud 'bum): gser gyi mdog can la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o/ / gtsug nas byung gi mdog dmar la mig gsum yod pa glang po che'i pags pa'i smad g.yogs can/ klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyis ser
173a3(rgyud 'bum): ral khar thogs la/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya'o// khyad par du rdo rje sde'i drung du rdo rje khro bo 'bar la log 'dren rnams 'joms shing 'thor bar bri'o// rig pa'i mchog 'dod dgur
173a4(rgyud 'bum): bskur ba'i gzugs can lan cig mthong ba tsam gyis ji shes patsam du gsal ba la kun rdo rje'i kha nas 'byung bar bri'o/ / gzugs de mthong na sngon gyi sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyu
173a5(rgyud 'bum): te/ log 'dren rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs so// gang ri mo'i gzugs 'di sgrub pa des ni dngos grub kyi mchog nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro// sgrub par 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gis
173a6(rgyud 'bum): zhag gsum smyung ba byas te zla ba nya la ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa rgyas par byas nas gsang sngags snga ma dag gis las rnams bya'o/ / 'o mas bkang ba'i snod bzhi dang / zhos bkang ba
173a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhi dang / de bzhin du btung ba dang sbyar thug gis bkang ba bzhi bzhi dbul zhing 'byung po'i gtor ma'ang sbyin no// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dngos grub kyi mtshan ma byung gi bar du
173b1(rgyud 'bum): nam phyed kyi dus su me tog dri zhim po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod lan re re sbyar zhing / bcom ldan 'das ma sangs rgyas kyi yum la bsnun na ri mo'i gzugs 'gul ba dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba
173b2(rgyud 'bum): g.yo ba dang / lha mo las 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur te/ ri mo'i gzugs 'gul na ni dbab pa'i las dang / zhi ba dang / rgyas pa'i cho ga 'grub par 'gyur ro// me tog gi 'phreng ba g.yon
173b3(rgyud 'bum): ni dbab pa'i rig sngags kyi cho ga 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / 'od zer byung na ni cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur te/ sgrub par gyur na rdo rje'i rigs thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//
173b4(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi dpal chen mo'i rig sngags kyi cho ga rgyas pa lhag ma dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// ci ste dbang phyug chen po'i cho ga rgyas pasgrub par 'dod na rig snga ga
173b5(rgyud 'bum): 'chang des me tog dmar po stong rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod lan re re dang sbyar te/ dbang phyug chen po la bsdun na de'i yang dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te/ dbang phyug chen po'i cho ga rgyas
173b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'ang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / ci ste phur bu gsum pa'i cho ga rgyas par sgrub par 'dod na rig sngagra 'chang des me tog nag po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod lan re dang sbyar te/ phur bu gsum pa'i
173b7(rgyud 'bum): rimo la bsdun na de'ang dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te/ phur bu gsum pas byas pa'i mthang gi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// sems can rnams la phan pa'i
174a1(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ cho ga 'di ni bdag gis bshad// khyed rnams yid ni dga' bzhin pas// dngos grub dam pa sbyin par gyis// gang sangs rgyas kyi yum dran pa tsam gyis 'ong
174a2(rgyud 'bum): bar mi byed na/ dngos grub kyang sbyin par mi byed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la snying rings pa yin te/ ngas kyang rdo rjes spyi bo dgas par bya'o// gang cho ga rgyas pa 'di 'chang ba de la gdon thams
174a3(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / log 'dren thams cad dang / sha za thams cad kyang 'byer zhing skrag par 'gyur ro// gang zhig cho ga 'dis mchod pa// de la lha mchog rnams kyis mchod// gang zhig dngos grub
174a4(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa la/ / de yis cho ga lha mchod bya// gang zhig cho ga 'di mchod dang // thams cad rdzogs par mchod byed pa// de yi lag na rdo rje yis// bshad pa bzhin du nges par 'grub// gang zhig
174a5(rgyud 'bum): cho ga 'di 'chang ba/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// lag na rdo rje dpal ldan pa// de yi lus kyi spyi bor gnas// yi ge bzhi pa zhes bya ba rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i cho ga rdzogs so//
174a6(rgyud 'bum): / de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo
174a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// skye bo phyi ma rnams dang / sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyi slad du rig sngags kyi rgyal po dang / lha thams
174b1(rgyud 'bum): cad gi cho ga phyi ma rgyas par bshad par 'tshal na/ de bzhin gshegs pas gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
174b2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ rdo rje 'dzin rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i las phyi ma rnams shod cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po la bsams nas las phyi ma rnams bshad do// de nas
174b3(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags kyi rgyal po mchog gi las 'byung ste/ dgon pa'am/ ri'i rtse mo 'am/ dben pa'i phyogs su skyang nul bya ste// thab dbyibs gru bzhir byas la lha bshos su zho dbul bar bya'o// g.yog
174b4(rgyud 'bum): byed pa rnams la zho brud do/ / yang na ngos kun tu khru bcu pa'i dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs te/ der me sbar la shar phyogs su kha bltas te 'dug nas be kang ka ta'i yam sreg shing srid du khru gang
174b5(rgyud 'bum): sboms su chang par 'khyud pa/ 'phan med pa stong rtsa brgyad zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyi nang du bsnyugs te dus gsum du sbyin sreg bya'o// zas su phye dang 'o ma'i 'dag gu'ar/ srong mo'i zas
174b6(rgyud 'bum): bza' zhing las byas te/ mi smra bar 'dug cing dus gsum du khrus bya'o// khang pa'i shar phyogs kyi glor grog mkhar gyi sa las lag na rdo rje'i stegs bu khri'aphang can byas la dri dang / me tog dang /
174b7(rgyud 'bum): bdug pa dang / lha bshos dbul zhing po nya mo'i sngags thams cad kyi las byas shing ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas nas/ rig sngags 'chang gis bcom ldan 'das ma'i sngags kyis btab par
175a1(rgyud 'bum): chus khazas bsang gtor byas te bza' bar bya'o/ / ci dga' ba'i 'dod pa'ang gsol bar bya'o// sbyin sreg de'ang zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du bya'o// de nas bcom
175a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das lag na rdo rje me tha ba de'i nang nas byung ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa 'am rdo rje sgrol bar mdzad de/ rdo rje de lag na thogs pas lag na rdo rje dang mthu stobs mnyam par 'gyur te/ thams
175a3(rgyud 'bum): cad du'ang thogs pa med par 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ / mig btsums pa'i yud tsam gyis kyang 'og min gyi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur zhing bskal par gnas par 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyang
175a4(rgyud 'bum): des bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang la cho ga rgyas pa'i dngos grub kyang sbyin par mdzad de/ cho ga rgyas par bsgrubs na las thams cad rdo rje bsgyur ba tsam gyis 'grub pa dang byed
175a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur te bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro/ / dbang du bya na gtsang sbrar byas te mchod rten la me tog dang / dri dang / bdug pa phul zhing / bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje la'ang mchod par byas la/
175a6(rgyud 'bum): de'i mdun du dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs nas zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du me tog dkar po snyim par bcug ste ming nas smos shing / lan stong rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas
175a7(rgyud 'bum): la phyogs mtshams ma nor bar mchod rten la bor na dbang du 'gyur ro/ / gter dang lha ma yin gyi phug gang na yod par yungs kar gyis bsnun na lha ma yin gyi phug 'khrul 'khor tshogs par
175b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhing / gter gyi 'khor thams cad choms par 'gyur te phyin par yang 'gyur ro// thams cad du skud pas bsrung bar bya'o// gter dang lha ma yin gyi phug gi gnas sgrub pa thams cad la
175b2(rgyud 'bum): bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad med par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs te/ zhag gcig smyung
175b3(rgyud 'bum): ba byas nas nim pa'i shing dang arka'i bud shing gis me sbar nas yungs kar dang lan tshwa yungs mar gyis bsgos pa'am/ yang na mar dang 'bras yos kyis lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bya ste/ sangs
175b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la me tog dri zhim po dang / bdug pa dang / lha bshos dbul zhing lag na rdo rje la'ang mchod pa byas nas de'i 'og tu las brtsam par bya'o// de nas mi'i gtso bo dbang du
175b5(rgyud 'bum): bya bar 'dod na 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs la zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du dri dang / me tog dang / lha bshos phul nas byang chub kyi shing gi
175b6(rgyud 'bum): bud shing gis me sba ral 'bras yos kyi'o thug gis sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad byas na dbang du 'gyur te/ ji skad smras pa bzhin byed cing nor sbyin par 'gyur ro// bram ze dbang du bya
175b7(rgyud 'bum): na cho ga de nyid kyis til gyi sbyin sreg brgya stong bya'o/ / rgyal rigs la ni nas kyi sbyin sreg bya'o// rje'u rigs la ni nas dang lan tshwa'i sbyin sreg bya'o// dmangs rigs la ni sbyar thug gi
176a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg bya'o/ / yugs sa mo dbang du bya na yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg bya'o// bu mo dbang du bya na yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg bya'o// 'di dag la'ang de bzhin du dri dang /
176a2(rgyud 'bum): me tog dang / lha bshos dbul zhing sbyin sreg lan stong stong byas na dbang du 'gyur te za gcig par bya'o// dgra phung bar byan mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi'am mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/
176a3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa skyang nul gyis byugs nas seng ldeng gi bud shing gis me sbar la ske tshe'i sbyin sreg lan brgya stong byas na de ma thag tu med par 'gyur ro// dgra gsad na zhag bdun gyi bar du dus
176a4(rgyud 'bum): gsum du dug dang khrag gi sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad byas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ / gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin mo dbang du bya na/ gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin mo phyogs gang na gnas pa der mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad
176a5(rgyud 'bum): la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs nas dri dang / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / mar me phul te mngar gsum gyi lha bshos kyang dbul lo// de nas a sho
176a6(rgyud 'bum): ka'i bud shing gis me sbyar la/ a sho ka'i me tog brgyad skyong gi sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gang zhig gis rdo rje'i rigs gtso bo mchog gi ming tsam 'dzin pa de la'ang lnga
176a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis zil gyis mnan par mi nus na/ gang mdo nyid 'chang ba lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ de nas 'jigs pa thams cad la ni skud pa la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pas bsrung
176b1(rgyud 'bum): pab byas par 'gyur ro/ / dug go cog la ni chu'am rma bya'i mdongs kyis byabs na med par 'gyur ro// zhag gcig spung ba byas te nyi ma bzang ba la 'bab chu'i 'gram du song ste me tog brgyad stong
176b2(rgyud 'bum): phul na/ me tog gi kha dog ji lta bu phul ba de lta bu'i gos rnams zhag bdun tshun chad kyis thob par 'gyur ro// gzhon nu'i gdon gyis byis pa zin pa la ni dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs
176b3(rgyud 'bum): bal dri dang / me tog dang / lha bshos phul nas byis pa shar phyogs su kha bstan te bzhag la bdug pas bdugs te byab pa'ang byas nas/ lag pa la'ang skud pa btags na sos par
176b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags bsgrub pa thams cad dang / ro langs bsgrub pa dang / bdag nyid bsrung ba dang / phyogs btsong ba dang / pha rol bsrung ba dang / mtshams gcad pa dang /
176b5(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub pa thams cad la rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gcig pus bya'o// char dbab par 'dod na chu klung gi sar 'gram gnyis ka'i sas rdo rje byas la mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba
176b6(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ chu klung rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i 'gram du song la/ sa de lta bu la nor rgyas kyi bu'i gzugs byas te/ de la dri dmar po dang / me tog dmar po dang / bdug pa dang / mar me phul nas/
176b7(rgyud 'bum): de'i mdun du rdo rje la lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas te/ bzlas brjod zin na dus ma yin par char 'bab par 'gyur ro// gcad na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lag na rdo rje la phul ba'i me tog rnying
177a1(rgyud 'bum): ba brgyad brgyas sbyin sreg byas na 'chad par 'gyur ro/ / bar gyi ngo gag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te cha shug dang ban da ka'i shing blangs la/ mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad
177a2(rgyud 'bum): la zhag gcig smyung ba byas nas dur khrod du song la dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs te/ dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa phul nas nam dro bar gyur gyi bar du rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan stong rtsa
177a3(rgyud 'bum): brgyad rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na 'grub par 'gyur te/ grub nas de 'chang na rgyal po la bzhag na gzhan gyis mi thub par 'gyur te ci rnyed pa'ang 'phral du zad par 'gyur ro// ri bong gi khrag
177a4(rgyud 'bum): dang mig gnyis dang / de bzhin du sbal pa'i mig gnyis dang / ri dgas kr-iSh+Na sa le'i mig gnyis blangs nas skar ma rgyal dang sbyar zhing zhag gcig smyung ba byas te btags la/ lag na rdo
177a5(rgyud 'bum): rje'i mdun du til gyi lo ma'i bar du bzhag nas dro bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod byas na grub par 'gyur te/ rkang pas mgyogs pa'i sman du 'gyur ro// des maugal bsdus na lo bcu drug lon
177a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i na tshod dang ldan par 'gyur ning gter thams cad mthong ste/ tshe lo lnga brgya thub par 'gyur la/ tshan po che'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig spyang ba
177a7(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ dur khrod du song la dkyil 'khor skyang nul du byugs nas/ de'i dbus su 'bras phye las mi'i gzugs byas te/ de la gtor ma rgyas pa dang / dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa'ang
177b1(rgyud 'bum): byin la tA la'i lo ma'i spu gri swa la sogs pa breg pa ltar bya/ / de'i g.yas logs su mo'i thod pa dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pas brgyan te bzhag la thod pa'i steng du 'dug pa bzhin du rig sdug
177b2(rgyud 'bum): 'chang gis rig sngags kyi rgyal po la lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te/ de nas thod pa blangs te dur khrod kyi mes bsregs na thod pa chag pa de'i dum grugs blangs te gzugs byas te/
177b3(rgyud 'bum): de'i lte ba'i steng du bzhag ste lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas thod pa'i dum grugs blangs te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du btags la lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas pas lus
177b4(rgyud 'bum): bslus na 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can du 'gyur te/ gang dri mi zhim pa de dag kyang dri zhim par byed cing chu klung gyen du 'bab par byed la/ tshe lo bdun brgya thub par 'gyur te srung ba'i
177b5(rgyud 'bum): cho ga byed pas bya'o/ / chu srin nag bkra dang sbal pa'i tshal blangs la til mar dung sbyar te/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bzlas brjod byas nas til mar des gdong bslus na chu'i nang
177b6(rgyud 'bum): du zla ba drug gi bar du 'dug nus par 'gyur ro/ / mig sman sgrub par 'dod na chos grangs dang rgyu skar yang bdam mi dgos/ sbyang ba bya mi dgos par phag gi mig gnyis dang / glang po
177b7(rgyud 'bum): che'i mig gnyis dang / lig bu mig dang / pha wang long bu dang / stang zil dang / bu tan dzin pa dang / 'di rnams blangs nas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/
178a1(rgyud 'bum): lagan rdo rje'i mdun du dri dang / me togadung / bdug pa phul nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te/ des mig bzlas na lus la nad yod pa nam
178a2(rgyud 'bum): med par 'gyur ro/ / mi gdon gyis zin pa'ang gdon gyis de mthong bar 'gyur te/ mthong nas 'bros par 'gyur ro// klu dbang du byan ba lang gi lhas sam kun dga'i ra bar dkyil 'khor srung
178a3(rgyud 'bum): nul du byugs la sid d+ya'i shing gis me sbar te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal pos sna ma'i me tog brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// de nas las de 'grub par 'gyur te/
178a4(rgyud 'bum): klu mthong na tshur shog ces brjod na/ sa'i steng na gnas pa'i klu'am klu'i bu mo rnams 'ongs te/ yid la bsams pa rtsam gyis thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur ro// sgrub pa thams cad la rgyal po
178a5(rgyud 'bum): chen po bzhi rnams shes par bya ba'i las 'di byas na bgegs thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang gis sgrub par 'dod na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du so ma ra dza'i khu bas log 'dren gyi
178a6(rgyud 'bum): gdong bris la/ de'i steng du seng ldeng gi shing gis me sbar te/ le brgan rtsi'i me tog rgya skyegs kyi khu bas kha dog bsgyur ba brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na bgegs thams cad bcom zhing btags
178a7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / de phyin chad sgrub pa rnams ci 'dod pa bzhin 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang zhig so ma ra dza'i khu bas log 'dren gyi gdong brin yang sgrub pa thams cad la bgegs med par 'gyur
178b1(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / gtum po nub phyogs su kha bstan pa'i mdun du mar gyi ngo nag dgul zhag gcig smyung ba byas te bachod pa rgyas par byas nas dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa phul na be kang ka'i bud shing gis me
178b2(rgyud 'bum): s+phar te 'bras las byas pa'i khu ba lan brgya stong blangs nas sbyin sreg byas na/ / lha mo'i dpral ba nas 'od zer 'byung ste/ de nas 'grub par 'gyur ro// grub nas kyang ti na ra lnga brgya'am/ yang
178b3(rgyud 'bum): nalongs spyod kyi gzhi sbyin par 'gyur ro/ / dgral gtse bar 'dod na mar gyi ngo nag lnga la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ dur khrod du song la 'bras phye las gzugs byas nas seng ldeng gi phur bu dug gi
178b4(rgyud 'bum): dud pas bdugs pas tshigs rnams su btabra la/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas na dgra'i yan lag thams cad du zug par 'gyur ro// phyung ste 'o mas bkrus na
178b5(rgyud 'bum): sos par 'gyur ro/ / dpyid zla 'bring po'i tshes gsum la 'dod pa'i gzugs byas la/ de'i mdun du seng ldeng gi phur bu sor bzhi pa bzhag ste zhag gcig smyung ba byas la mchod pa byas te/ rig
178b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi rgyal po lan brgyad steng bzlas brjod byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / de nas sred med kyi bu'i chung ma la phul ba'i ras bal gyi 'dab ma rgya skyegs kyi khu bas kha dog bsgyur ba dug gis bsgos
178b7(rgyud 'bum): pas mo mtshan gyi gzugs byas te/ bud med kyi ming nas smos shing phur bu des phug na bud med kyi mo mtshan na zhing khrag 'dzag par 'gyur te/ phyung na sos par 'gyur ro// sdigs bu'i skad ngam/
179a1(rgyud 'bum): lce spyang gi skad dam/ wa'i skad shes par 'dod na dur khrod dam/ khyim gtsang ma 'am/ lha khang du yar gyi ngo tshes dgu la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ dkyil 'khor skyang nul
179a2(rgyud 'bum): gyis byugs la/ lag na rdo rje'i gzugs bzhag nas/ de'i g.yas phyogs su lha chen po bzhag ste/ lha chen po'i mdun du 'bras phye las sdigs bu'i gzugs sam/ lce spyang gi gzugs sam/
179a3(rgyud 'bum): wa'i gzugs byas la bzhag nas// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje la mchod pa byas la/ lha chen po la'ang lha bshos ci 'byor pa phul nas smigs bu la 'bras chan zho dang sbyar ba sbyin no// lce spyang la ni
179a4(rgyud 'bum): shasbyin no/ / khrelan tso'i rnyed pastan no// de nas rig sngags 'chung gis yi la bsams te sngags kyi rgyal po 'bras brjod byas na/ tsi ste snyigs su med la bas mis nan rdzogs pa
179a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / lce spyang yid la bsams na ni lce spyang smra bar 'gyur ro// khwa yid la bsams na ni khwa smra bar 'gyur ro// yang na de dag thams cad yid la bsams na thams cad smra bar 'gyur
179a6(rgyud 'bum): te/ spras na 'grub par 'gyur ro// grub nas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling na yod pa'i don thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// nam mchi ba'ang ston par 'gyur ro// nor yang ston par 'gyur ro// rig
179a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags gang zhig las 'grub par mi byed na rig sngags de'i ming nas smos shing / lag na rdo rje'i mdun du u dum ba ra'i yam sreg shing brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na/ rig sngags mthu dang
179b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan par 'gyur zhing dngos grub kyang myur du sbyin par byed do/ / 'byung po dbang du bya bar 'dod na zhag gsum smyung ba byas te mar gyi ngo nag brgyad la dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs nas/ de'i
179b2(rgyud 'bum): dbus su tshon rtsi sna gsum gyi phye mas lag na rdo rje'i gzugs byas twa/ de'i g.yas phyogs su 'byung po'i bdag po gzhag go/ de nas lag na rdo rje la mchod pa bya ste/ 'byung po'i bdag po la
179b3(rgyud 'bum): lha bshos rgyas par dbul zhing 'byung po'i kha zas kyang sbyin par bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan drang bar byas la rig sngags kyi rgyal po dang bcas te/ lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas nas
179b4(rgyud 'bum): ba ru ra'i shing gis me sbar la/ ba ru ra'i sa bon nye ba'i snying pos lan brgyad brgya sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas 'byung po'i bu nag po zhes bya ba 'ong bar 'gyur te/ 'ongs nas ci bya zhes zer ba dang /
179b5(rgyud 'bum): des yid la ci dang ci bsams pa thams cad gyis shig ces smros shig/ de nas de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas mi snang bar gyur te bsams pa tsam gyis dpag tshad brgyar yang 'gro zhing de bzhin du
179b6(rgyud 'bum): phyir yang 'ong ngo / / dpag tshad brgya nas bud med khrid de 'ong zhing phyir yang sbrel lo// kun dga' ra ba dang / skyed mos tshal dang / khang khyim dang / mal stan dag kyang sprul par byed do//
179b7(rgyud 'bum): g.yog kyang byed par 'gyur ro// bza' ba dang / gzhib pa dang / bldag pa dang / btung ba la sogs pa'ang sprul par byed do// tshe lo sum brgya thub par 'gyur te/ lus
180a1(rgyud 'bum): zhig na lcang lo can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / zhag gsum smyung ba byas te mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la ma mo'i nang du song nas mchod pa rgyas par bya ste/ gtor ma'ang rgyas par byas
180a2(rgyud 'bum): nas bcom ldan 'das mas bsrung ba bya zhing po nya mo rnams kyis las thams cad byas la mar me gnyis sbar te/ stang zil ba so'i gabartse'i nang du bcug nas ma mo'i gtso mo'i mdun du pus mo
180a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis btsugs te 'dug la lag pa g.yon pas mnan te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas na/ de nas dngos grub kyi mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dro ba dang /
180a4(rgyud 'bum): dud pa 'thul pa dang / 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de la 'bar ba ni nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / nyi ma shar ba'i kha dog dang ldan te lo bcu drug lon pa'i sha tshugs can du 'gyur la/ rig
180a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi sod par 'gyur ro/ / dud pa' thul na ni lus mi snang bar 'gyur zhing / rig sngags 'chang gi rigs me tog ces bya ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rigs
180a6(rgyud 'bum): dri zhes bya ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gi rigs yi dgas zhes bya ba'i rig sngags thams cad kyang shes par 'gyur ro// de la rig sngags 'chang gi rigs me tog ces bya ba de dag ni gnod sbyin
180a7(rgyud 'bum): mo rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de tshe lo stong thub la rig sngags 'chang dri zhes bya ba rnams kyis mi tshugs shing dbang yang mi byed do/ / rig sngags 'chang gi rigs dri
180b1(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba de dag ni rgyal po'i btsun mo dag dang / ded dpon chen po'i rigs rnams dang / khyim bdag khyim chen po'i rigs rnams kyi bud med gang yin pa de dag dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la
180b2(rgyud 'bum): dga' mgur spyod de cho lo lnga brgya thub bo/ / de dag kyang rig sngags 'chang me tog ces bya ba rnams kyis mi tshugs so// rig sngags 'chang gi rigs yi dgas zhes bya ba de dag ni mi 'dod do// de
180b3(rgyud 'bum): dag gi yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen po'i bu mo 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag dang lhan cig tu rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod de tshe lo sum brgya thub bo// de la me tog gi rigs rnams ni me tog gi ming
180b4(rgyud 'bum): gis dgug par bya'o/ / dri'i rigs rnams ni dri'i ming rnams kyis dgug par bya'o// yi dgas kyi rigs rnams ni yi dgas kyi ming gis dgug par bya'o// de bkug na skrag ste drung du
180b5(rgyud 'bum): 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mnga' bdag tu gyur te/ ming smos pa tsam gyis kyang rig sngags 'chang rnams skrag par 'gyur ro// gang zhig rgyud phyi ma mtha' dgra
180b6(rgyud 'bum): chub par byed pa la ni rig sngags kyi lha thams cad dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lagran rdo rje'ang phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur te/ lha thams cad kyang sems rangs par 'gyur la/ dngos
180b7(rgyud 'bum): grub kyang bde blag tu 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / cho ga rgyas ba rlung phyi ma dang bcas pa lag na rdo rje dang / lha chen pos gang bshad pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bstod cing bsngags te/ de
181a1(rgyud 'bum): la lha thams cad sems dga' nas dngos grub sbyin par byed do/ / rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa'i snying po brgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das
181a2(rgyud 'bum): ma mchog la drug tu skul ba byed pa gang yin pa de'i snying po chen po rig po mchog gi snying po la drag tu skul bar byed pa'ang ngas bshad zin to/ / rig sngags mchog la drag shul can pha rol
181a3(rgyud 'bum): gnon pa gang yin pa de dag la drag shul skul bar byed pa de nyid kyi snying po'angangs bshad zin te/ 'di ni dngos grub gnyis ka sbyin par byed pa yin pas na/ des ni lha rnams kyang de bzhin
181a4(rgyud 'bum): du yid skyod par byed do/ / nye ba'i snying po bshad pa na lha'i tshogs 'khod pa gang yin pa de dag skrag cing 'jigs par 'gyur te/ de dag bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje la mgo bos phyag
181a5(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal nas 'khod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes/ lha dag la bka' stsal pa/ lha dag rig sngags bshad par byas re zhig 'khod la snying po mchog gi las rnams
181a6(rgyud 'bum): nyon cig/ de nas snying po'i las rnams 'byung ste/ bsrung ba ni lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i thal bas bya'o// mtshams gcad pa ni lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i phur
181a7(rgyud 'bum): bus bya'o/ / bskrad pa ni sgras bya'o// kum bi ri kha bcing bar bya ba ni lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i gseg mas bya'o// las thams cad dang bsgrub pa thams cad la'ang reg
181b1(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po sbyar bar bya'o/ / sgrub pa'i tshe bgegs bsal ba ni me sbyar la/ yungs kar bdag gi khrag gis bsgos pas lan brgyad brgya sbyin sreg byas na bgegs thams
181b2(rgyud 'bum): cad choms par 'gyur ro/ / bgegs thams cad rengs par byan tsam pa ka'i sa bon la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas bya'o// ro langs rengs par bya na lan gsum bzlas
181b3(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas pa'i yungs kar gyis bya'o/ / ro langs bsgrub pa thams cad dang / bgegs rengs par bya ba thams cad la ni snying pos bya'o// bdag dang grogs rnams bsrung ba ni
181b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das mas bya'o/ / mtshams gcad pa ni rig sngags kyi rgyal pos bya ste/ rtsa ba'i las rnams la'ang sbyar ro// phyi ma'i las rnams ni bcom ldan 'das ma yum gyis
181b5(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po'i las rnams bsgrub pa ni snying pos bya/ phyi ma'i las gzhan rnams rig sngags kyi rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das mas bya'o// rig
181b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi rgyal po la ni bcom ldan 'das ma yum gyis bya'o/ / nye ba'i snying po la ni sdong po 'am/ yum mam/ rig sngags kyi rgyal pos bya'o// po nya'i gsang sngags rgyud
181b7(rgyud 'bum): phyi ma dang bcas pa thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das mas sbyar bar bya'o/ / nor 'dod na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa rgyas par
182a1(rgyud 'bum): byas la smra ba'i shing gis me sbar nas 'bras dmar po la rdo rje byas te/ mar gyi nang du bsgrags pa stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dngos grub kyi mtshan mar me tog gi
182a2(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba'igul bar 'gyur ro/ / grub nas kyang tI na ra lnga brgya'am/ yang na yul sbyin par byed do// skyes pa dbang du bya na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ lha chen po'i gnas
182a3(rgyud 'bum): su song ste gzugs kyi g.yas logs sa su arka'i shing gis me sbar nas/ zhag gsum gyi bar du seng ldeng gi yam sreg shing skud pas dkris pa stong rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na skyes
182a4(rgyud 'bum): ba dbang du 'gyur ro/ / mi'i gtso bo dbang du bya bar 'dod na yar gyi ngo tshos brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ grog mkhar gyi phung po gcig 'dug par song nas/ de'i steng du me tog dang /
182a5(rgyud 'bum): dridradang / bdug pa phul la/ de'i 'og tu a shwat+tha'i shing gis me sbar te yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg la ni stong sbyin sreg byas na mi'i gtso bo dbang du 'gyur ro// bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod na zhag
182a6(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyi bar du dud pa med pa'i mdag mal 'bras dang phub ma bsres pas sbyin sreg lan brgya rtsa brgyad byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/ / yugs sa mo dbang du byan lag na rdo rje'i mdun du yar
182a7(rgyud 'bum): gyi ngo tshes brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ pa la sha'i shing gis me sbar nas ske tshe dang lan tshwalan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na yugs sa mo dbang du 'gyur ro// spyan la ma gtogs
182b1(rgyud 'bum): bar gang gsang sngags thams cad la snying gzir bar byed pa dang / gdung bar byed pa dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po gdung bar byed pa'i snying po dang bcas par sbyar bar bya'o// de ltar sbyar na bde
182b2(rgyud 'bum): blag tu 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / zla ba gcig gi bar du slong mo'i zas bza' zhing snying po bzlas brjod byas pa la/ de'i 'og tu mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la skyes pa'i ro ma nyams pa blangs te snying pos
182b3(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma sbyin zhing / de'i lag tu lig pu mig bzhag la/ de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas brjod byas ste/ yi dgas kyis rig sngags 'chang gi lag tu lig bu mig 'bul bar 'gyur
182b4(rgyud 'bum): gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o/ / de nas 'grub par 'gyur te/ des mig gnyis la bskus na gang la reg pa de gser du 'gyur ro// nye ba'i snying po thogs pa med cing stobs kyis pha rol
182b5(rgyud 'bum): gnon pa'i phyi ma'i las rnams 'byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rig sngags thams cad kyi yum gsungs pa gang dran par byas na/ rig sngags
182b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba yin pa dang / rig sngags thams cad kyi nye ba'i snying po dam pa 'jug par byed pa ngas bshad pa gang yin pa'i spyan dang nye ba'i snying po dran par byas na/ rig
182b7(rgyud 'bum): sngags sgrub par dka' ba thams cad kyang 'grub par byed cing / rig sngags rnams las gang dang gang la sbyar ba de'ang myur du byed par 'gyur ro// rig sngags gang las thams cad
183a1(rgyud 'bum): la las mi byed pa de la rig sngags 'chang gis yum dang nye ba'i snying po ldan pas/ lag na rdo rje'am lha chen po'i mdun du sna ma'i me tog mar gyi nang du ba sprugs pa brgya stong
183a2(rgyud 'bum): gis las thams cad bde blag tu dngos grub sbyin par byed do/ / rig sngags yid la bsams te grog mkhar gyi sa la gzugs byas la dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pas brgyan nas lag
183a3(rgyud 'bum): na rdo rje'i mdun du bzhag ste/ yum dang nye ba'i snying por ldan pas sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgyas bsnun na rmi lam du ston te de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro// rmi lam nyid du rig sngags 'grub
183a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'am/ yang na mi 'grub pa yin pa'i rig sngags thams cad ston par byed de/ de ltar rtogs nas rig sngags bde blag tu bsgrub par bya'i gzhan du ni ma yin no// yar gyi ngo tshes
183a5(rgyud 'bum): brgyad nas brtsams te rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi nang du zhugs la slong mo'i zas za zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na yul sbyin par 'gyur ro/ / yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad nas nya'i bar
183a6(rgyud 'bum): du zas 'o ma dang phye'i 'dag gu za zhing rig sngags bzlas brjod byas na/ gzhan gyi yul 'khor la gnod pa byed par 'gyur ro// de nas zas su chu dang phye'i 'dag gu za zhing bzlas
183a7(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas na dmag gi dpung 'joms par byed do/ / mar gyi po nag brgyad la zhag gcig spang ba byas te/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa g.yas po'i mthe bong bzung nas nye
183b1(rgyud 'bum): snying po bzlas brjod byas na/ ji tsam na lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa'i mthe bong las 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'od zer des kyang rig sngags 'chang g.yas phyogs su bskor nas lag na rdo rje'i
183b2(rgyud 'bum): spyi bor mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas 'a grub par 'gyur te rgyal po sbyin par byed cing tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro// slong mo'i zas za zhing rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi nang du zhugs te nye
183b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i snying po spyan dang bcas par lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas la/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis chu'i nang du yungs kar gyi sbyin blugs lan brgyad stong byas na bar snang la ral gri mthong bar
183b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te de blang bar bya'o/ / ci ste snang bar mi byed na ni rig sngags 'chang gis rig pa mchog bzlas brjod byas na snang bar 'gyur te/ 'og bag can gyi rig sngags bzlas brjod byed bzhin
183b5(rgyud 'bum): du blang bar bya'o/ / de blangs pas sgra lcang lor 'khyil cing lo bcu drug lon pa'i sha tshugs can du 'gyur te/ dpag tshad nyis stong gyen du 'phag pa dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis
183b6(rgyud 'bum): mi sod pa dang / / tshe lo nyis stong thub par 'gyur ro// gter 'byung bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang gnas gang na gter yod par song la/ tshes grangs dang rgyu skar yang bdam mi dgos// smyung
183b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'ang bya mi dgos par bil ba'i me'i nang du yungs kar dang pad+ma'i lo ma bsregs pa la nye ba'i snying pos lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na/ gter gyi lha das rmi lam du ston par byed do//
184a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas rig pa mchog gis bgegs rnams kyi sbyin sreg byas nas blang bar bya'o// dgra' byed gdong gis gnas bsrung bar bya'o// nye ba'i snying pos ni mar me sbar bar bya ste/
184a2(rgyud 'bum): b.lang gi rA arka'i shing bal gyis dkris la/ ba ser mo'i mar gyi mar me sbar ba gter gang na yod bde brtol te sgra tshig tshig pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// yang na srin phyis arka'i shing bal gyis
184a3(rgyud 'bum): dkris la rdo rje khro bo'i sngags dang ldan pas srog chags go ta'i tshil gyis mar me sbyar ro/ / mtshan ma ni de nyid dang 'dra'o// nA ga pa la'i arka'i shing bal gyis g.yogs te pad+ma'i rgyus pas dkris
184a4(rgyud 'bum): la mi'i tshol gyis me sbar te gzung ngo / / mtshan ma ni de nyid dang 'dra ste snying po chen po zhes bya'o// lha rnams ngas rnam pa sna tshogs mthong nas nye ba'i snying po'i las rnams bshad pa yin no//
184a5(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa'i snying po stobs ldan pa// gang dag snying stobs med pa dang // bsod nams chung ngu de dag gi/ pha rol phyin pa rdzogs bya'i phyir// gter gyi sgo yi khyad par dag/ bdag gis su
184a6(rgyud 'bum): ni bshad par bya/ / bcom ldan lag na rdo rje yis// de nas tshig ni 'di skad smras// gter sgo gang dag tshangs pa yis// gsang sngags kyi ni sbyor ba dang // cho ga yis ni nges bzhag pa//
184a7(rgyud 'bum): mi rnams chog med pa dang // stobs dang mthu ni med pa yis// rtag tu choms par mi 'gyur te// gang gis mi rnams bde blag tu// lengs par spyad par 'gyur ba dang // pha rol
184b1(rgyud 'bum): phyin pa'i rdzogs byed dang / / ji ltar nor rnams rab bzhag pa// de dag bdag gis bshad par bya// bcom ldan lag na rdo rje yis// de skad du ni tshig kyang spras// gter gyi sgo ni rab ba#
184b2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / sa mthar rgya mtsho thug pa yi// sa yi 'og nas gang yin pa// bdag gis su ni rab bshad kyis// lha rnams kyis ni mnyan par gyis// de dag gi ni kha dog mtshan// gsang sngam
184b3(rgyud 'bum): gang gis gzhom pa dang / / cho ga ji bzhin las rnams dang // bde blag tu ni thob pa yi// sbyar sman bdag gis bshad par bya// de dag gi ni mtshan ma yang // so so ru ni bshad par bya//
184b4(rgyud 'bum): gru gsum du ni zla gam dang // zlum po dang ni zur bzhi dang // pad+ma chu shing lo ma dang // de bzhin gzhan ma bsil yang 'dra// gter gyi sgo ni brgyad bshad pa// de dag kha dog legs
184b5(rgyud 'bum): par nyon/ / ngang pa'i mdog 'dra gter sgo yod// ka ra wI ra'i mdog 'dra dang // 'dam bu chug shar 'dra ba dang // rgya skyegs khu ba'i kha dog 'dra// ljang khu'i mdog can gter sgo
184b6(rgyud 'bum): yod/ / bza'i mdog dang 'dra ba dang // gi'u wang gi ni kha dog 'dra// de bzhin 'bring gar dang mtshungs// kha dog bshad pa 'di dag gis// gter sgo rnams kyi bgegs bsal
184b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / steng dang sa 'og gnas pa yi// bgegs rnams gang gis brlag 'gyur ba'i// sbyin sreg las ni cho ga rnams// rab tu bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// gter sgo
185a1(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags gang gis dgod/ / de dag rim pa bshad par bya// na mo badz+ra pA Na ye/ na mo ru drA ya/ na mo ma hA bid+ya rA dzA ya/ bi ru dri Ne swA hA/ ra ra nA ra swA hA/
185a2(rgyud 'bum): oM ga nA ya swA hA/ bi rU bi Ni swA hA/ tithA riswA k+Sh+ma/ mu ka ki ni swA// pra mu ti ni swA hA/ bru~M u0f7f he swA hA/ bid Ni swA hA/ hon kho swA Sh+Ta/ kA ga na~M swAhA/ bai ri Ni swAhA/ a~M ga rI Ni swA hA/
185a3(rgyud 'bum): bi rag Ni swA hA~M/ ma hA ba ra ti swAhA/ ra Ni bi Ni swA hA/ ka ra bai ra bi ka ra swA hA/ bi rU pi swA hA/ ma ri pa swA hA/ badz+ra ni swA hA/ gar+dz+dza ni swA hA/ marma Ni swA hA/ ku ni pa ta ni swA hA/
185a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'khor gru ba 'i nga myu byugs la ldan cig pa phyogs sgra ba'ims pa 'dus nas sa ning sgra dang / par smra pa dang / dbang po la par
185a5(rgyud 'bum): grog 'thung zhing las brtsams la cho ga 'dis lha thams cad bkod nas 'khur ba bkra shis ldan dang / ben tse dang / tsan dan dri zhim po dag phyogs dang mtshams kyi lha rnams la dbul zhing n+do dang
185a6(rgyud 'bum): dmar bag spangs te/ sngags snga mas sha mya'i yam sreg shing myur gyi nang du bsgrags pa brgyud skyong sbyin sreg bya'o// bgegs thams cad phung bar byed pa'i gcod byed ces bya ba'i rig sngags
185a7(rgyud 'bum): bstan par bya ste/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ ku ti ku ti/ tse ti tsi ti/ mi ti mi ta/ ri Ni ri Ni/ mo ti ni pra mo ti na swA hA/ rig sngags 'dis yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod
185b1(rgyud 'bum): byas te phyogs bzhir gtor na bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro/ / na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+yA/ a ma ra a ma rA/ ma ri ka ti na ti la ti swA hA/ rig sngags 'dis yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas
185b2(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas te mgo bor gtor na bgegs rnams 'tshe bar mi byed do/ / na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ ku ti ku ti/ hu tu ti/ hA ra ha ra swA hA/ rig sngags 'di tshul bzlas brjod byas pa'i sar
185b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhag na me'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / / gter sgo kun gyi bgegs rnams ni// rnam pa brgyad du rab bshad de// mi ro dag ni me'u thung dang // 'jigs par byed pa skad cig pa//
185b4(rgyud 'bum): glang po che dang ma he dang // rab tu 'jigs pa'i srin po dang // stag dang bya dang spyil po tsam// bgegs rnams brgyud po rab bshad de// de dag phung bar bya ba'i phyir// rig
185b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ / na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ a ri ba ri/ ti ri mo ri/ tsi ra mi ri/ ba ra ba ni ra Ni/ kI ri ki ri/ ka li kA li/ mi ri mi ri/ shi ri shi r-i/ nA sha ni nA sha ni/
185b6(rgyud 'bum): s+t+waM b+ha ni sta~M b+ha na~M/ mo ha ni swA hA/ rig sngags 'di dang rig sngags kyi rgyal pos yungs kA ra la bzlas brjod byas te/ phyogs bzhir gtor na bgegs thams cad mi snang bar 'gyur
185b7(rgyud 'bum): na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te pra hA ya/ kha ri bi bi ko ri/ na ri ba na ri/ mi ha ni ha ri boShA Ni swA hA/ rig sngags 'di chu la bzlas brjod byas te/ phyogs bzhir gtor
186a1(rgyud 'bum): na bgegs thams cad bcom zhing mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ / na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ na mo mi ri mi ri/ tsan dI tsan dI/ man+ti swA hA/ gsang sngags 'di tshul bzlas
186a2(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas te/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su gtor na phyogs bcing bar byas par 'gyur te/ khwa yi gzugs ni mi snang 'gyur// 'phur zhing che la gsum du snang // spyil po tsam
186a3(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba ni/ / phyogs rnams kun tu zhi bar 'gyur// gter gyi sgo yi ri mo na// thod pa rab 'dra rtogs par bya// de na phur bu zer snang ba// 'ja' khugs 'dra ba'i 'od dang bcas// phur
186a4(rgyud 'bum): bu de ni dpal gzugs ldan/ / de la lag pas reg mi bya// lus ni sbyar sman bskus nas kyang // de nas phur bu dbyung bar bya// gang gis sal de lhung ba'i// nam mkha'i phub ma shu dag yung /
186a5(rgyud 'bum): nim pa'i lo ma ldong ros dang // sgog skya nas dang shing kun rnams// mi khrag gis ni sbyar ba yi// byug pas de la bsku bar bya// de nas sa la lhung bar 'gyu// de ltar ma byas nus mi 'gyur//
186a6(rgyud 'bum): shri ri sha yi me tog dang // de yi rtsa ba shun phrags dang // ru rta rgya spos 'bri ha ti// yungs kar 'di rnams cha mnyam pa// ragacin dag dang btag par bya// lus la bskus pa'i sbyar smran
186a7(rgyud 'bum): 'di/ / khrag 'joms pa yi mchog yin no// ru rta dang ni rgya spos dang // log bu mig dang ldong ros bcas// sbal ba'i tshil dang ldan pas te// dud pa'i mig rtsi rab sbyar ba// 'di ni mig
186b1(rgyud 'bum): rtsi'i rgyal po ste/ / gter gyi sgo rnams gcod pa yin// nya ri kun da'i shun brags blang // sin du ba ri'i gi'u wang bcas// zing ga'i dud pas rab tu bdugs// 'di ni sbyar sman mchog yin te/
186b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyar sman gyis ni lus bslus nas// de nas phur bu dbyung bar bya// ci ste snang bar mi byed na// khwa yi 'khrul 'khor rengs byed cing // bgegs kun phung bar byed pa yi// rig sngags 'di ni de yis
186b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyar/ ka ru grA ka ru ga/ dI bya/ rU bi Na/ kan+ma tu ma pa ka ga tra/ sau b+hi be bi du lu ni/ ku mi ni/ hI hIn/ hU hU hU ni/ ki ri ki ri/ ka la kar NaM/ ma hA bi d+ye/ ha ra ha ra ha ra
186b4(rgyud 'bum): raha ra/ tsa la tsa la tsa la/ ra ra ra/ tha tha tha/ sha sha sha/ stam+b+ha ya nA sha ya nA sha ya/ ha ri ha rI/ gi ni gau ni/ hun+da hun dgrin mu ya/ han brah+ma Ni/ pa ta ni/ mo ha ni
186b5(rgyud 'bum): tsi rim ba na/ tha ra tha ra/ mi ti mi ti/ si ti si ti/ mi ri mi r-i/ bi ri bi raM/ hi ri hi ra/ de mya na de mya ni bi tra ba to pa ta ta ne/ pa ta ni/ ha ha ha ni swA hA/ phur bu 'byin pa na
186b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dom gsum du bcal te/ chu dang yungs kar gyis bsnun na khra de rengs par 'gyur ro// yang na rgyung ring por lhung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'dis ni bgegs thams cad bcom par 'gyur
186b7(rgyud 'bum): na mo badz+ra pA Na ye/ na mo ru drA ya/ na mo brah+ma ya/ gar shi ri shi ri ri/ si si ri ri/ mi ri/ ba ba pa swA hA/ rig sngags 'di'am/ yang na gos dkar can gyis gtsug pud bcing
187a1(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / gang gis nor rnams blang bya ba'i// gru gsum 'joms pa 'di yin te// khor khor yug sbyang byas la// rab tu bsgrims te brtag par bya// de yi mtsham
187a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbus dag tu/ / ri mo gru gsum gnag pa yod// ci skyed de ltar mi snang na// de nas 'o mar gtor bar bya// a pa marga'i thal sman gyis// mkhas pa dag gis rab gtor zhing // dung gi
187a3(rgyud 'bum): phye mas phyi bar bya/ / kho ra khor yug gtor bya zhing // gtor dang byi dor byas nas kyang // ci ste mtshan ma mthong 'gyur na// sbyar sman gyis ni bskus na yang // lcags kyi 'khar bas brdab
187a4(rgyud 'bum): byas na/ / chag par 'gyur te gzhan du min// zla gam dag gi dbus dag na// bkra shis ldan pa'i gzugs kyang snang // ci ste de ltar mi snang na// thal ba'i sman 'di sbyar bar bya// i
187a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dra bye'u rug lo ma rnams/ / mnyam par bzhag pas btsir nas ni// ba gcon dag dang lhan cig sbyar// bskol nas gtor ba byas nas ni// bkra shis ldan pa der snang ste// 'di la blo ldan
187a6(rgyud 'bum): the tsom med/ / sbyar sman gyis ni bslus nas kyang // lcags kyi 'khar bas brdab par bya// des nas la de ltung ste// rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med// zlum po gzhom pa'i cho ga yis/
187a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyar bar bya ba rab bshad do// kho ra khor yug sbyangs nas ni// rab tu bsgrims te brtag par bya// pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i mdog 'dra ba// sbrul mgo gdengs ka'i ri mo snang // ci ste de dag mi
187b1(rgyud 'bum): snang na/ / thal ba'i sman 'di sbyar bar bya// ka li sha yi sa bon dang // bcod rnams dang ni bgacin gyis// sbyar nas kun tu thugs par bya// de nas mtshan ma snang 'gyur te/
187b2(rgyud 'bum): spyisbyar sman gyis ni lus bslus nas// lcags kyi 'khar ba brdab par bya// des na des ni 'jig 'gyur te// rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba med// gru bzhi po yi ri mo yang //
187b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhi yin te bshad par bya// ci ste de ni mi snang na// thal ba'i sman 'di sbyar bar bya// sU ha sha ra'i yal ga blangs// mnyam par bzhag pas btsor byas la// ba gcin gyis ni

187b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te gzhan du min/ / pad+ma yin dbus su yang // snying po dag ni sdang ba yod// sman rnams kyis ni lus bslus nas// rdo ba yis ni brdab bya zhing // de ni snying po gzhom par
187b6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / de na yod par the tshom med// ji ltar bdag gis bzhag pa bzhin// lhag par yang ni brang bar bya// chu shing lo ma'i dbyibs 'dra ba// sbyar ba'i thabs ni mnyan par bya// de ni
187b7(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma snang ba ni/ / gi'u wang thig le 'dra ba yi// ri mo gnyis sam gsum yang rung // yang na bzhi'am lnga yod do// mtshan ma 'di dag snang bar 'gyur// ci ste mtshan ma mi
188a1(rgyud 'bum): snang na/ / thal ba'i sman 'di sbyar bar bya// a shwat+tha dang pa ta pa'i// lo ma a pa marba rnams// ra yi ga cin gyis sbyar nas su// kho ra khor yug blugs par bya/
188a2(rgyud 'bum): blugs ma thag tu snang 'gyur te// skyur sman gyis ni bskus nas kyang // lcags kyi 'khar ba brdab byas na// chag par 'gyur te gzhan du min// bsil yab dag dang 'dra ba ni// yu bar bcas
188a3(rgyud 'bum): par snang bar 'gyur/ / gshor gyis legs par sbyang byas la// de yi mtshan ma brtag par bya// ci ste de na mi snang na// thal ba'i sman 'di sbyar bar bya// in+d+ra shing gi lo ma dang // nir rkun dag gi
188a4(rgyud 'bum): lo ma dag/ rta yi gcin gyis sbyar nas kyang // kho ra khor yug blugs nas ni// de nas mtshan ma snang ba der// sbyar sman gyis ni bslus nas kyang // lcags kyi 'khar bas brdab byas na// chag
188a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur te gzhan du min/ / chu shing lo ma 'dra ba las// rus sbal rgyab dang 'dra ba dang // rdo rje ci ste rang 'ongs pa// de ni gzhom du med pa yin// gter gyi sgo ni thams cad la// phur bu rnam pa
188a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhi yod do/ / dbang po gshin rje lus ngan dang // khyab 'jug phur bu bzhi pa'o// gter gyi sgo ni thams cad du// rig sngags 'dis gtor ma sbyin par bya ste/ gshin rjel ni bsreg bya rnams so//
188a7(rgyud 'bum): khyab 'jug la ni 'bras chan sna tshogs pa'o// ku be ra la ni sbyar thug go// dpal ldan la ni 'bras kyi'o thug sbyin par bya'o// na mo badz+ra pA Ni sa/ nan+te su nen+te/ go bin+te/ ri ti ri ti/ rmi Ni
188b1(rgyud 'bum): ti/ mo ri ti swA hA/ sngags 'das ci 'dod pa'i gtor ma thams cad byin la/ de nas las brtsam par bya'o// gzhor gyi sngags ni 'di yin te/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ ti shi ya bi ti sha ya/
188b2(rgyud 'bum): namo ma hA Shi yA ya swA hA/ sngags 'di dag gis tshul bzlas brjod byas te bsang gtor bya ste/ de nas las bya'o// de la gter sgo gcog pa'i mchog/ rdo rje rnams dang gzhan yang gang // wa
188b3(rgyud 'bum): yi rigs rnams gcig pa yi/ / sbyar sman rnams kyang bshad par bya// ka na ka yi rtsa ba dang // a sha nag ta'i gi wang dang // spu yi rtsa ba 'di dag rnams// arka dar pa'i shun phrags
188b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / ril bu sran tsam byas nas kyang // grib ma dag tu bskam par bya// gter sgo thams cad gcog pa 'di// 'byung po'i mchog ces bya ba yin// 'bam po dang ni gcod rnams dang // si'u
188b5(rgyud 'bum): wang ldong ros bcas pa dang / / ka ra wI ra'i rtsa ba dang // arka kar po'i shun phrags dang // sho na ka yi shun phrags dang // 'di dag cha ni bsnyams byas la// ba gcin dag dang btag par
188b6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / gter sgo thams cad gcog pa yi// sbyar sman dag gi dam pa ste// lag na rdo rjes bshad pa yin// ag+ni ban+da'i lo ma dang // e ranu yi rtsa ba dang // sU hag shi ri sgog skya rnams//
188b7(rgyud 'bum): bgacin dag dag dang btag par bya// gter sgo gcog pa'i sbyar sman 'di// rdo rje zhes ni bya ba yin// ka ra wI ra'i rtsa ba dang // chu shing sa bon skyer ba dang // yung dang nag tam la dang /
189a1(rgyud 'bum): ga ri kar ni dkar po rnams// ba gcin dag dang btag par bya// sbyar sman gyi ni rgyal po 'di// gter sgo gcog pa'i mchog yin no// bi dru dzi ha mor ti/ de bzhinar
189a2(rgyud 'bum): nye'u yungs kar rnams/ / ba gcin gyis ni legs sbyar ba// gter sgo gcog pa'i dam pa yon// ba lung gi ni me tog dang // shal la ka yi snying po dang // 'bam po sni hak+Shi ri dang //
189a3(rgyud 'bum): wang dag dang ldan par ni// ra gcin dag dang btag byas pa// rdo rje 'joms pa'i mchog yin no// ko sha ta ka'i sa bon dang // ko bi ra yi 'bras bu dang // du ru ka yi lo ma rnams// ba
189a4(rgyud 'bum): gcin dag dang btag byas la/ / zhag grangs bzhi bcu dgur gzhag pa// rdo rje 'joms pa'i dam pa yin// pa ri dzA ti'i rtsa ba dang // su bar sna dang ta ka dang // spen pa yi ni lo ma
189a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / sbrang rtsi dang ni shing kra dang // gi ru wang dag dang sbyar ba yis// gter skyo gcog pa'i dam pa yin// sbyar sman dam pa 'di dag ni// rdo rje 'joms pa yin par bshad//
189a6(rgyud 'bum): gser rnams blang bar 'dod pa yi// lag pa bsku ba nga las nyon// ru rta dang ni rgya spos dang // a li ta dang mo ra to// lag pa bslu ba'i mchog yin te// rdo rje 'bar byed 'jigs
189a7(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / zhim thig le yin sa bon dang // nag ta ma le'i 'bras bu rnams// ba gcin dag dang sbyar ba ni// bde bar byed pa'i lag srung yin// pad+ma'i rtsa brgya spos dang // sa ra
189b1(rgyud 'bum): gshi dang spu rnams ni/ / ra yi gcin dang legs sbyar ba'i// bde bar byed pa'i lag skud yin// ka gan 'dzi yi sa bon dang // kar ni ka ra'i me tog dang // pri yang ku dang rgyu spos dang // su
189b2(rgyud 'bum): rabi dang tsan dan dkar/ / gri'u wang dag dang ldan pa ni// bde bar byed pa'i lag skud yin// sgo glegs lag pas reg pa na// mtshams nas kyang ni 'bye bar 'gyur// de nyid rengs par bya
189b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i phyir/ / rig sngags 'di ni sbyar bar bya// na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya// ti ri ti ri/ mi ri swA hA/ rig sngags 'dis tshul lan bdun bsngags te sgo grags kyi ngos la gtor na rengs par 'gyur
189b4(rgyud 'bum): bde blag tu gzung bar 'gyur ro/ / gter gyi sgo rnams thams cad la// rig sngags 'di ni sbyar bar bya// rengs byed rmongs byed dge ba ste// bgegs rnams thams cad 'joms byed pa//
189b5(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa nyid kyis byas pa ste// rmongs byed sgo yi them pa'i phyir// ri rab brtol nas byung ba ste// dri za lha mo rnams dang ni// mi 'am cis ni rab tu mchod// 'joms par byed cing sreg
189b6(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ / lha yi gzugs ldan blo gros che// rig sngags 'di ni bshad par bya// ki li ki l-i/ piM ga lak+Shi ha ha b+hi maM gi/ ha na ha na/ shU le na bi da ra ya badz+re Na/ ki li ki li shab+de na/ stam+b+ha ya
189b7(rgyud 'bum): ru dre Na/ de na han ha na shak+ti na/ ki ri ki ra/ tsi ro tsi ri/ mi ri mi ri/ na ru ti na ru ti/ tha ra tha ra/ tha tha/ ra ra/ pa ta ya pa ta ya/ stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya/ pa ta ya ba ta ya/ gardza gardza/ mdza
190a1(rgyud 'bum): mardza/ tardza tardza/ kaM kI na ki ki na/ dun+da b+hi dun+du b+hi/ shukla daMSh+Ta ka rA lA na ne/ ka na ne di bya rU pe/ tsa ma bin+du saM ma dA/ di pya pra b+he/ ba sha ne/ ka ha ka hu/ kha Ta ga haste/
190a2(rgyud 'bum): trin tra/ ru drA ya ni sh+ma shA ne/ ya da kri dase/ gr-i pA ga gro bA ga kro bA/ yur ba ra Ni/ ar+d+he kA re swa yaM ka sha ki ma kuT/ tsan+d+raka/ shauR+She/ de bgan d+harma/ yak+Sha bi d+ha/ dar a tsita/ su pU dza~M
190a3(rgyud 'bum): / dr-idro bA dro bA/ thi thi/ ma ba pa s+phar+Ya ma ba/ ha ha pa/ ka ka pa/ tsi tra/ ha na ha na/ stam+b+ha ya s+yAm+b+ha ya/ ma hA bi d+hA tsa turmu kho dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ rig sngags 'dis yungs kar dang / chu dang / thal ba rnams
190a4(rgyud 'bum): las gang yang rung ba gcig tu blangs te/ rig sngags bzlas brjod byas la phyogs bzhir gtor na bgegs thams cad rings par 'gyur zhing dgra'ang bcom par 'gyur ro// de nyid kyis sad pa dang /
190a5(rgyud 'bum): gnyid log tu gzhug pa dang / mun par bya ba dang / gar dang / glu dang / rol mo la sogs pa byed du gzhug pa dang / gzhan yang sems can mi snang ba gang yin pa dag dang / snang ba gang yin pa dag dang /
190a6(rgyud 'bum): bgegs dang log 'dren gang yin pa dang / ci ste rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/ dur khrod kyi gnod pa byung ngam/ sbrul gyis bcings pa'ang rung / gzhan yang sems can gnod par byed pa gang yin pa de dag thams
190a7(rgyud 'bum): cad 'joms par byed cing rmongs par byed pa yin no zhes/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis de skad bshad do// gser len pa na rdo rje lag na thogs shing rig sngags kyi mchog 'dis sbyin sreg
190b1(rgyud 'bum): legs par bya'o/ / na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ bi be tA ya swA hA/ ti stau su ka la hA ya swA hA/ kuM baSh+Ta nA ya/ pa rin+ta asta nA ya swA hA/ ni drA d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ sha ye yur bA yu swA hA/ li bi gra re tra ye
190b2(rgyud 'bum): swAsAhA/ ba su mak+Sha ya swAhA/ ya swAhA/ gaN+Da ya swA hA/ gaN pa ta ye swAhA/ ka ma rA pa ya swAhA/ ka li nI swAt+ma/ brAg+hA d+hi pa ye swA hA/ rak+Sha sA ya swAhA/ rakasA dza~M pe ba sa swAt+ma/ khan+ta mas/
190b3(rgyud 'bum): khan+ta d+hi pa ti ye swA hA/ ru drA ya swAhA/ ya mA ya swA hA/ ba ruN+Da la~M swA hA/ ku be rA ya swAhA/ pri thi bya swA hA/ mA tri byA swA hA/ brah+ma ya swA hA/ gang gsang sngags 'di dag gis sha ma

191a1(rgyud 'bum): brjid chen po ba/ / tshangs pas bshad pa'i khwa de nyid// sngon nis 'di'i steng dag na// rtag tu gter rnams mang po yod// gter de dag ni bsrung ba'i phyir// tshangs pa
191a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi khra rnams yod/ / khra yi rnam pa brgyad bshad pa// brtson 'grus che zhing stobs po che// lag na rdo rje bka' mchog gis// de dag gang gis brgyar 'gyes dang // gtor ma sngags rnams

191a5(rgyud 'bum): 'jug lhar 'dzin pa yin no/ / mig dmar ni ku ba ra lhar 'dzin pa yin no// de bzhin du 'dab bkra ni dbang po lhar 'dzin pa yin no// shel mig can ni sa'i lhar 'dzin pa yin no// khra de
191a6(rgyud 'bum): ngag gi kha dog mtshan/ / rtags rnams bdag gis bshad pa yin// de dag gi ni mdog dang dbyibs// rim bzhin du ni bshad par bya// nag po yi ni gzugs gang dang // mthu slong
191a7(rgyud 'bum): gang yin rab bshad de/ / kha dog rab tu gnag pa dang // bong tshad che zhing 'jigs par byed// dpag tshad gcig na gnas bzhin du// dril bu'i skad 'dra 'byin par byed// gtor ma
191b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod phyir yang dang yang / / de bzhin rgyun du skad sang 'byin// gang gis ni bar 'gyur ba yi// zas rnams kyang ni bshad par bya// sha bcos de bzhin brdos pa rnams// bya rjel ni sbyin par bya/

191b3(rgyud 'bum): dkar po yin gzugs gang dang // mthu stobs gang yin rab bshad de// nam mkha' la dag bskor byas nas// don chu sbyar mdog 'dra yi// 'dab ma'i shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur/
191b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyun du kho ra khor yug nas// 'dab ma'i gshog sgra chen po yis// 'brug sgra chen po 'byin par byed// gnas rnam su ni lan cig gam// lan gnyis lan gsum skor bar byed// gdon
191b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams lan gsum tshang ba'i bar/ / de srid du ni gtor ma sbyin// sna ba 'bras yos mar dag gis// gtor ma rnams ni sbyin par bya// sngags la/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ sho d+ha ya
191b6(rgyud 'bum): sho d+ha ya pa pa ta ye/ sho pA d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ dmar po yi ni gzugs gang dang // mthu stobs gang yin rab bshad de// bzhad bzhin du ni skad 'byin zhing // zab mo'i sgra ni rab

192a1(rgyud 'bum): li ka sbyin par bya/ / bza' ba dang ni la du dang // til gyi khub sbyin par bya// sngags la/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ rak+ta rak+Sha/ k+She rak+ta d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ mgrin pa mthon
192a2(rgyud 'bum): ka'i gzugs gang dang / / bathu stobs gang yin rab bshad de// sder mos kyang ni phrad par byed// de ni kha ltar skad 'byin cing // lan bdun par du skad 'byon te// de ni myur du 'ong bar 'gyur//
192a3(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma myur du sbyin par bya// sngags kyang legs par dran par bya// lan tshwa med pa'i sha sbyin cing // yam sreg shing yang sbyin par bya// gtor ma'i las ni 'di dag gis// de ni mur du lhung
192a4(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / sngags la/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ nI lag sho/ nI la te dzo/ nI lA d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ ki pan dza ra'i gzugs gang dang // mthu stobs gang yin rab bshad de// srin bya bzhin du
192a5(rgyud 'bum): yang dang yang / / skad po che ni 'byin par byed// myur ba myur bar skad 'byin cing // de bzhin sgra yang lan gsum 'byin// nye ba dag tu 'ong bar 'gyur// de tshe zas kyang sbyin par bya// gsang
192a6(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyis ni bya ba yin/ / khrag gis su ni bkang ba yi// sngon sum dag kyang sbyin par byed// de bzhin nya dang sha rjen sbyin// sngags la/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ kA ra li/ ba kA ra l-i/ ka ra la
192a7(rgyud 'bum): d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ mig dmar gyi ni gzugs gang dang // mthu stobs gang yin rab bshad de// rta bzhin du ni skad 'byin cing // 'khar ba'i sgra ltar tsher tsher po// de bzhin sgra cher sgrogs
192b1(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / desrel parab la nas 'byin// the tsos med cing mu sa ru// de la gtor ba sbyin par bya// de bzhin sha ni rjen pa dang // chang gis bkang ba'i rjod kyang byin// sngags la/ nam
192b2(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra pA Nis/ rak+Sha ne thor kA ni pa/ raka rti pa tra ye swA hA/ 'dab bkra yi ni gzugs gang dang // mthu spobs gang yon rab bshad de// 'brug sgra bzhin du skad 'byon cing / de bzhin du ni 'ong bar
192b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rang gi lus las de bzhin pa dag/ glog gi rgyud 'drar snang bar 'gyur// rnga mo wAr ni brtul zhing 'ong // ngur pa bzhin du yang dang yang // lan brgyad du ni skad 'byin cing // de ni
192b4(rgyud 'bum): myur du 'ong bar 'gyur/ / de la gtor ma sbyin bya zhing // gsang sngags kyang ni bya ba yin// bu ram zho dang sbyar ba yin// zas kyang rab tu sbyin par bya// sngags la/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ye/ ci

192b6(rgyud 'bum): tshe ltar skad 'byin cing / / 'dab mas rlung ni g.yo bar byed// 'dabam de ni rlung gis su// grang bar yang ni byed par 'gyur// skad ni lan gnyis 'byin byed cing // don khad kyis 'ong bar

193a1(rgyud 'bum): gis bkang basbyin/ / sngags la/ na mo badz+ra pA NI s+ya/ ke kar k+Sha ka kar dri ti/ ke kar d+hi pa ta ye swA hA/ khwa 'di dag ni bdag gis su// mtshon bcas cho gar ldan par

193a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gal bar las bya ba/ / gang yin de ni bdag nyid brlag/ bdag nyid chen po khra 'di dag/ mchod pa byas na ldog 'gyur te// lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin// khwa thams cad kyi gsang sngags ni

194a3(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa yin/ / shing gi gnas ni dum na// pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba dang // pad+ma chen po'i dri zhim yod// zabs su mi 'greng gnyis tsam yod// nor ni drug khri lnga stong yod// de ni

199a1(rgyud 'bum): mo'o mgo za'i nang dag tu/ / lig pu mig ni bcug nas kyang // dud pa bkag ste bsregs na ni// mig sman rab tu bzang ba yin// ne'u le'i mgo bo blangs nas ni//
