199a5(rgyud 'bum): wang dang / / 'ug pa yon mig rnams dang // 'dzin mo'i mgo dang cha mnyam par// dud pa bkug skye bsreg par bya// lung bong gi ni mig gnyis dang // de bzhin byi ba'i mig gnyis dang /
199a6(rgyud 'bum): bya rgod mgo dang lhan cig tu// dud pa bkag ste bsregs pa ni// mig sman rab tu bzang ba yin// spre'u'i mjug ma dag dang ni// de bzhin 'dzin mo'i mig gnyis dang // sbrul gyi mgo dang ldan
199a7(rgyud 'bum): cig tu/ / dud pa bkag ste bsregs pa ni// mig sman kun gyi mchog yin no// sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir// mig sman gyi ni sbyor ba mchog/ lha rnams bdag gis bshad pa yin//
199b1(rgyud 'bum): mig sman rnams dang blugs sman rnams la ni nye ba'i snying po sbyar bar bya'o// gter gyi las thams cad ni rig sngags kyi rgyal pos bya'o// nye ba'i snying po'i las rdzogs so//
199b2(rgyud 'bum): / ngas sngar bshad pa'i pho nya mo gang yin pa thams cad kyi po nya mo'i las bshad par bya'o// lha rnams rig sngags chen mo stobs chen mo'i 'phrul gyi rig sngags de dag gi rig sngags kyi
199b3(rgyud 'bum): ga'i las kyang bshad par bya'o/ / de la po nyi mo thams cad kyi las ni 'di yin te/ longs spyod kyigani sgrub par 'dod pas zhag gsum smyung ba byas la// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du
199b4(rgyud 'bum): lha bshos sna tshogs phul nas mchod pa byas te/ pr-i yang ku'i shing gis me sbyar la pri yang ku dang / gi'u wang dang / ril bu stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na zhag bdun gyi tha mar longs spyod kyi gzhi
199b5(rgyud 'bum): 'thob par 'gyur ro/ / mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la mchod sbyin byas pa'i mchod sdong blangs nas mi ro bsregs na// rig sngags kyi snying po dang ldan par bzlas brjod byed bzhin du mdag mo blangs la/
199b6(rgyud 'bum): blangs pa de spyan gyi sngags bzlas brjod byed bzhin du phug ron gyi khung du shi bar byas te/ phyi ma mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la lha chen po'i gnas su song nas log 'dren gyi sngags kyis gtor
199b7(rgyud 'bum): ma'i cho ga thams cad byas la/ zhag gcig smyung ba byas te sdum bu so ma'i 'dab ma bdun blangs pa'i steng du sol ba gzhag nas/ gzugs kyi lho phyogs su rig sngag bzlas brjod bya ste/
200a1(rgyud 'bum): dud pa 'thul ba'i bar du bzlas brjod byas la// de blangs nas nang par bram ze rnams dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod ston byas la/ de nas sbyar bar bya ste/ thig le
200a2(rgyud 'bum): byas na lus mi snang bar 'gyur zhing / tshe lo lnga brgya thub la pho nya mo thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// zas su 'o ma'i 'dag gu za zhing chos gcig la brtsams te/ tshes bdun gyi bar du rig sngags
200a3(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod byas nas zhag gcig smyung ba byas la dka' bzlog ma'i gnas su song ste/ 'bras phye las mdung rtse gsum pa byas pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na yul gru thob par 'gyur ro// /
200a4(rgyud 'bum): cho ga 'di nyid kyis ma mo'i gnas su song la mchod pa byas te dbang phyug chen po'i sngags kyi sa las thams cad bya'o// ma mo'i gtso bo'i mdun du 'bras phye las 'khur ba bkra shis ldan
200a5(rgyud 'bum): par byas pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na yul gru sbyin par byed do/ / mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig sbyang ba byas te/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du sna ma'i me tog kham bye ba brgyad stong
200a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg byas na pho nya mo thams cad las so cog byed par 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags kyi rgyal po sgrub pa'i las rnams la ni pho nya mo rnams sbyar bar bya'o// pho nya mo rnams la ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor dang
200a7(rgyud 'bum): dga' byed gdong sbyar bar bya'o/ / bdud rtsi thab sbyor la sogs pa'i gsang rdza tha bas cad la ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po dang spyan sbyar bar bya'o// yang na bcom ldan 'das mnyi tshe sbyar bar bya'o//
200b1(rgyud 'bum): gdon no cog dbye bar 'dod na ma dana'i tsher ma dug dang khrag gi nang du bsnyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na 'bye bar 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te smin drug gi bu'i
200b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas su song nas/ rig sngags lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas na gzhan gyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// skyes pa dang bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod na mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig spyad
200b3(rgyud 'bum): ba byas te/ lha chen po'i gnas su song la gzugs kyi lho phyogs su seng ldeng gi shing gis me sbar nas/ yungs kar gyis lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na skyes pa dang bud med dbang du 'gyur
200b4(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / mar gyi ngo tshes bdun la rgyu skar sa ril bab pa'i tshe/ bil ba las shing brnyan bdun skyes pa blangs nas dug mo yungs kyi shing drung lan stong bzlas brjod byas te btsugs na grong khyer gyi
200b5(rgyud 'bum): mi thams cad gnyid log par 'gyur ro/ / mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la spos kyi reng bu blangs te mi'i tshol gyis bsgos nas mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ lha chen po'i gnas
200b6(rgyud 'bum): su song nas mchod pa rgyas par byas la gzugs kyi lho phyogs su spos kyi 'dag gus mdung rtse gsum pa bris nas/ de'i steng du mi'i thod pa bzhag pa la 'dug ste/ thod pa'i snod mi tshil gyis
200b7(rgyud 'bum): bkang ba'i nang du spos kyi reng bu bzhag pa las thod pa'i nang du dud pa chags par byas nas/ de blangs pa lag na rdo rje dang / lha chen po dang / grogs rnams la'ang skal ba byin te/ de nas
201a1(rgyud 'bum): mig gnyis bskus na lus mi snang bar 'gyur zhing / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can stobs po che tshe lo dgu brgya thub par 'gyur ro// gdon las thar par bya bar 'dod na a
201a2(rgyud 'bum): shwat+tha'i shing gis me sbar te lan tshwa dang ske tshes lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na tshe bton nas gtor bar 'gyur ro/ / dgun zla tha chung yar gyi ngo tshes bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ 'phags pa

201a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi gzhan 'debs pa dang / sgrub pa byed par ngas bskos te/ de dran par byas na po nya mo thams cad mdun na 'khod par 'gyur ro// nga dang lha rnams kyi snying po lta bur gyur pa/ 'byung
201a5(rgyud 'bum): po'i bdag po cho ga rgyas pa sgrub pa pho nya mo thams cad kyi yid dang 'thad pa tshogs kyi bdag po lcags can bshad par bya'o/ / na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa ti s+ya/

201a7(rgyud 'bum): ba/ 'byung po'i bdag po cho ga rgyas par sgrub bo// tshogs kyi bdag po'i pho nya mo thams cad kyi yid dang 'thad pa bshad de/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni ye/ na ma I shwa ra sa/ na mo nan+da ke shwa rA ya/ ru lu ru la/
201b1(rgyud 'bum): pi la ta ma taM gi/ tsa la lo ha ka/ du Sh+Ta sa gra ha mi nan A bai sha ya swA hA/ 'di ni tshogs kyi bdag po lcags can po nya mo rnams kyis gzhen 'debs pa dang / sgrub par byed pa thogs pa med pa'i las
201b2(rgyud 'bum): can no/ / gdon dbab pa thams cad la ni me tog gis bya'o// las so cog la'ang tshogs kyi bdag po lcags can brjod nas las thams cad bya'o// zhag gsum smyung ba byas nas mar gyi ngo

201b4(rgyud 'bum): byas/ de'i 'og tu tshogs kyi bdag po lcags can gyis mtshan mo rmi lam du bstan par 'gyur ro// de nas po nya mo rnams las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// pho nya mo rnams kyi cho ga rdzogs so//

201b6(rgyud 'bum): ste/ sgrub pa thams cad dang / las thams cad la las 'di nyid kyis bya ste/ gu gul dang ni yungs kar dang // gi'u wang shu dag ru rta dang // sug smel yang ni de bzhin te// sgron shing dang

202a1(rgyud 'bum): pa mi 'byung ste/ / chom rkun ma yin mtshon rnams min// sbrul rnams ma yin lha min min// lag na rdo rje'ang 'dis bskus pas// sa steng dag tu rgyal bar 'gyur// 'di
202a2(rgyud 'bum): yis lus la bslus pa ni/ / log 'dren rnams las thar par 'gyur// sbyar sman 'di ni byas nas kyang // sgrub pa thams cad bsgrub byas na// log 'dren rnams kyis mi tshugs te// lag na/

202a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi cho ga rdzogs so/ / // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi rig pa mchog las bcom ldan 'das ma gos dkar can bshad pa gang yin pa de'i phyi ma'i las
202a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams ngas bshad kyis/ lha rnams nyon cig/ sgrub pa thams cad la srung ba yin te/ chom rkun dang / stag dang / sbrul dang / chu srin na bkra dang / ma hA ka ra rnams las gnas bsrung ba dang /
202b1(rgyud 'bum): mtshams gcad pa dang / kha bcing bar bya ba rnams yid kyis bya'o// gter brang ba ni gter gang na yod pa der song la smyung ba byas te/ dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs nas bil ba'i shing gi me'i nang
202b2(rgyud 'bum): duyungs kar mar dang sbyar bas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na de'i 'og tu gter ston par 'gyur te/ de nas brang bar bya'o// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ 'phags pa spyan

202b5(rgyud 'bum): 'amayang na gsar sbyin par 'gyur ro/ / zla ba gcog gi bar du slong mo'i zas za zhing rig sngags bzlas brjod byas la/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zla ba nya la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/
202b6(rgyud 'bum): ras ma nyams pa la tshen rtsi sprin med pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'drir gzhug ste/ 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog can/ thor tsugs byas pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na pad+ma thogs
202b7(rgyud 'bum): brtagayas pa na sngags kyi nor bu thogs te/ brang na dpal gyi be'u yod pa/ pad+ma la bzhugs par bya/ g.yas phyogs su bcom ldan 'das ma gos dkar can 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog
203a1(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa/ thor tsugs byas shing pad+ma'i 'phreng bas brgyan pa/ pad+ma la bzhugs te yid tsam gyis 'dud par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang spyad pa byas pas mar gyi

203a6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs 'gul zhing sa'ang g.yo bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas 'grub par 'gyur te/ bla ma la phyag byas nas rig sngags bzlas brjod byed bzhin du gyen du 'phags par bya'o// 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i

203b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa'i sa 'ang ba na du sgrub shAT+Ta / / gros dag na sa sa sngags galag na gas pa byu pa'i gas stan ng+yas d+d+ha sa h+lA// /
203b2(rgyud 'bum): so+o// dza rnam sa na ra kAhA/ ka~M She ka pa ka zig par swAhA/ rig sngags 'di lagan rdo rje'i mdun du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dpung phyug gi gzugs gzhug par bya'o// debo gam
203b3(rgyud 'bum): dun gas kar can gzhag par bye/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis par gyi u0f7fpartul nyin mtshon du spyad ba byu t+ta/ dr-I dang / me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pas 'tshod pa byas nas/

204a1(rgyud 'bum): yungs kar gyis bya'o/ / bca' sga la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te gdon la bstan na gdon gyi lus tsha bas 'debs par 'gyur ro// nad do cog la sa la lan bdun bzlas
204a2(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas te byin na nad med par 'gyur ro/ / gzhon nu mchog gi gzhan 'debs shing sgrub par byed pa'i snying po bshad zin to// drag tu bskul ba gzhan yang bshad par bya'o// na mo badz+ra pA

204b4(rgyud 'bum): bskus te rkang pa g.yas pa byug par bya'o/ / rig sngags kyang lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas te be'u smrar gzhug go/ de ste smra ra mi btub na'ang lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas te/ de nas smrar
204b5(rgyud 'bum): bcug na ci bya zhes smra ra bar 'gyur ro/ / des kyang 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par gyis shig ces smros shig/ de nas yid la gang bsams pa de thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ tshe lo stong nyis brgya
204b6(rgyud 'bum): thub par 'gyur ro/ / gzhon nu'i las rig sngags kyi rig sngags sgrub par byed pa bshad zin to// / ci ste rdo rje'i rigs sgrub par 'dod na lag na rdo rje'i sras gtsug nas byung gtum pa/
204b7(rgyud 'bum): drag pa/ 'dul dka' ba bsten par bya'o// sgrub par 'dod pa gang yin pas yum snying la dran par byas te sras gtum po dran par bya'o// 'di'i las gang sgrub na rdo rje'i rigs 'grub par gyur pa'ang

205a3(rgyud 'bum): dan dmar po dbul lo/ / me tog dkar po dang dmar po'ang tshul de dang 'dra bar dbul bar bya ste/ de'i mdun du seng ldeng gi shing gis me sbar la yum gyi gsang sngags kyis tsan dan dmar po'i ya ma sreg
205a4(rgyud 'bum): shing mar gyi nang du bsnyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bya'o/ / de nas gzhon nu 'grub par 'gyur te/ bgegs med pa bde blag tu cho ga rgyas pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin

205a6(rgyud 'bum): pa ru ni dran par byed/ / de la ngas ni khor zug tu// lag na rdo rjes bskul ba bzhin// dngos grub kyang ni sbyin par bya// gang zhig cho ga rgyas pa 'di// gsang bcas gsang chen ldan pa dang //
205a7(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rjes sngags bshad dang // gzi chen phyi ma'i rgyud klog dang // gzhon nu dam pa mnga' ba dag ni// spyan dang lhan cig ldan pa dang // phyi ma'i rgyud las bshad pa yin// las rnam
205b1(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig lta byed pa/ / de la dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// lus kyi spyi bor rtag tu gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes sangs rgyas kyi spyan spyi bo la bskur te/ rdo rje 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
205b2(rgyud 'bum): snyoms par zhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa thag tu lha thams cad sems 'jigs par 'gyur te lhags nas/ khyab 'jug ni
205b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi glo g.yon phyogs su 'dug go/ lha chen po ni g.yas phyogs su 'dug go/ smin drug ma ni 'dzem bzhin du rgyab logs su 'dug go/ dka' bzlog ma ni mdun phyogs su
205b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dug go/ gzhon nu dril mdzes dang smin drug gi bu ni glo g.yas phyogs su 'dug go/ tshogs rnams ni g.yon phyogs su 'dug go/ pho nya mo drug gis bskor ba'i dpal gyi lha mo gzi brjid
205b5(rgyud 'bum): chen mo shin tu 'od 'bar ba drag mo pha rol gnon pa drag mo ni phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ de'i lha yul dang / lha ma yin dang / grub pas bsten pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der ma zhugs
205b6(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te lha de dag la glang po che'i lha stangs kyis bltas so// de nas phyogs gcig na 'dug pa'i dpal gyi lha mo dang /
205b7(rgyud 'bum): nya mo stobs chen mo lha'i pha rol gnon pa dang ldan pa drug kyang bltas so// de nas pho nya mo drug po rnams kyis dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la legs par bltas nas/ pho nya mo de dag gis bsto//
206a1(rgyud 'bum): de pho nya mo chen mo me lce ma dang / me stag ma dang / 'phreng ldan ma dang / mdzod ldan ma dang / 'bar ldan ma dang / kha' bar ma dang / 'di dag gis dpal gyi lha mo la bstod
206a2(rgyud 'bum): pa.ag+ni dzaM hAswa yaM na maH/ pI ta daMSh+TA ya na maH/ ya mA ya na maH/ da ha nA ya na maH/ bin+du dzaM hA ya na maH/ A daR+sha nA ya na maH/ bri sha lA ya na maHswA hA/ me lcems bstod nas lba rnams dga'
206a3(rgyud 'bum): bar gyur to/ / me stag ma'i rig sngags bshad de/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ pu ru pu ru sahA/ a kats+tsha pa te swA hA/ me stag mas bstod nas/ 'phreng ldan mas bstod pa/ na mo badz+ra pA Ne ye/
206a4(rgyud 'bum): de ba ti/ de ba ya/ tse li mi li/ ka li pra tIts+tsha bi l-i de ba te swA hA/ 'phreng ldan mas bstod nas/ mdzod ldan ma sa bstod pa/ na mo badz+ra pA Na ye de ba ti d+ha bA yA ti ba ri si ri ri/ byi du ri/ dza pe nata

206a6(rgyud 'bum): na ni hu na ni/ mo ha ni me ha ni/ hi hi badz+ra pA Ni swA hA/ 'bar ldan mas bstod nas/ kha' bar mas mngon par bstod pa/ shri ye ma hA shr-i ye/ tsa la ma hA tsa le/ e rId de ka na/ ma hA
206a7(rgyud 'bum): b+ho ga ni/ b+ho ga ba ti/ ma mA ba lo ka swA hA/ kha'i bar mas bstod nas lha'i mig gis rnam par bltas so// de nas dpal gyi lha mo chen mos lag na rdo rje la bstod nas/ de nas bskyod par
206b1(rgyud 'bum): brtsams so/ / de nas lha'i dkyil 'khor de dag gis dpal gyi lha mo chen mo rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas myur du langs te/ lag na rdo rje'i g.yas phyogs su 'khod do// stobs po che'i tshogs
206b2(rgyud 'bum): brgyad la gtum byed dang / gser can dang / rmugs byed dang / rdzong ldan dang / lcags can dang / so can dang / mtshan sbyin dang / bdud rtsi thab sbyor la sogs pa tshogs brgyad po de dag gis
206b3(rgyud 'bum): mngon par bstod do/ / tshogs rnams kyis dpal gyi lha mo chen mo stobs chen mo bstod pa na/ spyan dang lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas/ thog mar gtum byed ma brjod pa/ na mo badz+ra pA Na ye/
206b4(rgyud 'bum): dam da ma raM gA raM gAg ga ga ya ga ya ga ya/ tsan+da ko dzI pa ya ti swa hA/ gnyis pa ste gsar can brjod pa/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ ba na ba na/ tsa la pa tsa la pa/ na mo dzA ko dz+nyA ba ya ti swA hA/ gsum pa ste/
206b5(rgyud 'bum): rmugs byed brjod pa/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ tsArnA ts+tsharnA/ nA sha ya/ bi nA sha ya dzaM b+ha ko dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ bzhi pa ste rdzo nga ldan brjod pa/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ tsu ru tsu ru/ tatra
206b6(rgyud 'bum): tatam ta ma ta/ ko ta ta ko ta ta dz+nyA pa ya ti sA hA/ lnga pa ste tshegs chen mo lcags can brjod pa/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ tad+ya thA/ ra ba ra ba/ da ba da ba/ ma ra ma ra/ mA ra mA ra/ b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/
206b7(rgyud 'bum): han ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ tshon+da tshin+da/ b+hin+da bin+da/ ha na le ha ka badz+re Na swA hA/ drug pa ste so can brjod pa/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ hu ta hu ta/ grA ha ma pa ha ri shu mi badz+re ha taH
207a1(rgyud 'bum): su pra tin dan ta ko dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ bdun pa ste tshogs gzi bo che stobs po che mtshan sbyin brjod pa/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ b+ho ma hA gra ha badz+ra sa t+ye na su pa ti pi ba rA
207a2(rgyud 'bum): la to dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ brgyad pa ste tshogs chen po bdud rtsi thab sbyor brjod pa/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ a mr-i ta kuN+Da la/ kha kha khA hi khA hI/ b+han+da b+han+da swA hA/ lpad dag gis tshegs
207a3(rgyud 'bum): chen brgyad po de dag las brtsams te/ dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la bstod nas/ tshogs chen po de dag gis kyang dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la rim gro byed cing lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du song ngo //
207a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas gzhon nu smin drug gi bus lha mo dA la bstod pa mthong nas rang gi reg sngags kyis dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la bstod pa/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ trai lo kya dza la ni ba drA pa Ni/ sarba d+harmA Ni/ sa ma ni/ sa mi
207a5(rgyud 'bum): ra Ne sarba lo ka ba shaM ka ri/ dzA dze mu dzaM/ hr-i da yaM/ A brta ni/ mi li mi li/ mi li tsa lA ya/ sarba lo ko ta sA da ni/ a nun ha na swA hA/ de nas dpal gyi lha mo chen mo gzhon nu smin drug gi bus
207a6(rgyud 'bum): bstod nas yid rab tu dga' zhing / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du song ngo // de nas dpal gyi lha mo chen mo 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du song ba drug mas mthong nas rang gi rig sngags kyis
207a7(rgyud 'bum): bstod pa/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ na maHsat+ya pA Ni nan/ sat+ya bA tsa ne na sa t+yaM/ ba hi ni sa t+ye ba de sa t+yaM/ ba hi te dza ba ti/ mA la ni/ ha ri Nai brta ni/ dza lo tad tsa li/ sarba le ka ba shaM ka ri/
207b1(rgyud 'bum): At+manAn mu ni s+yA/ ke bi te/ sog mdar/ hi li ha li/ na mo stu te swA hA/ drug mas bstod pa dka' bzlog mas mthong nas mngon par bstod pa/ na mo badz+ra pA rdzi s+ya/ s+yAd de/ da yi te/ a ti
207b2(rgyud 'bum): so me brah+ma/ bi da ni/ ri shi ri shi/ nak+Sha ta tre/ ya stad tra s+ya d+ya na/ taM ba ta ka te ya ni swA hA/ de nas dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la drug ma dang dka' bzlog ma gnyis kyis bstod nas/ drug ma dang dka'
207b3(rgyud 'bum): bzlog ma gnyis la'ang bltas te/ lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du song ngo // de nas dpal gyi lha mo chen mo lha rnams kyis bstod de/ lag na rdo rje 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du
207b4(rgyud 'bum): zhugs nas rig pa mchog gi cho ga chen po rgyas pa phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba dang / rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po brgyan pa dang / rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po rgyas pa bsgrub pa dang
207b5(rgyud 'bum): rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po'i dpal bskyed pa dang / rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po'i rig sngags kyi las thams cad bya ba'i phyir/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i mchog lag na
207b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rjes rjes su yi rang ba/ ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa/ grub pa rnams chud mi za bar byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin pa/ rtag tu dpal mngon par 'phel bar byed pa/ dkyil
207b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor thams cad gsal bar byed pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi nang du gtogs pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad la 'jug par byed pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa'i rig sngags
208a1(rgyud 'bum): bshad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rje spyi bo la bkur te rig sngags 'di bshad do// na mo bud+d+ha s+ya
208a2(rgyud 'bum): namo d+harma s+ya/ na maHsaM g+ha s+ya/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ na mo yak+ShA NAn/ na mo ma hA shri ye/ tsi li tsau li/ un mA da/ pra man+te/ dr-irnA/ shri ye/ tsa le tsa le/ shrI ye/ a ki ra Ni/ u pa tiSh+Tha/ u
208a3(rgyud 'bum): pa tiSh+Tha/ i maM pu ru ShaM/ na maHu pa tiSh+Tha/ ma ya ra ma/ gr-i he gr-i he/ de ba to badz+ra swa mAn swA hA/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gyi lha mo chen mos rog sngags bshad ma thag tu lha rnams
208a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis de thos nas skyong 'drar te/ lag na rdo rje'i zhal du lta zhing 'khod do// de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rjes/ lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha rnams khyed kyis rig
208a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gyi lha mo chen mos rig sngags bshad pa gang yin pa nyon cig/ rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po'i phyir 'phel bar bya ba dang / rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas

208b1(rgyud 'bum): dpal 'phel bar byed pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad gsal bar byed pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi nang du gtogs pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug par byed pa/ dkyil 'khor

208b3(rgyud 'bum): s a re de nas lha rnams snying 'dar te lag na rdo rje'i zhal du lta zhing rig sngags kyi rgyal po lag na rdo rje la dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gtogs pa'i rig sngags kyis kyang mngon par bstod de
208b4(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gyi lha mos rig sngags bshad pa gang yin pa de dag gis lag na rdo rje la bstod nas tshig 'di skad ces smras so/ / rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gyi

208b7(rgyud 'bum): cad skyed par byed pa/ pha rol phyin pa thams cad kyi tshegs su gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po de ngas bshad par bya ste/ gang mthong nas rig sngags 'changa' thams cad kyi dpal
209a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi mngon par 'gyur ba dang / lha thams cad bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / log 'dren thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / rgyal srid thams cad bsten par
209a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba dang / dgra thul bar 'gyur ba dang / rig sngags 'chang gi dpal rnams 'phel bar 'gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po de ngas bshad do// sa gzhi mnyam par brtag byas la/
209a3(rgyud 'bum): shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri// khru ni bzhi 'am khru ni bcu drug pa// gyo mo dang ni gseg ma med// dur khrod yang na shing gcig drung // yang na chu klung 'dus pa'i mdo// sa gzhi de
209a4(rgyud 'bum): dag brtag byas la/ / de nas mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri// sa de lta bu mthong nas smyung pa byas te/ gso sbyong dang ldan pas du gu la'i ras dkar po bgos la/ lag na pog por thogs
209a5(rgyud 'bum): nas phye ma red kyi dus 'tshams su dpal gyi lha mo'i rig sngags kyis lha rnams spyan drang bar bya'o/ / de nas nam phyed kyi dus sam yang na nang par dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ ci ste gser gyi phye mas
209a6(rgyud 'bum): brin ni lha'i dpal thob par 'gyur ro/ / dngul gyis ni dgra las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// zangs kyis ni zhi bar 'gyur ro// yang na tsan dan gyi bye mas bris na ni dpal thob par 'gyur ro// tsan dan

209b1(rgyud 'bum): nani dgra las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ / yang na me'i bsreg bya byas pa'i thal bas bris na ni zhi bar 'gyur ro// ci ste so bag gi phye ma 'am/ sol phye 'am/ dur khrod kyi thal ba'ang rung ste/ tshen rtsi 'di
209b2(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyis dkyil 'khor bris na ni yul 'khor la gnod par 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang bdag nyid dag par bya ste/ rgyu skar dang mthun pa'i dus su sbyang ba byas la/ nyi ma bzang ba 'am// yang na/
209b3(rgyud 'bum): yar gyi ngo chos lnga la dkyil 'khor khru bcu drug pa'am/ yang na khru bcu bzhi pa bri'o// ci ste thog mar shar phyogs su thig btab na ni rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi dpal 'phel bar 'gyur ro// ci ste lho phyog
209b4(rgyud 'bum): su btab na ni grong khyer la gnod par 'gyur ro/ / tsi ste nub phyogs su btab na ni rig sngags 'chang rnams phan tshun mi mthun par 'gyur ro// ci ste byang phyogs su ba ta ba na ni dgra thams cad las
209b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ / ci ste thog mar tshon dkar po bkye na ni rgyal po rgyal bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi las 'grub par 'gyur ro// ci ste tshon dmar po bkye na ni grong khyer zhi bar 'gyur
209b6(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / ci skyin ga po bkyen ni grong khyer la mi dge bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis rig sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas brjod byed bzhin du dkyil 'khor zi ba bya ste/ byung phyogs suni
209b7(rgyud 'bum): gangs kyi ri gzhag go/ / lho phyogs su ni ri'i bigs byed gzhag go// de nas khor yug gi ris bskor bar bya'o// dbus su ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bri'o// g.yon logs su ni
210a1(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje bri'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su ni dpal lha mo chen mo bri'o// lag na rdo rje'i drung du ni po nya mo drug bri'o// byang phyogs ngos su ni khyab 'jug dang /
210a2(rgyud 'bum): lha chen po dang / tshangs pa rnams de dag dang mthun pa'i 'khor dang bdud rtsi gzhag go/ nub phyogs su drug ma dang / dka' ba zlog ma dang / gzhon nu 'khor dang bcas pa gzhag go/ lho phyogs su
210a3(rgyud 'bum): ni tshogs drug cu rtsa bzhi po rnams gzhag go/ sgo re rer yang tshogs rnams gzhag par bya ste/ shar phyogs kyi sgor gtum byed dang / gsar can gnyis gzhag go/ lce phyogs kyi sgor ni
210a4(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi thab sbyor dang / rmugs byed gnyis gzhag go/ nub phyogs kyi sgor ni rdzong ldan dang / mtshan sbyin gnyis gzhag go/ byang phyogs kyi sgor ni lcags can dang / so can gnyis gzhag
210a5(rgyud 'bum): go nang du ni bcom ldan 'das tshig ldan ma dri za'i 'khor gyis bskor ba gzhag go/ / kar sha pa Na brgya rtsa tshang ba'am/ yang na pa Na brgyas rdo rje byas te bzhag la/ de'i steng du spyan gyis bzlas
210a6(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas pa'i bum pa mi gnag cing rtsa ba med la mgrin bcings dang bcas pa gzhag par bya ste/ bum pa de'i nang du sa bon thams cad dang / rin po che thams cad gzhug cing 'o ma
210a7(rgyud 'bum): yod pa'i shing gi yal ga gzhag go/ grwa bzhir yang bum pa bzhi gzhag par bya ste/ mgrin bcings dang ldan pa la sa bon dang rin po che thams cad bcug ste/ 'o ma yod pa'i shing gi
210b1(rgyud 'bum): yal ga gnag go/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gang dag dpal lam rig sngags 'chang las byung ba'i 'bras bu 'dod na rig sngags 'chang de bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya'o// bla ma des kyang rig sngags
210b2(rgyud 'bum): 'chang sbyang ba byas pa/ byang chub kyi sems yongs su bzung ba/ gso sbyong gi yan lag dang ldan pa/ gos gtsangam bgos pa/ dar dkar gyis gdong g.yog pa dkyil 'khor du gzhug par
210b3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de la nub phyogs kyi sgor bcug na ni dpal mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// lho phyogs su ni rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro// shar phyogs su ni 'thab mo 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang
210b4(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su ni bla ma'o sgo yin te 'jug par mi bya'o/ / de nas bla ma'i rig sngags 'chang du gu la'i ras dkar pos gdong g.yogs la/ dpal gyi lha mo'i rig sngags kyis mgo bor bsang gtor
210b5(rgyud 'bum): byas te gzhug go/ / de nas 'gron bu brgyad brgya lha la dor bar bya'o// 'gron bu de'ang lo mas dkris na ni rig sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro// ras dkar po dkris te bor na ni zhag bdun gyis
210b6(rgyud 'bum): dpal 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang de dag la lha rnams kyang bstan par bya'o// de nas phyir byung ste byang phyogs su song la dbus kyi bum pa'i chus khyor ba'i nang du sbyin no//
210b7(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags 'chang rnams kyis kyang lag pa g.yon pas mnos te btung bar bya'o// rig sngags rnams la'ang sems can thams cad bdag gis yongs su gzung ngo zhes spros
211a1(rgyud 'bum): shig ces bsgo bar bya'o/ / de'i 'og tu de dag gi don gyi phyir bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes smrar gzhug go/ de'i 'og
211a2(rgyud 'bum): tu de dag gi don gyi phyir rig sngags kyi tshogs rnams ba dag la grub par gyur cig ces smrar gzhug go/ de nas rig sngags 'chang ba spu ldang bar 'gyur zhing bstod pa'i glu'i sgra'ang thos par
211a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de'i 'og tu 'ong ba'i bram ze rnams kyang rgyal bar gyur cig/ dar bar gyur cig ces brjod par 'gyur ro// dung gi sgra dang rnga sgra'ang thos par 'gyur ro// ci ste bud med
211a4(rgyud 'bum): gos dkar po bgo zhing snod gang ba thogs pa mthong na ni/ lag na rdo rjes ji skad bshad pa bzhin du rig sngags 'chang de la dpal 'ong bar 'gyur ro// ci ste thub pa gang ba mthong na ni

211a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong na ni de'ang rgyal bar 'gyur te/ dgra rnams btul nas sa'i steng 'khor bar 'gyur ro// mi phal pa gang la la dpal 'dod
211b1(rgyud 'bum): pas dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mthong na'ang skal ba can gyi khyad par du 'gyur zhing / rgyal srid dam/ yul gru'i bdag po'am/ grong gi
211b2(rgyud 'bum): bdag por 'gyur te/ dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i las 'di ni don yod pa yin no// zhes rdo rje 'dzin pas bshad do// de nas rig sngags 'chang rig sngags kyi dngos grub 'dod pas
211b3(rgyud 'bum): dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen mo mthong la/ mthong nas zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du nges par gnas par bya ste/ rig sngags gang 'dod pa bzlas
211b4(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis de la rig sngags de 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / rgyal pos de mthong te zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du nges par gnas pa'ang yid la bsams pa thams
211b5(rgyud 'bum): cad thob par 'gyur ro/ / las rnams zin nas rig sngags kyi lha bshos sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs rnying pa de rnams kyang bsdus la dur khrod dam chu klung gang yang rung bar dor bar
211b6(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang dbang phyug nyams pa'am/ rgyal po'i dpal nyams pa slar gso bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang des zhag gsum smyung ba byas te/ zla ba nya'i nub
211b7(rgyud 'bum): mo gnas dben pa'am/ yang na n+ya gro d+ha'i drung du dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor khru bcu drug pa/ sgo bzhi yod pa/ me'i sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal bas bri zhing /
212a1(rgyud 'bum): dpal gyi lha mo'i rig sngags dang sbyar te/ de'i dbus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bri'o// g.yon phyogs su ni rdo rje bri'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yas phyogs su ni dpal
212a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi lha mo chen mo bri'o/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs kyi ngos su bum pa nyi shu rtsa bdun dgod par bya'o// byang dang / nub dang / lhor yang de bzhin du dgod par
212a3(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / bum pa de dag gi nang du'ang sa bon dang rin po che thams cad gzhug go// bum pa thams cad kyang mgrin bcings dang ldan par bya'o// bum pa de dag thams cad du 'o ma yod pa'i shing gi yal
212a4(rgyud 'bum): ga'ang bcug ste lan bdun bdun pasngags so/ / de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dang / dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la lnga bshos rgyas par dbul zhing mchod
212a5(rgyud 'bum): pa rgyas par bya'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dkyil 'khor gur kum gyis skyang nul du byugs la/ de'i mdun du bil ba'i shing gis me sbar te/ ba ser mo be'u yod pa'i
212a6(rgyud 'bum): mar gyi nang du a ka ru'i yam sreg shing ngam/ yang na pad+ma brgyad stong bsnyugs te sbyin sreg byas la mar gyi mar me brgyad stong sbar te de nas las bya'o// las zin nas bum pa de dag
212a7(rgyud 'bum): gis rgyal po de khrus byed du bcug la/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du nges par gnas par byas na zin pa'i rjes la rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro// phal pa gang la las khrus byas na de'i
212b1(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod kyi gzhi 'grub par 'gyur te/ rgyal srid dam/ yul gru'i bdag po 'am/ grong gi bdag por 'gyur ro// ci ste ba lang dang bram ze gsod par byed na'ang sdig pa thams
212b2(rgyud 'bum): cad las thar par 'gyur ro/ / gang dang gang 'dod pa'i phyir byas na'ang 'dod pa de dang de thob par 'gyur te/ ji ltar nga de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham 'bring na rtag tu gnas pa de bzhin du
212b3(rgyud 'bum): dpal gyi lha mo chen mo 'di de'i thad na gnas par 'gyur ro/ / ji ltar rdo rje 'di rtag tu nga la gnas pa de bzhin du dpal gyi lha mo 'di rtag tu de la gnas par 'gyur ro// gang zhig rtag tu
212b4(rgyud 'bum): dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor 'chang ba de la ni rtag tu lha rnams srung bar byed cing zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang ngam/ rig
212b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang gi bu 'am/ rig sngags 'chang ma gang zhig dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mthong na thams cad 'phel bar byed pa'i dpal thob par
212b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs so// // de nas drang srong lnga dga' ba'i tshal du 'khod nas gcig la gcig
212b7(rgyud 'bum): bgyis te 'di gang smras so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'di nyid ni// sems can rnams la pan 'dod phyir// thub pa'i drung na gas
213a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags/ / rnam pa sna tshogs thabs kyis su// rig mchog cho ga chen po gang // lha rnams la ni grub sbyin zhing // thos nas rtag tu lha rnams ni// lha min las
213a2(rgyud 'bum): ljon byed kyis/ / sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir// gsang ba'i bdag po stobs po che// zhi ba dang ni dul ba yi// thad du song nas bri bar bya// de nas lha'i drang srong 'od zer can dang / 'ong
213a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / kun shes dang / gnas 'jog dang / mi sbyin gyi bu la sogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das dang / lag na rdo rje dang / dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po gang
213a4(rgyud 'bum): na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ lha'i glu dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje la mngon par bstod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes dkyil 'khor de nas langs nas/ lha'i drang srong de dag
213a5(rgyud 'bum): la smras pa/ drang srong chen po khyed rnams sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir brtson pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang / dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed
213a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po'i nang du 'ongs pa legs so legs so/ / de nas dga' ba'i tshal chen po yid du 'ong ba dang / shing chen po yongs 'du la gnas pa'i srin mo nam gru zhes bya ba stobs chen mo
213a7(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grus chen mo/ 'jig rten gsum na byis pa rnams gsod pa/ 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can de'ang drang srong de dag gi thad du song ste mthong nas ltad mor gyur te/ dkyil 'khor
213b1(rgyud 'bum): de dang nye ba zhig tu song nas rgyang na 'dug cing / rdo rje 'bar ba'i gzi brjid kyis de'i nang du 'ong ma nus so// de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams dang / mi sbyin gyi bu la sogs
213b2(rgyud 'bum): pa drang srong rnams lag na rdo rje'i zhal du lta zhing / rdo rje 'dzin srin mo nam gru zhes bya ba stobs chen mo/ brtson 'grus chen mo/ 'di ni skye bo gnas pa dang 'gro ba 'jigs par byed pa lags
213b3(rgyud 'bum): kyis rdo rje 'dzin chen po srin mo'i 'jigs pa de las bdag cag yongs su skyobs shig/ de nas dpal dang ldan pa rdo rje 'dzin khros te mig dmar por bsgyur nas rang gi dpung la bltas te/
213b4(rgyud 'bum): lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha rnams re zhig 'khod cig dang / 'jig rten na sdang ba gang ji snyed yod pa de dag gzhig par bya'o// de nas lha rnams dang drang srong de dag gis
213b5(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje dang spyan la bstod nas/ rdo rje 'dzin srin mo chen mo/ brtson 'grus chen mo/ stobs chen mo khyod kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug mi nus kyis/ rdo rje 'dzin khyod kyis kyang srin mo chen
213b6(rgyud 'bum): mo 'di la bstod par mdzod cig dang / des na dkyil 'khor du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes lha de dag la snying rje'i sems kyis bltas nas srin mo nam
213b7(rgyud 'bum): gru la rang gi cho 'brang las bstod pa/ nam gru khyod kyi cho 'brang dang // mtshan nyid dag ni bshad bya na// nor bu'i rang bzhin khyod kyi lus// rgyab ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser//
214a1(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyi gdong yang dngul yin te// lto ba'i ngos ni rdo rjes gtams// ming po mdzod dang mdzod srung ba// khyod kyi ma ni kun 'gro ma// khyod kyi pha ni rlung
214a2(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya/ / skal ldan shing rta khyod kyi rus// lha yul dag tu grags pa yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes srin mo nam gru rang gi cho 'brang la bstod nas/
214a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag nyid che// tshangs dang gsum la phyag 'tshal te// dbang phyug che la phyag 'tshal nas// sa 'dzin
214a4(rgyud 'bum): rlung rnams gang yin dang / / gang dag gnod sbyin stobs po che// grub pa rgyu ba dri za rnams// drang srong lha dang lha min pa// de nas 'byung po thams cad dang // 'od zer can dang 'od srung
214a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / kun shes dang ni gnas 'jog dang // thub pa chen po mi sbyin bu// dbang po gtum po khyab 'jug dang // 'di rnams bdag la grub sbyin shog/ nam gru mo ni bshad bya na//
214a6(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mo nag mo 'jigs byed ma// gshin rje'i sring mo chen mo ste// yongs 'du'i shing la gnas pa yin// ri la khyab 'jug gcig pu ni// bde bar nyal bar mi nyam ste// des ni bya yi
214a7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs kyis su/ / mtshan mo khyab 'jug skrag par byed// lha mo nag mo stobs mo ches// de mthong nas ni 'ong bar 'gyur// de nas rtsed mo byed bzhin du// byis pa gsod pa'i mgrin pa nas// lag pa
214b1(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pas bzung nas ni/ / 'jigs pa'i sgra yang 'byin par byed// rna gnyis kyang ni mi mthong ste// sems nyams pas ni de mthong nas// shin tu bred cing bzhin yang 'gyur// khyod ni nga la ma
214b2(rgyud 'bum): 'tshe bar/ / lha yi dga' gnas dga' bar gyis// de nas khros nas de nyid du// byis pa gsod la bsgo ba ni// lo gcig pa dang lo gnyis dang // lo dgu pa la ma 'jug par// dazang mo song la skye
214b3(rgyud 'bum): dgu 'di/ / rang gi las kyis bza' bar gyis// ba lang rnams la gor yang byos// wa rnams dang ni wa gsod dang // ri dgas la ni ri dgas nad// mi rnams la ni mi ngas byos// khyod kyis lus
214b4(rgyud 'bum): la deng brlag gyur/ / byis pa rnams ni rtse gyur cig/ byis pa rnams la phan gdags phyir// ma mo rnams la snyems pa'i mchog/ mi rnams kyang ni rim bzhin du// de ni bdag gis bshad
214b5(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / dkyil 'khor 'di ni mthong ba la// gdon ni gang zhig ldog mi byed// gdon mang dag gis de spangs nas// mun pa mi bzang gnas par 'gyur// gang gis su ni zhi 'gyur ba//
214b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di yang lha rnams mnyan par gyis// gang na bud med srung byed pa// der ni byis pa bsrung bya ste// gser dag dang ni lung tang rnams// bud tran dzi ba lig pu mig/ gi'u wang mar dang
214b7(rgyud 'bum): sbrang ci dang / / yang na shu dag gro ba rnams// 'di dag gang gi khyim na yod// der ni byis pa bsrung bar bya// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje stobs po ches rig sngag bshad pa/
215a1(rgyud 'bum): na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ tsi li tsi li/ b+hin+na b+hin+da/ muny+tsa muny+tsu/ hi ba la ka na sA hA/ badz+ra pA Ni rA dz+nyA ba ya tI swA hA/ de bA sa mAdz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ ri shi ya/ sa mA dz+nyA pa ya
215a2(rgyud 'bum): ti swA hA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje stobs po ches 'di bshad ma thag tu srin mo stobs mo che nam grus skad chen po phyung nas/ dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar
215a3(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// stobs po che tshogs mi bzad pa/ mchog tu mi bzad pa
215a4(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu 'jigs pa las bdag sgrub tu gsol/ de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rjes/ srin mo de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// srin mo ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs
215a5(rgyud 'bum): shig/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che dran par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dran par gyis shig dang / des na 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro//
215a6(rgyud 'bum): bskal pa chen po ldog par gyis shig/ stobs po che nga'i bka' nyon cig/ de nas srin mo chen mo nam grus/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// byang chub
215a7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po bdag gis gtong lags kyis/ bdag gis ci bgyi ba bka' stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes/ srin mo de la smras pa/ gang na rig sngags kyi
215b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po gnas pa der khyod ma 'dug cig/ dpal thams cad 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ba gang yin pa dang / khyod kyi cho 'brang dang mtshan nyid gro ga la bris te 'chang
215b2(rgyud 'bum): ba der yang khyod kyis srungs la zhi ba dang bde legs su gyis shig/ smras pa/ stobs po che de ltar bgyi ste/ gang bdag gi cho 'brang dang mtshan nyid gro ga la gi'u wang gis bris nas snod
215b3(rgyud 'bum): du bcug ste 'chang ba dang / dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ba dang / yul lam grong khyer gang na dkyil 'khor chen po 'di 'dri ba'i yul de zhi ba
215b4(rgyud 'bum): dang bde legs su 'gyur te/ des na sems can sdang bar sems pa rnams kyis khyod kyi bka' mnyan nas srung bar byed de/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ro// byis pa gang nam gru'i cho 'brang
215b5(rgyud 'bum): dang mtshan nyid snod du bcug ste 'chang ba de la ni gdon thams cad kyis 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro/ / gang zhig dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bris pa'i
215b6(rgyud 'bum): dbus su rdo rje'i dbyibs kyi thab khung byas te/ rab tu grub par byed pa'i rgyud chen po las khro bo stobs po che ngas bshad pa gang yin pa 'am/ yang na rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen pos gu gul
215b7(rgyud 'bum): lam 'bru'i sbyin sreg byas na/ lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin du yul lam grong khyer gyi mi nad zhi bar 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i cho ga rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan
216a1(rgyud 'bum): 'das lag na rdo rjes/ lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// bzod ldan dag khyed nyon cig/ dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen
216a2(rgyud 'bum): po las ngas rig sngags bshad pa gang yin pa de dag gi las kyi 'bras bu ston pa rnam pa sna tshogs ngas bshad par bya'o/ / smras pa/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po sngags thams cad kyi las shod
216a3(rgyud 'bum): cig shod cig/ smras pa// lha rnams nga'i bka' gcog pa de ni ngas rdo rje 'bar ba kun tu rab tu 'bar bas spyi bo gshag par bya'o// dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil
216a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor chen po'i cho ga ngas bshad pa gang yin pa de'ang de bzhin du gyis shig/ nam gru'i cho 'brang dang mtshan nyid kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ yul gang du mi nad kyi gnod pa byung ba der ngas cho ga
216a5(rgyud 'bum): bshad pa'i cho ga des dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po bris la/ de'i dbus su rab tu grub par byed pa'i rgyud las bshang ba'i rdo rje khro bos gu gul las 'bru'i
216a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg bya'o/ / srin mo chen mo de'i gtor ma gang gis mi nad zhi bar gyur pa'ang bshad par bya ste/ 'bras kyi 'o thug sbyar thug dang // 'bras chan mon sran gre'u sbyar dang // 'bras chen bu ram sbyar
216a7(rgyud 'bum): bo dang / / til dang sbyar ba'i snum 'khur dang // 'bras kyi zhing de nu zho dang // ben tser 'khur ba bkra shis ldan// 'bras kyi chung peng la phug ti la// bur mar 'o ma nya dang sha// til phye las
216b1(rgyud 'bum): byas 'khur ba dang / / chang dang dbyig dang bcas pa dang // me tog 'phreng ba dri dang byug/ gtor ma de dag byin na ni// mi nad kun zhi phan par 'gyur// lha thams cad la'ang lha bshos sna tshogs
216b2(rgyud 'bum): dbul bar bya zhing / der shin tu bkra shis pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'ang bklag par bya'o// rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud chen po las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo
216b3(rgyud 'bum): rma bya chen mo'i rig sngags bdun brgyas bskor ba gang yin pa de'ang der bklag par bya ste/ rim gror bya zhing bla mar byas la/ dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / bshos rnams kyis mchod par bya'o//
216b4(rgyud 'bum): nam gru'i cho 'brang dang mtshan nyid kyang bklag par bya ste/ gro ga la bris nas mgo la btags na yul der zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur te/ yul der mi nad kyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// nam gru'i tshe
216b5(rgyud 'bum): 'brang mtshan nyid ni/ / lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin// de ni bdag gis nges par bstan// pho nya mo stobs chen mo rnams kyi las kyang bshad par bya ste/ dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar
216b6(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la pho nya mo stobs chen mo drug ngas bshad pa gang yin pa rnams dang / tshogs rnams kyi nang na po nya mo rnams kyis las sgrub pa lcags can bstan pa gang yin pa dang / mthong bar
216b7(rgyud 'bum): dka' ba bshad pa po nya tshogs drug gis bskor ba tshogs chen po lcags can gang gis mthong ba des pho nya mo rnams dang / 'grogs pa mi bzad pa dpa' bo'i tshogs chen po dang / pho nya mo rnams dang lhan cig
217a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa drag po mi bzad pa las drag po byed pa gzugs bzang po dang / lcags can po nya bo rnams dang lhan cig na gnas pa stobs po che sgrub pa ni mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la spyad
217a2(rgyud 'bum): ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs de bzhin du byas la/ de nas pho nya mo stobs mo che drug gzhag par bya'o// de la dbus su ni lag na rdo rje stobs po che drag
217a3(rgyud 'bum): po'i las byed pa gzugs bzang po gzhag go/ 'og logs su ni rkang pa g.yas pa'i lho phyogs su ni pho nya mo stobs mo che drug gzhag go/ rkang pa g.yas pa de'ang 'deg par bya ste/ tshogs chen
217a4(rgyud 'bum): po lcags can stobs po che tshogs bdun gyis bskor bas lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje 'dzin chen po'i rkang pa g.yas pa ston cing 'dzin par bya'o/ / de nas lcags can gyi 'og logs su rin po che thams cad dang 'bru
217a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad gzhag par bya'o/ yang na kar sha pa Na brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar dbul bar bya'o// lag na rdo rje dang / lcags can la sogs pa tshogs rnams dang / pho nya mo stobs mo che de dag kyang tshon sna gsum
217a6(rgyud 'bum): gyis bri bar bya'o/ / de nas lag na rdo rje dang / tshogs chen mo rnams dang / pho nya mo'i tshogs de dag la lha bshos sna tshogs du bral bar bya'o// de nas tshogs chen po lcags can gyi sngags ldan brgya rtsa brgya
217a7(rgyud 'bum): bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas mtshan mo rmi lam bzang po rmi bar 'gyur ro// yang na skyes pa 'am bud med mthong bar 'gyur ro// ci ste skyes pa nag po mig dmar la gos ser po gyon pa zhig mthong na ni
217b1(rgyud 'bum): phyin chad rig sngags 'chang gi zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / drag shul gyi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// ci ste bud med gos dkar po gyon pa mdog gnag pa 'am/ sngo bsangs sam/ dkar
217b2(rgyud 'bum): po mthong bar gyur na/ de ci ste dkar po mthong na ni ldong ros bsgrub par bya'o// ci ste sngo bsangs mthong na ni mtshon cha thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// ci ste nag po mthong na ni lig bu mig dang /
217b3(rgyud 'bum): wang long bu dang / sdang zil la sogs pa'i mig sman rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// pho nya mo rnams kyi las thams cad la ni nang par bla ma dang tshegs lag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar bya ste/ bdag nyid kyis
217b4(rgyud 'bum): po nya mo rnams kyi thabs su bud med gang yang rung ba ku sha'i stan byas pa la 'dug pa la ci rigs pa'i kha zas kyis ston na/ pho nya mo drug dang tshogs stobs po che brgyad po rnams 'grub par 'gyur te/
217b5(rgyud 'bum): zhag gsum na pho nya mo'i tshogs rnams yongs su mgu bar gyur pas glo bur du skyes pa dang bud med kyi gzugs kyis shing thog sbyin par byed do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis shing thog blangs
217b6(rgyud 'bum): la bdag grub bo snyam du shes par byas nas/ lag na rdo rje dang po nya mo'i tshogs rnams la mchod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje pho nya mo'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu tshon rtsi sna gsum gyis dris pa 'din
217b7(rgyud 'bum): gang gis mthong na'ang po nya mo'i tshigs thams cad 'grub par 'gyur na/ sgrub pa dang 'chang ba lta ci smos/ dbyig de dag kyang lag par bzhag ste bla ma la dbul bar bya'o// bul nas kyang po nya mo'i tshogs
218a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams bdag la grub par gyur cig ces smras la/ de nas kyang bsgrims te pho nya mo'i tshogs kyis bltas pa'i las 'di bsgrub par bya'o// de nas pho nya mo drug dang tshogs stobs pa
218a2(rgyud 'bum): che brgyad po rnams las sna tshogs kyis bsgrub par bya'o/ / pho nya mo rnams kyi las sna tshogs rnams bshad par bya ste/ me lce ma'i las 'di rnams bsrung ba ni lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i skud pas bya'o//
218a3(rgyud 'bum): mtshams gcad pa ni thal bas bya'o// dug las gso ba ni yal gas bya'o// gdon thams cad la ni yungs kar gyis gdab pa'i las bya'o// gzhon nu'i gdon la ni rna bar gshibs te brdzas brjod byas
218a4(rgyud 'bum): pas gtong bar byed de/ gzhon nu thams cad la rtag tu sbyar bar bya'o// dbab pa ni gu gul gyis bdug par bya'o// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje la me
218a5(rgyud 'bum): tog dkar po stong gis bsnun na longs spyod kyi gzhi sbyin par byed do/ / zla ba gcig gi bar du slong mo'i zas bza' zhing rig sngags bzlas brjod byas nas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ 'phags
218a6(rgyud 'bum): pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lcags can bzhag nas mchod pa rgyas par byas la/ de'i mdun du dong ka'i shing gis ma sbar la ldong ros pa lang gi mkhris pa dang sbyar bas lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na glo bur du
218a7(rgyud 'bum): ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ de nas tshogs chen po rmugs byed 'ongs par 'gyur ro// 'ongs nas rmugs byed kyis ldong ros sbyin par byed de/ de thogs pas 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can
218b1(rgyud 'bum): du 'gyur zhing / lcags can dang kha dog mtshungs la bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro// yang na slong mo'i zas bza' zhing dben pa'i gnas su lan 'dum bzlas brjod byas na tshogs chen po lcags can
218b2(rgyud 'bum): gyis ral gri sbyin par byed de/ de thogs pas stobs dang pha rol gnon pa dpag tu med cing bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro// byan lag gi tshang nas shing bu blangs la/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i
218b3(rgyud 'bum): mdun du lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas de thogs pas yid la gang bsams pa de 'grub par 'gyur te/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / zas dang / gos dang / mal stan rnams yid la bsams
218b4(rgyud 'bum): pas 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / de lta bu'i shing bu chu klung chen por bor te/ de nas nyi ma la bltas la chu ngogs su bzlas brjod byas na yid la gang bsams pa de dag thams cad 'grub cing tshe lo khri thub
218b5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur te/ mi'i thod pa la dbab pa dang / ral gri dang me long la dbab pa'ang byed nus par 'gyur ro// yar gyi ngo zla ba nya la brtsams te slong mo'i zas za zhing / 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i
218b6(rgyud 'bum): zhabs kyi drung du lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na bud med thob par 'gyur ro/ / dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i las bya ba dang / lha rnams la dri dbul ba'ang 'di'i rig sngags
218b7(rgyud 'bum): kyis bya'o/ / me lce ma'i cho ga ste dang po rdzogs so// / me stag ma'i las rnams 'byung ste/ dbab pa ni lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i chus bya'o// rgya gzhom pa ni so
219a1(rgyud 'bum): phag gis bya'o/ / dug las gso ba ni yal gas bya'o// sngon dang lu tas zin pa rnams ni byab pas bya'o// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te du
219a2(rgyud 'bum): gseg ma blangs nas/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas nas gseg ma de thogs pas gang la bsdigs pa de rgyas btab par 'gyur la/ gu gul gyis bdag
219a3(rgyud 'bum): grol bar 'gyur ro/ / mi ro la bltas te longs zhes smras na ldang bar 'gyur te/ don du gnyer ba'i mchog ston par 'gyur ro// de nas rma bya sgrub par 'dod na zhag gsum smyung ba byas te/ mar bya
219a4(rgyud 'bum): ngo zhag bcu bzhi la gzhon nu'i gnas su song la tshon rtsi sna gsum gyis rma bya bris nas de'i lus la rma bya'i sgro bzhag ste lha bshos sna tshogs phul la/ de nas skad lan gsum phyung gi bar du rig
219a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags bzlas brjod byas na de phyin chad dug gso ba'i las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / rma bya'i sgo de'ang dud pa bkag ste bsregs la/ des mig bskus na phye ma red lus mi snang bar 'gyur te
219a6(rgyud 'bum): yid la gang bsams pa'i don de byed nus par 'gyur ro/ / sems can thams cad la'ang mtshams gcad par nus so// 'bru'i zhing gi steng du song la lan stong bzlas brjod byas na 'bru rnams rgyas
219a7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / 'bru ma rungs par bya bar 'dod ni ma'i rus pa'i phur bu la lan stong bzlas brjod byas te btsugs na ma rungs par 'gyur ro// dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i
219b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor chen po la me tog dbul ba dang / lha thams cad la lha bshos dbul ba'ang 'di'i rig sngags kyis bya'o// me stag ma'i cho ga ste gnyis pa rdzogs so// / 'theng
219b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan ma'i las rnams 'byung ste/ bud med dbang du bya na zhag gsum gyi bar du dus gsum du lan tsha'i sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// zla ba gcig gi bar du dus gsum du khrus byas te dus
219b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum du lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na zla ba gcig lon nas/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje mthong bar 'gyur te bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed cing tshe lo lnga
219b4(rgyud 'bum): brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ / yar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig spyang ba byas te/ dgon pa'i gnas su lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas na glo bur du 'ongs pa 'gyur te/ 'ongs nas gter sbyin par byed
219b5(rgyud 'bum): la de'ang mi zad par 'gyur ro/ / zhag gsum spyad pa byas te yar gyi ngo tshes lnga la bum pa sa bon dang rin po che thams cad kyis bkang ste mgrin bcings dang bcas pa gzhag ste/ rig sngags kyang lan brgyad
219b6(rgyud 'bum): stong bzlas brjod byas la chu des rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i bu khrus byed du bcug na yul de dpal dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin dbang du bya bar 'dod na dgon pa'i gnas skyes pa dang bud med
219b7(rgyud 'bum): meng pa'i phyogs su zla ba gcig gi bar du slong mo'i zas bza' zhing sa las gnod sbyin gyi gzugs byas te dus gsum du lan brgyad brgya 'am/ lan stong bzlas brjod byas na zla ba drug lon pa na gnod sbyin gyi bdag
220a1(rgyud 'bum): po 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de na re/ bdag cag gis ci zhig bya/ dam pa slongs shig ces zer ba dang / de nas des 'di skad du dpag tshad brgya tshun chad kyi gnod sbyin thams cad bdag gi dbang
220a2(rgyud 'bum): dugyur cig ces smros shig/ de na re/ de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas mi snang bar 'gyur te/ yid la ci bsams pa de thams cad byed cing dus ma yin par rtsa ba dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / zas dang /
220a3(rgyud 'bum): gos dang / rin po che dang / ti na ra gang 'dod pa rnams sbyin par byed do// de nas longs spyod kyi gzhi blang bar 'dod na zhag drug spyang pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje kha mchod pa'i phyir zhing rgyas par
220a4(rgyud 'bum): byas la/ zla ba nya'i nub mo a ka ru dang / gu gul dang / du ru ka bsreg cing nam nangs kyi bar du bzlas brjod byas te zhag bdun gyi bor du nges par gnas na/ de nas longs spyod kyi gzhi chen po thob par 'gyur ro//
220a5(rgyud 'bum): dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i mar me rnams kyang 'di'i rig sngags kyis dbul bar bya'o// 'phreng ldan ma'i cho ga ste gsum pa rdzogs so//
220a6(rgyud 'bum): mdzod ldan ma'i las rnams 'byung ste/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rig sngags lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na nad thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro// dbab pa ni gu gul gyis bdug par bya'o// mar
220a7(rgyud 'bum): gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gsum smyung ba byas la/ gu gul dang bil ba lhan cig tu sbyar te lan stong bzlas brjod byas na ti na ra stong thob par 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te dur khrod du
220b1(rgyud 'bum): song nas mi'i thod pa blangs la ra'i 'o mas bkang ste/ thod pa gsum gyi steng du bzhag nas rig sngags bzlas brjod byed bzhin du 'bras sA lu'i 'o thug bcos la/ zin pa'i 'og tu rig sngags bzlas brjod
220b2(rgyud 'bum): byed bzhin du 'thungs te/ slar thod pa'i nang du skyug par bya'o// de nas yi dgas 'ong bar 'gyur te/ yi dgas na re/ rig sngags 'chang nga la'o thug byin cig ces zer ba dang / de nas rig sngags 'chang
220b3(rgyud 'bum): gis rig sngags thams cad kyi rgyal po bzlas brjod byed bzhin du yi dgas de la sbyin par bya'o/ / yi dgas des 'o thug 'thungs nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ de'i lag na ldong ros 'dug pa blangs na de thogs pas lag
220b4(rgyud 'bum): na rdo rje dang mthu stobs mnyam zhing bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro/ / rig sngags 'chang gis zla ba gcig gi bar du slong mo'i zas za zhing / rig sngags bzlas brjod byas na 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
220b5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / kun dga' ra bar zla ba gcig gi bar du slong mo'i zas za zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas pa'i mjug tu zhag gsum sbyang ba byas te/ mtshan rangs par bzlas brjod byas na/ de nas shing
220b6(rgyud 'bum): gi lhas gzugs ston par byed de/ de las 'grub par 'gyur la/ de phyin chad nags kyi lhas kha zas sbyin par 'gyur ro// dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha
220b7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la 'dug pa dbul ba'ang 'di'i rig sngags kyis bya'o/ / mdzod ldan ma'i cho ga ste bzhi pa rdzogs so// / 'bar ldan ma'i cho ga rnams 'byung ste/ dbab pa ni gu gu
221a1(rgyud 'bum): gyis bdug par bya'o/ / bsrung ba ni skud pas bya'o// mtshams gcad pa ni so phag gis bya'o// bslang ba ni thal mo brdab pas bya'o// sas ni 'bras dang phol mig
221a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams med par 'gyur ro/ / zla ba gcig gi bar du me tog dkar po la lan bdun bsngags te phye ma red byang phyogs su bor nas zla ba gcig lon pa na/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'grub par 'gyur te/
221a3(rgyud 'bum): bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing lo lnga brgya thub par 'gyur ro// rna bar gshibs te bzlas brjod byas na gdon thams cad kyis gtong bar 'gyur te/ gzhon nu rnams
221a4(rgyud 'bum): la rtag tu sbyar bar bya'o/ / mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig spyang ba byas te/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje la me tog dkar po stong gis bsnun na longs spyod kyi gzhi sbyin par 'gyur ro// zla ba
221a5(rgyud 'bum): gcig gi bar du slong mo'i zan bza' zhing rig sngags bzlas brjod byis nas zhag gsum sbyang ba byas te/ mar gyi ngo zhag bzhi la 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lcags can bzhag nas mchod pa
221a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas par byas te lha bshos rgyas par phul nas/ de'i mdun du dong ka'i shing gis me sbar la ldong ros la ba lang gi mkhris pa dang sbyar bas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na/ glo bur du ha ha zhes bya ba'i
221a7(rgyud 'bum): sgra thos nas tshogs kyi bdag po chen po rmugs byed 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ / 'ongs nas rdugs byed kyis ldong ros sbyin par byed do// de nas 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can du 'gyur zhing lcags
221b1(rgyud 'bum): can dang mthu stobs mnyam la bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro/ / yar gyi ngo zla ba nya la brtsams te slong mo'i zas bza' zhing / 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i zhabs drung du lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na dpal
221b2(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur ro/ / dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i las bya ba dang / lha rnams la dri dbul ba'ang 'di'i rig sngags kyis bya'o// 'bar ldan ma'i cho ga
221b3(rgyud 'bum): sde lnga pa rdzogs so/ / // kha 'a bar ma'i las rnams 'byung ste/ dbab pa ni chus bya'o// bsrung ba ni yungs kar gyis bya'o// mtshams gcad pa ni so phag gis bya'o// du khrod
221b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi thal ba blangs te mar gyi 'o zhes brgyad bzhag gcig smyung ba byas nas/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan stong bzlas brjod byas na thal ba des gang la reg par byas pa de gdon gyis 'debs par 'gyur zhing / tshig gis
221b5(rgyud 'bum): bsgo bas gtong bar 'gyur ro/ / lus gtsang bar byas te lan 'bum pazlas brjod byas na ba lang brgya thob par 'gyur ro// de nas skyes pa dbang du bya bar 'dod na zla ba nya la zhag gcig smyung ba
221b6(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ mchod pa rgyas par byas nas gur kum dang gser phye mar dang sbyar bas lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na brgya byin yang dbang du 'gyur na mi rnams lta ci smos/ dge slong dang bram ze brgyad brgya la
221b7(rgyud 'bum): mchod ston byin la sems can thams cad la'ang byams pa bsgoms na ni bram ze gsod pas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun
222a1(rgyud 'bum): du dur khrod kyi shing gis me sbar nas dur khrod kyi yam sreg shing skud pa dmar pos dkris pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na/ de nas rmi lam tshogs chen po lcags can ston par byed de/
222a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas 'grub par 'gyur ro// chu khyor gang la lan bdun bsngags nas gang la bltas te gtor ba de gdon gyis thebs par 'gyur la/ chu klung gi nang du zhugs te lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas na gtong bar
222a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / kha 'bar ma'i cho ga ste drug pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha de dag la smras pa/ lha rnams dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil
222a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor chen po la pho nya mo rnams kyi las rnams 'byung ba ngas bshad zin te/ tshogs chen po rnams kyi'ang bshad par bya'o// bdud rtsi zab sbyor gyi las sngar ngas gang bshad pa gang yin pa'i las de
222a5(rgyud 'bum): tshogs thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/ / rab tu grub par byed pa'i rgyud chen po las rdo rje khro bo ngas bshad pa gang yin pa de'i las kyis kyang tshogs chen po stobs po che rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// lha rnams 'byung po'i
222a6(rgyud 'bum): bu gzhon nu mchog sngon drug gi bu stobs po che'i las rnams ngas bshad kyis/ sems rtse gcig tu byos la nyon cig/ gang la bsams te bzlas brjod byas na de'i dbang du 'gyur ro// rgya gzhom pa
222a7(rgyud 'bum): ninus bya'o/ / bsrung ba ni skud pas bya'o// mtshams gcad pa ni thal bas bya'o// bud med dbang du bya ba ni zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du yungs kar gyis lan stong rtsa brgyad brgyad sbyin sreg byas na
222b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang du 'gyur ro/ / mi'i gtso bo dbang du bya bar 'dod na zhag bdun gyi bar du zas su 'o ma dang phye'i 'dag gu za zhing / 'phags pa lag na rdo rje la mchod pa byas te/ dus gsum du be kang ka ta'i yam
222b2(rgyud 'bum): sreg shing gis 'bru mar dri zhim pa'i nang du bsnyugs pa stong rtsa brgyad brgyad sbyin sreg bgyis na dbang du 'gyur ro/ / mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ 'phag pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun
222b3(rgyud 'bum): du gzhon nu smin drug gi bu bzhag nas/ de'i mdun du tsan dan dmar po'o shing gis me sbar nas seng ldeng gi yam sreg shing mar gyi nang du bsnyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na gzhon nu'i me tog gi 'breng
222b4(rgyud 'bum): ba 'gul bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas 'grub par 'gyur te zhag bdun tshun chad kyis gzhon nu'i sde'i bdag po thob par 'gyur ro// mi rnams kyis mi song la bdag gi tshe'i tshad kyang shes par 'gyur ro//
222b5(rgyud 'bum): pa gcig gi bar du slong mo'i zas bza' zhing / de nas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad dam zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gsum smyung ba byas te/ tsan dan dmar po'i mdung thung bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad du byas
222b6(rgyud 'bum): pa ras dmar po'i steng du bzhag nas mchod pa rgyas par bya zhing lha bshos rgyas pa phul la/ de nas rig sngags 'chang ba rtswa ku sha'i stan gyi steng du 'dug pa'i lag pa g.yas pas mnan la 'bar bar
222b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod byas na 'grub par 'gyur te/ de thogs pas pha rol gyi yul 'khor 'byed par byed cing gdon thams cad 'joms par byed par 'gyur te/ yul gang du btsugs pa der
223a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ / klu 'am/ klu mo 'am/ dri za 'am/ rig sngags 'chang rnams la bltas te bsdigs na de dag thams cad bka' bzhin du 'gyur ro// glang
223a2(rgyud 'bum): chetshergyags shing myos pa la bltas shing bsdigs na glang po che dbang du 'gyur ro/ / slong mo'i zas za zhing cho ga 'di bzhin du 'khor lo bsgrubs na rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por
223a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ bskal par gnas shing rig sngags 'chang brgyas bskor ba la me long la dbab pa dang / mthe bong la dbab pa dang / bum pa la dbab pa'ang nus par 'gyur ro// dbye bar bya na zhag
223a4(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyi bar du phub ma'i sbyin sreg lan stong rtsa brgyad brgyad byas na dbye bar 'gyur ro/ / smin drug gi bu'i cho ga rdzogs so// / lha ma chen mo drug ma'i las rnams kyang
223a5(rgyud 'bum): bshad par bya ste/ bsrung ba ni thal bas bya'o// dug las gso ba ni chus bya'o// mtshams gcad pa ni so phag gis bya'o// de nas longs spyod kyi gzhi bslang bar 'dod na gzhon nu'i gnas su
223a6(rgyud 'bum): song la lha mo la mchod pa byas te smin ma'i shing gis me sbar nas 'o thug dang / mar dang / sbrang rtsir sbyar bas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas la/ de nas nang par langs la 'phags pa 'a
223a7(rgyud 'bum): na rdo rje la mchod pa byas te/ gur kum mar dang sbyar bas lan brgya rtsa brgyad brgyad sbyin sreg byas na zhag bdun pa'i nyin par sde'i bdag por 'gyur ro// de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i zhabs
223b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi drung du legs ldan lha chen po dang / gzhon nu smin drug gi bu dang / lha mo drug mtshon rtsi sna gsum gyis bris la/ rig sngags 'chang zas su 'o ma dang bye'i 'dag gu za zhing lan 'dum bzlas brjod
223b2(rgyud 'bum): byas na lha mo mthong bar 'gyur te/ de'ang 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed do// bton pa tsam gyis rgyan skugs las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// de nas bdag nyid kyi tshe'i tshad shes par 'dod na mar gyi
223b3(rgyud 'bum): zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig spyang ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje la'ang mchod pa rgyas par byas/ a ka ru'i bdug pa dang / du ru ka dang / gur kum dang / gu gul dang / sbrang rtsi dang / ba mar
223b4(rgyud 'bum): gyi mar me bzhi phyogs bzhir sngar la/ de nyid du rig sngags bzlas brjod byas te/ de nyid du nyal na 'jig rten gsum na yod pa'i don rmi lam du ston par 'gyur ro// khyod che 'di srid du thub par 'gyuraro
223b5(rgyud 'bum): zhes lnga zhing nam 'chi ba'ang ston par byed de/ ga ge mo zhig tu che ge mo zhig gi tshe srog 'dor ro zhes ston par 'gyur te/ 'di ni dngos grub mchog gi lam yin no// de nas 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i
223b6(rgyud 'bum): lam shes par 'dod na slong mo'i zas za zhing / 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i zhabs drung du zla ba gcig gi bar du bzlas brjod byas na/ de nas bung ba 'ong bar 'gyur te/ bung ba de'ang rna drung du mi snang
223b7(rgyud 'bum): bar gyur nas 'jig rten gsum na yod pa'i don ston par 'gyur ro zhes rdo rje 'dzin gyi bshad do/ / drug ma'i cho ga rdzogs so// / lha mo dka' bzlog ma dril mdzes kyi las
224a1(rgyud 'bum): kyang bshad par bya ste/ mig la bsngags na gang bltas pa de thob par 'gyur ro// gdong la lag pa byugs te nyal na rmi lam ngan pa rmi bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas sde dpon
224a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod na yar gyi ngo tshes dgu la zhag gcig smyung pa byas te gtum mo nub phyogs su bstan pa la bltas nas/ mchod pa rgyas par byas la mar dang gu gul gyis lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na sde dpon
224a3(rgyud 'bum): thob par 'gyur ro/ / de nas mi'i gtso bo dbang du bya bar 'dod na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig spyang ba byas te/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa byas nas mtshan rangs par bzlas
224a4(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas na mo'i gtso bo dbang du khugs par 'gyur ro/ / de nas ral gri sgrub par 'dod na zla ba gcig gi bor du slong mo'i zas za zhing rig sngags lan bdun 'bum bzlas brjod byas la/ de nas zhag
224a5(rgyud 'bum): gsum spyang ba byas te/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa rgyas par byas nas rig sngags kyi rgyal pos bsrung ba'i cho ga thams cad bya'o// de nas lag pa gnyis gu gul gyis bskus la/ la
224a6(rgyud 'bum): pas ral gri bzung ste rig sngags bzlas brjod byas na dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te/ ral gri de lag na thogs pas rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po bskal par gnas par 'gyur zhing sgra chen
224a7(rgyud 'bum): po'i pho brang na 'dug par 'gyur te/ legs ldan lha chen po de dag kyang 'bras bu thob pa sbyin par byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang lhan cig tu gnas par 'gyur zhing /
224b1(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur la/ de dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur te/ lus dang bral ba'i
224b2(rgyud 'bum): tshe'ang bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas lha'i gsang ba mngon sum du mthong bar 'dod na zhag gsum spyad pa byas te/ zla ba nya la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang lag na rdo rje dang gnyis la
224b3(rgyud 'bum): ci nus kyis mchod par bya'o/ / de nas yud tsam bzang po la bdag dang / rgyal po 'am/ gzhan yang rung ste du gu la'i ras dkar po bgos te/ de nas a ka ru sreg cing rgyal po dang gnyis
224b4(rgyud 'bum): ka zad kar 'dug ste mig mi 'dzum par bzlas brjod byas na/ mig snga na 'dug pa'i lhas gang gi don bstan pa de rgyal pos kyang ji ltar thos pa de bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro// cho ga 'di ni bsten
224b5(rgyud 'bum): nas lo gcig ma lon pa la sbyin par mi bya'o/ / stong rnyed ma byin pa la'ang sbyin par mi bya ste/ chos can dad pa dang ldan pa la sbyin par bya'o// dka' ba zlog ma'i cho ga rdzogs so// /
224b6(rgyud 'bum): / lha rnams dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po las 'byung ba'i rig sngags kyi lha rnams kyi las ngas bshad zin to// ngas kyang lha de dag sgrub
224b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / gzhan gdab pa dang / gnod par bya ba dang / gsad pa dang / bskams pa dang / dpal bskyod pa dang / las nyams pa rnams kyi las bsgrub pa dang / rig sngags nyams pa
225a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi rig sngags bskang ba dang / mi nad kyi gnod pa 'byung ba la mi nang zhi bar bya ba'i phyir rig sngags bshad par bya'o// na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la b+hai
225a2(rgyud 'bum): bA ya phaT hUM dz+wa la na lA ya phaT swA hA/ de nas lha de dag gis rdo rje 'bar ba 'di thos nas snying 'dar zhing lag na rdo rje'i zhal du bltas so// de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rjes/ lha
225a3(rgyud 'bum): dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ / lha rnams ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig/ rdo rje 'bar ba zhes bya ba khro bo chen po'i rgyud dang mthun pa 'di ni lha rnams sgrub pa dang / gzhan 'debs pa dang /
225a4(rgyud 'bum): gnod pa byed pa dang / gsod pa dang / skems pa dang / dpal skyed pa dang / las nyams pa rnams kyi las sgrub pa dang / rig sngags nyams pa rnams kyi rig sngags skyod pa dang / mi nad kyi gnod
225a5(rgyud 'bum): pa byung ba la mi nang zhi bar byed pa yin te/ lha rnams kyi cho ga rgyas pa 'grub par byed pa 'di ni rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyung chen po las kyang ngas bshad do// da ltar yang khyed rnams 'grub par byed pa rdo rje 'bar
225a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhes bya ba khro bo chen po 'di ngas bshad pa yin no/ / 'di'i las kyang bshad par bya ste/ gang gis dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'grub par byed pa dang
225a7(rgyud 'bum): gang gis dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gtogs pa'i lha rnams 'grub par byed pa dang / rig sngags 'chang mthu zad pa gang yin pa dag dang / rgyal po dbang phyug las nyams pa gang yin pa dag dang / lha
225b1(rgyud 'bum): lha'i bu 'am/ klu 'am/ klu'i bu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin gyi bu 'am/ srin po'am/ srin po'i bu 'am/ dri za 'am/ dri za'i bu mthu chung ngu gang yin pa de dag gi mthu bskyed pa'i
225b2(rgyud 'bum): phyir yang ngas bshad par bya'o/ / mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig spyang ba byas te/ gnas dben pa'am n+ya dro d+ha'i drung du rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud chen po las sman ut+pa kha dang ldan pa zhes bya ba
225b3(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grus chen mo/ stobs chen mo/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i sman de'i phye mas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khro bo bro bar bya ste/ lag pa g.yon pa na rdo rje thogs la/ lag pa g.yas
225b4(rgyud 'bum): pa mchog sbyin par bya'o/ / de'i mdun du bum pa mi gnag cing rtsa ba med la mgrin chings dang bcas pa sa bon thams cad kyis gang bar byas te/ bum pa de'i nang du sman ut+pa la dang ldan pa'ang gzhug
225b5(rgyud 'bum): go bum pa de'ang gser las byas la 'gron bu bkram pa las byas pa'i rdo rje'i steng du ras dkar po bzhag ste/ de'i dbus su bum pa gzhag par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bsams
225b6(rgyud 'bum): pa rgya chen pos lha bshos dang mchod pa rgyas par bya ste/ gu gul gyi bdug pa'ang dbul lo// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dpal gyi lha mo'i rig sngags lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas nas/ de'i
225b7(rgyud 'bum): 'og tu rdo rje 'bar pa khro bo chen po lan brgyad stong bzlas brjed bya'o/ / de nas nang par bum pa des bdag nyid khrus bya'o// 'gron bu las byas pa'i rdo rje dang gos de'ang 'phags pa lag na rdo rje ya
226a1(rgyud 'bum): phul nas bla ma'ang de dang 'dra ba'i phyir bla ma la dbul lo/ / de phul nas kyang yid la bsams pa bslang bar bya'o// dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams kyang ci nus kyis ston par bya'o//
226a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas lha thams cad kyi las mngon sum du 'gyur ro// las 'di ni skal ba med pas mthong bar mi 'gyur te/ rig sngags las byung ba'i 'bras bu thob pa 'am/ rig sngags 'chang gi rigs dang ldan pa
226a3(rgyud 'bum): gang yin pa de dag gis mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / las 'dis dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gtogs pa'i rig sngags rnams 'grub par 'gyur te/ rig sngags de dag dran pa tsam gyis bsgrub pa dang gsad par yang nus
226a4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes/ lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras
226a5(rgyud 'bum): so/ / lha rnams bcom ldan 'das ma yum gang gi spyi bor bkur nas rdo rje 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur pa dang / gang bzung ba dang / bklags pa dang / bsgrubs na rig sngags 'chang gisang
226a6(rgyud 'bum): dang 'dra ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba'i bcom ldan 'das ma yum de bshad kyis/ khyed rnams kyis rgyags pa med pa'i sems kyis nyon cig/ de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams dga'
226a7(rgyud 'bum): zhing mgu la yi rangs te bde ba dang yid bde bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po legs so legs so// stobs dang pha rol gnon pa
226b1(rgyud 'bum): dpag tu med pa lags so/ / khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po skyeng par byed pa shod ci macoM// de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po lag na rdo rjes rang gi rig sngags kyi tshogs
226b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams la glang po che'i lha stangs kyis bltas so/ / 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad la'ang bltas nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ snying dga' bar byed pa'i yum bshad do// na mo rat+na tra ya s+thA/
226b3(rgyud 'bum): na mash+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA ba ti s+ya/ na maHla ka hr-i da ye/ na maHshaM ka re/ shAn taM ka re/ g+hu Ta g+hu Ta g+hu Te ni/ g+hA Ta ya/ g+hu DI ni swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'jig rten gyi
226b4(rgyud 'bum): yum bshad ma thag tu'ang sdong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos te/ mun pa dang / rab rib dang / ling tog gi mun nag thams cad med par gyur to// sems can
226b5(rgyud 'bum): dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas rnams kyi sdug bsngal thams cad kyang med par gyur to// lha rnams thams cad kyang ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rje la
226b6(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad ces smras so/ / rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lha'i yum gyi las rnams shod ci go / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang yum 'chang ba'i rig sngags 'chang de la yongs su dga' nas
226b7(rgyud 'bum): myur du dngos grub sbyin zhing bsrung ba dang bskyab par bgyi'o/ / de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje 'dzin gyis/ lha rnams la 'di skad ces smras so// bzod ldan dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin
227a1(rgyud 'bum): du mA ma kI 'chang ba gang yin pa de ni ngan 'gro log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / lha dang bdud du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang / dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu las gang zhig
227a2(rgyud 'bum): yum dang sras gnyis ka'i ming tsam 'chang ba de ci ste ngan 'gro log par ltung bar 'gyur ba ni ngas yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ de ni gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dper na nor bu rin po che mgo la thogs
227a3(rgyud 'bum): pa la nad do cog mi 'byung zhing gdon thams cad 'byed par 'gyur ba bzhin te/ 'di ltar ngan 'gror 'gro ba rnams las sgrol ba 'di ni yum dang sras su bcas pa'i mthu yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom
227a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal nas yum gyi las rnams bshad pa/ sgrub pa thams cad la phyag rgya gcig bcings la sgrub pa'i rdzas la phyag rgyas btab na myur du dngos grub kyi
227a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / dam tshig mi shes pa la ni phyag rgya bstan par mi bya'o// gang gi tshe rag sngags 'chang gis rig sngags 'chang la phyag rgya ston pa na/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das lag ma
227a6(rgyud 'bum): mdun du 'gron bu brgyad brgyas rdo rje byas la/ de'i mdun du phyag rgya bstan par bya'o// de'ang 'bras chan bu ram dang sbyar ba'i mchod yon rdo rje la phul nas phyag rgya bstan par bya'o// de mthong na lag nardo rje
227a7(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba yin te/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rnams la bston par bya'o// sdig pabyed pa rnams la bstan par mi bya'o// sdig pa byed pa gang yin pa de dag gis ni phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi ming yang thos par mi 'ar
227b1(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / dge ba'i rtsa 'byas pa gang yin pa de dag gis ni phyag rgya de dag thos par 'gyur ro// nga'i gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i tshogs 'di ni gtsang zhing dben par byas pas blta bar bya'o// gang gis phyag rgya'i
227b2(rgyud 'bum): tshogs mthong ba de la ni/ rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa gsang ba dang bcas/ gsang chen dang bcas par de'i lag tu 'dug par 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gis kyang phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi ga
227b3(rgyud 'bum): byin bskyed par bya ba'i phyir/ bla ma la dpag tu med pa'i yon dbul zhing bla ma'i lag nas rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa nod par bya'o// bla mas kyang bla ma la gus pa'i slob ma la lag nas nges par
227b4(rgyud 'bum): mngon par dngos grub sbyin par bya'o/ / de ltar byas na lag na rdo rjes byin pa yi te/ cho ga rgyas pa'ang grub par 'gyur ro// ci ste bla ma'i lag nas phyag rgya mthong btsam gyis las byas nas phyag rgya de nyid kyis
227b5(rgyud 'bum): kyang gnod pa med par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas sam sku gdung gi gnas su phyag rgya'i tshogs gzhag par bya'o// phyag rgya mthong ba gang yin pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par blta
227b6(rgyud 'bum): bapar bya ste/ de dag thams cad lha rnams kyi phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro// nga gang na gnas pa de ni de dag gnas te/ nga mthong bas de dag nges par phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur zhing //
227b7(rgyud 'bum): lus dang bral ba na lag na rdo rje'i gnas yid du 'ong ba 'am/ bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// phyag rgya mthu stobs chen po nan tan du blta bar bya ste/ phyag rgya'i rnam pa lag pa'i tshul gyis bstan par bya'o//
228a1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa bris pa mthong nas phyag rgya chen po rnam pa sna tshogs dgod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das mA ma kI'i las rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ zas su 'o ma 'am
228a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dag gu 'am/ lo ma 'am/ slong mo'i zas za zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na sngar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas ras ma nyams pa dang / kha tshar ma bcad pa dang / spu med pa la tshon rtsi sbyin
228a3(rgyud 'bum): dadang ma sbyar bas ri mo mkhan gso sbyong dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs seng ge'i khri la bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa'i tshul du 'drir gzhug go// de'i g.yon logs su 'phags pa lag na rdo rje
228a4(rgyud 'bum): mdog sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa rdo rje dang rnga yab thogs par dri'o/ / g.yas logs su ni bcom ldan 'das mA ma kI mdog sngo bsangs lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje thogs shing / lag pa g.yas pa
228a5(rgyud 'bum): nanayid bzhin gyi nor bu thogs pa/ rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa 'drir gzhug go// de nas sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du ri mo'i gzugs bkram la yar ngo'i tshes zhag gcig nas brtsams
228a6(rgyud 'bum): nya'i bar du bzlas brjod byas pa'i mjug tu zhag gsum spyang pa byas la mchod pa sna tshogs rgyas par bya ste/ 'o ma yod pa'i shing gis me sbar la dud pa med pa'i mngag ma la a ka ru nag po'i yam sreg
228a7(rgyud 'bum): shing du ru ka'i mar gyi nang du bsnyugs pa brgya stong phrag gsum sbyin sreg bya'o/ / de nas las zin pa'i 'og tu 'phags pa lag na rdo rje 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de 'ong ba'i rtags su me tog gi 'phreng ba
228b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gul ba dang / mar me'i methe chen por 'gyur ba dang / sngon ma byung ba'i dri bsung zhim po'i ngang ldang bar 'gyur ba dang / 'di rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la spos chu me tog dang ldan pa'i mchod
228b2(rgyud 'bum): yon dbul bar bya'o/ / yang na lha mo 'ong bar 'gyur te/ phyag byas la dam pa rnam pa brgyad la dam pa rnam pa gcig bslang bar bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba dang / bcud kyis la
228b3(rgyud 'bum): chen po dang / gtsug lag dang / bzo thams cad shes pa thob pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa dang / gzungs la 'jug pa dang / rin po che'i char 'bab pa dang / lha ma yin gyi phug tu 'jug
