228b5(rgyud 'bum): nas sgrub par 'dod pas ldong ros blangs la bud med kyi ru zho dang btags te ril bu lnga byas te/ yungs kar dang lhan cig tu a ka ru'i sgrom bu'i nang du bcug la zla ba spyang kis zin pa 'am nyi ma spyang
228b6(rgyud 'bum): kis zin pa'i tshe gtor ma'i cho ga bya ste bsgrub par bya'o/ / gang gi tshe yungs kar rnams tsheg tsheg zer ba'i tshe ni skye bo thams cad dbang du 'gyur ba'i dngos grub dang po ste/ des na 'jig rten thams cad
228b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang du 'gyur zhing gang bsgo ba de dag thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ / yang na dud pa 'thul bar 'gyur na ni lus mi snang bar 'gyur ba thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// yang na 'bar bar 'gyur na ni de'i
229a1(rgyud 'bum): tshe lha gzhon nur 'gyur te/ nyi ma shar ka'i ka ri byin dang ldan zhing rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal por 'gyur la/ bskal ba chen po gcig gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// gi'u wang
229a2(rgyud 'bum): dang ba bla la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams kyang de bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o/ / de nas mig rtsi sgrub par 'dod na lig bu mig dang / ut+pa la sngon po dang / ru rta dang / tsan dan rnams lhan cig sbyar te zangs kyi sdong du
229a3(rgyud 'bum): bcug la zla ba spyang kis zin pa'i tshe dud pa byung gi bar du bzlas brjod byas nas/ des mig bskus na lus mi snang bar 'gyur zhing 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can du 'gyur la/ lus mi snang bar 'gyur ba

229a5(rgyud 'bum): ga byas nas srung ba'i cho ga rang nan tan du byas la/ lag pa g.yas pas ral gri bzung ste 'gul bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod byas nas/ 'gul bar gyur na ni gcig pu gnas pa'i rig sngags 'chang du
229a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / 'bar na ni 'khor dang bcas par 'gyur te rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi rgyal po stobs dang pha rol gnon pa thogs pa med par gyur pa nas/ g.yas par ral gri bzung ste 'gul bar
229a7(rgyud 'bum): gyur gyi bar du bzlas brjod byas nas 'phags par 'gyur ro/ / de nas rdo rje sgrub par 'dod na lcags zhun ma las rdo rje sor bcu drug pa thor to gnyis ka rtse gsum par byas te tsan dan dmar po'i lde gus
229b1(rgyud 'bum): blublags la/ cho 'phrul chen po'i zla ba tshes nas brtsam zhing ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa rgyas pa byas nas bzlas brjod byed cing nyin gcig bzhin du phyir zhing rgyas par bya/ dge slong rnams ston pa'i
229b2(rgyud 'bum): rjes su zhag gsum smyung ba byas te/ ri mo'i gzugs sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bkram la mchod pa rgyas par byas te/ mar gyi mar me brgyad sbar nas rtsa ku sha las stan byas pa la 'dug
229b3(rgyud 'bum): la/ rdo rje lag pa gnyis kas bzung ste 'bar bar gyur kyi bar du bzlas brjod byas na/ rdo rje de thogs pas 'khor dang bcas pa 'phags par 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar
229b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur la/ stobs dang pha rol gnon pa lag na rdo rje dang mnyam zhing bskal pa chen po'i bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur te/ lus dang bral na'ang rdo rje'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mdung rtse gsu
229b5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang mdung thung la sogs pa mtshon cha thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / ras dang / shing lham dang / mchod phyir thogs dang / 'khar ba dang / shing la sogs pa rnams kyang cho ga gong ma'i
229b6(rgyud 'bum): tshul gyis bsgrubs na thams cad dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro/ / zhi bar bya bar 'dod na thab khung pad+ma'i dbyibs 'dra bar byas la mchod sbyin la 'os pa'i bud shing dag gis me sbar te/ 'bras ba
229b7(rgyud 'bum): po'i chan gyi srog thugs zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang sbyar ba blugs gzar gyis lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na zhag gsum byas pas ni bdag gam gzhan zhi bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdun byas pas
230a1(rgyud 'bum): ni grong ngam grong khyer zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / mi nad chen po'i gnod pa la ni shwa m+bI yam sreg shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyi nang du bstsags pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o// phyugs kyi
230a2(rgyud 'bum): gor la ni u dum wa ra'i yam sreg shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyi nang du bsnyugs pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o// char mi 'bab pa la ni mngar gsum gyi sbyin sreg bya ste/ thams cad la yang lan stong rtsa
230a3(rgyud 'bum): brgyad brgyad bya zhing zhag bdun bdun byas na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / dur ba'i nyag ma zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyi nang du bsnyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na zhag bcus dus ma yin par
230a4(rgyud 'bum): 'chi ba zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / lan 'bum sbyin sreg byas na 'chi bdag las rgyal te tshe ring bar 'gyur ro// slong mo'i zas za zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas pa'i mjug tu zhag gsum smyung ba byas
230a5(rgyud 'bum): tezla ba spyang kis zin pa'i tshe ba nag mo'i 'o ma la lan brgyad brgya bsngags te 'thungs na sman bcud kyis len du 'gyur ro/ / rgyas par 'dod na zho'i sbyin sreg brgya stong byas na rgyas par 'gyuraro//
230a6(rgyud 'bum): pha rol gyi dpung rengs par bya na lcags kyi phye ma til mar dang sbyar bas lan sum stong sbyin sreg bya'o// rgyal mtshan dang dung la sogs pa la bsngags na'ang de mthong zhing thos pas pha rol gyi dpung
230a7(rgyud 'bum): rengs par 'gyur ro/ / bum pa gsar pa 'bru thams cad dang spos chus bkang ste lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas pas log 'dren gyis zin pa khrus byed du bcug na gtong bar 'gyur ro// sbrum ma
230b1(rgyud 'bum): khrus byed du bcug na bde bar za bca' bar 'gyur ro/ / byis pa rnams gdon no cog gis zin pa khrus byed du bcug na gtong bar 'gyur ro// dbang bskur ba 'dis ni sdig pa thams cad las grol bar
230b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur te/ byung ngan po'ang dpal dang ldan par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor gyi las kyis kyang gdon thams cad kyi las byed do// rma bya'i mjug ma la lan brgyad stong gis bsngags pa ni dug go cog sel
230b3(rgyud 'bum): bar byed de shi zin pa'ang 'tsho bar byed do/ / rims dang mi nad la sogs pa'ang de nyid kyis sel bar byed do// skud pas ni rims so cog med par byed do// rdo rje la lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas
230b4(rgyud 'bum): pas ni lha ma yin gyi 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'joms par byed do/ / seng ldeng gi yam sreg shing zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyi nang du bskyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na gter chen po mthong
230b5(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur la/ de'ang spyad bzhin du zad par mi 'gyur ro// rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi nang du zhugs te/ pad+ma tsan dan dmar po'i nang du bstsags pa 'bum sbyin sreg byas na pad+ma'i phung po dang
230b6(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa'i gter sbyin par 'gyur ro/ / bil ba'i sreg blugs mar gyi nang du sbyin sreg byas na longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur ro// til rnams lhan cig tu bsdus te mar dang sbyar bas lan 'bum sbyin
230b7(rgyud 'bum): sreg byas na kha zas 'phel te zad par mi 'gyur ro/ / de nas lha rnams dbang du bya bar 'dod na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du dus gsum du a ka ru'i yam sreg shing mar gyi nang du bsnyugs pa brgya stong
231a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg byas na lha thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ / gnod sbyin mo rnams la ni a sho ka'i lam sreg shing gis bya'o// klu rnams la ni klu shing gi me tog gis bya'o// rig sngags
231a2(rgyud 'bum): 'chang rnams la mkhan pa'i yam sreg shing gis bya'o/ / 'phags pa lag na rdo rje la ni a ka ru'i yam sreg shing du ru ka'i mar gyi nang du bstsags pas bya'o// dri za rnams la ni thang chu'i spos kyi sbyin sreg
231a3(rgyud 'bum): mi 'am ci rnams la ni pog gi sbyin sreg gis bya'o/ / yi dgas rnams la ni sru rtsi pog gi sbyin sreg gis bya'o// log 'dren rnams la ni til gyi tshogs ma'i sbyin sreg gis bya'o// 'byung po rnams la ni 'byung
231a4(rgyud 'bum): po'i ras kyi sbyin sreg lan brgyad brgya zhag bdun nam zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du bya'o/ / mi'i gtso bo 'am mi chen po dbang du bya bar 'dod na zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du yungs kar gyi sra blugs til
231a5(rgyud 'bum): mar dang sbyar bas lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bya'o/ / mi'i gtso bo'i bu mo la ni ske tshe'i sreg thugs kyis bya'o// mdun na 'don pa la ni mar gyi sreg blugs kyis bya'o// bu mo rnams la ni sna ma'i me tog
231a6(rgyud 'bum): gis bya'o/ / bud med thams cad la nI lan nA'i sreg blugs kyis bya'o// bram ze la ni 'bras bzang po'i chan gyi sreg zhugs kyis bya'o// rgyal rigs la ni zho'i sreg thugs kyis bya'o// rje'u rigs
231a7(rgyud 'bum): la ni 'bras kyi sbyar dug gi sreg blugs kyis bya'o/ / dmangs rigs la ni mon sran gre'u'i sreg thugs kyi sbyin sreg gis bya'o// sems can thams cad la ni mar dang til sbyar bas bya ste/ thams cad la'ang
231b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg lan brgyad brgya chang bar bya'o/ / nyi ma la phyogs te lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/ zas su ba gcin dang phye'i 'dag gu za zhing las bya'o// rig sngags 'chang
231b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad gso bar 'dod na zhag bdun gyi bar du zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar la sbyar ba'i til gyis lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bya'o// bcad pa dang / bcom pa dang / ma rungs par gyur pa dang / phur bus btang ba
231b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams gso bar 'dod na pu shel tsi las gzugs byas te me tog dkar pos mchod pa lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas pa'i lo mas bkrus shing 'o ma'i sbyin sreg kyang bya ste/ a ka ru'i bdug pa'ang phul na phyir sos
231b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das ma yum brjod la sngags kyis mchod yon phul na spyan drangs par 'gyur zhing bzlas brjod kyang bsrungs par 'gyur ro// lan cig brjod pas ni bdag nyid la srung bar byed do//
231b5(rgyud 'bum): lan gnyis brjod pas ni gzhan la srung bar byed do// lan gsum brjod pas ni rdzas srung bar byed do// yungs kar gyi bsrung bar bya ba'i rdzas sngags kyis gzi byin bskyed na rgyas par 'gyur zhing dngos grub tu 'gyur
231b6(rgyud 'bum): gi'u wang gis bcom ldan 'das ma'i gsang sngags gang 'dod pa bar thag yangs par yi ge bris te/ gi'u wang dang spyi gu'ang der bzhag la der sngags des lan brgyad brgya btab ste/ bcom ldan
231b7(rgyud 'bum): 'das la mchod pa byas nas nyal na 'ong bar 'gyur te/ lhag chang skong bar 'gyur ro// yang na rmi lam du ston par 'gyur ro// lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te rtswa ku sha'i stan la nyal na legs nyes ston par
232a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das ma 'di ni rig pa mchog gi rgyud thams cad kyi snying por 'gyur ba don thams cad sgrub pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma mA ma kI 'di ni rog sngags kyi rgyal
232a2(rgyud 'bum): po rog pa mchog gi las gang yin pa rnams dang / pho nya mo bco brgyad gang yin pa rnams dang / phyag rgya chen po gang yin pa rnams kyi so so'i cho ga shin tu myur bar byed cing / gzhan gyis mi tshugs shing myur du
232a3(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / grog mkhar gyi sa dang yungs kar bsres pa las rdo rje byas te tsan dan dmar pos byugs la blangs na lam mi gzur ba dang / mi smra bar lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas bzlas brjod byas
232a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mjug tu zla ba spyad kis zin pa'i tshe rdo rje yungs kar gyi dbus su bzhag ste/ yungs kar tsheg tsheg zer gyi bar du bzlas brjod byas na rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur te/ rdo rje des las thams cad byed la/ zag
232a5(rgyud 'bum): gi rtse mo phye mar rlog cing snyil bar byed do/ / chu klung gyen du zlog par byed do// mtsho skam par byed do// klu rnams 'byer bar byed do// dug rnams kyi dug med par byed do// srog chags rnams rengs
232a6(rgyud 'bum): bar byed do/ / rmongs par byed do// skyel bar byed do// 'khrul 'khor rnams phye mar zlog go shing rta la sogs pa rengs par byed cing phye mar yang rlog ste/ de la sogs pa'i las thams cad byed do//
232a7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das ma mA kI 'di ni ro langs thams cad sgrub pa ste/ las sna tshogs byed pa yin no// ri'i rtse mor song ste lcags tshun ma las byas pa'i rdo rje thogs la/ lag pa gson pas bzung la la
232b1(rgyud 'bum): drug 'bum pa zlas brjod byas na de nas ri 'gul bar 'gyur te/ ri 'gul na 'khor dang bcas pa 'phags par 'gyur ro// slang mo'i zas pa zhing ri'i rtse mor bye ba gcig bzlas brjod byas na ying lag
232b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa de thams cad nges thob par 'gyur ro/ / lha rnams bcom ldan 'das mA ma kI 'di ni thams cad 'grub pa ste/ las sna tshogs byed pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das ma 'jig rten gyi yum gyi las
232b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams ngas bshad zin te/ de la drag tu 'grub par byed pa'i sngags kyang bshad par bya'o// na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ oM dz+wa la mA ma ki s+pho Ta ya hUM phaT swA hA/ lha rnams 'di'i las kyang bshad par
232b4(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma'i las ngas bshad pa gang yin pa de dag las nyis 'gyur du bsten par byas na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje 'khor
232b5(rgyud 'bum): de'i nang nas langs nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rig pa mchog gi cho ga chen po las bdag gis
232b6(rgyud 'bum): lha rnams bshad pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad kyis sgrub pa po gtsang sbra dang / cho ga dang / spyod yul dang ldan pa gang lags pa srung ba dang / sgrub pa dang / sba bar bgyid cing dngos grub
232b7(rgyud 'bum): kyang thob par 'gyur ba dang / tshol ba rjes su dran par bgyi bas bgegs dang log 'dren de dag thams cad brlag par 'gyur ba dang / gtsang sbra bgyis kyang rung / gtsang sbra ma bgyis kyang rung ba na bsrung ba
233a1(rgyud 'bum): dang bskyab pa dang / sba ba dang / sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du bdag gis rdo rje khro ba stobs po che bshad par bgyin/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad du gsol/
233a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems dpa' legs so legs so// stobs dang pha rol gnon pa dpag tu med pa
233a3(rgyud 'bum): khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa de ni legs so/ / khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas gnang bar mdzad kyis/ sems can lam du zhugs pa rnams dang / lam ma yin par zhugs pa
233a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / gtsang sbra byas pa rnams dang / gtsang sbra ma byas pa rnams srung ba'i phyir shod cig shod cig/ de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po lag na rdo rjes 'khor 'dus pa la glang po che'i lha stangs kyis bltas
233a5(rgyud 'bum): nas rdo rje khro bo stobs po che bshad pa/ na mo rat+na tra ya s+ya/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ na ma sh+tsaN+Da badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ti s+ya/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la/ ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+h+wa na sa ya/ dza Ti la la bo dar/ un+d+ra
233a6(rgyud 'bum): kro d+hA ma hU~M phaT swA hA/ de nas lha de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/ lag na rdo rje'i zhal du lta zhing tshig 'di skad ces smras so// rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po rdo rje khro bo stobs po che'i las rnams shod cig shod cig
233a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas lag na rdo rje grags pa chen pos snying rje'i sems kyis las rnams bshad pa/ rig pa mchog sgrub pa'i rig sngags 'chang lam du 'jug gam/ bshang ba dang gci ba la sogs pa byed na thob mar lan
233b1(rgyud 'bum): cig brjod na bsrung bar byas par 'gyur ro/ / lam du 'jug na lan gsum brjod nas song na chom rkun la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du chu klung rgal ba na'ang chu srin na bkra
233b2(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / de nas sgrub par 'dod na tshes grangs dang rgyu skar gdam mi 'tshal/ smyung ba'ang bya mi dgos par khro bo nyid brtson par bya ste/ nyin par yang rung /
233b3(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mo'ang rung / zan zos kyang rung / ci ste ma zos kyang rung / gtsang sbra byas kyang rung / gtsang sbra ma byas kyang rung ste/ lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na sngar bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro//
233b4(rgyud 'bum): de nas pa la sha'i shing ngam bil ba'i shing gis me sbar te/ 'bras yos sam til yang rung / mar dang sbyar bas lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas las rnams 'byung ste/

233b7(rgyud 'bum): pa g.yon pas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na skyes pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ / bu mo dbang du bya bar 'dod na 'bras sA lu'i phye ma las gzugs byas la rkang pa g.yon pa nas brtsams te gcad cing gcad cing lag pa
234a1(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pas lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro/ / yugs sa mo dbang du bya na dur khrod dam gdol pa'i khyim nas me bslangs la dur khrod kyi shing gseb la lam gyi sum

234b2(rgyud 'bum): te mig gnyis bskus nas gang la bltas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / bskrad par bya na arka'i shing gis me sbar la/ lung tang gi me tog gis lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na zhag bdun gyis 'bros par 'gyur

235a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg byas na phyir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / hUM zhes byas pas ni ske glegs dang sgo gtan choms par 'gyur ro// phaT ces byas pas ni lha ma yin gyi 'khrul 'khor thams

235a4(rgyud 'bum): la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas te/ de nas sgra tug tugazer bar gyur nas de dag las gcig khar bcug na lus mi snang bar 'gyur la/ phyir phyung na snang bar 'gyur te tshe lo khri thub par

235a7(rgyud 'bum): baspyang kos zin pa'i tshe zla ba ma btang gi bar du bzlas brjod byas te/ des mig bslus na lus mi snang bar 'gyur zhing che lo stong thub par 'gyur ro// gang la dmigs te lan khri bzlas brjod byas na de thar
235b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / yang na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// dur khrod kyi ras khru gang tsam blangs la de tshon rtsi sprin med pas khro bo'i gzugs mi sdug cing mche ba gtsigs la/ lus kyi mdog gnag cing me lce 'bar bas bskor te/
235b2(rgyud 'bum): sgra kham pa gyen du brdzes shing khros pa'i mig gis bltas la/ lag pa g.yon pa na rdo rje thogs/ lag pa g.yas pan dbyug pa thogs pa 'drir gzhug go// 'og logs su ni sgrub pa po lag na pog por
235b3(rgyud 'bum): thogs pa bris la mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad dam bcu bzhi gang yang rung ba la de'i mdun du me tog dmar po phul te ldong ros dang / lig bu mig dang / gi'u wang dang / dga' byed kyi srad bu dang / dong ka'i shing ljam
235b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / gos dang / rdo rje 'khor lo dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / ral gri la sogs pa las gang yang rung ba thangs nas cho ga bzhin du dag par byas la/ a shwat+tha'i lo ma la bzhag ste dngos grub rnam gsum gyur

235b6(rgyud 'bum): bskal bar gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin mo dbang du bya bar 'dod na sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du a shat+tha'i shing gis me sbar la/ a sha ka'i me tog brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na gnod sbyin mo'i
235b7(rgyud 'bum): ming nas smos pas dbang du 'gyur ro/ / klu'i bu mo dbang du bya bar 'dod na shes pa li ka'i shing gis me sbar la/ nag bus pa brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// dgug par bya na mar gyi ngo zhag
236a1(rgyud 'bum): brgyad dang zhag bcu bzhi gang yang rung ba'i phye ma reng ana'i shing gis me sbar la/ yungs kar gyis lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na ming nas gang smos pa khugs par 'gyur te/
236a2(rgyud 'bum): gcig smyung ba byas pas las bya'o// zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du byas na ni brgya byin yang khugs par 'gyur ro// lan tshwa dang bdag gi khrag sbyar bas sbyin sreg byas na ni gang gi ming nas smos
236a3(rgyud 'bum): pab de dbang du 'gyur ro/ / de nas log 'dren gzhig par 'dod na mar gyi ngo zhig bcu bzhi la lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa byas te/ de nyid kyis bsrung bar byas nas zhag gsum smyung bar byas la
236a4(rgyud 'bum): thab khung rdo rje'i dbyibs 'dra bar bya ste/ gu gul gyi ril bu brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na bgegs thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la brtsams te dus gsum du gu gul gyi ril bu mar
236a5(rgyud 'bum): kyigyi nang du bskyugs pa brgyad sdong sbyin sreg byas pa'i mjug tu zhag gsum smyung ba byas la/ de'i mdun du mchod pa chen po byas te/ rdo rje khro mo'i kha nas glo bur dung grub bo zhes zer ba'i sgra 'byung gi bar
236a6(rgyud 'bum): dubazlas brjod byas na/ de nas skra lcang lor 'khyil zhing nyi ma shar ba'i mdog 'dra ba la/ rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur zhing / bskal par gnas shing lag na rdo rje dang mahA
236a7(rgyud 'bum): stobs mnyam par 'gyur ro/ / de nas lig bu mig sgrub par 'dod na ri mo'i gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du yar gyi ro las brtsams te dus gsum du lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas nas/ de'i
236b1(rgyud 'bum): mdun du zhag gsum sbyang ba byas la/ lig pu mig gam sdong ros a shad+tha'i lo ma'i steng du bzhag ste lag pa g.yon pas mnan la dro bar gyur pa dang / dud pa 'thul ba dang / 'bar bar gyur gyi
236b2(rgyud 'bum): du bzlas brjod byas na/ dro bar gyur na ni 'gro ba rnams dbang du byed par 'gyur ro// drud pa 'jal nA ni lus mi snang bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi spyod yul du mi 'gyu

242b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sems kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rje la mngon par bstod nas/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po rdo rje du tshur gyi rig sngags chen mo'i las rnams shod cig shod cig ces spras nas/ lag na rdo rje stobs
242b2(rgyud 'bum): chen gyis/ / spyan la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas// mnyam bzhag rdo rje khu tshur gyi// cho ga bshad pa rab bstan pa// chu klung gi 'gram mam sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du sgra skad drag pa med pa'i gnas su
242b3(rgyud 'bum): gtsang sbra dang / tshangs par spyad pa dang / za gcig pa dang / slong mo'i zas za zhing mi smra bar lan sum 'bum mam lnga 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o// chu klung ngam pad+ma'i rdzing bur me tog la lan re re bzlas brjod
242b4(rgyud 'bum): byas te dor bar bya'o/ / slong mo'i zas za zhing ri'am dgon par ba lang gi lci ba bsreg par bya'o// chu'i nang du zin thig le'i lo ma gcad cing gcad cing dor bar bya'o// las 'di dag byas na lha nyid rang gi cha lug
242b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis 'ong bar byed de/ 'gog par byed do// sgrub pa'am/ bdag nyid sad par 'dod pa'am/ yul gru 'dod kyang rung ste/ ras ma nyams pa/ skra med pa/ kha tshar ma bcad pa la tshon rtsi sbyin dang ma sbyar ba
242b6(rgyud 'bum): snod gsar pa'i nang du bcug ste/ phyis gsar pas ri mo mkhan gtsang ma gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs 'drir gzhug go/ rdo rje'i sde'ang mi'i gzugs su byas la mgo
242b7(rgyud 'bum): bor rdo rje bzhag ste/ 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin lag pa g.yon pas brnyes par bya'o// rdo rje'i sde'ang sgra lcang lor 'khyil zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje'i mgo logs su
243a1(rgyud 'bum): ni gtsug nas byung gzhon nu'i gzugs la rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa gser gyi kha dog can/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug par bri'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas
243a2(rgyud 'bum): logs su ni rdo rje khu tshur ma gzhon nu'i gzugs 'dzin pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing / dpung rgyan dang gdu bu'i rgyan gyis brgyan la gser gyi mdog can bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'dug pa bri'o//
243a3(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa po'ang 'og logs su pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ lag pa g.yas pa na pog por thogs/ lag pa g.yon pa na me tog gi za ma tog thogs par bri'o// de nas yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la
243a4(rgyud 'bum): brtsams te tshes bcu gsum gyi bar du zas su 'o ma dang 'bras chan za zhing / za gcig par byas la dus gsum du lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas zhag gnyis sam gsum du spyang ba byas te/
243a5(rgyud 'bum): dus gsum du khrus byed cing gos gtsang ma bgos la mtshan mo ni sbyin sreg bya/ nyin mo ni bzlas brjod bya ste/ yul gru 'dod na ni shu ti mar gyi nang du bstsags pas sbyin sreg bya'o// zhag grangs du'i spyan
243a6(rgyud 'bum): sreg byed pa de srid du bzlas brjod bya ste/ las so cog la dus gsum du lan sum stong bzlas brjod bya'o// dngos grub kyi mtshan mar rmi lam du me tog gam 'bras bu rnyed pa 'am 'dzin pa rmi sa ra lnga 'grub par
243a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gshags 'gyed pa'i cho ga 'di yin te/ rgya skyegs yungs mar gyi nang du bsnyugs pas sbyin sreg bya'o// bu 'dod pas ni til dang 'bras kyis bya'o// dgra gzhig pa la ni gu gul 'bru mar dang
243b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyar te khrag dang bsres pas bya'o/ / 'jigs pa thams cad la ni bil ba'i yam sreg shing gis bya'o// lha bshos ni 'bras kyi 'o thug dang 'o ma 'bras kyis sbyar bas bya'o// phyogs bzhir yang
243b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten skyong ba rnams las 'byung po'i zas kyi gtor ma sha dang chang dang bcas par nub mo sbyin par bya'o/ / las rnams la ni nas dang / yungs ka ra dang / 'bras yos dang / so sor sbyin sreg bya'o//
243b3(rgyud 'bum): gdon las thar par bya na ba ru ra'i yam sreg shing ske tshes bya'o// lo tog rgyas par bya na nas dang u dum pa ra'i yam sreg shing gis bya'o// dgra gzhig par bya na ske tshe'i 'bru btags te til dang
243b4(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba dang ma da na'i tsher ma'i yam sreg shing gis bya'o/ / gtan du bskrad par bya na ni bil ba'i 'bras bu yungs mar gyi nang du bsnyugs pa dang / bil ba'i lam sreg shing dang / bil ba'i phye ma dang
243b5(rgyud 'bum): rgya skyegs phye mar byas te sbyin sreg bya'o/ / 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs kyang 'drir gzhug go/ bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod na nyin mtshan du lan tshwas bya'o// ka ka dang / u dum+ba ra'i
243b6(rgyud 'bum): yam sreg shing dang / lan tshwa las gzugs byas te bud med la ni rkang pa g.yon pa nas/ skyes pa la ni rkang pa g.yas pa nas brtsam mo// skyes pa la ni nim pa'i yam sreg shing dang / skyes pa'i
243b7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs byas la/ lan tshwa a ran da 'am zar ma'i mar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg bya'o// cho ga gzhan yang rtsig ngos sam shing leb la 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i gzugs bris te/ mgo bar yang
244a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs bri'o/ / rdo rje 'dzin gyi lag pa g.yon pa la rdo rje bstod de 'dzin par bya/ lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mo ni bsdigs pa'i tshul du bya ste/ g.yon byos
244a2(rgyud 'bum): su rdo rje khu tshur ma mdog nag mor bri/ g.yas phyogs su sgrub pa po lag na rdo rje'i zhal du lta zhing pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs te rdo rje 'dzini la snyim par me tog 'thor bar bya/ rdo rje khu tshur ma'ang lag pa
244a3(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs la rab tu 'bar bar bya/ lag pa g.yas pa ni mdzub mor bsdigs par bya ste/ khros shing gos ser po gyon par bya'o// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad nas brtsams te mar gyi ngo zhag bco
244a4(rgyud 'bum): lnga'i bar zhag bdun du sngar bsnyen pa mi smra bar dus gsum du lan brgyad brgya brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te/ zas su 'o ma dang 'bras chan za zhing / mar gyi mar me dang / dri dang / me tog gi 'phreng ba dang /
244a5(rgyud 'bum): bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa bya zhing dus gsum du khrus byas la/ nub gcig bzhin du gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs dbul/ rtag tu dus gsum du'ang dbul lo// zhag bdun gyi bar du bzlas brjod byas
244a6(rgyud 'bum): layar gyi ngo ches gcig la brtsams te ka ra wI ra dmar po yungs mar gyi nang du bsnyugs pa dang / arka'i yam sreg shing gis sbyin sreg byas te/ cho ga 'di ni snga ma bzhin no// me tog dkar pos bya na'ang yam
244a7(rgyud 'bum): sreg shing ni snga ma nyid de/ mar gyi nang du bstsags pas bya'o// las 'di rnam gnyis te dgra sdig can la bya'o// rtsod pa'i sa 'am grong gi logs su rlung phyogs gang nas 'gro ba der nye'u shing dum bu dum bur gtungs
244b1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / pa la sha'i yam sreg shing gi sbyin sreg bya ste/ lha bshos su zho dang 'bras chan sbyar ba dbul zhing spyang ba byas pas bya ste/ sku gzugs kyi cho ga ni snga ma bzhin no// dgra'i ba lang ngam ma he rnams
244b2(rgyud 'bum): ma rung bar byan pa lang gi sha dang ma he'i shas sbyin sreg bya'o/ / rdo rje khu tshur gyi cho ga'i skabs su lha bshos dbul zhes 'byung ba kun rdo rje khu tshul nyid la dbul/ mi rnams la ni mi shas sbyin sreg bya'o// chab
244b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum dang ske tshe 'bru mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg kyang bya'o/ / mi rnams la ni be kang ka ta'i yam sreg shing gis bya'o// ba lang rnams la ni ba lang gi lci bas bya'o// ma he rnams la ni ma he'i lci bas bya'o//
244b4(rgyud 'bum): mi dang / ba lang dang / ma he rnams kyi nad kyi gnod pa la'ang de dang 'dra ste/ mi rnams la ni skra dang / sen mo dang / byi ba'i rtug pa dang / lan tshwa rnams yungs mar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg bya'o// ba lang
244b5(rgyud 'bum): gi nad la ni pags pa dang / mjug ma dang / spu dang / rmig pa rnams dang / beg tshong dang lhan cig tu phye mar byas te yungs mar dang sbyar bas ba lang gi lhas sam/ ba lang gi ra ba 'am/ yang na gang na ba lang
244b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'ang rung ste/ der sbyin sreg bya zhing nyin mtshan brgyad kyi bar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya'o// dge slong rnams la'ang mchod ston byas te/ 'dir yang sku gzugs kyi cho ga snga ma bzhin gtor ma'i tshe
244b7(rgyud 'bum): ga'ang bya'o/ / mi rnams la ni grong ngam grong khyer gyi nang du sgo'i them pa non par bya ste/ de nyid du khyim du byas la mi rnams la ni seng ldeng gi sol bas bya'o// ba lang rnams la ni spos kyis bya'o// ma ho rnams
245a1(rgyud 'bum): la ni nim pa'i yam sreg shing gis byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / ldong ros dang / lig bu mig dang / gi'u wang la sogs pa sgrub par 'dod na sngar bshad pa'i bsnyen pa byas
245a2(rgyud 'bum): la zangs dang / lcags dang / ra gan la sogs pas yam sreg shing gis mig sman byas te/ lig bu mig dang / ldong ros dang / gi'u wang la sogs pa las gang yang rung ba blangs
245a3(rgyud 'bum): la/ bu mo gzhon nu gso sbyong dang ldan zhing gos dkar po gyon pas spos chu dang sbyar te btags nas/ sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten nam sku gzugs kyi mdun du yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad nas brtsams te
245a4(rgyud 'bum): tshes bco lnga'i bar du nyin par sngar bsnyen par byas la nub mo bsgrub par bya'o/ / gtor ma'ang nub mo sbyin par bya'o// de nas lag pa gnyis dri chus bkrus la mig sma na de blangs te mchod nas/ mar
245a5(rgyud 'bum): gyi'o zhag gcig la bud med shi ba mthong ba dang / de'i khar mig snga na de bcug la ras ma nyams pas kha bcing bar bya'o// bud med de'ang thog ma kho nar snum gyis bsku zhing / dril te khrus byas nas
245a6(rgyud 'bum): spos kyis byugs la mig gnyis mig rtsis bsku'o/ / rkang pa gnyis kyi mthil yang rgya skyegs kyis bskus la ras ma nyams pa zung gcig bskon te/ ku sha'i stan la mgo nub phyogs su bstan
245a7(rgyud 'bum): te gzhag go/ / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams gcad par bya ste/ dang por tshon sna lnga'i skud pas bya'o// rim pa gnyis pa ni thal bas bya'o// gsum pa ni yungs kar gyis bya'o// bzhi
245b1(rgyud 'bum): pa ni chus byas la shar phyogs su kha bltas te 'dug nas bud med de'ang seng ldeng gi phur bu 'am lcags kyi phur bu bzhi la gdags so/ / rig sngags dag gis kyang dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams
245b2(rgyud 'bum): gcad par bya ste/ dang po ni sangs rgyas byams pas bya'o// gnyis pa ni gos dkar mos bya'o// gsum pa ni gzugs chen pos bya'o// bzhi pa ni rdo rje khro bos bya ste/ rig sngags
245b3(rgyud 'bum): 'chang gis rkang pa g.yon pa ni sa la gzhag/ g.yas pa ni snying khar mnan la 'byung po'i gtor ma thams cad kyang sbyin zhing / mi'i thod pa bzhi'i nang du phyogs bzhir gtor ma byin nas nam nangs kyi bar
245b4(rgyud 'bum): du bzlas brjod bya'o/ / rig sngags 'chang gi glo g.yas g.yon du ni lag na mtshon thogs pa'i mi gnyis gzhag par bya ste/ g.yon phyogs su'ang gcig/ g.yas phyogs su'ang gcig gzhag go/
245b5(rgyud 'bum): phyogs srung ba'ang bzhir mi bzhi gzhag ste/ dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la gzhag go// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis brtson 'grus brtun la nam shar phyogs su lce spyang gi skad 'byin gyi bar du bzlas
245b6(rgyud 'bum): brjod bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'grub par shes par bya'o// bud med kyi kha nas kyang 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'od zer byung ba dang gtor ma sbyin par bya'o// bgegs byung na'ang
245b7(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma byin na grub pa yin/ de blangs pas bdag gi grogs rnams dang bcas te gyen du 'phags par 'gyur zhing / skra lcang lor 'khyil la nyi ma shar ka'i mdog can dang ldan pa dang / rig
246a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang gi rgyal por 'gyur zhing / lag na rdo rje dang mthu stobs mnyam zhing in+d+ra nI la'i mdog can dpag tshad gcig tu dri bsung gis khyab pa dang / bskal
246a2(rgyud 'bum): par gnas par 'gyur te/ 'di'i ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi cho ga'ang spyi dang 'dra'o// a pa marga sgrub pa'ang 'dir bshad par bya ste/ ri'i rtse mor bcom ldan 'das bzhugs par bya ste
246a3(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs la bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgyar bya'o/ / 'og gi g.yon rol du ni rdo rje 'dzin mdog nag por 'bri'o// rdo rje sde'ang rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra
246a4(rgyud 'bum): bar bya ste/ lag na rdo rje la lta zhing 'dug par bri'o// rdo rje 'dzin gyi lag pa g.yon pa'ang rdo rje sde'i steng du bzhag la/ gang gi phyir sgrub pa de'ang pus mo g.yas pa sa la btsugs te me tog gis snyim
246a5(rgyud 'bum): pa bkang la rdo rje 'dzin la lta zhing 'dug par bya/ rdo rje 'dzin yang sgrub pa po la lta zhing lag pa g.yas pas dbugs 'byin par bya'o// rdo rje khu tshur ma'ang gzhon nu'i gzugs can rgyan thams cad
246a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis brgyan par bya ste/ de'i lag pa g.yon pa na rdo rje thogs/ g.yas pa na pad+ma 'am ut+pa la thogs te rdo rje 'dzin la lta zhing / pad+ma 'am ut+pa la de rdo rje 'dzani la dbul bar blta bar bya'o//
246a7(rgyud 'bum): riromo mkhan gyi cho ga dang ras kyi cho ga ni sngar bshad pa dang 'dra bar bya ste/ ri mo mkhan gtsang mas bya'o// mar gyi ngo zla ba phyed kyi bar du bzlas brjod lan brgyad stong brgyad stong byas la/ yar gyi
246b1(rgyud 'bum): ngo tshes gcig nas brtsams te zhag gsum spyang bar byas la/ bsgrub par bya ste/ mar gyi ngo la ni sngar bstan pa yin no// yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la a pa mna'i yam sreg shing mar dang sbrang rtsi'i nang
246b2(rgyud 'bum): du bsnyugs pa lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas pas sbyin sreg bya'o/ / phyi rol gyi gtor ma'ang ci 'byor pas bya'o// nang gi lha bshos kyang zho dang 'bras chen sbyar ba 'am 'bras kyi'o thug 'bul
246b3(rgyud 'bum): bar byas na/ zla ba phyed tshun chad kyis 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro// yang na a pa marga'i yam sreg shing 'bum sbyin sreg bya'o// grong dang grong khyer dang mi nye ba'i byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams
246b4(rgyud 'bum): natsa pa ti'i shing ngam/ yang na shing 'o ma can gyi drung du song la nyi ma gung gi dus su gring mas ji tsam khebs pa de tsam gyi phyogs byi dor byas te/ grog ma bar gyi sas sbyang nul byugs la sa de nyid kyis sngags
246b5(rgyud 'bum): bu gsum bya ste/ gcig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi/ gcig ni rdo rje 'dzin gyi/ gcig ni rdo rje khu tshur ma'i bya'o// mdun logs der thab khung rdo rje'i dbyibs 'dra bar byas la/ grog mkhar
246b6(rgyud 'bum): gyi sas rdo rje byas nas sa de nyid kyis skyang nul byugs te/ tsan dan dmar pos mchod la/ ka ra wI ra dmar pos mchod pa byas so// lha bshos kyang ci 'byor pas 'bras chan bu ram dang sbyar ba dang
246b7(rgyud 'bum): 'bras chan zho dang sbyar ba dbul lo/ / de'i nang du rtswa ngur ba rtse mo ma nyams pa'i stan bting la kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ gtor ma rnam gsum la sogs pa sbyin zhing / bcom ldan 'das de'i mdun los
247a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi dkyil 'khor la thab khung rdo rje'i dbyibs 'dra ba/ ra ba shar nub tu dkyus ring bar byas pa'i nang du shing 'o ma can tsher ma med cing rtsa ba dang bcas pa bcad de sbyin sreg byas na rgyal/
247a2(rgyud 'bum): sring ngam nor sbyin par 'gyur ro// mi'i gtso bo dbang du bya bar 'dod na sbyin sreg byas na mi'i gtso bo de'ang de nyid du 'ong bar 'gyur te/ rgyal rigs ni zhag gsum gyis dbang du 'gyur ro// rje'u rigs ni zhag
247a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kyis dbang du 'gyur ro/ / dmangs rigs ni zhag gcig gis dbang du 'gyur ro// las byed pa'i tshe ci ste la la zhig 'ongs te nor gyis 'dring par byed na'ang las yongs su ma rdzogs kyi bar du nor de blang
247a4(rgyud 'bum): bar mi bya'o/ / g.yog byed pa ma gtogs par gzhan dang lhan cig tu gtam yang mi bya'o// ci ste rmi lam du lha mo las 'od zer 'byung bar rmis na de'ang de'i dngos grub kyi mtshan ma yin no// sgrub
247a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'dod pa ni ci ste bud med kun 'ongs te/ me tog gam 'bras bu sbyin par byed na des na dngos grub 'grub par shes par byos shig/ lo tog ma rungs par 'dod na zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum
247a6(rgyud 'bum): dulan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas pas 'bru ma rung bar bya ba gang yin pa'i 'bru de nyid kyi sbyin sreg bya ste mchod pa'ang ci 'byor pas bya'o/ / gso sbyong dang ldan pas pa la sha'i sbyin sreg byas na zhi
247a7(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / nya ba rnams kyis nya mi sod par bya na nya ba nyid kyi khyim nas me 'am shing blangs la/ nya pa de nyid kyi khyim nas nya blangs nas mar gyi nang du bstsags te/ nya pa de dag nyid kyi khyim gyi
247b1(rgyud 'bum): g+ha sbyin sre byas na nya mi sod par 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin du ri dgas dang / phag dang / ma he dang / ri bong la sogs pa'i cho ga'ang de dang 'dra ste/ lam gyi bzhi mdor sbyin sreg byas kyang rung / gtor ma 'a
247b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyin par bya'o/ / gsod pa dang 'ching bar byed pa la ni rtsig ngos la rdo rje khu chur ma bris te/ de'i mgo bor yang bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs bris la zas su dkar gsum za ba dang / gso sbyong gi
247b3(rgyud 'bum): yan lag dang ldan pas bya zhing / bcom ldan 'das la dri la sogs pas mchod par bya'o// rdo rje khu tshur ma ni mdog dkar po bya ste/ lag pa g.yon khu tshur bcangs la/ lag pa g.yas dbugs
247b4(rgyud 'bum): 'byin par bya'o/ / sgrub pa po'ang pus mo g.yas pa sa la btsugs te snyim par me tog thogs par bya'o// de nas yam sreg shing gang 'dod pa dang / gu gul yungs mar gyi nang du bsnyugs pas
247b5(rgyud 'bum): nub mo sbyin sreg byas na nges 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / las thams cad la'ang spyan dang lhan cig sbyar bar bya'o// lha rnams rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rdo rje khu tshur ma'i las rnams ni ngas bshad
247b6(rgyud 'bum): zin te/ de la drag tu bskul ba'i rig sngags dran pa tsam gyis mdun du gnas par 'gyur ba'ang ngas bshad par bya'o// na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ ru tu ru tu ma ta swA hA/ de nas lha de dag 'jigs pa'i sems kyi
247b7(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje'i zhal du lta zhing tshig 'di skad du/ rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po chen po/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rdo rje khu tshur ma'i snying po'i las rnams shod cig shod cig ces kyang spras so//
248a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po lag na rdo rjes snying po'i las rnams bshad pa/ ras ma nyams pa kha tshar ma bcad pa la tshon rtsi sbyin dang ma sbyar bas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs
248a2(rgyud 'bum): seng ge'i khri la bzhugs shing chos ston cing bzhugs pa 'drar gzhug go/ / glo g.yon logs su lag na rdo rje ut+pa la sngon po'i mdog can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa la tshig gu'i sham thabs gyon zhing /
248a3(rgyud 'bum): lag na rnga yab thogs pa bri'o// g.yas logs su ni rdo rje khu tshur ma mdog sngo bsangs ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan la/ lag pa g.yon pa na rdo rje thogs/ g.yas pa na shing thog thogs pa bri'o// de nas rig
248a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang gis 'o ma'i lde gu'am slong mo'i zas za zhing phyogs gtsang mar lan drug 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o/ / de'i 'og tu ri mo'i sku gzugs phyogs gtsang mar bkram ste/ zas dkar gsum bza'
248a5(rgyud 'bum): zhing dus gsum du khrus byas la/ yar gyi ngo ches gcig la brtsams te zhag gsum spyang ba byas te me sbar nas/ gu gul gyi ril bu mon sran tsa'i 'bru tsam la du ru ka'i mar gyi nang du bstsags pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg
248a6(rgyud 'bum): byas na/ de nas sku gzugs 'grub par 'gyur te/ lha mo 'ongs nas dam pa gang stsol ba thob par 'gyur ro// mchod pa'ang ci 'byor par bya'o// dge slong dag la'ang mchod ston gsol bar bya ste/ 'di ni gzhan gyis
248a7(rgyud 'bum): mi thub pa'i dngos grub yin no/ / sku gzugs de nyid kyi mdun du lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs te lan sum 'bum pazlas brjod byas na/ khu tshur bcangs pas lus mi snang bar 'gyur zhing phye na snang bar 'gyur ro// chog
248b1(rgyud 'bum): snga ma bzhin du sa phyogs gtsang mar hUM dang ldan par lan nyi khri bzlas brjod byas na glang po che rgyags pa dag kyang skyel bar byed cing 'dren par byed/ dbang du 'gugs par byed/ bcing bar byed/ 'grol bar byed do//

254b7(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas na 'jig rten gyi ma mo rnams dam pa sbyin par 'gyur ro/ / 'jig rten gyi ma mo rnams kyi cho ga rdzogs so// / lha rnams 'jig rten gyi sa

255a2(rgyud 'bum): zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du khro bo bzhag nas mchod pa rgyas pa byas la/ bcom ldan 'das mas las thams cad bya zhing / me tog dkar po

255a4(rgyud 'bum): chu'am yang na rnam par bzlas brjod byas pas ni rgyu 'joms par byed do// lo mas ni dug sel bar byed do// srung ba ni skud pa 'am gos kyi grwa mdud pa bya ste/ de dag thams cad kyang lan bdun

255a7(rgyud 'bum): shing gis me sbar nas pad+ma dkar po zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyi nang du bsnyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na dad+mo grub 'grub pa'i mtshan mar me tog gi 'phreng ba 'gul bar 'gyur te/ grub nas
255b1(rgyud 'bum): kyang khams gcig gi rgyal por 'gyur ro/ / mchod pa'ang ci 'byor pas bya'o// bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis gdon thams cad 'joms par byed do// 'o ma 'am chus ni dug sel bar byed do//
255b2(rgyud 'bum): sas ni kham phor lag pa la 'bebs par byed do// gong ma dang 'dra/ mi'i thod pa dang bum pa la'ang 'bebs par byed do// yan lag kyang ma rung bar byed nus so// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag
255b3(rgyud 'bum): gcig smyung ba byas te li khri blangs la thod pa'i nang du bzhag ste/ lha chen po'i gnas su song la gzugs kyi g.yas logs su dur khrod kyi shing gis me sbar te/ li khri btso bar bya zhing rig sngags kyi rgyal pos
255b4(rgyud 'bum): bsrung bar bya'o/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis li khri blangs te khyim du khyer la dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pas brgyan nas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad kyi bar du dus gsum du bzlas brjod lan brgyad brgya brgyad

255b6(rgyud 'bum): kyis dbul lo/ / rig sngags kyi rgyal pos ni bsrung bar bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis li khri blangs te a shwat+tha'i lo ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag la/ dro bar gyur kyi bar du rig sngags brjod na 'grub
255b7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur te/ grub nas kyang thig le byas na lus mi snang ba dang 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can du 'gyur la/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi song la/ ci 'dod pa'i kha zas rnams longs
256a1(rgyud 'bum): spyod cing tshe lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur ro/ / mar gyi po dag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du mchod pa rgyas par byas la/

256a3(rgyud 'bum): ral gri bzung nas 'phar zhing ku co'i sgra thos par 'gyur gyi bar du rig sngags kyi rgyal po brjod par bya'o/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis bcom ldan 'das ma dang sngags kyi rgyal po dang bcas par dran par

256b3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / lha rnams rdo rje khro bo chen po bdud rtsi thab sbyor stobs dang ldan pa/ pha rol gnon pa dpag tu med pa'i las rnams ngas bshad zin to// tshangs pas bshad pa'i las kyang bstan
256b4(rgyud 'bum): par bya ste/ srung ba ni lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i thal bas bya'o// gdon bskyod pa ni mthe bos bya'o// lo tog ma rung bar bya ba ni yid kyis bya'o// chu ma rung bar bya ba ni lan gsum bzlas
256b5(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas pa'i gseg mas bya'o/ / dgra gsad par 'dod na dgra gang na 'dug pa de logs su kha bltas te zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du lan brgyad brgya brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas na zhag bdun
256b6(rgyud 'bum): gyi nyin par dgra 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ / bud med dbang du bya bar 'dod na 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ka ra wi ra'i me tog brgyad brgyas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje la bsnun na dbang du 'gyur ro// khrag

257a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhom na sngar ngas las bshad pa'i las gang yin pa des rkang rjes kyi rdul gyis zhag bdun gyi bar du sbyin sreg bya'o/ / lha rnams tshangs pa'i snying po la drag tu bskul ba

258a7(rgyud 'bum): can mi rnams la gang 'tshe ba yin pa'i gdon de dag nges par bshig pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la dri bar gyis/ bcom ldan 'das snying rje'i sems kyis gdon rnams kyi rus dang / rigs dang / ming de dag
258b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag la gsungs shig/ de skad ces spras nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes/ rdo rje khro bo la 'di skad ces smras so// bdud rtsi thab sbyor gang khyod sems
258b2(rgyud 'bum): can la phan pa'i phyir zhugs te/ sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gdon rnams kyi rus dang ming nga la dris pa legs so legs so// de ngas bshad pa bzhin du nyon cig/ 'jig rten dag na gdon rnams ni//
258b3(rgyud 'bum): drag cing sbyor ba sna tshogs yid// gdon yod de dag ci 'dra ba// go rims bzhin du bshad par bya// gdon rnams stong phrag brgyad cu ni// mi yi 'jig rten dag na gnas// de las sa 'dir rgyu ba yi//
258b4(rgyud 'bum): gdon ni bco brgyad shes par bya// gdon rnams 'ong bar 'jug pa dang // de bzhin mtshan ma dag dang ni// gso rung mi rung dpyad pa dang // gso ba'i thabs ni tha dad dang // rigs rnams la ni gang
258b5(rgyud 'bum): brten dang / / gang gi rus ni gang yin dang // de las gzhan yang bshad bya ste// ngas bshad de ni mnyan par gyis// gzugs kyang med la dri yang med// sgra yang med tsang khyad par du// mnyan du med cing
258b6(rgyud 'bum): ltar med de/ / mtshan ma tsam las shes par bya// me long dang ni chu dag las// grib ma ji ltar snang ba bzhin// de ltar de dag rtogs bya zhing // de las gdon rnams shes par bya'o// thams cad rlung

259a2(rgyud 'bum): na de dag shes par bya/ / rlung can gyis ni rlung can 'dzin// de dag gi ni ming dang gzugs// so sor yang ni bshad bya ste// gcig ni lha gdon shes par bya// gcig ni 'byung po'i gdon yin te// de

259a6(rgyud 'bum): tshigs dag tu 'dzin byed de/ / lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa yi// gdon rnams gso ru rung bar bshad// de las 'das par gnas pa yi// gso ru rung ba ma yin no// de las gzhan yang mtshan rnams kyis/
259a7(rgyud 'bum): khyad par dag kyang bshad par bya// lha gdon shes par bya ba la// de ni gtor ma 'dod pa ste// rigs bzhi so sor rgyu bar byed// gtsang zhing gtsang sbra spyod pa dang // dka' thub gnod pa mthar phyin dang /
259b1(rgyud 'bum): tshul khrims ldan pa'i mi dag la// lha yi gdon ni 'dzin par byed// lha yi gdon gyis zin pa ni// shes pas legs par rtogs bya ste// dga' bar ma 'gyur 'khrug mi 'gyur// kha zas la yang mi

259b3(rgyud 'bum): mang po'i ngad ldan zhing / / de yi gdong ni pad+ma bzhin// legs par byas par 'gyur ba ste// gang la tshul ni 'di dag yod// de ni lha yi gdon du bshad// gang gi bde bar 'gyur ba yi// gtor
259b4(rgyud 'bum): ma'i cho ga 'di dag bya/ / me tog dri dang me tog 'phreng // mar me yang ni de la sbyin// pad+ma ut+pal pu shel tsi// chang dang 'bras chan sbyin du gzhug/ gdugs dkar dag byed srang bu dang // de bzhin
259b5(rgyud 'bum): me tog 'phreng dkar dag/ de ni lha yi gnas kyang rung // lam gyi bzhi mdor sbyin par bya// gtor ma'i las ni 'di nyid kyis// gdon de myur du gtong bar 'gyur// ci ste des kyang ma btang na// gang gi
259b6(rgyud 'bum): gdon de gtong 'gyur ba/ / 'di ni de la sbyar bar bgyi// na ga ta ma shra sha yi// me tog rtsa ba 'bras bu dang // shun phrags dang ni de bzhin du// shu dag dkar po yungs kar dang // tshogs rnams de
259b7(rgyud 'bum): dag sogs nas kyang / / me ni chung ngus byas pa la// mar ni phul bzhi nang du btso// de nas de la blud par bya// de bzhin du ni snar yang blugs// mig bskus lus byugs 'jigs par 'gyur//
260a1(rgyud 'bum): snar thugs 'jigs pas gzir ba dang // mar 'thungs pas kyang 'jigs 'gyur nas// gdon de rab tu 'bros par 'gyur// ci ste des kyang ma btang na// las
260a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di yang ni legs par brtsam/ / rgyal po'i blo gros ma sngags kyis dur khrod kyi sol ba las gzugs brnyan byas la/ rdo rje lcags sgrog gis bcings nas mdun du gzugs brnyan mtshon rnon pos
260a3(rgyud 'bum): bcad na gdon gyis ku co bton te 'bros par 'gyur ro/ / ci ste de ltar byas kyang ma bros na rgyal ba'i blo gros mas lan tshwa dang ske tshe lan brgyad brgyas byas na ku co bton te 'bros par 'gyur ro//
260a4(rgyud 'bum): lha'i gdon gyi skabs rdzogs so// // sngar bshad pa ni gang yin pa'i// 'byung po'i gdon yang shes par bya// bram ze dang ni rgyal rigs la// 'dzin par byed de de
260a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du/ / de ni gtor ma 'dod phyir rgyu// de yi tshul rnams nga las nyon// gtsang zhing gtsang sbrar spyod pa dang // gzugs bzang ba yi mi rnams la// 'byung po'i gdon ni 'dzin par byed
260a6(rgyud 'bum): de yi tshul rnams nga las nyon/ / tshes grangs bcu gsum bcu bzhi'ang rung // gnyis ka'i phyogs la'ang de bzhin te// bcu bzhi la ni rtag pa yin// dga' ston dag dang 'dus pa dang // lha
260a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi ni gnas dag dang / / skabs 'di dag tu gzugs bzang ba'i// mi rnams la ni 'dzin par byed// gtsang zhing gtsang sbrar spyod pa dang // dka' thub gdon pa mthar phyin dang // rtag tu glo
260b1(rgyud 'bum): dkar gyon pa dang / / smyung ba dga' ba de bzhin no// 'byung po'i gdon gyis zin pa yi// tshul 'di dag ni nga las nyon// sems pa dang ni dgod pa dang // nam mkha' la ni lta bar byed//
260b2(rgyud 'bum): mdog kyang nam mkha' 'dra bar 'gyur// gser gyi mdog ltar mdzes pa ste// zas dang skom la dga' ba dang // lha dang bram ze mchod la dga'// 'byung po'i gdon gyis zin pa yi//
260b3(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma yang ni de dag yin// de ni gang gis bder 'gyur ba'i// gso ba'i thabs kyang bshad par bya// til zan dang ni 'byung po'i zas// sha btsos rjen pa de bzhin te// me tog dri dang
260b4(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma dang / / me tog 'phreng ba sna tshogs pa// gtor ma de dag bsdus nas ni// lho phyogs su yang sbyin par bya// rdo rje ser skya'i sngags kyis kyang // sreg blugs gsum dang bdun pa
260b5(rgyud 'bum): dbul/ / gtor ma'i las ni 'di nyid kyis// gdon de myur du gtong bar 'gyur// ci ste des kyang ma btang na// gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i// thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar
260b6(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / gan da ma la dum bi dang // ba la a ti ba la dang // bu shel tsi dang thal tres dang // shu ga nas sgog pa dang // tshogs rnams de dag bsags nas ni// mar ni phul gang bzhi dag/
260b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / kha gcin phul bzhi nang du btso// me ni chung ngus btso bar bya// de nas de dag blud par bya// de bzhin du ni snar yang blugs// mig bskus lus phyugs 'jigs 'gyur nas// 'byung
261a1(rgyud 'bum): po rab tu 'bros par 'gyur/ / ci ste des kyang ma btang na// gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i// thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya// rdo rje ser skya'i sngags kyis las
261a2(rgyud 'bum): brtsams te/ dkyil 'khor bris nas lan tshwa dang ske tshe'i sbyin sreg lan brgyad brgya byas na gdon gyis ku co bton te 'bros par 'gyur ro// 'byung po'i gdon gyi skabs rdzogs so//
261a3(rgyud 'bum): sngar bshad pa ni gang yin pa'i// dri za'i gdon yang shes par bya// bram ze rgyal rigs 'dzin par byed// yar gyi ngo yi tshes bcu gnyis// mar gyi ngo yang de bzhin te// dri za rtag tu rgyu bar byed//
261a4(rgyud 'bum): lhag ma'i dus su 'tshe mi byed// gtor ma 'dod cing zhi la dga'// gdon de dga' ba 'dod pa ste// glu la dga' zhing dga' la sred// gtsang zhing gtsang sbrar spyod pa dang // gzugs bzang ba yi mi
261a5(rgyud 'bum): dag la/ / dri za dag ni sten par byed// de yi tshul ni nga las nyon// glu len cing ni gar byed cing // kha nas rol mo'i sgra yang 'byin// zas dang skom la dga' bar byed// de bzhin khrus dang 'phreng la
261a6(rgyud 'bum): dga'/ rgyan dang gtam gyi tshul la dga'// chag shing dri zhim dad kyang ldang // dri za yis ni zin pa yi// mtshan ma rnams ni de dag yin// gang gis de ni bder 'gyur ba// gso ba'i thabs kyang
261a7(rgyud 'bum): bstan par bya/ / gtsang zhing gtsang sbrar spyod pa dang // dga' bzhin pas ni gso bar bya// me tog 'phreng dmar de bzhin te// 'bras chan dmar po'ang de bzhin te// ba dan dmar po sbyin par byed//

266b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ / log 'dren gdon yang shes par bya// gtum zhing drag la gzu lums can// lci zhing 'jig rten 'joms pa ste// mar gyi ngo yi tshes lnga dang // tshes grangs bcu bzhi gnam

266b3(rgyud 'bum): spabs gang yin dang / / chu ngogs bud med bltas pa dang // shing la 'dzeg cing bshang gci byed// 'greng zhing bshang gci byed pa dang // gcer bur rgyug pa gang yin dang // gzhan gyi gros
266b4(rgyud 'bum): dang 'dres pa dang / / gos kyi tha mas g.yab pa yi// mi rnams gang gis zin pa yi// zhum zhing ngu bar byed pa dang // nor rnams kyang ni chud za zhing // gzhan gyi yid du mi 'ong dang // skyes pa chung
266b5(rgyud 'bum): ma rnyed mi 'gyur/ / bud med na ni khyo mi rnyed// tshong byed na yang zong dag gis// khe spogs rnyed par mi 'gyur zhing // zhing gshin dag la rmos btab kyang // rmos pa'i 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur//
266b6(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ni thams cad rdzogs pa yi// rlung ma las kyang bu mi 'byung // don gzhan bya bar brtsams kyang ni// log pa'i blo ni gzhan du 'gyur// de dag gang la snang gyur pa'i// de yi gso ba'i
266b7(rgyud 'bum): thams kyang bshad/ / khang pa mnyam zhing gsar byas la// rin chen thams cad bsags par bya// bum pa bzhi yang der gzhag cing // bkra shis rnams kyang dbul bar bya// rdzas rnams dang ni
267a1(rgyud 'bum): 'bras rnams dang / / bum pa ba dan sngon po dang // sha btsos dang ni rjen pa dang // de bzhin 'khur ba zas rnams dang // dri dang me tog dkar po dang // 'bras kyi 'o thug der
267a2(rgyud 'bum): spyir bya/ / gtor ma'i las ni 'di nyid kyis// de ni khrus kyang byed du gzhug/ ba la a ti ba la dang // kan ta ka ri 'bri ha ti// ba tra dang ni pu shel ci// pri yang ku dang shu ti dang // phye ma'i gong bu 'di
267a3(rgyud 'bum): yis ni/ / rab tu mnyam bzhag khrus byed gzhug/ rig sngags 'chang ni shar phyogs lta// nad pa nub phyogs bstan byas la// gos dkar can gyi snying po dang // ldan pa'i chus ni dbang yang bskur// de
267a4(rgyud 'bum): nas blo ldan yid gzhungs pas/ / bdud rtsi thab sbyor ldan pa yi// sbyar sman gyis ni lus kyang bsku// gu gul dang ni yungs kar dang // gi'u wang shu dag ru rta dang // sug smel yang ni de bzhin te// smon shing
267a5(rgyud 'bum): dang ni thang shing dang / / tsan dan dang ni a ka ru// ka la ya yi pad 'dra dang // ge sar rnams ni cha bsnyams la// chu dang lhan cig btag par bya// gang na sbyar sman 'di gnas pa// der ni 'jigs pa mi
267a6(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ste/ / chom rkun ma yin mtshon rnams min// sbrul rnams ma yin lha min min// lag na rdo rje'ang 'dis bskus pas// sa stengs dag tu brgyal bar 'gyur// 'di yis lus la bskus na ni// log
267a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dren rnams las thar par 'gyur/ / sbyar sman don kun sgrub pa ni// sngar yang ngas ni bshad pa yin// log 'dren gyi gdon gyi skabs rdzogs so// // sngar bshad pa ni gang yin pa'i//
267b1(rgyud 'bum): brjed byed gdon yang shes par bya// drag cing khro la gtum pa dang // gzu lums can de tshugs par dka'// tshes gnyis dang ni tshes bzhi dang // de bzhin dgu dang bcu gnyis dang // mar gyi bcu bzhi
267b2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin te/ / brjed byed dag ni 'jug par 'gyur// dang po'i thun ni 'das nas kyang // lhag ma rnams la de bzhin ldang // phyi nas rlung bzhin yang dang yang // de nas yud tsam nyin zhag dang // de bzhin zla byed
267b3(rgyud 'bum): zla dang lor/ / dbu ba skyug cing brgyal bar 'gyur// lus las rdul yang 'byung bar 'gyur// gdon gyis zin pa 'khor ba dang // sa la 'gyel zhing 'khor bar 'gyur// brjed byed gdon gyis zin pa yi//
267b4(rgyud 'bum): de yi mtshan ma de dag yin// gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i// gso ba'i thabs kyang bshad par bya// bdug pa dri dang me tog 'phreng // de bzhin sha btsos rjen pa dang // til zin dang ni 'byung po'i
267b5(rgyud 'bum): zas/ de bzhin shug pa pu shel tsi// byug pa dang ni mar yang blud// 'bras bu gsum las srang gcig dang // tsha ba gsum las srang gcig gzhug/ sgog skya brgya yang gzhug par bya// yungs kar stong
267b6(rgyud 'bum): yang de bzhin te/ / nag ta ma la'i sa bon dang // bil ba'i rtsa ba de bzhin te// de dag cha ni mnyam byas la// ra gcin dang ni btag par bya// mar dang ba gcin bzhi 'gyur gyi// nang du yang ni btso bar bya//
267b7(rgyud 'bum): mig kyang bsku zhing snar yang blugs// de bzhin mar yang btung bar bya// mig bskus lus byugs 'jigs par 'gyur// snar blugs 'jigs pas gzir ba dang // cho ga 'di dag rnams kyis kyang //
268a1(rgyud 'bum): gdon de rab tu 'bros par 'gyur// ci ste des kyang ma btang na// gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i// thabs gzhan 'di yang bshad par bya// dkyil 'khor bris te
268a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhug par byas la spyan nam/ yang na bdud rtsi thab sbyor ram/ tshogs chen po lcags can gyis be kang ka ta'i yam sreg shing gi sbyin sreg byas na gdon de 'bros par 'gyur ro// brjed byed kyi
268a3(rgyud 'bum): gdon gyi skabs rdzogs so/ / // sngar bshad pa ni gang yin pa'i// smyo byed gdon yang shes par bya// drag cing gtum la gzu lums can// lci zhing tshugs par dka' ba/
268a4(rgyud 'bum): ste/ mar gyi ngo yi zhag gnyis dang // zhag dgu la ni 'tshe byed cing // rlung dang bad kan rang bzhin gyis// smyo byed gdon ni 'jug par 'gyur// de yi tshul ni bshad par bya// ngas bshad
268a5(rgyud 'bum): de ni mnyan par gyis/ / gzugs ni rab tu mdzes pa yin// shin tu dga' zhing spro bar 'gyur// dpa' bo dang ni gzugs bzang dang // mi ni glu la sred pa la// rtsed mo la sogs gtam dag
268a6(rgyud 'bum): las/ smyo byed 'dzin te the tsom med// mtshan 'di dag gis shes par bya// tshul rnams kyang ni 'dir nyon cig/ glu len cing ni gar byed dang // dgod par byed cing ngu ba dang // dri dang me
268a7(rgyud 'bum): tog 'phreng la dga'/ / rlung dang bad kan gnas pa yin// rab tu rgyug gam yang na 'greng // dal nas kyang ni dgod pa dang // gnyis kyang che bar mi 'gyur la// cung zad kyang ni smra mi byed// kha
268b1(rgyud 'bum): zas la yang dga' ba rnams/ / rlung mkhris bad kan gnas pa yin// shin tu drag tu smra ba dang // mang du yang ni smra ba dang // gtam gyi tshul la dga' ba'i rnams// bad kan gnas la brten pa
268b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / gnas gsum la ni brten 'gyur la// tshul kun yang ni byed gyur na// de ni gsor med shes par bya// de la spyad par bya ba med// lha rnams lag na rdo rje nga'i mtshams rlung 'di ni
268b3(rgyud 'bum): gsor mi rung ba la'ang tshar gcod pa yin no/ / gdon gang nga'i ming thos kyang mi 'bros pa de la ni ngas rdo rje drag pos spyi bo gshog par bya'o// sman dang gsang sngags gang gis smyo byed kyi gdon stobs
268b4(rgyud 'bum): po che la gso ba'ang bshad par bya ste/ dri kun dang ni me tog 'phreng // de bzhin rol mo'i spyad kun dang // 'bras chan dri zhim gtsang ma dang // 'o thug 'bru chang sbyar ba'i chang // de ltar
268b5(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma rnams bsogs la/ / lam gyi bzhi mdor sbyin par bya// gtor ma'i las ni 'di dag gis// gdon de myur du gtong bar 'gyur// ci ste des kyang ma btang na// gang gis gdon
268b6(rgyud 'bum): de gtong 'gyur ba'i/ / thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya// mar rnying lo ni sum cu gnyis// lon pa'i mar de phul bzhi dang // 'o ma phul bzhi dag dang ni// sbrang rtsi phul bzhir ldan par
268b7(rgyud 'bum): bya/ rta ba lang ko ba bsregs pa yi// phye ma phul bzhi gzhug par bya// sgog skya brgya yang gzhug par bya// srang grangs sum cu a ru ra// srang grangs nyis 'gyur tsha ba gsum// gso
269a1(rgyud 'bum): ba pos ni gzhug bya ste/ / lhan cig phye ma zhing mor bya// gang tshe thams cad choms gyur nas// de bzhin du ni thams cad kyi// phyi ru yang ni dbyung bar bya// mi yi 'jig rten
269a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa yi/ / gdon rnams thams cad ji snyed pa// rlung can dang ni mkhris pa can// bad kan can dang 'dus pa can// gdon gyi gzugs ni thams cad kyi// sman rnams kyang ni 'di yin te//
269a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje lha yi mar zhes bya// gdon kun gtong bar 'gyur ba dang // gdon kun zhi bar byed pa dang // gdon kun 'jigs par byed pa ste// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// nga yis su ni ba
269a4(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / gang zhig sman gyi rgyal po yi// ming ni legs par dran byed pa// de la gdon rnams thams cad kyis// glags btsal phyir ni brtson mi byed// de phyir de la blud par bya// de bzhin snar yang
269a5(rgyud 'bum): blugs par bya/ / cho ga 'di dag gis kyang ni// gdon de rab tu 'bros par 'gyur// ci ste des kyang ma btang na// gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i// thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya//
269a6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor bris la der gzhug par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor der rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'am/ tshogs lcags can nam/ rmugs byed kyis sbyin sreg bya'o// lha rnams 'di ni lag na rdo rje'i
269a7(rgyud 'bum): tsham rlungs yin te/ gsor mi rung ba rnams kyang tshar gcod par byed do// gdon gang nga'i ming thos nas mi 'bros pa de la rdo rje drag pos spyi bo gshag par bya'o// lha rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas
269b1(rgyud 'bum): ma rung ba rnams gzhom pa bzang po rnams ngas bshad zin to/ / smyo byed kyi gdon gyi skabs rdzogs so// / sngar bshad pa ni gang yin gdon// lha ma yin gdon shes par bya/
269b2(rgyud 'bum): gtum zhing gzu lums 'tshe ba dang // 'jig rten 'tsho bar byed po'i ste// gzi brjid can dang lus che dang // gzugs bzang yon tan ldan pa la/ lha ma yin ni 'jug par byed// de yi mtshan ma tshul
269b3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin nyon/ / rig sngags 'chang la brnyas par byed// rig byed kyang ni smra bar byed// skem byed nga yin khyab 'jug pa// zhes ni brdzun yang smra bar byed// gdon kun gyi ni tshul dag dang // rnam pa mang
269b4(rgyud 'bum): por sgyur bar byed/ / ngu zhing res 'ga' sos kyang 'dzin// res 'ga' tha kyang za bar byed// lag pas rtswa dag blangs nas kyang // skad cig gis ni mi la 'tshe// tshig ngan gad rgyangs smra bar byed// shin tu yang
269b5(rgyud 'bum): ni dgod par byed/ / lha ma yin gyi gdon rnams kyi// mtshan ma yang ni de yin te// cho ga yang ni de bzhin du// de yi ngo lon gang dag gis// gdon de gtong bar 'gyur ba'ang bya// me tog kun dang dri dag dang // /
269b6(rgyud 'bum): me tog 'phreng ba sna tshogs dang // pad+ma ut+pal du shel tsi// ut+pal dmar po'i 'dab ma dang // sha btsos dang ni rjen pa yi// ngo lon dag ni 'jam por bya// de nas rig sngags 'chang dag gis// gtsang
269b7(rgyud 'bum): s+tha bya ste nub phyogs sbyin/ / gtor ma'i las ni 'di nyid kyis// gdon de myur du gtong bar 'gyur// ci ste des kyang ma btang na// gang gis gdon de gtang 'gyur ba'i// thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya//
270a1(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba dang // ba la a ti ba la dang // thal dres dang ni pu shel ci// rtsa ba lnga rnams bsogs nas ni// mar ni phul tag bzhi dag dang // ba gcin phul
270a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhi'i nang du btso/ / me ni chung ngus dal nas btso// de nas de la blud par bya// de bzhin du ni snar yang blugs// mig bskus lus byugs 'jigs par 'gyur// snar blugs 'jigs pas gzir
270a3(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / mar 'thungs pas kyang 'jigs gyur nas// gdon der rab tu 'bros par 'gyur// ci ste des kyang ma btang na// gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i// thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya//
270a4(rgyud 'bum): rdorje ser skyas sbyin sreg bya// rdo rje sgrog gis bcing bar bya// de dag sngags kyis tshar yang gcad// lha ma yin gyi gdon gyi skabs rdzogs so// / de nas ngas ni sngar bshad gag/
270a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu'i gdon bzhin shes par bya// gtum zhing khro la gzu lums can// 'gro ba'i gnas dang mi gnas 'joms// tshes gnyis dang ni bcu gcig dang // mar gyi ngo yi zhag lnga dang // phal cher
270a6(rgyud 'bum): tshechos bcu dag la rgyu/ / gzhon nu'i srog ni gcod pa yi// rtag tu gsum zhig rgyu bar byed// byis pa gsod cing mi bsrun na// rigs bzhi ldan zhing rtag tu rgyu// gtor ma 'dod pa'i gdon chen
270a7(rgyud 'bum): yin/ de las gzhan pa'i gang dag gi/ rigs rnams ci 'dra bshad par gyis// nam gru bram zer shes par bya// bya ni rgyal rigs yin par bstan// skem byed rje'u rigs shes par bya//
270b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu dmangs rigs shes par bya// gyen du lta ba gang yin dang // skad cig skad cig 'khor bar byed// rims dang lud pa dbugs mi bde// de ni nam gru'i gdon yin no// mig phab pa ni gang
270b2(rgyud 'bum): yin dang / / so yang 'cha' bar byed pa dang // rngam pa can dang rims btab gang // de ni bya nyid yin par bstan// glo bur du ni ngu ba gang // rims kyis btab cing rab tu rgyug/ sdang zhing
270b3(rgyud 'bum): dgod par byed pa dang / / de bzhin 'dar zhing glal bar byed// byis pa gang gi kha dag nas// dri nga ba ni 'byung ba dang // lus la rma dang 'brum bu 'byung // tsha zhing me yi mdog dang 'dra// mtshan mo
270b4(rgyud 'bum): dus 'tshams ldang bar 'gyur/ / dus 'tshams dag tu bab pa na// 'khru zhing rims 'debs skyug pa dang // lus kyang sngon por gyur pa dang // gang zhig lus ni rdo par byed// rims kyis kyang
270b5(rgyud 'bum): ni 'tshe ba dang / / nu ma shin tu sos kyang 'debs// lan grangs mang du ngu zhing 'dar// mig kyang dmar por gyur pa dang // mi dga' mchu yang mur bar byed// byis pa skems byed zin pa yin//
270b6(rgyud 'bum): lag pa dang ni rkang pa gcig/ las byas pas ni tshogs kyang na// mig ni 'khor zhing lta bar byed// mig gcig kyang ni 'dzums par byed// rnag dang khrag gi dri yang mnam// smin ma ya gcig
270b7(rgyud 'bum): 'degs par byed/ / skem byed brjed byed gdon rnams kyi// mtshan ma dag tu bstan pa yin// gzhon nu'i gdon la gtor ma bya// legs par khrus byas gtsang mas sgrim// dbyig rnams dang ni
271a1(rgyud 'bum): gser rnams dang / / gos kyang de la sbyin par bya// snum 'khur bkra shis 'bras yos dang // 'bras chan dang ni zan dron dang // sha btsos dang ni rjen pa dang // chang
271a2(rgyud 'bum): dang til zan rnams dang ni/ / til dang 'bras chan bu shel tsi// 'bras kyi 'o thug yungs kar ldan// ba lang gi ni chu ka 'am// shing skam ma mo'i gnas dag tu// gtor ma me mar bcas pa 'di/
271a3(rgyud 'bum): srod la yang ni sbyin par bya// gtor ma'i las ni 'di nyid kyis// gdon de myur du gtong bar 'gyur// ci ste des kyang ma btang na// gang gis gdon de gtong ba yi// thabs gzhan dag ni sbyar bar bya//
271a4(rgyud 'bum): bu tshang rdo dang ra minye ba// gser khrom dang ni skyer pa yung // ka pid ta yi khu ba dang // pa la sha yi lo ma dang // sbrang rtsi ran tsam gzhug par bya// seng ldeng snying po tsha ba gsum// btsod dang shing mngar
271a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / / de dag cha ni mnyam byas la// ra gcin dang ni btag par bya// mar ni phul ba ni gzhug par bya// ba gcin yang ni bzhi 'gyur thugs// go phye'i lo ma dag dang ni// ba ra ba ra ka rul
271a6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / til rul nas kyi lo ma yi// blugs pa'i sman ni bya ba yin// mar ni phul tag phyed kyis kyang // gong bu'i sman mchog btso bar bya// dus 'tshams gnyis su mkhas pa yis// de ni khrus
271a7(rgyud 'bum): kyang byed du gzhug/ gzhon nu'i gdon ni thams cad las// gso ba'i thabs ni dam pa yin// kun nas gso ba'i thabs yod de// thams cad kyang ni 'tshe ba yod// cho ga 'di dag gis kyang ni//
271b1(rgyud 'bum): gdon de rab tu 'bros par 'gyur// ci ste des kyang ma btang na// gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i// thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya// dga' byed gdong gis khrus bya zhing // gtor ma
271b2(rgyud 'bum): yang ni de la sbyin/ / yang na rig pa mchog gos bya// des ni gdon de gtong bar 'gyur// gzhon nu'i gdon gyi skabs rdzogs so// // sngar bshad pa ni gang yin pa'i//
271b3(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin gdon yang shes par bya// gtum zhing gzu lums che ba ste// 'jig rten dag la'ang 'tsho bar byed// ngo gnyis tshes ni bcu gsum dang // yar gyi tshes lnga dag la rgyu// skyed mos tshal dang
271b4(rgyud 'bum): lha gnas su/ / gtsang zhing spyod pa gtsang ba dang // mi rnams gzugs ni bzang ba dang // rgyan pos rtse la rab chags dang // bzhi na do gang du rtse ba na// bram ze rgyal rigs rtag tu 'dzin// gnod sbyin
271b5(rgyud 'bum): gdon gyis zin gyur pa/ / de yi mtshan ma shes par bya// dri dang me tog 'phreng la dga'// zas skom la yang de bzhin dga'// khrus dang rgyan la'ang de bzhin dga'// khro ba med cing mi ngu la// yang dang yang
271b6(rgyud 'bum): du zas kyang za/ / dbang yang che zhing nor mang la// de bzhin rtag tu sbyin la dga'// rtag tu shin tu gtsang sbra ldan// de ni gso ba'i thabs kyang bshad// zas kun dang ni dri kun dang // de bzhin me tog thams
271b7(rgyud 'bum): cad dang / / shing thog kun dang sbyar thug dang // de bzhin 'bras kyo 'o thug dang // sha btsos dang ni rjen pa dang // til zin dang ni 'byung po'i zas// gdugs ser dang ni mchod phyir thogs// de bzhin du
272a1(rgyud 'bum): ba ser po dang / / dbyig rnams dang ni gser dag dang // rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs rnams// tshul bzhin du ni sbyin par bya// gtor ma de dag bsogs nas kyang // byang phyogs
272a2(rgyud 'bum): su ni sbyin par bya/ / gtor ma'i las ni 'di nyid kyis// gdon de myur du gtong bar 'gyur// ci ste des kyang ma btang na// gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i// thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya//
272a3(rgyud 'bum): gro rnams dang ni nas rnams dang // mon sran gre'u dang rgya sran dang // 'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba gsum// de bzhin yungs kar pri yang ku// shu dag dang ni shing kun dang // de bzhin rtsa ba lnga pa gnyis//
272a4(rgyud 'bum): til rnams sgog skya ldan par gzhug/ mar ni phul bzhi'i nang du btso// 'o ma phul bzhi sbrang rtsi bzhi// ba gcin phul bzhi blugs par bya// ba lang ko ba bsregs pa yi// phye ma phul bzhi gzhug par bya//
272a5(rgyud 'bum): me ni chu dus dal nas btso// de nas de la blugs par bya// de bzhin du ni snar yang blugs// mig bskus lus byugs 'jigs pa dang // snar blugs 'jigs pas gzir bar 'gyur// cho ga 'di dag
272a6(rgyud 'bum): gis kyang ni/ / gdon de rab tu 'bros par 'gyur// ci ste des kyang ma btang na// gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i// thabs gzhan 'di yang sbyar bar bya// dkyil 'khor bris te der bcug la// /
272a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg gi las mi bzad pas me'i nang du rig pa mchog gis gzhom par bya'o// yang na rdo rje nag mos gzhom par bya ste/ des ni gdon 'bros par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gyi gdon gyi skabs rdzogs so//
272b1(rgyud 'bum): / de las gzhan yang gdon rnams kyi// mtshan ma'i bye brag bshad par bya// gdon rnams dag ni thams cad la// rigs bzhi dag ni yod par bshad// de dag kyang ni ming gcig
272b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / mtshan ma gcig pu 'khrul par byed// gdon rnams gang dag gang du 'dzin// de yang bdag gis bshad par bya// lha dang 'byung po gnod sbyin dang // de bzhin dri za tshangs pa'i srin// gdon
272b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams lnga por shes pa na/ / bram ze rgyal rigs spyod par bshad// klu yi gdon du shes pa dang // srin po yin gdon nyid dang // gdon de gnyis su shes pa ni// rje'u rigs dmangs rigs 'tshe/
272b4(rgyud 'bum): ba yin// lha min gdon ni rgyal rigs kyis// lhag ma'i rigs rnams 'tshe ba yin// sha za'i gdon ni dmangs rigs kyis// lhag ma'i rigs rnams 'tshe ba yin// smyo byed dang ni log 'dren dang // byis
272b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gdon ni gang yin pa/ / gdon rnams 'di gsum shes pa ni// rigs bzhi dag la spyod par bshad// gdon gang rigs mthun gang la spyod// de ni gso bar sla ba yin// ci ste gdon gang 'ga'
272b6(rgyud 'bum): btsal zhing / / gzhan la ston par 'gyur na ni// lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin// de la gson du re ba'ang med// nyi ma nub mo snang mi byed// zla ba nyin mo snang mi byed// bstan pa de yi tshul gyis
272b7(rgyud 'bum): na/ / gdon ni rang gi rigs la spyod// gdon rnams bco brgyad gang yin pa// thams cad dus tshogs rnams su rgyu// lo grangs bcu gnyis tshun chad kyi// gdon rnams gso ba'i thabs bshad de/
273a1(rgyud 'bum): de las 'das pa'i gdon rnams kyi// gso ba'i thabs ni yong med do// mtshan gcig gnas dang chu yi nang // me 'gram dang ni khron pa'i drung // de bzhin ma mo rnams kyi
273a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / ba lang dbus dang rta zhon dang // glang chen zhon dang g.yul du pham// ri bo dang ni dur khrod dang // shing drung dang ni 'dreg mkhan khyim// gnas 'di dag ni thams cad du// gdon ni gang zhig
273a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jug 'gyur na/ / lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin// de la gson du re ba med// de las gzhan yang mi bzad gdon// gso ba'i thabs kyang bshad par bya// grib gnon gdon ni gnyis yod de//
273a4(rgyud 'bum): mthong ba tsam gyis 'brang bar bshad// de yi mtshan ma'ang nga las nyon// grib gnon gdon gnyis gang yin de// thams cad du ni 'jug par byed// gdon rnams dag ni thams cad kyang //
273a5(rgyud 'bum): grib gnon gyis ni nye bar mtshon// sau gan d+hi dang ut+pal gyi// mtshan ma rnams kyang nga las nyon// de las sau gan+d+hi ka ni// gzu lums che zhing drag pa ste// tshes grangs nyin zhag nges pa med// shing
273a6(rgyud 'bum): drung dang na skyed mos tshal/ / lam gyi bzhi mdor 'jug par byed// gdon de khus 'debs du ba dang // lus rnams kyang ni 'joms par byed// nyin mo thun gcig 'das pa na// gsod par yang ni byed
273a7(rgyud 'bum): pi ste/ / sau gan d+ha kas zin 'gyur ba// de yi mtshan ma de dag yin// bdud rtsi zab sbyor ram dga' byed gdong gis chu la bsngags te khrus byed du bcug la/ 'dug pas bdugs na gtong bar
273b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / ut+pal yang nga las nyon// ngu zhing dgod par byed pa dang // so rnams kyang ni gcig par byed// nu ma yang ni mi shes de// dus tshigs med par rgyu bar byed// ut+pa las ni zin
273b2(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa/ / de yi mtshan ma de dag yin// gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i// gtor ma yang ni de la sbyin// 'bras kyi 'o thug sbyar thug dang // lag pa na 'bras chan bu ram rlan// sha
273b3(rgyud 'bum): btsos pa dang rjen pa dang / / chang dang til gyi zan dag dang // 'bras chan sha dang sbyar ba sbyin// til dag dang ni de bzhin dbyig/ tshang dang sbyar ba'i chang sbyin zhing // lam gyi bzhi mdor gtor
273b4(rgyud 'bum): ma sbyin/ / gtor ma'i las ni 'di nyid kyis// gdon de myur du gtong bar 'gyur// ci ste des kyang ma btang na// gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i// thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya// yungs
273b5(rgyud 'bum): ka ro shu dag shing kun dang / / pi bi ling dang na le sham// 'bras bu gsum ni cha mnya ma dang // gi ri ka ra ni dkar po dang // ru rtu dang ni pri yang ku// de bzhin bca' sga dag dang ni// thang shing dang ni pu
273b6(rgyud 'bum): shel tsi/ / nag ta ma la'i 'bras bu dang // tshogs rnams 'di dag bsogs nas ni// ba gcin dag dang btag par bya// mar gyi nang du btso bya zhing // ba gcin bzhi 'gyur blugs par bya//
273b7(rgyud 'bum): mig kyang bsku zhing snar yang blugs// btung bar bya zhing lus kyang byug/ 'di ni gdon rnams thams cad kyi// sman rnams kyi ni dam pa yin// gang na sbyar sman 'di gnas pa// de na kita lu ta dang /
274a1(rgyud 'bum): byis pa yang ni de bzhin te// de dag gis ni 'jigs pa med// cho ga 'di dag gis kyang ni// gdon de rab tu 'bros par 'gyur// ci ste des kyang ma btang na// gang gis gdon de
274a2(rgyud 'bum): gtong 'gyur ba'i/ / thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya// bdud rtsi thab sbyor ram// dga' byed gdong ngam// gos dkar can gyis dkyil 'khor du bzhag na// gdon thams cad ma rung bar 'gyur//
274a3(rgyud 'bum): soru gan d+hi dang ut+pal gnyis ka'ang las gcig yin par shes par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje la dris pa/ ma rung gdon las gso ba'i
274a4(rgyud 'bum): thabs/ / bcom ldan shes par bgyi bar 'tshal// gang la shing bu bab pa dang // gang dag dkyil 'khor spong ba dang // gos shing zhen par gyur pa dang // phyir yang ldog byed gang yin dang // nams kyang
274a5(rgyud 'bum): gtong bar mi byed la/ / gsang sngags dang ni rtsi sman dang // sbyin sreg las kyis gzhig pa ni// gdon rnams gzhig pa'i dam pa ste// mar btung ba yi cho ga dang // cho ga ci 'dra gtor ma'i las// gsang ba
274a6(rgyud 'bum): yi ni the tsom dang / / gang gis gnod sbyin gtang 'gyur dang // sreg pa dang ni gcad pa dang // gsad cing rus pa gzhom pa dang // de dag cho ga rab bshad pa// de ni stongs chen bdag la gsungs// de ltar
274a7(rgyud 'bum): blo can che ba nyid/ / bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyis dris nas// lag na rdo rje skal chen gyis// 'di skad kyi ni tshig kyang spras// bdud rtsi thab sbyor khyod kyis su// nga la gang dris bshad par bya// lha rnams
274b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khod pa'i nang du nyon/ / ma rung ba yi gdon nyid ni// g.yo dang mi g.yo zhes bya ba// sems can kun la 'tshe ba yod// sbyin sreg las ni du mas kyang // g.yo dang mi g.yo'i 'bras mi 'gyur//
274b2(rgyud 'bum): de yi mtshan ma ngas bshad kyis// go rims bzhin du lha rnams nyon// dris pa yi ni don rnams kyang // rab tu yang ni smra bar byed// ngu bar byed cing rab tu khro// de ni ma rung mtshan mar shes//
274b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dus shing tshogs pa'i nang dag tu// shin tu yongs su srung ba gang // khang stong dag tu dga' bar byed// de ni ma rung mtshan mar shes// gang gis rtag tu phyag 'tshal dang // snyan par yang ni smra ba
274b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / stan dag kyang ni stobs par byed// de ni ma rung mtshan mar shes// stan dag las ni stan dag la// ci ste 'pho zhing ldang bar byed// de ni ma rung mtshan mar shes// nga ni lha min khyab 'jug pa//
274b5(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa nga yin dbang phyug nga // skye dgu'i bdag po nga yin zhes// de skad kyi ni tshig smra zhing // gdon kun gyi na tshul yang byed// gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba// de yi gso ba'i thabs kyang
274b6(rgyud 'bum): / bshad// a shA ga na d+ha shu dag dang // 'bras bu gsum dang bu shel tsi// kan+ta ka ri b+h+r-i ha ti// ki ri kar ni dkar po dang // nag ta ma la'i 'bras bu dang // shi ri sha yi me tog dang // de
274b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gsom pa ta li/ / pa la sha yi lo ma dang // bu tshang rdo dang ra mnye ba// ba la a ti ba la dang // bi la ba arka gnyis kyi rtse// de bzhin rtsa ba lnga pa gnyis// lo ni sum cu lon pa yi//
275a1(rgyud 'bum): mar ni rnying pa gang yin pa'i// mar ni dul bzhi ldan par bya// 'o ma phul bzhi sbrang rtsi ba ni// ba lang ko ba bsregs pa yi// phye ma phul ba zhi gzhug par bya// skyog
275a2(rgyud 'bum): brgya yang gzhug par bya/ / srang grangs sum cu'i a ru ra// tsha ba gsum yang de bzhin te// de bzhin 'bru mar blugs par bya// shing kun yang ni srang gcig dang // lhan cig phye ma zhib mor bya//
275a3(rgyud 'bum): gang tshe thams cad tshogs gyur na// bA gcin phul bzhi blugs par bya// de nas me ni chung ngus btso// rlung can dang ni ma bris pa can// bad kan can dang 'dus pa can// gdon gyi gzugs ni tham
275a4(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi/ / sman rnams kyang ni 'di yin te// cho ga dag ni 'di nyid kyis// gdon de myur du gtong bar 'gyur// ci ste des kyang ma btang na// gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i// thabs
275a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ / lcag sgrog gis ni bcing bya zhing // skra yi thag pas bcing bar bya// bdug pa sna tshogs kyis kyang bdug/ lus kyang bsku zhing byug par bya// de nas cho ga sbyar
275a6(rgyud 'bum): bya zhing / / dus las kyang ni bshol mi bya// dkyil 'khor yang sa la bzhag nas ni// khor yug nas ni gzir bar bya// gdon gyis zin pa dbus bzhag ste// lcags thag gis ni gdagos
275a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / de ni brtan pos 'khor du gzhug/ bdug pas legs par bdug bya zhing // lan grangs brgyar ni tshang bar bya// de bzhin ko ba chu dron dang // shing kun dang ni sgog skya dang // sbun pa dang
275b1(rgyud 'bum): ni bca' ba dang / / 'di dag chu dang sbyar bya zhing // chu yi nang du nub par bya// mis ni gdon zin nga la yang bso// de ltar nub par byas pa yi// cho ga 'di dag gis kyang ni// ci ste gdon de mi
275b2(rgyud 'bum): gtong na/ / las la mkhas pas rab bsgrims te// cho ga 'di ni sbyar bar bya// bdug pa sbyar ba 'di dag gis// myos pa nyid du bya ba ste// 'dir ni dred spu sen mo dang // de bzhin stag gi
275b3(rgyud 'bum): sen mo brang / / sha l+ya ka yi 'bras bu dang // khyi dang dom gyi rtog pa dang // ba lang byi ba'i pags pa dang // ba tu na yi rtug pa dang // rnga mo bong bu'i rtug pa dang // spu dang rta yi rmig pa
275b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / de bzhin ba lang rA dag dang // spre'u'i rus pa sgog skya dang // de bzhin du ni spen ma rnam// de dag cha ni mnyam byas la// chu dang lhan cig btag par bya// lag na rdo rje phyag byas la//
275b5(rgyud 'bum): bdug pa 'di ni sbyar byas te// yud tsam ngal yang bso bya zhing // bdug pas yang dang yang du bdug/ dug dang 'o ma shing kun dang // de bzhin ku sha na sa dang // a nan thal tres bu shel ci// ngal
275b6(rgyud 'bum): bso de la phan po ste/ / snar yang blugs shing 'thung du gzhug/ legs par yang ni blugs par bya// phan par 'dod pas gdon zin gyi// lus la yang ni bsku bar bya// rgya tshwa dang ni bca' sga dang // byi
275b7(rgyud 'bum): tang ka dang tsha ba gsum/ / ba bla dang ni ru rta rnams// cha mnyam par ni sreg par bya// ra yi gcin dang btag bya ste// mig bskus na ni gdon kun sel// sner blugs na yang gdon kun sel// nir gun di
276a1(rgyud 'bum): dang bye'u rug dang / / lung tang yungs kar pi pi ling // de dag mi bzad gdon rnams kyis// zin pa la ni snar yang blugs// bkru sman yang ni gtang bya zhing // sngan gyis mig
276a2(rgyud 'bum): bskus lus kyang byug/ de lta bu ni byas na yang // ci ste gdon ni mi gtong na// gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i// thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya// sdong chen la ni gdags bya zhing // sgren mor
276a3(rgyud 'bum): shin tu skrag par bya/ / thag pa sbom pos bcing bya zhing // lus ni shin tu bsgrim par bya// khron pa nas ni bcus pa'i chus// rab tu yang ni gtor bar bya// gdon pa des ni rab zin nas// mi bzad pas
276a4(rgyud 'bum): ni lus kyang bkug/ bdug pa sbyar ba'i lus rims kyi// gdon de myur du med par 'gyur// ngal bso ba yang bya ba ste// shu dag nim pa'i lo ma dang // padag dang ni pu shel rtsi// ka pi ta yi lom
276a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / / sgog skya sbrul lpags brjen pas bsre// 'di ni zhi bar byed par bshad// cho ga 'di dag gis kyang ni// gdon des ci ste mi gtong na// gang gis gdon de gtong 'gyur ba'i// thabs gzhan 'di
276a6(rgyud 'bum): ni sbyar bar bya/ / 'di la the tshom med par ni// mi bzad gsang sngags sbyar bar bya// rmugs byed lcags can so can dang / mtshan sbyin bdud rtsi thab sbyor sogs// tshogs rnams so so'i las kyis gzhom// bcings
276a7(rgyud 'bum): nas karka ta ka yi/ / bdug pa mi bzad bdug bya ste// mgo dang lkog ma de bzhin dbus// phrag pa gnyis kyang nges par 'dug/ drag po'i las kyis drag po rnams// skrag par byas nas gtong bar 'gyur//
276b1(rgyud 'bum): yid ni 'byung bar byed pa yi// gsang sngags sbyar sngan ldan de bzhin// yungs kar reg bdug drag po yis// blo ngan de ni skrag par bya// blo can rgyud la 'jigs med cing // de nyid rtogs pas gtong du
276b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhug/ cho ga 'di dag nyid kyis kyang // ci ste gdon de mi gtong na// gdon rnams rab tu tshar gcod pa'i// thabs gzhan 'di ni sbyar bar bya// nges par yang dag khyad par du// gsang sngags kyi ni
