276b4(rgyud 'bum): yang ni bri bar bya/ / rdzas bzhi sbyar ba gang yin pa// de yang legs par bshad par bya// lung tang 'phreng yang de bzhin du// shing sha ba dang seng ldeng dang // ba ru ra dang rgya sran dang // ka ku b+ha dang adza
276b5(rgyud 'bum): na/ / thang shing yam sreg shing rnams bsdu// chu yi bum pa bzhi dag kyang // khrag gis su ni gtor bar bya// sha btsos pa dang rjen pa dang // til zan la phug sbrang rtsi dang // mar rnying dag gi
276b6(rgyud 'bum): tshogs rnams dang / / yungs kang dag ni bre bzhi yi// tshogs rnams dang ni ba bla dang // a ti pa la'ang de bzhin no// dri kun yang ni de bzhin te// sing ha dang lha'i me tog dang // sa ha de ba'ang gzhug
276b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ rtagaser dag dang ni dngul rnams dang // 'bru kun yang ni gzhug par bya// kha dog dag kyang ngan par bya// khrag gis kyang ni bsreg par bya// dri dang 'bras bu me tog 'phreng // tshon rtsi
277a1(rgyud 'bum): btags dang ma btags dang / / a ka ru ni ma nyams spros// te ma ru dang gu gul mar// pi tshwa marda'i lo ma dang // de bzhin skud pa shis pa ste// mig sman gyi no ral
277a2(rgyud 'bum): bu dang / de bzhin snar yang blugs par bya// lus la yang ni bsku bar bya// de nas khrus kyang bya ba ste// zhi ba'i las kyi tshogs kyang // gdon rnams drag tu tshar gcod pa// dngos grub mchog
277a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod gang yin pas/ / rab tu bsgrims te bya ba yin// 'byung po'i bdag dang 'byung po yi// cho ga de la bshad par bya// dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa der// sa bon thams cad bkod pa yi// /
277a4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis bri// 'byung po'i bdag po chung mar bcas// mkhas pa yis ni gzhag par bya// so can dang ni lcags can dang // de bzhin rmugs byed rdzogs ldan rnams//
277a5(rgyud 'bum): de dag phyogs rnams gzhag par bya// kun nas lag na 'dug pa thogs// lho phyogs kyi ni ngos su yang // dga' byed grong khyer 'od dang bcas// dam pa brgyad po gang bshad bri// kho ra khor
277a6(rgyud 'bum): yug dag nas kyang / / yam sreg shing ni dgram par bya// nang du bkod pa de dag kyang // bsam pa bya zhing shes par bya// ngos rnams bkra shis 'bar ba dang // ma rung gdon ni mkhas pas bri//
277a7(rgyud 'bum): nges par yang ni mchod byas nas// me tog 'phreng dang dris rgyas pas// lag na rdo rjes legs bshad pa'i// las rnams kyang ni sbyar bya zhing // rgyud mthong ba yi las kyis ni// ma rung gdon
277b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams dgug par bya/ / dkyil 'khor 'di ni 'byung rnams kyi// 'byung po'i rigs ni rlag par 'gyur// drag po chen po mi bzad pa// chos lugs mi bzang gang yin pa// de dag nga yi
277b2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor gzhug/ drag po g.yo dang mi g.yo ba// drag tu 'khrul cing sems can rnams// nga yi dkyil 'khor nang du gzhug/ de mthong sems can 'chi bar 'gyur// gdon rnams
277b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi ni dkyil 'khor du/ / 'thab pa drag pa der gzhug cing // shin tu tshar yang gcad par bya// rig pa'i mchog gam spyan gyis ni// 'jig rten dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// gdon gyi dkyil
277b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor rdzogs so/ / // de nas gdon skrag pa'i mtshan ma rnams dang // med par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma rnams blta bar bya ste/ 'di ni gtang bar ma gyur cing // skrag pa'i
277b5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mar shes par bya/ / lus kun yang ni 'drar ba dang // mgo bo yang ni 'dar bar byed// dbugs kyi shugs kyang 'byin par byed// de ni skrag pa'i mtshan mar shes// shin tu dgod par byed pa dang //
277b6(rgyud 'bum): yang dang yang du khro bar byed// tshig kyang shin tu 'dzin par byed// de ni skrag pa'i mtshan mar shes// mthong na yang ni zhi bar 'gyur// zhi ba'i tshul gyis lta ba dang // bdug pa yang ni snom par byed//
277b7(rgyud 'bum): hUM zhes bya bas sdod par 'gyur// de ni skrag pa'i mtshan mar shes// ngal zhing rims nad 'debs gyur pa// de ni med pa'i mtshan mar shes// smras pas rtogs pa gang yin dang // thams cad myur du
278a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa dang / / yang na shin tu 'dar bar 'gyur// de ni med pa'i mtshan mar shes// gang zhig mthong na rang dbang dang // slar ni rang dgar 'gyur ba dang // mi yi tshul ni spyod
278a2(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa/ de ni med pa'i mtshan mar shes// 'jigs bzhin bden pa gang yin de// zhi ba'i tshul gyis lta ba dang // mi ni ngo mtshar ldan gyur pa// de ni med pa'i mtshan mar shes// de bzhin mdun gyis
278a3(rgyud 'bum): mi phyogs la/ / dris na yang ni smra mi byed// rims nad byang zhing rmongs med pa// de ni med pa'i mtshan mar shes// khyod kyis nga la gang dris pa// de kun khyod la bshad par bya// bcom ldan ji ltar gdon

278b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / gang gis gsang sngags dbang 'gyur ba// phyag rgya'i cho ga nges pa yis// gsang sngags dkyil 'khor 'di yang bshad// phyag rgya tshogs dang bcas btang zhing // gsang ba'i phyag rgyas

278b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje rnal 'byor dam pa la gnas nas/ gdon nyan par 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad de/ khru gsum patshon sna lnga'i phye mas dbus su bcom ldan 'das
278b7(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje bri'o/ / de nas phyag rgya dgod par bya ste/ shar phyogs kyi sgo logs su ni rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang // rnam par rgyal ba dang / rdo rje mtshan ma dang / rdo rje'i rtags rnams dgod do//

279a6(rgyud 'bum): rgya'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad ngas bshad zin to/ / phyag rgya rnams kyi cung zad dpe tsam du bya ba de ngas bshad par bya ste/ rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po'i rgyud phyi ma dang bcas
279a7(rgyud 'bum): pa phyag rgya rnams kyis btab pa 'di 'chang ba gang yin pa dang / klog pa dang / phyag 'tshal ba gang yin pa de la'ang lha rnams yid dga' bar 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po
279b1(rgyud 'bum): spyan dang bcas pa 'di 'chang ba 'am phyag 'tshal ba lta ci smos te/ de'i mdun du gdon thams cad snying 'dar zhing myur du 'khod par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa
279b2(rgyud 'bum): chen po bcom ldan 'das ma spyan dang bcas pa gang yin pa ngas bshad zin to/ / snying po'i rgyal po'i las gang gis cho ga rgyas pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ba 'am/ 'joms par byed pa'ang
279b3(rgyud 'bum): ngas bshad par bya ste/ snying po'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das ma dang bcas pa rgyud phyi ma dang ldan pa la gnas pa dang 'chang ba gang yin pa de la ni/ lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin du ring po mi thogs par
279b4(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / gang gis dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba de'ang bshad par bya ste/ tshes grangs gdam mi dgos/ smyung ba'ang bya mi dgos par ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor
279b5(rgyud 'bum): skyang nul gyis byugs pa der tsan dan dmar po las byas pa'i rdo rje bzhag nas/ de'i mdun du mi'i gzugs byas te snying po'i rgyal po bzlas brjod byed cing / ba ka la'i me tog gos bsnun na cho ga rgyas
279b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gdon bcom par 'gyur ro/ / cho ga de nyid kyis sna ma'i me tog gis bsnun na cho ga rgyas pa 'grub par 'gyur te/ dam pa sbyin par 'gyur ro// zla ba gcig gi bar du slong mo'i zas sam
279b7(rgyud 'bum): 'o ma dang / phye ma'i 'dag gu za zhing mchod rten gyi drung du snying po'i rgyal po'i bzla brjod byas na gang sgrub pa de la 'bras bu yod par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la
280a1(rgyud 'bum): zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ gos gtsang ma bgos nas mchod rten gyi khang bur song la dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pas brgyan nas ku sha'i stan gnyis bzhag ste/ rig
280a2(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang shar phyogs su kha blta zhing / rig sngags 'chang gcig nub phyogs su kha bltas te 'dug la/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gi lag pa rig sngags 'chang gi lag pas bzung nas/ rig sngag
280a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyal po lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bya'o/ / de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rjes sbyar ba'i nang nas 'od zer 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'od zer de'ang rnam pa gnyis su 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang la g.yas
280a4(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su bskor nas mi snang bar gyur pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gi mgo bo la gtsug gi nor bur 'gyur te/ de nas mgo la 'dug pas rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar gyur te/ rig sngags
280a5(rgyud 'bum): 'chang thams cad kyis mi song la/ 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can du 'gyur zhing bskal par gnas pa dang / sred med kyi bu'i stobs phyed dang ldan par 'gyur te/ gnyis ka'ang sred med kyi bu'i
280a6(rgyud 'bum): stobs phyed dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / dpag tshad nyis stong du gyen du 'phags par 'gyur ro// zla ba phyed kyi bar du zas su 'o ma dang phye ma'i bdag gu za zhing rig sngags bzlas brjod byas la/ de nas mar gyi
280a7(rgyud 'bum): ngo zhag bcu bzhi la lha chen po'i gnas su song ste/ rig sngags lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang zla ba nya la n+ya gro d+ha'i shing gcig 'greng gi drung du song la/ de'i drung du khru lnga tsam
280b1(rgyud 'bum): byi dor byas nas pho'i ming dang ldan pa'i shing las mdud byas te/ dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pas brgyan la/ bcom ldan 'das ma dang rig sngags kyi rgyal pos las byas te/ de nas rig sngags 'chang de n+ya
280b2(rgyud 'bum): / gro d+ha'i shing la 'dzegs la/ rig sngags lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas te/ bzlas brjod byed bzhin du mdung gi steng du bdag nyid mchongs nas/ des reg ma thag tu lhung lo 'khyil zhing lo bcu drug lon
280b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gzugs can du 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi sod la/ tshe lo khri nyis stong thub par 'gyur te/ lus zhig pa'i tshe'ang 'phags pa lag na rdo rje mthong bar 'gyur ro// yum dang snying
280b4(rgyud 'bum): po'i rgyal po 'chang ba gang yin pa de la ni lha rnams yid dga' bas dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur ro/ / cho ga rgyas pa rgyud phyi ma dang bcas pa 'di 'chang ba'am klog pa gang yin pa de dag la ni lha thams cad srung ba dang /
280b5(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa dang / sbed par 'gyur te/ sdig pa thams cad las kyang grol bar 'gyur ro// snying po'i rgyal po 'chang ba gang yin pas ni lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin du ring po mi thogs par dngos grub 'thob par
280b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gdon thams cad kyang 'di nyid kyis dbang du bya'o// gdon 'khrug par bya bar 'dod rnan le sham blangs la ka na ka'i 'bras bu'i nang du btsos nas/ na le sham nges gdon la bdugs na smyo bar
280b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ gu gul gyi bdug pa 'am gtor mas gtong bar 'gyur ro// mig 'khrul par bya bar 'dod na ba bla blangs te rtsangs pa zar bcug ste/ ba bla rtsangs pa'i kha nas byung ba blangs nas mig sngar bstan na mig
281a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khrul bar 'gyur te/ mar dang sbrang rtsis bskus na slar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// gdon gyi klad pa na bar bya na ba la ta ka'i 'bras bu blangs la phye mar btags te/ me tog dang lhan cig tu
281a2(rgyud 'bum): snom du bcug na bsnams ma thag tu klad pa'i nad kyis 'debs par 'gyur ro/ / gu gul gyi bdug pa 'am gtor mas gtong bar 'gyur ro// de nas gdon mkhris pa'i rims kyis 'debs par 'dod na ag+na
281a3(rgyud 'bum): ma sdu ba gcin bgos la/ bgos nas phye ma zhib mor btags te me tog dang lhan cig tu snom du bcug na/ bsnoms ma thag tu mkhris pa'i rims kyis 'debs par 'gyur te/ gu gul gyi bdug pa dang gtor
281a4(rgyud 'bum): mas gtong bar 'gyur ro/ / pri ti pi pi ta dang / tsan dan dmar po dang / mi'i thod pa lhan cig tu sbyar te 'thung du bcug na gdon myos par 'gyur te/ mar dang sbrang rtsi 'am gtor mas gtong bar 'gyur ro//
281a5(rgyud 'bum): tum pa'i rtsa ba dang / ko sha ta ki dang / ka na ka'i 'bras bu lhan cig tu btags te blud na yang myos par 'gyur ro// bu ram dang rtsabs sam gtor mas gtong bar 'gyur ro// gdon ni cho gas gtong
281a6(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ba'i bdug pa bshad par bya ste/ gzhon nu la ni lhag par yang // rma bya'i sgro dang d+ha ka ti// gser phro ma lug ru ba lang rA// de bzhin ma hA sa gan+d+ha// sbrul lpags rjen pa dag dang ni// rgya skyegs
281a7(rgyud 'bum): byi la'i pags pa dang / / mon sran sde'u ma ru'i rtsa ba dang // na le sham dkar 'bru bzhi dang // ras 'al tshi gu bil ba'i rtsa// thang shing tsan dan dmar por bcas// the tsom med par gnod sbyin mo/
281b1(rgyud 'bum): bdug pa 'di dag sbyin bya zhing // byis pa rnams la phan 'dod pas// bdug pa 'di ni sbyar bar bya// gdon rnams kyi ni ngo lon dang // gtong bar byed pa dang 'khrul par byed pa de dag ngas bshad
281b2(rgyud 'bum): zin to/ / sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir rig sngags kyis gdon rnams gcad pa dang / gzhom pa dang / phyir bslang bar bya ba ngas bstan pa de'ang bshad par bya'o// na mo badz+ra pA
281b3(rgyud 'bum): Ni s+yaHhu ru hu ru ba hu me/ uta tiSh+Tha/ i me swA hA/ phyir bslang ba ni chus bya'o// lha rnams gdon rnams kyi mtshan ma dang gso ba'i thabs ngas bshad zin to// rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa
281b4(rgyud 'bum): ma lus pa'i dbang du byas te/ las byed pa gang yin pa 'am/ yang na bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal po spyan dang bcas par 'chang ba gang yin pa des kyang gdon rnams ma lus par bya ba dang gsang
281b5(rgyud 'bum): par nus so/ / gang zhig bzod ldan khro thul ba// tshangs par spyod cing dbang po thul// gtsang zhing spyod pa gtsang ba dang // byang chub tu ni nges byas dang // rig pa mchog gi de nyid rtogs// cho ga'i lha
281b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams mchod byed pa/ / de 'drar spyod pa mkhas pa yis// gsang ba pa rnams gzhig par bya// gdon thams cad kyi ngo lon rdzogs so// // de nas sa'i lha mos lag na rdo rje'i
281b7(rgyud 'bum): zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/ lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das cho ga rgyas pa legs par gsungs so// bdag gis kyang rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi don gyi phyir bcom
282a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang gis rig sngags ni ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar ni 'jug par bgyi/ nor sgrub pa'i las kyi dus ni gang / drag shul bya ba 'am/ zhi ba 'am/
282a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa'i las kyi dus ni gang / rig sngags ni dus gang du bsgrub par bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes/ sa'i lha mo la 'di skad ces smras so// sa'i lha mo khyod sems can thams cad la
282a3(rgyud 'bum): phan pa'i phyir zhugs te/ nga la dris pa gang yin pa de legs so legs so// sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir lha mo khyod la bshad par bya ste/ rig sngags 'chang rig sngags sgrub pa zla ba phyed
282a4(rgyud 'bum): dam !zhag nyi shu'i bar du rig sngags bstan par bya ste/ de'ang dor bar bya'o// gsum pa ni ro smad dkris nas lha'i thad du 'gro bar bya'o// rig sngags 'chang rig sngags gang de nyid kyis
282a5(rgyud 'bum): chu la bsngags te khrus bya zhing / khrus byed pa'i tshe su la'ang smra bar mi bya ste/ rig sngags la phyag byas nas khrus bya'o// rig sngags sgrub pa na skyil mo krung brtan por 'dug par bya ste/ rgyas pa
282a6(rgyud 'bum): 'am rig sngags sgrub pa la ni skyil mo krung gis 'dug par bya'o/ / drag shul la ni rkang pas rkang par mnan te 'dug par bya'o// rgyas pa'i las dang / nor sgrub pa dang / sgrub pa chen po rnams la ni nang
282a7(rgyud 'bum): par las byas te/ de'i tshe lha thams cad mngon du phyogs par 'gyur bas na/ de'i phyir las 'grub par 'gyur ro// drag shul gyi las rnams la ni nyi ma gung ngamanam phyed na las bya ste/ de'i tshe yi dgas
282b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mngon du phyogs par 'gyur bas na/ de'i phyir de dag ma rung bar byed pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro// zhi ba dang rig sngags sgrub pa ni srod kyi dus su bya ste/ de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i rigs
282b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi lha rnams rig sngags 'chang la lta bar byed pas na/ de'i phyir de la zhi ba 'grub par 'gyur ro// nub mo'ang cho ga 'di bzhin du las bya'o// lha mo gzhan yang bshad par bya ste/ rig sngags gang
282b3(rgyud 'bum): gi sbyin sreg nub mo bya bar bshad pa de'i sbyin sreg ni nub mo bya ste/ bzlas pa nyid ni nyin mo bya'o// lha mo gang gi sbyin sreg nyin par bya'o// lha mo gang gi sbyin sreg nyin par bya ba de'i bzlas brjod ni nub
282b4(rgyud 'bum): mo bya'o/ / lha mo cho ga des na rig sngags thams cad bde blag tu 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas sa'i lha mo de mgu zhing rab tu dga' nas/ rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa mngon par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir lag na
282b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i zhabs la phyag bya ba'i gsang sngags smras pa/ na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ bal gu bal gu/ hu lu hu lu/ taM gi ni swA hA/ de nas sa'i lha mo des/ lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan
282b6(rgyud 'bum): 'das rig sngags kyi las rnams shod cig shod cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes rig sngags kyi las rnams bshad pa/ rig sngags sgrub pa na rig sngags 'chang gis zla ba phyed kyi bar du zas su
282b7(rgyud 'bum): 'o ma dang 'dag gu za zhing rig sngags bzlas brjod bya'o/ / de nas yar gyi ngo tshas brgyad la tsan dan dkar po las sa'i lha mo'i gzugs byas la/ tsan dan dmar po las lag na rdo rje'i gzugs byas te/
283a1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor skyang mul gyis byugs nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su lag na rdo rje'i gzugs bzhag la/ dbus der sa'i lha mo'ang bzhag ste/ lag na rdo rje dang sa'i lha mo la mchod pa byas
283a2(rgyud 'bum): laHlha bshos rgyas par phul nas/ lag na rdo rje'i drung du ni ba dan dmar po gzhag go// sa'i lha mo'i drung du ni ba dan dkar po gzhag go// phyogs bzhir yang gos dmar po gyon pa'i mi rnams gzhag go// rig
283a3(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang gis kyang gos dmar po bgos la nges par gnas par bya ste/ rig sngags bsgrub par bya'o// de nas nyi ma'i 'od las byung ba'i mes bil ba'i shing sbar te/ bil ba'i me tog zho dang / sbrang
283a4(rgyud 'bum): rtsi dang / mar gyi nang du bsnyugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na sa'i lha mo 'gul bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sa'i lha mo de lag na rdo rje'i zhabs kyi drung du gzhag go// de nas rig sngags
283a5(rgyud 'bum): 'chang gis lag na rdo rje la tsan dan dmar po'i mchod yon phul ba la tsi ra kan da ka'i phye ma yungs mar dang sbyar bas lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o/ / de nas nam mkha' las sa'i lha mo grub bo zhes sgra 'byung bar
283a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis sa'i lha mo de blangs la/ blangs nas phye ma zhib mor btags na phye mas gang la reg pa de las grub nas sal gnas pa'i rig sngags 'chang la/ rig sngags thams
283a7(rgyud 'bum): cad mngon du phyogs par 'gyur zhing / rin po che thams cad dang sman thams cad mngon du phyogs par 'gyur ro// sa'ang de la gnas sbyin par 'gyur zhing / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can du 'gyur te/
283b1(rgyud 'bum): tshe lo bdun stong thub par 'gyur ro// las thams cad la lan gsum bzlas brjod byas pa'i thal bas bsrung bar bya'o// bskrad pa ni mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la za gcig par bya ste/ lam gyi sum mdo
283b2(rgyud 'bum): 'am/ bzhi mdo 'am/ dur khrod kyi thal bas sa'i lha mo'i gzugs byas la/ de'i steng du tsan ngan dmar pos gtor bar bya ste/ thal ba blangs la dur khrod kyi shing gis me sngar la lan brgyad stong sbyin
283b3(rgyud 'bum): sreg byas na zhag gsum gyis 'bros par 'gyur ro/ / gzer thabs kyi gdab par 'dod na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la rdza mkhan gyi 'jim pa la gzugs byas te/ mdung rtse gsum pa'am/ ma da na'i tsher
283b4(rgyud 'bum): ma dbul nas blangs pa'i ma da na'i tsher ma la lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas pas btsugs na gang du btsugs pa der gzer bar 'gyur te/ phyung na gtong bar 'gyur ro// thig le sgrub par 'dod
283b5(rgyud 'bum): na zhag gsum smyung ba byas pas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad dam zhag bcu bzhi la lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am dur khrod du ba glang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs te/ lha bshos rnam pa sna tshogs phul
283b6(rgyud 'bum): nas tsan dan dmar po'i chus dkyil 'khor bsang gtor byas la/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dur khrod kyi thal ba bzhag ste/ rig sngags 'chang ku sha'i stan la 'dug pas thal ba lag pas mnan nas
283b7(rgyud 'bum): lha mo'i gzugs snang bar 'gyur gyi bar du rig sngags bzlas brjod bya'o/ / de nas 'grub par 'gyur te/ lha thams cad la phyag byas nas/ sa'i lhalho mo spyan drangs na der 'dug par 'gyur / der
284a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dug pas bgegs rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing dngos grub kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ro/ / sa'i steng na sdang bar sems pa gang yin pa de dag gis kyang glags mi rnyed do//
284a2(rgyud 'bum): lha thams cad kyang mngon du phyogs par ni 'gyur te/ de nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// dgun zla tha chung la zas su 'o ma dang phye'i 'dag gu za zhing shing a sho ka'i drung du lan 'bum bzlas brjod
284a3(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ zhag gsum spyang ba byas pas yar gyi ngo zla ba nyal shing de nyid kyi drung du a sho ka'i shing gis ma sbar la gu gul gyi rol bu brgyad stong gi sbyin sreg byas na/ shing mi snang bar gyur na las de
284a4(rgyud 'bum): 'grub pa yin no/ / de nas nam mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur te/ 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can du 'gyur zhing / tshe lo lnga stong thub par 'gyur ro// lha bshos kyang rgyas par 'bul lo// lha mo khyod

284a6(rgyud 'bum): ri bi ni swA hA/ sgrub pa'i tshe rig sngags 'dis mad na'i tsher ma khrag gi nang du bstsags pa brgyad stong gis sbyin sreg byas na bgegs thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig spyang ba byas
284a7(rgyud 'bum): te/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du tsan dan dmar pos dkyil 'khor byas nas rig sngags lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas na sa'i lha mo 'grub par 'gyur te/ de phyin chad las thams cad byed nus par 'gyur ro//
284b1(rgyud 'bum): sa'i lha mo'i cho ga rdzogs so// / de nas lha'i drang srong mes sa'i lha mo'i mtsham brlang mthong nas/ lag na rdo rje'i thad du song ste spras pa/ rdo rje 'dzin chen po bdag gis kyang rig sngags
284b2(rgyud 'bum): 'chang thams cad gang gis dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur ba'i dngos grub bstan par bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje stan las langs nas/ lha'i drang srong me la 'di
284b3(rgyud 'bum): skad ces smras so/ / drang srong chen po khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir brtson pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa gang yin pa ni legs so legs so// drang srong chen po khyod ni
284b4(rgyud 'bum): lha thams cad kyi zhal yin no/ / drang srong chen po khyod ni lha thams cad kyi rje yin gyis/ drang srong chen po sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir dngos grub kyi rgyu shod cig shod cig/ de nas lha'i drang srong me lag na rdo rjes
284b5(rgyud 'bum): bstod pas yid dga' bar gyur nas/ lag na rdo rje stobs po che la 'di skad ces smras so// gnod sbyin gyi bdag po bdag 'ong ba ni dngos grub 'grub pa'i rgyur 'gyur te/ gang gi bdag 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i bdag
284b6(rgyud 'bum): spyan drang ba'i gsang sngags bshad par bya'o/ / na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ oM a g+ni de ba tA ya/ d+hU pa ta ye dz+wa li ni swA hA/ rig sngags 'di ni spyan drang ba'i sngags so// na mo badz+ra pA Ni s+ya/ na mo ag+na ya/ kuN+Di
284b7(rgyud 'bum): ku tiHga ti ye gats+tsha gats+tsha/ sho shan til li pu tra sA hA/ rig sngags de slar gtang ba'i sngags so// rig sngags 'chang gang dag bdag la lta ba de dag gis ni dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur roro// bdag 'ong ba'i
285a1(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma lta ba ni sgrub pa thams cad la'ang bdag mdun du bzhag la/ pa la sha'i shing gis me sbar nas 'bras yos mar dang sbyar bas lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas me'i dbus
285a2(rgyud 'bum): sngo breng nger 'dug pa dang / mtha' sngo ba dang / me'i rtse mo rgyas pa dang / drung sngo zhing mgyogs pa las brtag ste/ de nas rtags bshad pa de dag gis 'ong bar shes par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis lha
285a3(rgyud 'bum): bshos phul te/ mar gyi sreg blugs bdun gyi sbyin sreg bya'o// bdag 'dug pa dang bdegs thams cad mi 'byung zhing rig sngags kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i drang srong mes/ lag na rdo rje la
285a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad ces smras so/ / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rig sngags kyi las rnams shod cig shod cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje yid dga' bar gyur nas rig sngas kyi tshogs rnams la bltas te/ rig
285a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi las rnams bshad pa/ las thams cad la'ang pa la sha'i shing gis me sbar la/ 'bras yos zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang sbyar bas lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na las 'grub par 'gyur te/
285a6(rgyud 'bum): me'ang dam pa sbyin par byed cing / gang na 'bar ba snang ba der srung bar 'gyur ro// lha dbab na bye'u rug pa'i lo ma'am chus bya'o// skyes pa dbang du bya na yar gyi ngo tshes bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/
285a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg gi gnas sam/ khang stong dben pa'i phyogs su me'i sbyin sreg byas pa'i mes bil ba'i shing gis me sbar te/ kun da'i me tog kha ma bye mar gyi nang du bsnyugs pa sum stong gis sbyin sreg byas na skyes pa
285b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang du 'gyur ro/ / de nas me sgrub par 'dod na zhag bdun gyi bar du zas 'o mdang phye'i bdag gu za zhing rig sngags bzlas brjod byas na/ de nas yar gyi ngo tshos bcu gnyis la zhag gcig spyang ba byas te/ khang
285b2(rgyud 'bum): stong du song la nang du zhugs nas gtsang mar byas te/ phyogs bzhir gtor ma byin la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su lag na rdo rje'i gzugs bzhag nas/ de'i mdun du me'i sbyin sreg byas pa'i mes bil ba'i shing
285b3(rgyud 'bum): gis me sbar la/ de nas me tog dkar po dang gu gul gyi bdug pas me spyan drang ngo // de nas rig sngags 'arlang gis rtsa dur ba'i stan byas te/ rtswa ngur ba'i stan la 'dug la/ sna ma'i yam sreg shing zho dang
285b4(rgyud 'bum): sbrang rtsi dang / mar gyi nang du bsnyugs pa brgyad stong gi sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas me stag gis rtsa gang rol bar byed na/ rig sngags 'chang gis rig pa mchog dran par bya zhing / rig pa mchog nyid kyi sreg blugs
285b5(rgyud 'bum): lan bdun du sbyin sreg byas na des zhi bar 'gyur ro/ / de nas 'od zer cig byung ste rig sngags 'chang la g.yas phyogs nas bskor nas slar de nyid du zhugs na 'grub par 'gyur te/ grub nas lag stangs
285b6(rgyud 'bum): tsam byas pas kyang sbyin sreg gi las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / de nas rig sngags sgrub par 'dod na me'i thab khung de nyid nas sol ba blangs te/ cho ga 'di nyid kyis lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bzlas
285b7(rgyud 'bum): brjod byas na dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro/ / de nas me dbyung bar 'dod na mar gyi ngo zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ sbyin sreg gi gnas su song nas a mA ra te ke'i rus pas lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg
286a1(rgyud 'bum): byas na me li kha nas me thag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ che ge mo zhig sreg cing yul de tshig par gyis shig ces yid kyis bzlas na yid la bsams ma thag tu las thams byed par 'gyur
286a2(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / dgra gsad par 'dod na mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad dam/ mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig smyung ba byas te/ dur khrod kyi shing blangs nas 'byung po'i gtor ma'ang byin la/ shing blangs pa la lan
286a3(rgyud 'bum): brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas te/ che ge mo zhig choms shig ces smras na/ rims tsha bas btab ste zhag bdun gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ro// nor 'dod na rtag tu mar dang 'bras kyi sbyin sreg byas na nor 'phel

292a5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de nas rig pa mchog gi cho ga grub par shes par bya ste/ nang par gyi dus su 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du sin du ba ra sngon po'i yam sreg shing brgyad stong gi sbyin sreg
292a6(rgyud 'bum): byas la/ dge slong bdun la mchod ston bya zhing / bram ze dag kyang ston nas las de grub na lag na rdo rje dang mthu stobs mnyam zhing bskal par gnas pa dang / 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i
292a7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs can dang / stobs dang pha rol gnon pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi song la mthu
292b1(rgyud 'bum): stobs che ba dang / bdag nam 'chi ba shes pa dang / pha rol nam 'chi ba shes pa dang / 'dzam bu'i gling na yod pa'i don 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad yang dag pa

292b4(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / mjug tu yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg bya'o// ras ma nyams pa la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong dang ldan pas tshon rtsi sbyin med pas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs 'drir gzhug go/ de'i g.yas logs su lha
292b5(rgyud 'bum): mo mdog dkar zhing 'byung po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba bri'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon rol du 'phags pa lag na rdo rje mdog sngo bsangs sam/ yang na dmar po bya ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan
292b6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ dar ram ras kyi sham thabs can bri'o// 'og tu ni sgrub pa po dri'o// mtha' mar ni ri'i rtse mo rnams bri'o// lag na rdo rje 'ang rig sngags thams cad kyis bstod cing 'dug par bri'o// steng du
292b7(rgyud 'bum): ni nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i ma mo bdun bri'o/ / de nas rig sngags 'chang gis zhag gsum sbyang ba byas te/ sa phyogs gtsang mar sku gzugs bkram la/ mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la sna ma'i me tog brgyad
293a1(rgyud 'bum): stong gis 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i rkang pa g.yon pa la bsnun na/ des gzugs 'gul zhing spu zing zhes byed par 'gyur ro// las de grub pa dang de phyin chad las sgrub na tshe
293a2(rgyud 'bum): gargyas pa'i rig sngags thams cad dang / rig sngags gzhan dag kyang bde blag tu 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes/ lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha
293a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams lha mo chen mo 'di ni drag cing rdzu 'phrul che ba yin no/ / de nas lha rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// stobs po che khyod ni mchog sbyin pa yin/

293a6(rgyud 'bum): yam sreg shing rnams kyi cho ga'i rim pa bshad pa/ lha rnams nyon cig/ nor sgrub pa'i sbyin sreg rnams la ni 'bras ma drus pa dang / shI ti dang / thang chu la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams kyis bya'o//

293b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis bya'o/ / lha rnams yam sreg shing rnams kyang nyon cig/ bud med dbang du bya ba la ni mo'i ming dang ldan pa'i yam sreg shing rnams kyis bya'o// nor sgrub pa dang dbang du bya ba la

293b6(rgyud 'bum): ba la ni mthe'u chung gi tshad du bya'o// dbang du bya ba la bud med kyi ni rtse mo'i yam sreg shing gis bya'o// skyes pa'i ni dbus kyis bya'o// drag shul dang ma'i gtso bo dbang du bya ba la ni drung pas bya'o//

294a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags gang gis zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i las rnams la me tog dang yam sreg shing gang bstan pa de nyid kyis las byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / yang na rig sngags kyi rigs gsang

294a7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i spyan sngar drag shul bsgrub par mi bya ste/ de ni lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bsgrub par bya'o// lag na rdo rje'i gzugs kyang bshad par bya ste/ mtshan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa mdog

295a1(rgyud 'bum): la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang khyod sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs te/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir rig pa mchog gi

295b1(rgyud 'bum): pa chen po byas te/ lha bshos kyang rgyas par phul nas pa la sha'i shing gis me sbar la/ gu gul sbrang rtsi dang mar dang sbyar bas lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na lha mo chen mo rdzong gi 'phags ma 'grub par

296a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi tshogs la bltas nas gsang sngags bshad pa/ na mo badz+ra pA Nis+ya/ na mo na ra ya r+N+Na sa/ na mo bai shra bat+tA ya/ shA bta sa tsakra d+ha rA ya/ ma ba dan ta/ 4
296a2(rgyud 'bum): d+han ban d+ha mi/ ni pa dan tan/ tsa tuSh+ka dan tA/ a shi bi shA na shru ban d+ha mi/ sarba duSh+TAnash+tsa/ dA ru Nan/ i ti maM ti ni/ ma hA sha mi rA/ na mo de ba bA yu/ tsa tur b+hU dza ya/ ma s+phu ra/

297a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser dag dang ni 'dra bar 'gyur// mtshal phye zhib mor kha lung khu bas lan bdun bsgo// shing kun sha yi khu bas kyang ni lan bdun bya// mi thong gser nang
297a2(rgyud 'bum): ag+ni ra til mar ldan byas na/ / lha yi rgyan du rung ba'i gser gyi sbram bur 'gyur// sbyor ba 'di dag bdag gis bshad zin gyis// bai DUR+Ya sngon po'i cho ga yang bdag las gson cig/ mching bu sngon

297a4(rgyud 'bum): por 'gyur ro/ / mkhas pa dag gis li khri dang / mtshal dang / ba so sbyar nas/ ra gsar du 'brangs pa'i 'o mas sbrus la/ blo dang ldan pas b+ha ru byas te/ grib mar legs par bskams nas nya'i khong du

297a6(rgyud 'bum): nab+hu ru bzang por 'gyur ro/ / cho ga de ltar byas te thing shing blags na ni in+d+ra nI lar 'gyur ro// nya phyis kyi phye ma blugs na ni mu tig tu 'gyur ro// gzhan dag kyang kha dog ci 'dra ba'i bye brag dang sbyar te de
297a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs 'di dge ni bdag gis bshad zin gyis/ gser gyi don du bdag gis rdzas bshad pa gang yin pa'i rdzas de dag gis mtshan nyid kyang
297b1(rgyud 'bum): gson cig/ brdar na mdog ni dmar ser 'gyur// lci zhing 'od kyang chags pa dang // mnyen zhing mdog kyang mi gnas pa// de ni gser gyi mchog tu bshad// dul zhing 'jam zhing lci la snum//
297b2(rgyud 'bum): bsregs na dngas la shin tu dkar// 'od bzang mnyen bag yod pa'i dngul// gang yin de ni rab tu bzang // phyi rol nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog/ bcag 'phro dngul chu'i mdog dang 'dra// lci zhing

297b4(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / phyi ro len tsong sgro mdog 'dra// bcag 'phro gser gyi phye ma bzhin// lci zhing mdog sdug de 'dra ba// mu zi'i mchog tu bshad pa yin// nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra zhing // ka ra wi
297b5(rgyud 'bum): ra'i me tog 'dra/ / yang na la la gser 'dra ba// ldong ros kyi ni gtso bor bshad// gser gyi gyim bag mdog 'dra zhing // rim pa'i sul gyis gang ba dang // mdog kyang sdug cing lci ba
