325a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'chang la phyag rgya bstan pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje'i mdun du 'gron bu brgyad brgyas rdo rje byas la/ rdo rje de'i mdun du phyag rgya bstan par bya'o// bla ma la dad pas
325b1(rgyud 'bum): kyang rdo rje la mchod yon phul nas tha ma la yon phul te phyag rgya blta bar bya'o/ / mthong na lag na rdo rje mthong ba yin te/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rnams la bstan par bya'o// sdig pa byed
325b2(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams la bstan par mi bya'o/ / sdig pa byed pa gang yin pa de dag gis ni phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi ming yang mi shes te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa gang yin pa de dag gis ni phyag rgya 'di thob par

325b7(rgyud 'bum): phyir mi ldog pa yin par blta bar bya ste/ de ni lha thams cad kyis phyag bya ba yin no// nga gang na 'dug pa de na phyag rgya gnas la/ phyag rgya gang na gnas pa de nang 'dug ste/ nga mthong bas de dag nges
326a1(rgyud 'bum): par phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / lus zhig pa'i tshe'ang lag na rdo rje'i gnas yid du 'ong ba 'am/ bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// gang gi phyir phyag rgya
326a2(rgyud 'bum): lta bar byed na phyag rgya'i dbyibs lag pa'i tshul gyis bstan par bya'o/ / dkyil 'khor du'ang dbyibs su bri bar bya ste/ de mthong nas cho ga bzhin du phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya'o// de nas bcom
326a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'khor gyi nang nas langs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
326a4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po gsang ba dang bcas/ gsang chen dang bcas pa bdag gis bshad lags kyi/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i pho
326a5(rgyud 'bum): brang lcang lo can du mchis la sems can rnams gdul bar 'tshal lo/ / de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
326a6(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje gang khyod kyis rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen po 'di bshad pa ni khyod gtum pa yin/ bsten par dka' ba yin/ shin tu thub par dka' ba yin/ 'phags pa'i tshul med pa yin te/

327a1(rgyud 'bum): khyod ni gzugs sdug pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa yin/ khyod ni 'bar ba'i me lce dang ldan pa yin/ khyod ni gzugs mdzes pa yin/ khyod kyi ming 'di dag mkhas pa gang gis thos

329a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang / / so so yi ni las rnams kyang // mdo tsam rab tu bshad par bya// bgegs rnams dang ni gsang ba dang // 'khrul 'khor gzhom par bstan pa la
329a2(rgyud 'bum): sngags rnams phyag rgyar sbyar na ni/ / myur du las rnams nges par byed// lha la sogs pa gzi chen rnams// sngon gyi dkyil 'khor 'dus pa yi// lha rnams kun la bdag gis ni// phyag
329a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyu dam tshig bcas pas no/ / phyag rgya dag gis lha rnams kun// byams pa yi ni sems su 'gyur// 'gal bar byed pa gang de dag/ rdo rje 'dzin pas gsad par 'gyur// stobs chen pha
329a4(rgyud 'bum): rol gnon pa dang / / rdzu 'phrul che ba'i lha de dag/ rig mchog rgyud kyi g.yog 'khor du// bya ba'i phyir na bshad pa yin// rig sngags khro bo pho nya mo// rigs dang nye ba'i rigs kyi lha// rnal
329a5(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma ni gang bstan pa/ / de dag phyag rgya bshad pa yin// rig mchog rtsa ba'i phyag rgya rnams// thog mar rab tu bstan pa yin// de ni snying po'i phyag rgya dang // nye ba'i snying po rab
329a6(rgyud 'bum): tu bshad/ / rigro sngags rgyal po gnod mdzes kyi// phyag rgya las kun byed pa dang // rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ni// bkug pa'i las la sbyor bar bya// de bzhin phyag rgya chen po brgyad//
329a7(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grus che zhing gzi brjod che// rab tu gtum zhing las kun la// lag na rdo rje'i mthu dang ldan// rgyal po dang ni rnam par rgyal// mA ma~M kI dang gdong dmar dang // 'phreng ba 'dzin
329b1(rgyud 'bum): dang klu mgo can/ / rna cha gdong dang 'od zer 'phreng // phyag rgya chen po brgyad bshad pa// lag na rdo rje gzi chen gyi// yan lag kun la 'byung ba yin// bdag gis bshad pa gang yin/
329b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ gdon gyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa// bco brgyad po ni brtson 'grus che// me lce 'bar ba'i de dag dang // phyag rgya drug cu rtsa bzhi gang // las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad
329b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / rdo rje 'phags byed dkyil 'khor las// phyag rgya bstan pa gang yin dang // de dag gi ni gtso bo yi// phyag rgya mdor bshad gang yin pa// de dag gi ni tshul dang rtags// las
329b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyang ni bstan par bya/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rig sngags thams cad kyi bdag po rig pa mchog stobs dang pha rol gnon pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid 'byung ste/
329b5(rgyud 'bum): mdun du lag ngar lhan cig tu sbyar la sor mo phan tshun bsnol te/ khu tshur bcangs te gung mo bsgrengs la gzhibs la/ de'i phyi rol gyi glo gnyis nas mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje'i dbyibasu byas nas/ mthe ga
329b6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis rdo rje'i dbyibs ltar rab tu bzhag po ni bcom ldan 'das rig pa mchog gi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las mthe bong gnyis sprad de bzhag pa ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba ni rig sngags
329b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyal po'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis kyi dbus bkug la gung mo bzhibs pa'i phyi rol gyi tshogs drang por bstan par bya ste/ rgyal ba'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya yin no// slar gtang ba ni de nyid
330a1(rgyud 'bum): lngas mdzub mo gnyis cung zad brkyang bar bya ste shugs ldan gyi yin no/ / rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las gung mo gshibs pa'i phyi rol gyi tshogs drang por mdzub mo gdu bu ltar
330a2(rgyud 'bum): bkug ste bzhag pa ni snying po'i phyag rgya'o/ / tshigs dbu mar gzhar ba ni nye ba'i snying po'i phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo'i thor to mnyam du gzhibs pa ni blo gros rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las
330a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyab tu bsdams te gzhar ba ni dga' byed gdong gi phyag rgya'o/ / rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis kyi sen mo phan tshun sprad de bzhag pas mthe bong gnyis mnan pa ni ral gri'i phyag rgya'o//
330a4(rgyud 'bum): ral gri'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis tshogs re re bkug ste/ mthe bong gnyis kyi phyi rol du bzhag pa ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po rab tu grub par byed pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o// de las
330a5(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni dbang phyug chen po'i 'o/ / de nyid las mthe bong cung zad bkug pa ni lha mo rtse gsum ka gdeng gi phyag rgya'o// snying po'i phyag rgya las gung mo gshibs pa'i tshigs
330a6(rgyud 'bum): dang po bkug pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis btang ste tshogs re re bkug la 'og tu phan tshun sprad pa ni gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o//
330a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo gnyis phyi rol tu ma phrad par bzung ba ni pad+ma 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o// gtum sel gyi phyag rgya'ang de nyid yin no// cung zad brkyang ba ni dpal chen mo'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las
330b1(rgyud 'bum): tshogs dang po'i steng du bzhag pa ni rdo rje mi g.yo ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / tshigs re re bkug skye mthe bong gnyis kyi phyi rol du gzhar ba ni rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya'o// sen mo gnyis la gzhar ba ni
330b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du ral gri'i phyag rgya las las mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshogs re re bkug pa ni rdzong gi 'phags ma'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe bong gnyis so sor sbas
330b3(rgyud 'bum): pa ni ral pa gcig pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / ral pa gcig pa'i phyag rgya nyid las tshigs gcig bkug pa las gshibs pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// rdzong gi 'phags ma'i phyag
330b4(rgyud 'bum): rgya las bkug pa ni gnod sbyin thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ / rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las gung mo gshings pa yid tsam gyis bkug pa ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i
330b5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya las mthe bong gnyis yid tsam phyir bkye ba ni 'jigs byed chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ / rgyal ba'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya las phye ste mthe bong bsgreng ba ni rdo rje ser sna'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du rdo
330b6(rgyud 'bum): rje'i 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya ni shugs ldan ma'i yang yin no/ / snying po'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni lag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// me tog gi phyag rgya'ang de nyid yin no//
330b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i snying po'i phyag rgya los de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis mthe bong la reg par byas pa ni rdo rje khro bo mdzes pa'i phyag rgya'o// 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya'ang de nyid yin no// mdzung mo gnyis cung zad rtse
331a1(rgyud 'bum): ba ni tshangs pa'i mig gi phyag rgya'o/ / blo gros rdo rje'i phyag rgya las mthe bong gnyis smras pa ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po yi ge 'bru bzhi pa'i phyag rgyu'o// 'phags pa
331a2(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dbu bzhi pa'i phyag rgya'ang de nyid yin no/ / mdzub mo cung zad phye ba ni brgya byin gyi phyag rgya'o// dga' byed gdong gi'ang de nyid yin no// mthe bong gnyis
331a3(rgyud 'bum): spros pa ni gtsug tor thub med kyi phyag rgya'o/ / mdzub mo gnyis bkug la gung mo gshebs pa'i phyi rol tshogs drang por bstan pa ni 'od zer 'phreng gi phyag rgya'o// tshags dbu mar bstan pa
331a4(rgyud 'bum): ni 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgya'o/ / thur du bstan pa ni phur bu gsum pa'i phyag rgya'o// ral gri'i phyag rgya la gshibs pa'i rtse mo bkug pa ni dbang phyug chen po'i mtshan gyi phyag rgyal
331a5(rgyud 'bum): de nyid las mdzub mo dang sbyar ba ni nyi ma'i nam mkha'i phyag rgya'o/ / rab tu 'grub par byed pa'i mdzub mo'i tshogs gnyis bkug pa ni rig sngags 'chang thams cad 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'o//
331a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba'i rgyud las dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'ang de nyid yin no// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni srin po'i phyag rgya'o// rtse gsum kha gdeng gi phyag rgya las mthe bong sbyar ba ni ma mo thams
331a7(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis gung mo gzhibs pa'i phyi rol nas gdu bu ltar dkris pa ni rdo rje sgrog gi phyag rgya'o// de ltar 'dug bzhin du bkug pa ni rdo rje gdu bu'i phyag rgyas
331b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyag rgya las mdzub mo bye ste gdu bu ltar byas la/ gung mo gshibs pa'i phyi rol gyi tshogs dang por bstan pa ni klu chen po'i phyag rgya'o// de ltar de lta bu'i tshul gyis
331b2(rgyud 'bum): mdor bsdus te rig mchog gi phyag rgya'i khyad par phyag rgya grangs med par 'byung ngo / / phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar la srin lag bsnol te nang du bcug nas mthe bong gnyis kyi drung du bzhag la/
331b3(rgyud 'bum): de gnyis kyi bar du mthe bong gnyis dam du gshibs te gzhag/ gung mo gshibs pa'i glo gnyis nas mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje'i tshul du byas/ mthe'u rlung gnyis kyang gshibs te bzhag pa
331b4(rgyud 'bum): ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las mthe bong gnyis gshibs te bstod pa ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i yin no// de nyid las gung mo gshobs pa nas gang tsam gyis phye ba ni ji
331b5(rgyud 'bum): rje 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs la gung mo gshibs pa dang lhan cig tu sbyar ba ni lag na rdo rje'i rdo rje'i snying po thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las
331b6(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo brkyang ba ni rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / mdzub mo tshigs dbu ma bkug la gung mo gshibs pa'i tshogs dang por bzhag pa ni blon mo bdun gyi spyi'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe bong
331b7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis gshibs la mthe'u chung gnyis gshibs pa las bsnol ba ni pho nya mo thams cad kyi spyi'i phyag rgya'o/ / rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo gnyis ral gri'i phyag rgya ltar
332a1(rgyud 'bum): byas la/ srin lag gnyis kyang mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mo'i glo phyogs su bstod de gzhar ba ni rdo rje 'jigs bye chen po'i phyag rgya'o// de la srin lag gnyis snga ma lo
332a2(rgyud 'bum): na bzhin bzhag pa ni rdo rje khro bo chen po su ru su ru'i phyag rgya'o/ / de la mdzub mo'i tshogs gcig bkug pa ni khro bo ma'i phyag rgya'o// de ltar de lta bu'i tshul gyis mdor bsdus te rig sngags kyi
332a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po gnod mdzes kyi phyag rgya las phyag rgya grangs med par 'byung ngo / / phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar te srin lag dang mdzub mo gshibs pa nang du sbas la/ sor mo rnams kyi bar phye ba ni nam
332a4(rgyud 'bum): mkha'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las sor mo rnams gzhum pa ni 'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo brkyang ba ni rta mgrin gyi
332a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'o/ / g.yas pa brkyang ba ni rdo rje snying po'i phyag rgya'o// mA ma kI'i phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshags gcig bkug pa ni mA ma kI spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// brkyang ba ni
332a6(rgyud 'bum): slar gtang ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / khro bo rnam par mi bzad pa'i phyag rgya'ang de nyid yin no// gung mo gshibs pa las rdo rje'i tshul du bya ba ni khro bo rtse gcig ldan gyi phyag rgya'o// g.yas pa'i
332a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo bkug pa ni rdo rje dgra sta'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las mthe bong gnyis rab tu bzhag ste tshogs gcig bkug la mdzub mo'i ngos la gzhar ba ni rdo rje mi g.yo ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las
332b1(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mam thor to spyad pa na rdo rje nags pa'i pa'i byug rgya'o/ / tshigs gnyis bkug pa ni log 'dren gyi phyag rgyag/ rdo rje'i rdul du byas pa ni gtsug nas zung ba'i phyag rgyu'o// su ma/
332b2(rgyud 'bum): kI'i phyag rgya'i mdzub mo gnyis phye ste/ gung mo gshibs pa'i tshigs dang por bzhag la mthe bong gnyis kyang bcum pa ni rdo rje sde'i phyag rgya'o// tshogs dbu mar bzhag pa ni lag bzangs
332b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi phyag rgya'o/ / drung du bzhag pa ni gtsug nas 'byung gi phyag rgya'o// de gnyis gung mo gshibs pa'i rgyab tu gdu bu ltar sbyar ba ni log 'dren thams cad bcings pa'i phyag rgya'o// mA ma kI'i
332b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis phye ste gung mo gshibs pa'i phyi rol nas rdo rje'i tshul du bzung / mthe bong gnyis gshibs te bstod pa ni rdo rje rtse lnga pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje rtse
332b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rdo rje yin no/ / de bzhin du mdzub mo'i dbus bkug ste tshogs dang por bzhag pa ni chu srin ma ka ra'i phyag rgya yin no// mA ma kI'i phyag rgya de nyid las mthe'u chung gshibs pa mthe bong gshings
332b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / gung mog shibs pa rnams bcum pa ni rdo rje nag mo'i phyag rgya'o// mthe'u chung dang mthe bong gshibs pa phan tshun bsnol la gyen du rdo rje rtswa gsum par bya ba ni mA ma kI'i snying po'i
332b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya ste/ las thams cad byed pa dang shin tu drag po yin no// de nyid las sor mo rnams bcum pa ni rdo rje 'byin ma'i phyag rgya'o// mthe bong gshibs pa bcum ste bzhag pa ni rdo rje lte ba'i
333a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'o/ / mthe bong nang du sbas pa la mthe'u chung gshibs pa phye ba ni gdong dkar ma'i phyag rgya'o// de nas 'phags pa mA ma kI'i phyag rgya tha dad pa gdon thams cad
333a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs par byed pa 'byung ste/ g.yas brkyang gi tshul gyis gnas par byas la/ lag pa g.yon pa ni rdo rje mtshan ma blta ba'i dmigs su gtad par bya/ g.yas pa sta zur phyogs su
333a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhag/ bcom ldan 'das mA ma kI'i las kun byed pa'i phyag rgya gzhan 'di ni gdon rnams la sogs pa dang / sna tshogs pa'i bgegs la sbyar bar bya'o// de ltar de lta bu'i tshul gyis phyag rgya
333a4(rgyud 'bum): grangs med par 'byung ngo / / lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo rnams bcangs te khu tshur tha mal par byas nas mdzub mo brkyang ba'i glor mthe bong gzhar ba ni rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las gung mo
333a5(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas par brkyang ba ni rnams par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las mthe bong ril nang du bcug ste sor mo thams cad kyis mnan pa ni lag na rdo rje'i khru tshur gyi phyag rgya'o// sor mo phan
333a6(rgyud 'bum): tshun yid tsam lhag par byas pa ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgya'o/ / gung mo dang srin lag gnyis kyi bar du mthe bo'i thor to tshigs gcig tsam gyi phyi rol du byung bar byas pa ni rdo rje khu tshu
333a7(rgyud 'bum): gyi phyag rgya'o/ / lag na rdo rje'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya las mdzub mo brkyang ba ni rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i phyag rgya'o// de ltar de lta bu'i tshul du phyag rgya grangs med par 'byung ngo // snyim pa bkan
333b1(rgyud 'bum): te gung mo gnyis lu gu rgyud kyi tshur du 'khyud nas sor mo lhag ma rnams bkug pa la mthe bos mnan pa ni gdong dmar gyi phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las snyim pa phye ste srin lag gnyis 'khyud la mdzub mo
333b2(rgyud 'bum): gung mo'i rtse mor gzhar bi ni 'od zer 'phreng gi phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las mthe'u chung dang srin lag 'khyud de lag pa'i nang du bcug lA/ phyi rol nas mdzub mo gnyis kyi thor to'i steng nas gung mo
333b3(rgyud 'bum): bkug pa'i rtse mo mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mo dang sprad pa ni rna cha gdong gi phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las gung mo mthe bo'i thor to la gzhar ba ni dga' byed gdong gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las lag pa g.yon
333b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i srin lag brkyang ba ni rdo rje sde'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las g.yas pa'i srin lag phyir brkyang ba ni lag bzangs kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyis las snyim pa phye ste gnyis ka phan tshun 'khyud nas
333b5(rgyud 'bum): mthe'u chung gnyis srin lag dang gung mo mnan la/ mdzub mo gnyis kyi thor to sprad de mthe bong gnyis kyis srin lag dang gung mo mnan pa ni khro bo thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las g.yas pa
333b6(rgyud 'bum): brkyang ba ni khro bo rdo rje rtse gcig ldan gyi phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las zlog pa ni snying po'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// de las snyim pa phye la mthe'u chung dang / srin lag dang / gung mo rnams 'khyud
333b7(rgyud 'bum): nas mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste sprad la srin lag gnyis kyi drung du mthe bong bzhag pa ni lus dmar gyi phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las srin lag bsnol ba'i rtse mor mthe bong gnyis bzhag la/ mthe'u
334a1(rgyud 'bum): rlung dang gung mo tha mal par bkug pa ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las snyim pa phye so mo thams cad kyi thor to bsnol mar phun tshun 'khyud de mthe bong
334a2(rgyud 'bum): dang mdzub mo'i thor to sprad la/ mthe'u chung rang rang mthe bo'i drung du gzhar ba ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las zlog ste bkug pa ni rdo rje 'og pag can gyi phyag rgya'o// de ltar de lta bu'i
334a3(rgyud 'bum): tshul gyi phyag rgya grangs med pa 'byung ngo / / snyim pa bkan la mthe'u chung gshibs nas de'i rgyab nas srin lag gshib par bya/ de gnyis kyi glo'i tshigs dang por gung mo gnyis bzhag la mdzub mo
334a4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis so so nas bkug ste/ mthe bong gnyis gro la gan+d+har ba ni klu mgo can gyi rtse ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las gud mo dang / mdzub mo dang / mthe bong klu mgo gdangs ka sbyar dgug pa ni klu
334a5(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyi snying po'i phyag rgya'o/ / mthe bong gnyis gcig tu sbyar te klu mgo'i gdengs ka ltar byas pa ni nam mkha'i lding gi phyag rgya'o// gung mo dang mdzub mo sngon du sbyar ba ni lha ma yin thams
334a6(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi phyag rgya'o/ / rtsa ba'i phyag rgya de nyid las mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug la de'i ngos sgra gung mo gnyis kyi tshogs gcig bkug ste bzhag nas mdzub mo gnyis phyi rol du rdo rje ltar bzung ba ni rnga
334a7(rgyud 'bum): rje yangs pa chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ / rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo dang gung mo bkug la de'i nang du mthe bong gzhug pa ni de nyid kyi spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo brkyang ba ni slar gtang ba'i phyag rgyas
334b1(rgyud 'bum): rtsu ba'i phyag rgya las gung mo cung zad tsam phye la mdzub mo'i tshigs dang po'i ngos la bzhag pa 'di'ang klu mgo can gyi phyag rgya yin no/ / rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo'i dbus bkug la gung mo gnyis kyi
334b2(rgyud 'bum): tshigs dang por ngos su gzung ba 'di ni klu mgo can gyi phyag rgya tha dad pa yin no/ / de nyid las mthe bo'i bar du gdu bu ltar bkug pa ni klu chen po'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du gcig tu sprad de ce
334b3(rgyud 'bum): gcig pa'i tshul du bzhag pa ni 'phrog ma'i phyag rgya'o/ / dga' bo dang nye dga' bo'i phyag rgya'ang de nyid yin no// tshogs dang po gnyis bkug pa ni kha 'bar ma'i phyag rgya'o// tshogs gnyis
334b4(rgyud 'bum): bkug pa ni khro bo thub dka'i phyag rgya'o/ / rtsa ba'i phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshogs dang po'i phyi rol du sbyar te bzhag pa 'di ni klu mgo can gyi phyag rgya tha dad pa yin no// 'phags pa
334b5(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi khrus kyi cho ga'ang de nyid yin no/ / de ltar de lta bu'i tshul gyis phyag rgya grangs med por 'byung ngo // lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo phan tshun bsnol te mthe bong gnyis
334b6(rgyud 'bum): nang du bcug la mdzub mo gnyis gzhibs pa'i thor to bkug pa ni 'phreng ba 'dzin gyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las mdzub mo'i dbus bkug ste phan tshun thor to spyad pa ni rdo rje khang pa'i phyag rgya'o//
334b7(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo bkug pa ni 'od zer gyi 'phreng gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis kyi dbus bkug la gung mo gnyis bsnol la gzhar/ mthe bong gnyis bstod de rtse gcig
335a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshul du byas pa ni gdon thams cad skrag par bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las mthe bong gnyis kyi thor tog shibs te nang du bcug pa ni gdon thams cad bcing ba yin
335a2(rgyud 'bum): no/ / de gdon thams cad skrag par bya ba de nyid ni lag na rdo rje dang dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya'o// gdon bcing ba ni khro bo 'gro ba'i phyag rgya'o// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las gung mo mthe bo'i thor to la
335a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhar ba ni gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi snying po'i phyag rgya'o/ / de ltar de lta bu'i tshul gyis phyag rgya grangs med par 'byung ngo // phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo las srin lag gnyis bsnol ba mthe
335a4(rgyud 'bum): bong drung du bzhag pa'i bar du mthe bong gnyis bzhag ste/ mdzub mo gnyis kyi dbus bkug nas gung mo gshibs pa'i steng du bzhag la/ mthe'u chung gnyis gzhibs pa'i 'od zer 'phreng
335a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / mdzub mo gnyis kyi tshigs dbus ma bkug pa ni spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// brkyang ba ni slar gtang ba'i phyag rgya'o// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis
335a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi tshogs gcig bkug la mthe bo'i ngos la gzhar ba nI rig pa mchog gi phyog rgya tha dad pa yin no/ / mthe bong gnyis bkug pa ni gnod mdzes kyi phyag rgya'o// steng nas gdu bu skar byas
335a7(rgyud 'bum): pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i phyag rgya'o/ / phyi rol nas dkri ba ni gdon bcing ba'i yin no// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las mdzub mo rdo rje'i tshul du bzung ba ni 'od zer 'phreng gi phyag rgya gnyis pa yin
335b1(rgyud 'bum): no/ / de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis drung nas bkug sdeg pu'u ltar bsnol ba 'di ni 'od zer 'phreng gi phyag rgya tha dad pa yin no// de nyid las mthe bong gnyis bkug pa ni dbang bskur ba'i phyag
335b2(rgyud 'bum): rgya'o/ / de nyid las mthe bong rtse gcig pa'i tshul du bzhag pa ni gdon bskrad par bya ba yin no// de nyid legs par snyams pa ni dpal mo'i blo gros ma'i phyag rgya'o// rtse ba'i phyag
335b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyurgya las mdzub mo gnyis dbus bkug ste mthe bong gnyis kyi steng du ral gri lhur byas pa ni khro bo ki li ki li'i phyag rgya'o/ / mA ma kI'i phyag rgya gzhibs pa'i tshul de nyid las phye ba ni rdo
335b4(rgyud 'bum): rje khro bro su ru su ru'i phyag rgya'o/ / mdzub mo gnyis ral gri ltar du byas te srin lag gnyis yid tsam gyis bstod pa ni nyi ma'i phyag rgya'o// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo gzhibs
335b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshogs bkug pa ni 'phags pa mA ma kI'i snying po'i phyag rgya'o/ / rtsa ba'i phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis tshigs dang por bzhag la/ srin lag gnyis kyi rtse mor mthe
335b6(rgyud 'bum): bong gnyis kyi thor to la so sor bzhag pa ni dpal gyi rgyud kyi dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las mthe bong gnyis kyi drung du bkug ste cung zad sbyar ba ni ma tang gi mig gi phyag rgya'o//
335b7(rgyud 'bum): mthe bong gnyis gzhibs pa'i phyi rol gyi ngos la mdzub mo gnyis bzhag pa ni grub pa'i phyag rgya'o// de ltar de lta bu'i tshul gyis phyag rgya grangs med par 'byung ngo // phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo
336a1(rgyud 'bum): las mthe'u chung dang srin lag gnyis bsnol te mthe bo'i drung du bzhag la/ gung mo gnyis kyis mdzub mo gzhibs par dkris nas mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug pa ni rnam
336a2(rgyud 'bum): gdong gi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las tha mal par sbyar ba ni rna cha gdong gi phyag rgya gnyis pa'o// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las gshibs pa'i kha phye ba ni dga' byed gdong gi phyag rgya'o// sor gnyis
336a3(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyi phye ba ni khro bo cher bzhad kyi phyag rgya'o/ / gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo srin lag gnyis kyi rtse mor sbyar ba ni rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya'o// mthe bo'i tshogs bstod de klu mgo lngar byas pa ni skrag byed chen
336a4(rgyud 'bum): po'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las snyim pa'i tshul du byas la mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mo sdud de kha sbyar ba ni spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// mthe bong gnyis brkyang ba ni slar gtang ba'i phyag rgya'o// mthe bong
336a5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis bkug pa'i thor to nang du bcug pa ni rdo rje d+h+r-i gi ri ti'i phyag rgya'o/ / rna cha gdong gi phyag rgya gnyis pa las mthe bong gnyis sbas pa ni rdo rje ser skya'i phyag rgya'o// gzhibs pa las sor gnyis
336a6(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyis phye ste mthe bong bstod pa ni gdon skrag par byed pa dang bcing bar bya ba yin no/ / gzhibs pa'i rtse mor gung mo gnyis kyis bkab ste bsdams pa ni gtsug nas 'byung gi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du
336a7(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo phye ste dbus su bkug nas gung mo gzhibs pa la gzhar ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi phyag rgya'o/ / gung mo sbas pa mdzub mo gnyis rtse gcig pa'i tshul du bya ba ni sgrol ma'i phyag rgya'o//
336b1(rgyud 'bum): de nyid las mdzub mo bkug pa ni khro gnyer can gyi phyag rgya'o// cung zad phye ba ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o// mthe bong gnyis sbas pa ni rdo rje rtse gcig gi phyag rgya'o// cung
336b2(rgyud 'bum): zad brkyang ba ni rdo rje sgrog gi phyag rgya'o/ / mthe bong yang gzhibs la mthe'u chung yang gshabs pa ni rdo rje gdong gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las phye ba ni rdo rje sel gyi phyag rgya'o// gung mo gcig bsgreng ba ni
336b3(rgyud 'bum): gtsug pud kyi phyag rgya'o/ / mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ba ni rdo rje gdong gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las thur du bstan te mthe'u rlung dang lhan cig sprad pa ni rdo rje na mkha' lding gi phyag rgya'o// srin lag gnyis sbyar
336b4(rgyud 'bum): ba ni khro bo 'chol pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / de ltar de lta bu'i tshul du phyag rgya grangs med par 'byung ngo // rna cha gdong gi phyag rgya nyid las gung mo gnyis gzhabs pa la mdzub mo gnyis kyis dkris pa ni gdong dmar
336b5(rgyud 'bum): gyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje ltar byas pa ni spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// gtang nas gyen du glod de bzhag pa ni slar gtang ba'i phyag rgya'o// spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong
336b6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis bstod de bzhag pa ni gdon 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las mthe'u rlung dang srin lag gnyis sprad de sbyar ba ni rdo rje rigs kyi mdzes ma'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mthe bong gnyis
336b7(rgyud 'bum): sbas pa'i ni dbang phyug chen po'i mig gi phyag rgya'o/ / mdzub mo gnyis bkug pa las btang bas gung mo gzhibs pa'i sen mo gnyis kyi phyi rol nas bstan pa ni rigs gsum spyi'i phyag rgya chen po
337a1(rgyud 'bum): yin te/ rig sngags thams cad srung ba dang / dbang bskur ba thams cad dang / las thams cad la dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen po yin no// spyan drang ba'i phyir
337a2(rgyud 'bum): yang sbyar bar bya'o/ / de las mthe'u chung btang ba ni me lce 'bar ba'i phyag rgya ste/ rig sngags thams cad bcing ba dang grol bar byed pa yin no// de ltar de lta bu'i tshul gyis phyag rgya grangs
337a3(rgyud 'bum): med par 'byung ngo / / rkang pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i tshul du bzhag nas mdzub mo gcig drang por bsrangs te lta ba'i dmigs su gtad la/ lag pa g.yas pa'i rdo rje mdun logs su bzhag nas
337a4(rgyud 'bum): sta zur gyi phyogs su bstan pa ni rgyal ba rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las dpung pa brkyang la khro bo'i lta ba byas te bsdigs pa ni khro bo srog med kyi phyag rgya'o// de las mthe bong dang gzhibs pa ni
337a5(rgyud 'bum): khro bo rab tu gtum pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las g.yon brkyang gi tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje dbyug sngon gyi phyag rgya'o// khro bo thams cad kyi spyi'i phyag rgya snga ma las mthe bong brkyang ba ni zhabs las
337a6(rgyud 'bum): byung gi phyag rgya'o/ / rdo rje de nyid bstod de bstan pa ni rdo rje pho nya mo'i tshogs thams cad kyi spyi'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las snying khar rdo rje byas pa ni khro bo gtum po'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon
337a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sor mo gsum bcum la mthe bong gnyis kyis mdzub mo'i sen mo mnan te snying kha'i phyogs su bzung la/ lag pa g.yas pa'i rdo rje bstod pa ni khro bo lha'i yan lag gi phyag rgya'o//
337b1(rgyud 'bum): de nyid las lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo btang ste/ de bzhin du bzung ba ni gdon zhi bar bya ba'i phyir pho nya mo thams cad kyi spyi'i phyag rgya yin no// de bzhin du mdzub mo dang gung mo brkyang ba
337b2(rgyud 'bum): ni rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las mdzub mo cung zad bkug ste g.yon brkyang ba'i tshul du byas pa ni spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'o// gung mo'i rtse mos mthe bong bkab ste mdzub
337b3(rgyud 'bum): mo brkyang ba ni gdon 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / rtsa ba'i phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo dang srin lag gnyis kyis phyi rol nas dkris la g.yas brkyang ba'i tshul du byas pa ni mi bzad pa'i phyag rgya'o//
337b4(rgyud 'bum): de nyid las g.yon brkyang ba'i tshul du byas pa ni rnam par rgyal ba mi bzad pa'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid mgo bor bzhag pa ni 'jig pa'i phyag rgya'o// rkang pa g.yas brkyang gi tshul du byas la
337b5(rgyud 'bum): lag pa g.yon pa sta zur gyi phyogs su bzhag nas/ g.yas pa'i mthe bong gi ngos kyis mthe'u chung dang srin lag bsnol ba mnan te/ gu mo bsgrengs la mdzub mo cung zad bkug nas rna ba'i
337b6(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su bzhag pa ni bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las mthe bong btang ba ni lhag kyu ma'i phyag rgya tha dad pa yin no// g.yon brkyang gi tshul du byas la la
337b7(rgyud 'bum): pa g.yon pas de bzhin du byas pa ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o/ / rtsa ba'i phyag rgya nyid las rkang pa bsnyams te bsgreng ba ni sa'i lha mo'i phyag rgya'o// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya las rkang pa gnyis bskum la
338a1(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo brkyang ste bstan pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i gdon zhi bar bya ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / mdun logs su mdzub mo gcig gi dbus bkug ste bzhag la gung mo brkyang ste bstan pa
338a2(rgyud 'bum): nirdo rje gdan gyi phyag rgya'o/ / g.yon pa'i sor mo gnyis kyang de bzhin du byas pa ni lha'i phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo gcig pu ni 'jam dpal gyi phyag rgya'o// gung mo ni rdo rje mdzes ma'i phyag rgya'o
338a3(rgyud 'bum): g.yas brkyang gi tshul du gnas la lag pa g.yon pa'i sen mo rnams sbas te/ khu tshur bcad nas de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa'i rdo rje brkyang ste blta ba'i dmigs su gtang pa ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi
338a4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'o/ / mdzub mo steng du bzhag pa ni snying po'i phyag rgya'o// gung mo'ang de ltar byas pa ni nye ba'i snying po'i phyag rgya'o// gung mo dang mthe bong gnyis sbyar la sor mo gzhan rgyab tu ba
338a5(rgyud 'bum): pa ni rdo rje 'joms ma'i yin te/ phyogs bzhi srung ba yin no// g.yas brkyang gi tshul gyis lag pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje g.yas pa'i dpung mgor bzhag la/ lag pa g.yas pa'i rdo rje bstod na
338a6(rgyud 'bum): dpung pa g.yon pa rna thabs su bzhag ste blta ba'i dmigs su gtad pa ni rdo rje phag mo'i phyag rgya'o/ / g.yon brkyang gi tshul gyis lag pa g.yon pa bkan la mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis
338a7(rgyud 'bum): bkug ste pad+ma'i rtsa ba ltar byas la/ g.yas pa'ang de nyid dang 'dra bar bzhag pa ni lus dmar gyi phyag rgya'o// 'bar ba'i phyag rgya'ang de nyid yin no// snying po gang nas 'byung ba'i phyag rgya'ang
338b1(rgyud 'bum): de nyid yin no/ / rdo rje b+h+r-i gi ri ti'i phyag rgya'ang de nyid yin no// g.yas brkyang gi tshul gyis lag pa g.yon pa bkan te brkyang la mthe bong dang mthe'u chung so sor bskyed nas sor mo lhag ma
338b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams klu mgo'i gdengs ka wAr gzhag/ g.yas pa'ang mtshan nyid de dang 'dra bar byas la/ gzhu gengs pa ltar gru mo rna ba'i phyogs su bzung ba ni klu chen po'i phyag rgya'o// khyab 'jug
338b3(rgyud 'bum): gi 'dug stangs kyis mthe bo'i sen mo rkang pa g.yon pa'i 'og tu sbyar te/ lag pa stengs dang bcas par sbyar ba'i mthil gyis brdeg cing lag pa bsnol bas bzung la/ pho long gi thabs su gyen du
338b4(rgyud 'bum): sbar zhing lag pa bskor te bkan pas nu ma'i bar du brdeg cing bskor la/ lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil logs kyi sor mo la bltas nas/ mig gyen khar bsgyur te bteg la glog sgyur ba'i phyag
338b5(rgyud 'bum): rgya'ang bcings nas g.yon pa'i sor mo rdo rje chen po bstod pa byas na/ des lha dang / gnod sbyin dang / lha ma yin dang / klu dang / srin po rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang / 'gram na
338b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa thams cad dang / tshangs pa dang / skem byed dang / dbang chen dang / drag po la sogs pa'i snying la glog 'gyu ba'i shugs 'di bab pas 'ong bar 'gyur te/ mthu stobs bcom nas
338b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i rjes su mthun pa dang dul zhing rdo rje la 'dud par 'gyur ro/ / de dag gi phyir zhi bar byas na de'i tshe phyag rgya de snying khar bkrol ba de dag de'i mod las mthun par bde bar 'gyur ba'i phyir dang zhing
339a1(rgyud 'bum): byams pa'i sems dang ldan par bzlas brjod bya'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid 'byung ste/ lag pa g.yon pa phyir bstan
339a2(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa nang du bstan te gcig tu sbyar nas/ lag pa'i sor mo rnams kyi g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung nas brtsams te re re nas bzung ste dkris la/ gru mo bsnams nas phyag rgya snying khar bzhag
339a3(rgyud 'bum): ste mthe bong gnyis kyis so so'i srin lag mnan la/ lag pa gnyis phyir bstan pa ni bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o// thabs de nyid las lag pa gnyis bkan
339a4(rgyud 'bum): pa ni bcings pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa gnyis ka'i mdzub mo dang mthe bong gdu bu ltar phan tshun sprad pa 'di ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud tha dad pa yin no// mthe bong gnyis bkyed pa ni rdo rje sgrog gi phyag
339a5(rgyud 'bum): rgya'o/ / g.yon pa bkan la g.yas pa khas phub ste sor mo rnams gcig la gcig bsdams pa 'di'ang rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi phyag rgya yin no// de las khu tshur bcangs te mthe bong gnyis brkyang
339a6(rgyud 'bum): ba ni rdo rje thog gi phyag rgya'o/ / sor mo rnams phye ste khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis kyis mnan te sgra dang bcas par brdang pa ni dgrol ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo'i sor mo
339a7(rgyud 'bum): bsnyams la mdzub mo gnyis so sor bkug ste gung mo gnyis ngos la bstan pa ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya'o/ / phan tshun bsnol te snyim pa bzed la mdzub mo gnyis kyi sen mo gcig gis
339b1(rgyud 'bum): gcig bkab pa ni spyan drang ba yin no/ / de las bzlos pa ni slar gtang ba yin no// de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyi rdo rje tho ba phrag pa logs su bzhag ste lta stangs kyis snying la
339b2(rgyud 'bum): bsdigs pa ni khro bo'i phyag rgya'o/ / yig 'bru bcu pa'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje dbyug pa'i yin no// de nyid las bstod pa khro bo 'gro ba'i phyag rgya'o// mthe bong bkyed pa ni gzhom pa'i phyag
339b3(rgyud 'bum): rgya'o/ / g.yas pa'i mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyis g.yon pa'i khu tshur bzung la/ mdzub mo dang / gung mo dang / srin lag rnams brkyang ste mdung rtse gsum pa'i dbyibs ltar byas pa ni
339b4(rgyud 'bum): gtsug nas byung gi phyag rgya'o/ / me lha spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya'ang de nyid yin no// g.yon pa'i srin lag dang gung mo sbas pa ni gtsug nas byung gi phyag rgya tha dad pa yin no// lag pa g.yon pa'i srin
339b5(rgyud 'bum): lag dang gung mo bkug pa ni mthe bos bzung la mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ba ni rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid mdzub mo'i thor to mthe bo'i rtse mo logs su btud pa 'di ni rdo rje
339b6(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs byed chen po'i phyag rgya tha dad pa ste rdo rje rtse gcig pa yin no/ / gzhan yang nam mkha' lding dang dpal gyi be'u'i dbyibs de las mthe'u chung dang srin lag gnyis kyi thor to bkug pa ni mig gi phyag
339b7(rgyud 'bum): rgya zhes grags so/ / mthe'u chung dang / srin lag dang / gung mo rnams kyi thor to legs par bkug pa ni khro gnyer can gyi phyag rgya'o// ming med dang / gung mo dang / srin lag dang / gung mo
340a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi thor to legs par bkug pa ni khro gnyer can gyi phyag rgya'o/ / mdzub mo dang / gung mo dang / sprin lag dang / mthe'u chung rnams sprad la/ mthe bong gnyis
340a2(rgyud 'bum): kyi thor to gung mo dang srin lag gi mtshams su bzhag pa ni rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las srin lag dang gung mo gnyis kyi tshags nang du bkug ste/ mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ba ni rus
340a3(rgyud 'bum): sbal gyi phyag rgya gnyis pa yin no/ / lag pa gnyis bla 'og tu bstan te bsnol la/ sor mo rnams gcig la gcig dkris nas mthe bong dang mthe'u chung rnams sprad pa ni rus sbrul dang rdo rjes
340a4(rgyud 'bum): 'og gi phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa gnyis ka khu tshur bcangs la gung mo brkyang ste rdo rje ltar byas nas g.yon pa'i mdzub mo brkyang ba ni rdo rje dbyug pa'i phyag rgya'o// sgrol ma'i phyag rgya nyid las mdzub
340a5(rgyud 'bum): mo gnyis kyi thor to nas gang tsam gyis phye ba ni rdo rje yang pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / nas gnyis tsam gyis phye ba ni bdud rtsi thal sbyor gyi phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni kun tu yangs pa'i phyag
340a6(rgyud 'bum): rgya'o/ / de nas mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste sprad pa ni pad+ma yangs pa'i phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo gnyis brkyang mar brjod pa ni rdo rje sa 'og gi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las gung mo gnyis kyi thor to'i tshogs
340a7(rgyud 'bum): dang po gdu bu ltar bkug la/ mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo sprad pa ni rdo rje dgra sta'i phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo brkyang ba ni ral gri dang dgra sta'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las gung mo dang srin lag
340b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis thor to bsnol te sbyar la/ mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung brkyang ste gung mo dang mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mo sbyar ba ni rdo rje seng ge'i khri'i phyag rgya'o// 'dzub mo dang gung mo gcig la gcig bstan
340b2(rgyud 'bum): la/ mthe bong brkyang ste sbyar nas mthe'u chung yang brkyang ste sbyar ba ni rdo rje lcags mda'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis bsnol la mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ste sor gnyis tsam gyis phye ba ni rus
340b3(rgyud 'bum): sbrul gyi phyag rgya dang phur bu dbyung ba'i phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa gnyis bsnol te sor mo thams cad sbyar bar bya ba ni rdo rje ra ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis bkan la mthe'u chung nang du sbyar te mdzub
340b4(rgyud 'bum): mo dang / gung mo dang / srin lag rnams rgyab tu bsgrengs nas mdzub mo dang / gung mo dang / srin lag rnams kyis mnan te/ mthe bong gnyis rus sbal gyi phyag rgya bzhin du byas pa ni shes
340b5(rgyud 'bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / srin lag nang du bkug la mthe bong gnyis kyi tshags drang por mnan/ mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo gung mo gnyis kyi tshogs dang por sbyar nas mthe'u chung
340b6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis drang por sbyar ba ni mtshon cha chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las mdzub mo gung mo gnyis kyi sen mo la brten pa ni mtshon cha mchog gi phyag rgya'o// mtshon cha chen po'i phyag rgya de nyid las
340b7(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo gnyis gung mo gnyis kyi tshogs dang po'i bsrubs kyi glor bzhar ba ni mtshon cha'i shugs kyi phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis kyi thor to gung mo'i tshogs dang po nas cung zad bkug
341a1(rgyud 'bum): ste gung mo gnyis kyi tshogs dbu mar sbyar ba ni mtshon cha'i snying po yin no/ / mtshon cha chen po de nyid las sprin lag dang mthe bong ngos sbyar ba ni tshol ba'i mtshon cha'o//
341a2(rgyud 'bum): lag pa'i phyag rgya drang thabs su sbyar ba ni dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya yin te phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya dang 'dra'o// nam mkha' lding gi dpal be'u'i phyag rgya ltar srin lag phye ste mthe bong gnyis drang
341a3(rgyud 'bum): por gzhibs pa'ang rdo rje dbyug sngon gyi phyag rgya'o/ / de nyid las mthe bong gnyis kyi tshogs dang po legs par bkug ste srin lag gnyis kyi drung du brten pa ni rdo rje dbyug pa'i phyag rgya'o// mda' bo
341a4(rgyud 'bum): che'i dbyibs ltar gung mo gnyis kyi drung du mthe bong gnyis gzhibs pa'i rtse mo bkug pa ni gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o/ / pad+ma'i gdan gyi dbyibs ltar byas te gung mo gnyis kyi thor to sprad pa ni
341a5(rgyud 'bum): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o/ / mthe'u chung dang srin lag gdu bu ltar bkug la de bzhin du spyad/ gung mo gnyis gzhibs pa mnan nas gzhibs pa'i tshogs dang por mdzub
341a6(rgyud 'bum): mo gnyis gzhar ba ni 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma'o'o/ / de nyid las mthe bong gnyis srin mo spang ba de la srin lag gnyis sbyar ba ni lus las byung gi phyag rgya'o// thal ba'i khu tshur ni 'joms byed lnga
341a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa gnyis bkan te sor mo'i phyi rol du bsnol mar brkyang la/ mdzub mo bsrang ste thor to sbyar nas mthe bong brkyang nas mdung rtse gsum pa'i dbyibs ltar byas pa ni lha mu'i phyag
341b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyu'o/ / mthe'u rlung dang srin lag gi thor to mthe bos mnan la sor mo lhag ma rnams brkyang ste mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis ba kan te sor mo'i dbyibs ltar byas pa
341b2(rgyud 'bum): ni lus dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa gnyis kyi glang po che'i sna'i dbyibs ltar byas pa ni 'jigs byed kyi phyag rgya'o// smin ma'ang bkug pa ni khro bo dbang phyug gi yin te/ 'di dag
341b3(rgyud 'bum): ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po bco brgyad kyi phyag rgya yin no/ / mdzub mo gnyis so so'i gung mo'i drung du bkug pa ni log 'dren rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa'i khu tshur nam mkha' ltar// khong
341b4(rgyud 'bum): stong sbyar nas de bzhin du/ / mthe bong gnyis kyang bstod pa ni// tshangs pa zhes ni bya bar bshad// mthe bong gnyis ni btud nas kyang // cung zad bstod pa khyab 'jug gi/ gung mo gyen
341b5(rgyud 'bum): du bsgreng byas la/ / de yi steng du mdzub mo dang // mthe bong lhan cig bzhag pa ni// nyi ma yi ni yin par bshad// g.yon pa'i sor mo bzhi po rnams// g.yas pa yis ni btsum par bya//
341b6(rgyud 'bum): de ltar khu tshur bcang byas nas// mthe bong gnyis ni bskyed de sbyar// g.yon pa mthong bar byas pa ni// mig g.yon gyi ni phyag rgya yin// lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong dang // mdzub mo
341b7(rgyud 'bum): yang ni de bzhin sbyar/ / sor mo gsum po rnams kyang ni// mthe bong lhan cig sbyar bya zhing // byi la'i sder mo'i dbyibs 'dra ba// zhabs kyi snying po'i phyag rgya 'di// 'jig rten gsum gyi
342a1(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa yin/ / sor mo dag ni bzhi po rnams// lag pa g.yon pas bcang bar bya// g.yon pa'i mthe bong bskyed nas ni// g.yas pa yang ni bstod par bya// drag
342a2(rgyud 'bum): pa gnyis kyi rgyab tu ni/ / rtag tu 'dug par bya ba yin// sor mo yi ni mdzub mo dang // gung mo'i tshogs kyi bar du ni// mthe bong gnyis kyi tha ma'i tshigs// sbyar zhing legs par gzhag
342a3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / g.yon pa'i mkhrig ma'i phyogs su ni// g.yas pa'i mthe bong brten byas pa// seng ge'i rna ba 'dra ba ste// phyag rgya dpal ldan snying po yin// phyag rgya gsum po 'di dag ni//
342a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khrul 'khor rnams kyi snying por bshad// 'di dag gis ni sbyar byas shing // gsang sngags ldan par byas na ni// 'khrul 'khor 'od 'bar gang yin dang // 'khrul 'khor rtse mo mi bzad
342a5(rgyud 'bum): gang / snang ba dang ni mi snang dang // che chung dang ni dkar nag rnams// thams cad kyang ni 'jigs 'gyur te// 'di la spyad par mi bya'o// 'khrul 'khor phyag rgya gsum bshad pa/
342a6(rgyud 'bum): b+h+yo tsugs gsum pa yin par bshad// de la gnyis ka'i sor mo ldan// 'og gi phyogs su brten bya nga // mthe bong 'didzi ni de bzhin no// klung mo gyen du bsgrengs nas ni// gnyis ka wAn
342a7(rgyud 'bum): cig sbyar bya ba/ / nam mkha' phyag rgyar brten pa ste// lha chen gyi ni yin par shes// bdag nyid dang ni ldan pa yin// g.yon pa'i gung mo gang yin pa// gnyis ka yini bar du bzhug
342b1(rgyud 'bum): lag pa gnyis ka'i sor mo yi/ / lhag ma yang ni dbyed par byed// mthe bong gnyis kyang bkyed bya ste// lha mo'i phyag rgya yin par bshad// mdor na phyag rgya 'di dag ni// byas rnams
342b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams grub pa ste/ / bgegs rnams zhi bar 'dod pa bzhin// rab tu bsgrims te sbyar bar bya// de las gzhan pa rgyud kun gyi// don kun sgrub par byed pa yi// phyag rgya spyi yi sgrub pa'i
342b3(rgyud 'bum): thabs/ / 'di dag kyang ni bshad par bya// spyan drang la sogs don rnams la// srung ba la sogs las rnams las// sgrub pa pos ni rim bzhin du// phyag rgya 'di dag sbyar bar bya//
342b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya kun gyi cho ga yi// gtang ba dang ni dgug pa la// shin tu bzlas pa'i sgrub pa po// bgegs rnams dang ni log 'dren gyis// ring du yongs su spong bar byed// thog mar las ni thams
342b5(rgyud 'bum): cad la/ / bgegs kun zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// bgegs rnams kun gyi dgrar gyur pa// bdud rtsi thab sbyor bshad par bya// lag pa gnyis ka'i mthe bong gnyis kyis mthe'u chung gi sen mo
342b6(rgyud 'bum): mnan la/ sor mo lhag ma rnams kyi bar nas gang tsam gyis phye ste rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas la/ de nyid las bsnol te dpung mgor bzhag nas mche ba mnan la drag tu lta zhing khur ba bus te rkang pa
342b7(rgyud 'bum): phral la 'greng zhing / g.yas brkyang gi tshul gyis lus btud ba ni 'phags pa bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'o// 'di mngon sum du bstan te/ log 'dren rnams dang gdon gzhan rnams
343a1(rgyud 'bum): chings shig ces byas na bcings par 'gyur ro/ / lag pa g.yon pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa de ni las kyi rdo rje zhes bya'o// g.yas pa ni dam tshig gi rdo rje yin no// snyam
343a2(rgyud 'bum): bab kan la mthe'u chung gnyis bsnol ba'i bar du srin lag gnyis bzhag nas mdzub mo gnyis dbus bkug la gung mo gnyis gzhibs pa de'i tshogs dang por bstan te/ mthe bong gnyis glol
343a3(rgyud 'bum): bcar nas snyim pa'i thabs su byas pa ni khrus kyi phyag rgya ste/ khrus byed pa'i tshe de la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas phyag rgya'i chu mgo bor blugs na/ bgegs rnams las grol zhing khrus
343a4(rgyud 'bum): byas nas kyang 'jug par mi 'gyur ro/ / de nyid las mthe bong gnyis bar du bcug la gzhan thams cad snga ma bzhin du byas pa ni srung ba'i phyag rgya ste/ mgo bo dang / lag pa gnyis dang / snying kha dang
343a5(rgyud 'bum): lkog ma dang / gnas lngar rim pa bzhin gtug par bya'o// de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bkug mthe bong gnyis tshig dang po'ang nang du btud pa ni lha thams cad kyi spyi'i khrus kyi phyag rgya'o// srung ba'i phyag
343a6(rgyud 'bum): rgya las mdzub mo gnyis btang ste rdo rje'i tshul du byas pa ni srung ba chen po log 'dren thams cad 'joms par byed pa yin te/ snying khar bzhag la nyi ma gcig bzlas brjod byas na log 'dren gyis zin pa
343a7(rgyud 'bum): las grol bar 'gyur te/ gdon thams cad la'ang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o// g.yon pa'i sor mo gnyis kyis mthe bong sbas te gdu bu ltar 'dug pa'i nang du mthe'u chung dang mdzub mo gnyis dbus bkug
343b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i thor to bcug la/ lag pa g.yas pa sta zur phyogs su rdo rjer bya ste/ las thams cad la dri dang / me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pa thams cad la sbyar na bgegs 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro//
343b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje de nyid g.yon pa'i gung mo phyogs su bzung na gzi byin ster bar 'gyur ro// g.yon pa'i srin lag bsgrengs pa'i ngos la mthe'u chung dang gung mo bsnol ba bstan te/ mdzub mos mthe'u chung
343b3(rgyud 'bum): gi thor to dam du bzung nas mdzub mo dang gung mo thor to mthe bos mnan pa ni bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi mche ba'i phyag rgya ste/ gdon thams cad dang bgegs chen po rnams la sbyar bar bya'o//
343b4(rgyud 'bum): sor mo rnams phan tshun bsnol la mthe bong gnyis nang du bcug pa'i steng du mdzub mo'i tshogs gcig bkug ste/ gdu bu'i thabs su sprad pa ni chu bsal ba'i phyag rgya ste/ chu la bskor nas
343b5(rgyud 'bum): ci dga' bar khrus bya'o/ / rdo rje'i phyag rgya la mdzub mo bkug pa ni de nyid spyan drang ba'i 'o// gnyis ka brkyang ba ni slar gtang ba yin te/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgya yin no// lag pa
343b6(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa ni khro bo chen po'i phyag rgya ste/ bcing ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi skabs su bshad pa'i las gang dang gang yin pa de dang de la khro bo chen po sbyar bar bya'o// spyan drang ba dang
343b7(rgyud 'bum): slar gtang ba la'ang phyag rgya rnams ji lta ba bzhin du sngags dang sbyar bar bya'o/ / rigs kyi phyag rgya thams cad la'ang de dag nyid kyis sbyar bar bya'o// snyim pa las mthe'u chung dang srin lag pan
344a1(rgyud 'bum): tshun bsnol te mthe bong gnyis glo la gzhar/ mdzub mo glong de dbus bkug la gung mo gzhibs pa'i tshogs dang por bzhag pa ni rig gsum char gyi spyi'i mchod yon gyi
344a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'o/ / de bzhin du sor mo phrug gsum phan tshun bsnol la mdzub mo brkyang ba'i thor to sprad nas mthe bong gnyis kyi sbyor bzhag ste snyim pa'i thabs su byas pa ni me tog gi phyag rgya'o// u0f7f p
344a3(rgyud 'bum): a bkan la mthe'u chung gzhabs te/ de'i rgyab tu srin lag gzhibs te gzhar/ de'i rgyab tu gung mo gzhibs la mdzub mo gnyis logs shig tu brkyang ste/ gzhibs nas mthe bong gnyis glo
344a4(rgyud 'bum): la gzhar te snyim pa'i thabs su byas pa ni bdug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / snyim pa bzed mdzub mo gnyis cung zad bkug pa ni spyi'i lha bshos kyi phyag rgya ste nang du me tog gzhag par bya'o// lag pa g.yas
344a5(rgyud 'bum): pa skyabs sbyin gyi phyag rgyar byas la g.yon pa mkhrig ma nas gdu bu ltar bzang ba ni dri'i phyag rgya'o/ / lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mthe bong dang gung mo gzhibs pa ni spyi'i mar me'i phyag rgya'o//
344a6(rgyud 'bum): mthe bong dang srin lag gnyis kyis sngags kyi nor bu bzung la mthe'u chung dang gung mo brkyang ste/ mdzub mo'i dbus bkug nas gung mo'i rgyab kyi tshigs dang por bzhag pa 'di ni rig sngags kyi nor bu'i
344a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'o/ / snyim pa'i nang du sngags kyi nor bu blangs la gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas na dag par byas par 'gyur ro// lag pa g.yas skyabs sbyin gyi tshul du byas te bstan la mdzub mo bkug
344b1(rgyud 'bum): nas mthe bong yang lag pa'i mthil du bkug pa ni me spyan drang ba'i 'o/ / mdzub mo dang mthe bo'i thor to bkug ste lhan cig sbyar ba ni me slar gtang ba'i 'o// g.yas pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa de ni sems
344b2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' yin no/ / lag pa gnyis gung mo gnyis dang sprad de sbyar la gzhan bsnol nas bla 'og tu bstan te dra ba'i thabs su bya ba ni rdo rje dra ba'i 'o// mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gzhibs la mthe bong
344b3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis bkyed nas 'og dang thad kar sa la bzhag ste/ gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas na las thams cad las gzhi bsal ba dang yongs su bzung ba byas par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi spyi'i snying po'i
344b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya yin no/ / lha rnams la bstan na'ang lha rnams dga' bar byas pa dang / bskul bar byas par 'gyur ro// khro bo ki li ki la'i phyag rgya bcings la phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo las sor mo rnams
344b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyar ba ni mchod pa'i phyag rgya'o/ / bsnol mar sbyar ba ni phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya'o// me tog la sogs pa ma 'byor na'ang phyag rgya bcings pas 'byor pa byas par 'gyur ro// las thams cad
344b6(rgyud 'bum): la'ang bskrad pa ni las kyi rdo rjes bya'o/ / sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgya ni thams cad du rig sngags bsrung bar bya'o// sor mo phan tshun sbyar te khu tshur bcangs la gung mo gzhibs pa'i phyi rol du
344b7(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mo rdo rje ltar byas nas mthe bong gnyis glo la gzhar ba ni dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya ste/ ngan du byas pa dag la'ang srung ba chen po yin la/ nye 'khor du mtshams bcad de 'khor los sgyur ba
345a1(rgyud 'bum): bzlas brjod byas su zin kyang sus kyang rig sngags kyi mthu nyams par byed mi nus so/ / khro bo 'chol pa'i sbas pa'i phyag rgya la'ang bsrung bar 'gyur te/ 'di dag ni
345a2(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa rnams kyi spyi'i phyag rgya yin no/ / de las gzhan yang sbyin sreg gi gsang sngags las gang gi skabs su bstan pa lung las ji skad 'byung ba de dag la'ang las kyi phyag rgya sbyar bar bya'o//
345a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje'i rigs thams cad spyi'i yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis bshad do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo badz+ra d+ha ra s+ya/ na mo bid+yA ga na s+ya s+t+waM/ 'di ni snying po yin te
345a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du/ / rdo rje rigs chen de dang ni// rig sngags rigs ni thams cad kyi// rig sngags blon mo bdun rig dang // rig sngags yan lag bdun dang bcas// 'dod pa'i rdo rje 'dzin
345a5(rgyud 'bum): gyis bshad/ / dang po 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma// rig sngags rdo rje me tog bzhin// las mchog la ni gnyis pa yin// rdzu 'phrul dang ni stobs ldan pa// rdo rje sgrog ces bya ba dang // 'og pag
345a6(rgyud 'bum): ser mo gtum mo dang / / de bzhin rdo rje tshugs par dka'// rig sngags chen mo bdun de dag/ nyi ma bdun dang stobs mnyam zhing // sems can tshogs kun mchog rnams la// thal mo
345a7(rgyud 'bum): sbyar te phyag kyang bya/ / gzhan yang ya mtshan las 'das shing // dus kyi mtha' yi mi 'dra ba// rdo rje khro bo khro bo che// de la yang dang yang du 'dud// de bzhin rdo rje thog thag ni// 'byung po
345b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams la thog thog bzhin/ / gzung dka' rig sngags las kun byed// lho phyogs sgo ni srung ba dang // rdo rje khu tshur mchog sbyin dang // gtum po chen po stobs po che// bdag dang
345b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhan kun srung ba'i mchog/ byang phyogs sgo ni srung ba dang // pho nya chen mo grub pa bcu// de bzhin de dag g.yog mo rnams// pho nya ma ni drug cu bzhi// rig sngags tshogs ni sna tshogs
345b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / rdo rje dbyug pa nyi ma la// rdo rje rigs kyi slob dpon gyis// grub pa'i rdo rje cho ga yis// snying nas kyang ni phyag byas nas// de las gzhan rnams bshad par bya// las kyi dkyil
345b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gtso bo ni/ / ji bzhin du ni bris nas kyang // gdon gyi las rnams bsgrub par bya// gang gi ming ni spos tsam gyis// ma bcos par yang gdon rnams 'jig/ dbang po'i rgyal mtshan
345b5(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa yis/ / ma bcos lha min 'pham pa bzhin// 'byung po kun las grol ba'i thabs// 'jig rten kun tu mchog gyur grang // thams cad zhi bar byed pa yi// dam pa gang yin
345b6(rgyud 'bum): bshad par bya/ / gang zhig tshul bzhini dran byas shing // bsgrims te mchod pa byas na ni// 'byung po kun gyis mi tshugs la// 'jigs med bde bar gnas par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'jig rten
345b7(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon 'dra/ / 'jig rten gyi ni snang byed mchog/ 'byung po'i tshogs ni thams cad kyis// rtag tu lha chen bzhin du mchod// mchog gyur mchog gis mchod pa des// cho ga bzhin du rgyas
346a1(rgyud 'bum): par ni/ / gdon gyi mtshan nyid bar du yang // legs par rab tu bshad par bya// zla phyed yud tsam nyin mo dang // rgyu skar dag ni bzang ba la// gtsang zhing gos
346a2(rgyud 'bum): gtsang bgos pa dang / / bsdams shing nges par gnas pa dang // gtsang ma'i grogs dang ldan pa dang // gtsang ma'i lam du zhugs pa yis// yar gyi ngo ni tshes gcig gam// tshes
346a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis de bzhin lnga yang rung / / tshes drug gam ni brgyad dam bcu// bcu gsum yang na nya dag gi/ nyin par yongs su gzung bar bya// ba pa dang ni ba la pa// be shwa de bde bzhin te//
346a4(rgyud 'bum): yang na te'u tu la'ang rung // zhag phyed yongs su gzung bar bya// shwa ta me tra ba la dang // sha ra ma tha a bi tsi// dza ya se'u me'i yud tsam la// dkyil 'khor dam pa bya ba yi// bsgrims
346a5(rgyud 'bum): te lag na rdo rje dang / / rgyal dbang la ni phyag byas nas// zhi zhing sngan chad las byas pa'i// sa phyogs mkhas pas 'gro bar bya// kun dga' tshong dus gtsug lag khang // grong dang grong khyer
346a6(rgyud 'bum): byang shar mtshams/ / de bzhin lho nung mtshams kyang rung // mnyam zhing mdangs dga' mdog sdug dang // tshad ldan tshwa sgo med pa dang // rdo dang gseg ma rus pa dang // skyon kun med pa des mthong
346a7(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / de 'dra'i sa de rnyed nas ni// rdo rje lcags kyu dran bya zhing // shar phyogs nas ni gom pa dor// ha cang mi drag nod mi bya// rig sngags gang la dad pa yis// bdag nyid de nas bsrung
346b1(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / yan lag gsum po nas dang ni// yungs kar 'bras kyang gzhag par bya// de nas dkyil 'khor gnas der yang // dge ltas dag kyang blta bar bya// sngags kyis dag par byas
346b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i chus/ / thams cad legs par gtor bar bya// ba lang lci bas legs par sbyar// ku sha dag kyang gding bar bya// khru ni bzhi 'am drug gam brgyad// sa yi phyogs char thig kyang gdab//
346b3(rgyud 'bum): thig spud gsar zhing grims pa dang // ran pa dang ni mdzes pa dang // dri zhim dang ni blta na sdug/ gzabs pa dang ni legs pa dang // thung ngu dang ni sbom la sogs// ma legs mdud pa rnams
346b4(rgyud 'bum): med na/ / dri dang me tog mchod pa yis// shes rab can gyis thig kyang gdab// bu dag chog shes dben pa bde// chos la mi spong bde ba yin// 'tshe ba spangs pa 'jig rten bde// srog chags
346b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams la sdom pa dang / / 'dod chags bral ba 'jig rten bde// 'dod pa rnams las 'das pa dang // nga snyam nga rgyal zhi ba dang // dul ba 'dir ni mchog tu bde// bu dag rgyun las zlog pa yis//
346b6(rgyud 'bum): lam bgrod zab cing blta dka' ba// mun nag thibs pos bsgribs pa dang // 'dod la chags pas rtogs mi 'gyur// ngas ni dka' ba rtogs byas nas// skye bo rgyun bzhin 'khyam pa dang //
346b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa dag gi 'dun pa yis// bcings pa'i bar du bshad pa ste// 'di ni lag na rdo rje yi// yid 'ong ched du brjod pa brgyad// ki li ki lis bsrungs byas nas// nges par kun tu 'jigs
347a1(rgyud 'bum): pa med/ / byang phyogs yang na nub phyogs su// tshon rtsi la sogs de dag gzhag/ shar bltas lag pa g.yon pa yis// dri dang me tog 'phreng bas mchod// mtshon
347a2(rgyud 'bum): cha bsngags shing phyogs bcings la/ / thig gis grwa yang btsal bar bya// de ltar mnyam par bkod nas ni// khang pa gru bzhi bri bar bya// ji ltar thig ni gdab pa bzhin// thig dang mthun par
347a3(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par bya/ / rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu ma// ya mtshan de nyid dran par bya// nang gi khang pa mnyam pa dang // grwa bzhi legs par gnas par bya// grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad du// de
347a4(rgyud 'bum): yi tshad dang mthun par ni/ / rdo rje khang gnas rdo rje yi// dbus dang thog ma dbyibs legs shing // rtse mtho shin tu rgya che ba// shar du brten te gzhag par bya// rdo rje yi ni byang phyogs su/
347a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rig sngags gdab cing bya// dbus dang rtse mo legs pa yi// rgyal mtshan rtse mo nang du bsgreng // nub byung grwar ni gzhag par bya// rdo rje sgo ni nub tu 'dod// 'di ni gsang ba'i sgor bshad
347a6(rgyud 'bum): de/ / 'byung po thams cad 'jigs par byed// dkyil 'khor 'dod pas sgo de yi// byang phyogs kyi ni nye 'khor dang // lho phyogs su ni gang bshad pa// bsnyen te legs par gzhag
347a7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / gur kum dag ni yi bong ba// rgya skyegs khu bas sbyar ba'am// le brgan rtsis ni dmar byas pa'i// dar ni yid kun 'phrog byed pa// des ni ba dan byas nas kyang // shing nga
347b1(rgyud 'bum): dag la gdags par bya/ / sgo yi lho phyogs ngos su yang // de dag las gzhan gang 'dod pa'i// ku ran da yi 'phreng ba dag/ rdo rje rtse mor gdags par bya// yang na me tog dmar po yi/
347b2(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba sna tshogs bzang po gdags// rdo rje'i sgo ni don grub pa// 'gro dang mi 'gro 'jig rten gsum// 'di dag 'joms nus gang yin pa// sgo srungs gnyis kyang gzhag bya zhing //
347b3(rgyud 'bum): yang rig sngags bzhin du bya// grags pa gzhan yang gang 'dod pa// rdo rje thog thog lho phyogs su// rdo rje khu tshur byang phyogs gzhag/ rdo rje thog thog lho phyogs su// me tog yungs kar
347b4(rgyud 'bum): steng dag tu/ / dri sung zhim pos cher bsgos shing // dri dang me tog rgyas pa'ang gzhag/ rdo rje khu tshur stobs po che// dpal ldan de bzhin byang phyogs su// rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya yis/
347b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhag na glags ni rnyed mi 'gyur// 'jig rten gsum rgyal gang gang las// rdo rje 'dzin pa yid kyis bkug/ rdo rje khu tshur khu tshur gyis// bsnun na rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/ rdorje
347b6(rgyud 'bum): snying po'i khang pa der/ / g.yon logs nas ni 'jug par bya// de ni g.yas logs bskor ba yang // 'jig rten dag tu bshad par bya// 'khor kun dang ni lhan cig tu// rdo rje sgrog kyang
347b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bya/ / klu yi gtso bo nor rgyas bu// gzi can gnyis kyang grwa ru gzhag/ 'di gnyis klu kun bdag po ste// klu kun gyi ni gnas kyang yin// bram ze las byung dug can de/
348a1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan// 'di gnyis kyi ni mdun logs su// mkha' lding rnam par 'dud pa'i du// mkha' lding gi ni cho ga bzhin// rkang dang byis pa la
348a2(rgyud 'bum): sogs bskor/ / de nas 'byung po'i tshogs bdun dag/ cho ga bzhin du gzhag par bya// gnod sbyin kun dang ku be ra// de yi be con byang phyogs gzhag/ de nas klu chen tshogs rnams
348a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / bya ba sgrub po g.yog dang bcas// klu yi g.yog rnams mthu stobs ldan// de dag shar phyogs ngos su dgod// de nas phyi rol rig sngags tshogs// thams cad gzhag ste/
348a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug che// chos kyi ngang can gragags ldan ma// lha mo dka' bzlog zha 'bring ldan// lag na rdo rje lha chen dang // dka' bzlog gnyis kyi bar dag tu// rig sngags rigs dag gzhan
348a5(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / der ni lag na rdo rje yi// rdo rje 'bar bas rab tu gzir// de nas gra logs lha mo ni// ka ta ya na log 'dren dang // sna yon sum cu rtsa gnyis po// de dag las ni gang 'dod dang //
348a6(rgyud 'bum): de yi 'og tu dri za ni// skal chen brtson 'grus che ba rnams// shar du dbang po rdo rje dang // de bzhin dbang po lha yi tshogs// de yi 'og tu lha yi bza'// de nas khyab 'jug 'khor lor bcas//
348a7(rgyud 'bum): me dang drug ma bstan pa yi// me dang mdung thung grwa ru gzhag/ lho phyogs dang por lho phyogs kyi// 'byung po'i bya ba bsgrub pa gzhag/ de yi 'og tu gshin rje dang // gshin rje'i dbyug pa grul
348b1(rgyud 'bum): dum rnams/ / grul bum la sogs tshogs kun dang // ma mo rnams dang 'jig rten ma// bden bral grwa ni 'phags ma'i mdun// 'byung po'i tshogs kyis bskor bar bya// nub phyogs dang
348b2(rgyud 'bum): por skem byed ni/ / drag mo tshogs ni mang por bcas// klu dang mkha' lding grags ma rnams// de yi 'og tu gtor ma'i gnas// tsho li zhes bya rgya chen yang // der ni nges par gzhag
348b3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / de ltar de dag thams cad du// tshogs rnams thams cad bkod pa'i dbus// rdo rje dkyil 'khor nang dag tu// rdo rje dbyibs kyi stegs bu ni// shar nub phyogs su lta ba'i dbyings
348b4(rgyud 'bum): deyi dbyings legs gzhag par bya/ / de yi nub phyogs gnas su yang // rig sngags 'chang ni gus gnas shing // lag na rdo rje'i snying po ni// rab tu bsgrims te bzlas brjod bya/
348b5(rgyud 'bum): tsan dan phye ma la sogs spos// nas dang yungs kar la sogs dang // yang na de dag re re yis// lag na rdo rje thog mar bris// bdag nyid g.yon phyogs ngos la 'dug/ lha mo lho nub
348b6(rgyud 'bum): mtshams su gzhag/ g.yas pas dri dang 'phreng bas mchod// bdug pa sna tshogs dag kyi sreg/ shin tu bkra shis tshigs bcad kun// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'am// yang na
348b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dus pa chen po'i mdo/ / the tshom med par gdon par bya// de nas chos kyi rgyal po yi// chos kyi 'khor lo mkhas pas bri// dpal dang ldan pa lha yi lha// sangs rgyas sku gzugs
349a1(rgyud 'bum): 'od can bri/ / de nas rdo rje lcags kyu yis// rig sngags gus pas mchod cing bzlas// lha mo stobs chen de nyid dang // rdo rje ri bo bri bar bya// snying po
349a2(rgyud 'bum): lag na rdo rje ni/ / mtshon rtse gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi// tshul bzhin bri zhing rigs rnams kyi// blon mo bdun gyis bskor bar bya// pho nya mo bcu dpung gi mchog/ drug cu rtsa bzhis rjes 'bras
349a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / rig sngags tshogs ni thams cad dang // rdo rje khro bo yan chad bri// yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba dang // skal ldan mchog sbyin gzugs bzang 'dra// 'jig rten kun gyi thabs su ni//
349a4(rgyud 'bum): dus kun tu ni phyag bya ba// lha kun rig sngags chen mo ste// gnod sbyin 'byung po klu 'jigs byed// gdon chen dag ni stong phrag rnams// gcig pus gsod par byed pa ste// de yi ming
349a5(rgyud 'bum): ni brjod byas shing / / me tog bdug pas mchod byas na// gdon rnams bye ba stong phrag dag/ 'khyam par 'gyur zhing g.yo bar 'gyur// de yi dngos grub gzugs bzang bzhin// dpal
349a6(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan par mngon sum gnas/ / thams cad don ni sgrub pa pos// 'di la the tshom med par sgrub// sgrub pas rab dang 'bring la sogs// bshos dang bdug pa la sogs mchod// a
349a7(rgyud 'bum): ka ru spos du ru ka/ yungs kar gu gul shu dag dang // nir kun di dang shu la si// pad 'dra ma dang sbrang rtsi mar// ma hA bi sha la dang bcas// 'dir ni las kyang bya ba yin// thams cad
349b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa'i sgo dag tu/ / thams cad kyang ni 'byung bar bya// sgo ma yin pa gzhan dag tu// 'dir ni ci yang mi bya'o// zhe sdang gti mug rgyags dang myos// 'dod chags mi shes dbang gi
349b2(rgyud 'bum): kyang / / 'di la 'jug dang 'byung byas na// mi rnams myur du nad kyis 'debs// gdon rnams myos shing rgyugs pa yis// rdo rje dgal rdzi byed dam// rkang pas rdo rjer mo brdzis// myur
349b3(rgyud 'bum): du dam tshig nyams 'gyur te/ / de dag rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// myur du rdo rje chen pos 'joms// de dag gi ni rigs rnams kyang // rdo rje rig sngags tshogs kyis gzhag/ slob dpon yang na
349b4(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig shes/ / gdon gang dag gis brnyas byed na// rdo rje lcags kyu'i bzlas brjod dang // sbyin sreg dag gis de yi rigs// skad cig gis ni bcom par 'gyur// gzhan yang rdo rje
349b5(rgyud 'bum): rigs chen las/ / rig sngags 'dod gyur gang yin pa// de yang sngar ni bsgrub byas la// myos la sogs pas gdon rnams bskrad// gang phyir sgor yang 'grub pa'i phyir// rtag tu 'di
349b6(rgyud 'bum): ni nang dag tu/ / mchod pa'i tshogs ni brjod pa dang // brdeg pa la sogs las mi bya// gzhan yang nad gtang mang po dang // yi dgas 'byung po sha za dag/ dkyil 'khor spong bar
349b7(rgyud 'bum): byed pa dag/ de dag 'dir ni gshibs pa yi// drag po'i las la 'jug par bya// gzhig par bya ba gang yang rung // thams cad lho phyogs nang du bya// kun la me ni 'bar bar bya/
350a1(rgyud 'bum): bdug pa'i snod ni phyi rol gzhag/ lha bshos sna tshogs mdzes pa dag/ ci 'dod kun ni thams cad du// thams cad zad mi shes par bya// gdon gyi dkyil
350a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor pha rol gyi/ / byang shar mtshams su gang 'dod pa'i// lha yi phyag rgya'i tshogs kyang bri// pad+ma 'khor lo rgyal mtshan mdung // mdung thung dbyug pa be con ri// zhags pa rtse
350a3(rgyud 'bum): gsum kha gdeng dung / / gdon drag rnams la gnas par bya// gang na rig sngags gdon drag pa// mthu drag gnas pa de dag ni// mthu nyid kyis ni bsgrub bya zhing // 'di la dpyad par mi
350a4(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / dkyil 'khor de yi phyogs kun tu// 'byung po'i tshogs kun gnas kyang bya// gtor ma dang ni bdug pa rnams// rab tu rgyas pas mchod par bya// de nas gdon ni dul ba yis// /
350a5(rgyud 'bum): thems par gyur na mchod par bya// mi bzad la ni snar blugs dang // mig bsku ba dang btung ba dang // sbyin sreg sogs pas gzhig par bya// gdon gyis drug tu btab pa la// dal nas
350a6(rgyud 'bum): bzung bas yongs mi bya/ / dal nas byas pa sman pa nyid// mi bzad gdon gyis bcom par 'gyur// de phyir sman pa mi bzad pa// gtum zhing spyod pa rig pa dang // brtan mchog
350a7(rgyud 'bum): dga' zhing spo ba dang / / snying snyoms rig sngags brtson pa yis// khros nas mthu ni snyoms bya zhing // brdeg pa'am yang ni bsdigs par bya// dul ba'i gdon ni dang ba yis//
350b1(rgyud 'bum): de ma thag tu 'grub par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor phyi nang bcas par yang // gtor ma'i las ni bya ba dang // 'khur ba dang ni gzhibs pa dang // khwa zas ci 'byor rim bzhin dbul/

350b3(rgyud 'bum): par smra zhing dam tshig shes/ / slong dpon phyir ni 'dir brtson pa'i// skyob ma dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug/ thams cad kyi ni phyag rgya'i tshogs// skrag par bya dang mchod bya ba// de dag
350b4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad g.yon pa yis/ / rnam pa thams cad bstan par bya// rdo rje gom par 'dor dang 'jig/ cig car yongs su bsgyur ba dang // g.yon pas brdab par bya ba dang // rgyags pa'i seng
350b5(rgyud 'bum): ge sgra bsgrags dang / / mdzub mo bstan te hUM zhes bya// shin tu sgra yang rab tu bkyed// rdo rje rigs can skyes pa yi// slob dpon gyis ni bstan par bya// lha yi gdon ni thams cad kyi//
350b6(rgyud 'bum): nags kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs bshad pa// rkyen du bab pa gang yin pa'i// so so'i phyag rgya'i tshogs 'di yin// tshangs pa'i pad+ma lha chen mdung // gshin rje'i dbyug chen dam pa yin// khyab
350b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jug 'khor lo sman pa'i mi/ / nam mkha' lding gi sna dang 'ad // dbang po rdo rje me yi lce// chu lha yi ni zhags pa bstan// rlung ni dar gyi shugs can te// tan ta yi be con sogs// 'byung
351a1(rgyud 'bum): po'i gdon rnams thams cad kyi/ / lag pa g.yon pas de dag gzung // 'jug byed kyi ni 'khor lo rdzing // lta ba dang ni dor ro// dri ba dag ni thams cad kyi// gleng
351a2(rgyud 'bum): bu pi wang la sogs bstan/ / gar mkhan dag ni lhag par yang // gar dang rol mo'i cha byad bstan// gnod sbyin rnams kyis cher bgad pa// rab gtum gyi ni sgra chen te// ku be ra yi mtshan
351a3(rgyud 'bum): mang dang / / yang na phyag rgya'i tshogs kun yin// klu chen gdengs ka chas pa ste// lag pa g.yon pas mgo bor gzhag/ dbugs ni rgyun rings rgyu ba dang // mig dmar dug dang bcas pa yin//

351a7(rgyud 'bum): byed kyi ni rang bzhin tshul/ / mdung thung la sogs dpung la brten// ma mo'i gdon ni thams cad ni// rang gi lha yi mtshon mchog byed// pad+ma phyir dang thor tsug dbyug/ sngags ni nor du bskor
351b1(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / rig pa 'dzin pa 'phags pa rnams// tshangs pa'i phyag rgya bdun pa yin// mdung rtse gsum pa zla phyed dang // thor tsugs mig dang rgyal mtshan dang // khyu mchog smad 'byin
351b2(rgyud 'bum): ral gri rnams/ / dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya bdun// mdung thung dril bu ba dan dang // de bzhin ra dang bya gag dang // rma bya yi ni mjug ma rnams// gzhon nu'i phyag rgya bdun po yin//

353a1(rgyud 'bum): 'od dpa' dog mnyam/ / gza' dang rgyu skar skar ma la// de dag rtag tu rgyu bar byed// rna ba nya ba'i 'od zer gyis// phung po rgyas pa dag la gnas// rin
353a2(rgyud 'bum): chen kun gyis rab brgyan cing / / rtse nas ngos ni lha ldi dang // phug brgya dag gis gang ba yi// lhun po ril de dag gnas// gangs ri ro bo'i rtse mo dang // gangs kyi sul ni stong pa dang
353a3(rgyud 'bum): sman kun gyis ni rgyas pa yi/ / gsang rnams dang ni nags tshal dang // sman pa rgyas yongs su gang ba yi// spos dang ldan la de dag gnas// spos kyi ngad ni zhim pa yi// phyogs
353a4(rgyud 'bum): rnams dang ni rgyas byed dang / / dpag bsdam shing gis brgyan pa yi// skyed mos tshal chen dga' byed dang // lha rnams gzhal med khang rnams su// lha yi gzugs kyis gnas par byed//

353a7(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu 'khrugs par byed/ / dpyid zla'i dus la bab pa na// shing rnams kun lagadon de dag/ khu byug bung ba'i gzugs su gnas// chu klung chen po'i 'gram dag na// gling ma rnams
353b1(rgyud 'bum): dang rdzong rnams dang / / chu dmar dag gis rgyas pa yi// 'jing rnams na ni gnas par byed// chu rgyun yid du 'ong ba dang // chu rnams rab tu 'byung ba dang // khron pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
353b2(rgyud 'bum): ri bo dag drang cu rnams dang // sbrul gyi tshogs kyis gang ba yi// nags khrung chen po dag na yang // de dag sbrul du gzugs bsgyur nas// sbrul dang lhan cig dga' bar byed// ljon shing
353b3(rgyud 'bum): chen po mi bi zad dang / / 'byung po dag ni tshogs chen dang // khang stong dang ni yul stong dang // ba lang gnas ni gang ba dang // rgyal po dag gi dkor khang dang // pad+ma rnams dang gzhan dag kyang //
353b4(rgyud 'bum): glang chen gnas ni yid 'ong dang // rta rnams kyi ni bris ngag dang // gzhan yang grong khyer rnams dang gzhan// tshong dus dag na gnas par byed// chang 'thung gnas dang khyim dang gzhan// srang
353b5(rgyud 'bum): dang lam dang shing rta dang / / rgyu ba dag gi gnas rnams dang // bu mo la sogs lta ba'i rnams// skyed mos tshal rnying mi bzad dang // lha yi gnas ni zhibs pa dang // bu btsa' ba yi gnas gzhan
353b6(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'chi la thug pa'i khyim dag dang // dga' ston sa dang 'dus pa dang // 'dus stonas dang 'thab mo'i sa// g.yul gyis ni thams cad ni// gdon rnams rtag tu gnas par byed
353b7(rgyud 'bum): drug cu rtsa bzhi'i gdon bshad pa/ / yid ltar mgyogs shing 'dod dgur bgro// 'dod dgur 'gyur ba'i gzugs can de// thams cad rang dgar rtsen par byed// lha tshogs ma mo'i gdon drug
354a1(rgyud 'bum): bcas/ tshangs pa srung bar byed pa ste// bar snang gza' ni nyi ma yang // gdon rnams kyi ni gtso bor bshad// skem byed la sogs srin po'i bar// rdzong ldan
354a2(rgyud 'bum): ma dang glu gnyis dang / / srin po bcu dang lha mo dang // nor bu 'gul ni bar ma yin// grul bum la sogs yi dgas dang // brjed byed bcas dang srul por bcas// mngang 'phrog de bzhin skyo
354a3(rgyud 'bum): byed dang / / thams cad gdon gyi tha mar bshad// de dag gi ni khyad par bzhin// dkyil 'khor mngon par mchod byas nas// mngon par dga' bar bya ba yi// bstod pas mchod pa dag
354a4(rgyud 'bum): kyang bya/ / dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha// lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ shar phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la// mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// me sde bsreg bya ba zhes pa'i lha/
354a5(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po'i rgyal po gdor gyi bdag/ phyogs mtshams gdon gyi tshogs bcas la// mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// gshin rje dbyug pa 'chang ba'i lha// sa yi bdag po gdon gyi
354a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag/ brnab sems bdag nyid gdon bcas la// mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// bden dang bral ba legs ldan lha// srin po'i bdag po gdon gyi bdag/ sna tshogs gdon gyi
354a7(rgyud 'bum): tshogs bcas la/ / mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// zhags pa thogs pa chu yi lha// bden pa srung ba gdon gyi bdag/ nub phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la// mchod par byas te
354b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag kyang 'tshal/ / rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha// tshag srung gdon gyi bdag po ste// rlung gi tshogs kyi gdon bcas la// mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// gnod sbyin
354b2(rgyud 'bum): lag na be con thogs/ / nor srung gdon gyi bdag po ste// byang phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la// mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// dbang dang ldan pa 'dren pa'i lha// bgegs
354b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ dbang ldan phyogs kyi gdon bcas la// mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// 'og gi klu dang che ba'i lha// rgyal po chen po glang po che// dam tshig shes pa'i

354b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dang / / rig sngags tshogs dang gsang sngags dang // de bzhin phyag rgya'i tshogs kun dang // dam tshig shes dang slob dpon dang // tshangs pa la sogs lha chen dang / rdo rje
354b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa tshe yi lha/ / lag na rdo rje stobs po che// gtum po 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag/ 'jigs byed lag na rdo rje thogs// thams cad zhi bar byed pa ste// 'byung po'i tshogs ni kun
354b7(rgyud 'bum): gyis mchod/ / rnam pa kun gyis 'byung po kun// dus kun tu ni srung ba po// rig sngags bcas pa de dag dang // 'byung po'i tshogs ni thams cad la// bshos dang dri sogs snga
355a1(rgyud 'bum): tshogs rnams/ / des ni dga' zhing dbul bar bya// dam tshig shes pa rnams dang ni// 'byung po'i tshogs kyis bdag la srungs// de yi rgyas pa 'phel ba
355a2(rgyud 'bum): yang / bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad par gsol// sna tshogs tshig gis smra bar bya// zhi ba'i tshig ni yang dang yang // bdag gi bla ma'am yang na gzhan// dam tshig shes pa gzhan/

355a4(rgyud 'bum): ba dag gi gnas dang rten gyur dpal bskyed phyir/ / 'dir ni thams cad dus su phyogs rnams thams cad du// yongs su dag pa'i yid dang rnam pa thams cad kyis// thams cad zhi bar
355a5(rgyud 'bum): byed pa gsum du rab bshad pa/ / don rnams bsgrub pa'i phyir ni bla mas bya ba yin// las kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs so// // kun rig sems can kun gyis mchod//
355a6(rgyud 'bum): rig sngags bdag po kun gyis rjed// mtshungs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas ni// rnam gsum nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan// mtshan chen mang po mnga' ba ste// 'dom gang 'od chen 'chang ba dang /
